1a1(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa brgyad stong pa 'phreng ba can bzhugs lags so/
2a1(brgyad stong): rba
2a2(brgyad stong): bod skad du/ 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol
2a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po dang po//
2b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs
2b2(brgyad stong): rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/
2b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na/ bya rgod phung po'i ri la bzhugs te/ dge
2b4(brgyad stong): slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig go/
3a1(brgyad stong): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med
3a2(brgyad stong): pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang
3a3(brgyad stong): shes pa/ glang po chen po bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob
3a4(brgyad stong): ga/ srid pa kun tu sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu
3b1(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma tog pa
3b2(brgyad stong): ni/ 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab
3b3(brgyad stong): 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3b4(brgyad stong): pa las brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ nges par
3b5(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ khyod spobs par byos shig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ ci che
4a1(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa rab 'byer 'di bdag nyid kyi rang migs rab kyi skabs pa'i sbubs baspyang ba dang /
4a2(brgyad stong): ra kyi rnabs pa'i rnalas byin gyis brnangs pas/ byang sems dpa' sems dpa' na sa / sa ra
4a3(brgyad stong): byin pa nye bar ston par 'gyur ram/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mtha yin snyam mo// de nas sangs rgyas kyimathas/ tshe dang ldan par
4a4(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pagara'i bu'i tshul gyi sems pa chog pa de sems kyis shes nas che dang ldan pa ga'i phrul 'dzin
4a5(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams gang ci smra ba dang / sten pa dang / nye bar snyan pa
4b1(brgyad stong): dang / brjod par bya ba dang / gsal bar byed pa dang / yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
4b2(brgyad stong): skyes bu'i mtha' yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang bstan pa'i chos bstan pa de la bslob na de dag gis
4b3(brgyad stong): chos nyid de mngon sum du byas nas 'dzin to// de dag gis chos nyid de mngon sum du byas shing bzung nas/ gang dang gang 'chad pa dang /
4b4(brgyad stong): gang dang gang ston pa dang / gang dang gang nye bar ston pa dang / gang dang gang brjod par byed pa dang / gang dang gang gsal bar byed pa dang /
4b5(brgyad stong): gang dang gang yang dag par gsal bar byed pa de dag thams cad chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rigs kyi
4b6(brgyad stong): bu de dag 'di ltar chos nyid de nye bar ston pa rnams/ chos nyid dang mi 'gal ba de yang de bzhin gshegs pas chos bsten pa'i rgyu mthun
4b7(brgyad stong): pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang bcom ldan 'das
4b8(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad du rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/ ji ltar byang chub sems
5a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung
5a2(brgyad stong): ba de bzhin du/ khyod spobs byos shig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes brjod pa gang lags
5a3(brgyad stong): ba re la bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dag sa lag bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
5a4(brgyad stong): te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i chos de dag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab
5a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'am/
5a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sem dpa'i chos kyang bdag gis ma mtshal ba dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma
5a7(brgyad stong): 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rjes su
5a8(brgyad stong): bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang yang gal te 'di ltar sbas pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems
5b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' sems mi 'gor / kun tu mi zhum/ bag mi cha/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid
5b2(brgyad stong): phyir phyogs par mi bgyid/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par
5b3(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur na/ 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rjes su bstan par bgyi ba lags so//
5b4(brgyad stong): 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// 'di nyid shes rab kyi pha
5b5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la gdams pa lags so// gang de ltar gnas na de nyid 'di'i gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pa lags so//
5b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol
5b7(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa bsgoms pas/ ji ltar bslabs na 'di byang chub sems des kyang rlom sems su mi bgyid pa de ltar bslabs par bgyi'o//
5b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sems des ni sems ma mchis pa ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni 'od gsal ba lags so//
6a1(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la
6a2(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dem/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
6a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang cis sems med pa nyid gang yin pa'i
6a4(brgyad stong): sems med pa nyid de la/ yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod pa'am/ dmigs par yang 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang
6a5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor de ni med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/ med
6a6(brgyad stong): be med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam/ zhes smras
6a7(brgyad stong): pa'i khyod kyi rgal ba gang yin pa de ci rigs par 'gyur ram/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sa//
6b1(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems med pa nyid/ de yang gang yin/
6b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa de ni 'gyur ba med pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
6b3(brgyad stong): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar yang khyod bcom ldan
6b4(brgyad stong): 'das kyis nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa'i mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa legs so legs so// de bas na yang byang chub sems dpa'
6b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par nye bar brtag par bya'o//
6b6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ma bral ba rA yang
6b7(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// nyan thos kyi sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid
7a1(brgyad stong): mnyan par bya bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag pa rAg kun chub par ga/ rab tu gdon par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bsla' bar bya'o// rnam
7a2(brgyad stong): 'byor tu bya'o// rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la sleb par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid banyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya rab tu gdon
7a3(brgyad stong): par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ bzung bar bya/ bcang
7a4(brgyad stong): bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tha~Md thob par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o//
7a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslabs shing rnal 'byor du bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rgyas par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las
7a6(brgyad stong): bstan to// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par 'dod pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya/ bzung bar bya bcang bar bya klag par bya/ kun chub par bya ba
7a7(brgyad stong): tu gdon par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par bya ba'i byor rnal 'byor du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol
7a8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di nyid las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang la bslab par bya ba dang / rnal 'byor du bya ba'i sangs kyi chos tha~Md rgyas par bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
7b1(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i ming gang lags pa 'di nyid bdag gis ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
7b2(brgyad stong): pa yang ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'di nyid ma 'tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjesu ma mthong / shes rab kyi
7b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal migs yang dag par rje su mthong na/ byang chub sems glang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la gdams shing rje su bstan par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag
7b4(brgyad stong): gis dngos po ma tshal ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/ ming tsam gyis 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' zhes 'du ba dang 'god par bgyid pa ni/ bdag gi blo ba la gcags lag so//
7b5(brgyad stong): 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ming de yang gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags pa yang ma lag so// de ci'i slad
7b6(brgyad stong): zhe na/ ming de ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ltar ming de gnas pa ma lags shing mi gnas pa yang ma lags la/ gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags shing / gnas pa dang bral ba ma lags yang ma lags/
7b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'phong kun tu mi zhus
7b8(brgyad stong): bag mchi/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par mi bgyid bcom zhing byir phyogs par mi 'gyur mi dang kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur zhing / lhag pa'i
8a1(brgyad stong): / bsam pas mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bgyi'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sem pa'i
8a2(brgyad stong): sa la gnas pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das gan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing /
8a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa la gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la gnas
8a4(brgyad stong): par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te gzugs la gnas na gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lag so// de bzhin du gal te tshor ba dang 'du
8a5(brgyad stong): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa ma lag so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
8a6(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasasu 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa yang ma lagos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod
8a7(brgyad stong): su rdzogs par bgyid pa yang ma lag so// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur na/ yongasu mi bzung ba yong su bzung bas thang mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
8a8(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gzugs yong su gzung ba ma mchi so// de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tsher dang 'du shes dang 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa dang 'du byed
8b1(brgyad stong): rnams dang rnam par shes pa yongs su bzung ba ma mchis so// gzugs yongasu bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ de bzhin du tshor ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes
8b2(brgyad stong): gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams gang lags pa dang / rnam par shes pa yongasasu bzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yad
8b3(brgyad stong): yongs su gzung ba ma mchis so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa 'di la spang bar bgyi'o// 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
8b4(brgyad stong): po'i chos thaMd yongasu gzung ba ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ yangs pa mdun du bgyis pa/ tshad med par nges po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thaM de dang thun mong ma lags pa'o// /
8b5(brgyad stong): thaMd mkhyen pa nyid de yang yongasu gzung ba ma mchis te/ mtshan mar gzung ba ma lag so// gal te mtshan mar bzung bar gyur na/ kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba can 'di la dad par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ kun tu rgyu
8b6(brgyad stong): 'phreng ba can tha~Md mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjesu 'brang zhing phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes kyis zhug so// de zhugs nas kyang gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin to// de bzhin du tshe rab ma
8b7(brgyad stong): lags/ 'du shes ma lags/ 'du byed rnams ma lags/ rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin to// de la shes pa dga' ba dang bde bar yang yang dag par rje su mi mthong ngo // shes pa de nang gyi gzug
8b8(brgyad stong): kyi yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi rol kyi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi nang gi gzugs kyi yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes
9a1(brgyad stong): bde gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ngo // de bzhin du shes pa de nang gi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'a byed rnams kyi ma yin/ shes pa de nang gi rnam par shes
9a2(brgyad stong): ba'i yin par yang dag par rje su mi mthong / shes pa de phyi rol gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / shis pa de phyi nang gyi rnam par shes pa'i yin par yang dag par
9a3(brgyad stong): rje su mi mthong / shes pa de rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang dag par rjes mi mthong ste/ tshig gi rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu 'phreng ba can mos so// de thaMd mkhyen pa'i yis 'di la thad du dang
9a4(brgyad stong): pas rje su 'brang zhing chos nyid tshad mar bgyis te 'di ltar mos pa zhes bgyi'o// des chos gang yang yongasu ma bzung // gang gzung ba 'am/ gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos de dag gang yang ma dmigs
9a5(brgyad stong): so// de mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems su mi bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi ste/ gang
9a6(brgyad stong): gzugs yongasu mi 'dzin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnam par shes pa yongasu mi 'dzin la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang
9a7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dros pa bco brgyad rnams yong su ma rdzogs par bar ma dor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba ste/ de bas na bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
9a8(brgyad stong): po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
9b1(brgyad stong): bsgom pas 'di ltar nye bar brtag cing 'di ltar nges par bsam par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ ci star gang med pa dang mi dmis
9b2(brgyad stong): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam zhes/ gal te de ltar nye bar brtags de ltar nges par bsams na/ mi 'gong kun tu mi zhum bag michi/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur 'di'i ying phyir phyogs
9b3(brgyad stong): par mi bgyid bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dang kun tu mi skrag pa dang mi ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma
9b4(brgyad stong): bral bar rig par bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar gang gi tshe gzugs nyid gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid
9b5(brgyad stong): dang bral ba/ de bzhin du gang gi tshe tsher ba nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang 'du byed rnams nyid dang / de bzhin du 'di ltar gang gi tshe rnam par shes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral
9b6(brgyad stong): pa/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba/ gang gi tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thang mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba
9b7(brgyad stong): yin na/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan
9b8(brgyad stong): pa sha ri'i bul 'di skad ces smraso// che dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin po shA ri'i chu gzugs nyid gzugs kyi bo nyid dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tsho rab nyid dang 'du shes nyid dang /
10a1(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa nyid kyang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol
10a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa nyid kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / tha~Md mkhyen pa'i ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// shes rab
10a3(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni yis rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid ni mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid dang yang bral ba'o// mtshan nyid kyi gzhi yang mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i ngo bo
10a4(brgyad stong): nyid dang yang bral ba'o// ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang yang bral ba'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan
10a5(brgyad stong): ba rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thaMng la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i/
10a6(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang 'di la slob par 'gyur ba de thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu
10a7(brgyad stong): chos thad ni nges par 'byung ba med cing ma skyes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tha~Md mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyuraro// ci lta ci ltar tha~Mngad mkhyen
10a8(brgyad stong): pa nyid la zhi bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar sems can yongasu smin pa'iphyir/ lus dang sems yongasu dag pa dang / mtshan mongasu dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag pa dang sangs rgyas dang /
10b1(brgyad stong): nye bar yang 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye ba yin no// gzhan yang
10b2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las brtsams te 'di skad ces smraso// gal te gzugs la spod na mtshan ma la spod do// gal te gzugs
10b3(brgyad stong): kyi mtshan ma la spod ma mtshan ma la sbed do// gal te gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du sbed na mtshan ma la skrod do// gal te gzugs kyi ske ba la spod na mtshan ma la spod do// gal te gzugs
10b4(brgyad stong): kyi 'gag pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te gzugs kyi 'jig pa la spyod na mtshan ma la skrod do// gal te gzugs stong po'o snyam du sprod na mtshan mo la spod do// bdag spod do/
10b5(brgyad stong): snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spong ngo // bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod ni mtshan ma la sbe // bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam de dmigs pa nyid la sdod do// de bzhin du gal
10b6(brgyad stong): te tshe re ba dang 'du shes dang 'ang byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la sbed na mtshan ma lo sbed de// gal te rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la spod na mtshan ma le sprod do// gal te rnam par
10b7(brgyad stong): shes pa mtshan mo'o snyam du sbed na mtshan ma la spyod do// gal te rnam par shes po'i skye ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spod ngo do// gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'gog pa la skrod na mtshon ma la sbedado//
10b8(brgyad stong): gal te rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la spod na mtshan ma la spong ngo do// gal te rnam paro shes po stong pa'o snyam du spong na mtshan ma la sde do// bdag sbed snyam du spyod no mtshan pa la spyod do// bdag
11a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du spyod na mtshan ma la spyod// bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam na de dmigs pa nyid la spyod do// gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
11a2(brgyad stong): pa spyod pa ste// de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed pa yin no snyam du sems na de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni thabs mi mkhas par rigs par bya'o// de nas tshe dang
11a3(brgyad stong): ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci ltar byed na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
11a4(brgyad stong): spyod pa yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa shi ra'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
11a5(brgyad stong): chen po gzugs la mi spod / gzugs kyis mtshan ma la mi spod/ gzugs mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spyod/ gzugs kyi skye ba la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi 'gag pa la mi sbed/ gzugs kyi 'jig
11a6(brgyad stong): pa la mi spong / gzugs stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ bdag sbe do snyam du mi sprod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam tu mi spyod/ bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du dmigs pa la spyod
11a7(brgyad stong): da dang / de bzhin tu gal te tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnam la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa'i
11a8(brgyad stong): mtshan ma'o snyam du mi spod/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la mi spong/ rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa la mi spong/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa la mi spyod/ rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod/
11b1(brgyad stong): bdag spyod do snyam du mi spong / bdag byang chub sems dpa'o snyam du mi spyong / bdag byang chub sems dngo' snyad du dmigs pa la mi spyod cing / gal te yang de 'di snyam du gang de ltar spro dang de ni
11b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ste/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par bya ba yin no snyam du mi sems pa ste/ de lta spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
11b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la spyod pa yin no// de spyod kyang spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod do snyam du nye bar mi
11b4(brgyad stong): rtogs spyod pa yang ma yin la mi spyod pa yang ma yin pa nyid de snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyod par bya ba'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtogs/ spyod pang po bya'o snyam du yang nye bar mi rtogs/ spang bar bya
11b5(brgyad stong): ba yang yin la spang par mi bya ba yang yin ro// snyam du nye bar mi rtogs/ spyad par bya ba yang mi yin la spyod par mi bya ba yang ma yin pa nyid ngo snyam du nye bar mi rtogs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
11b6(brgyad stong): thams cad ni nye bar la rtogs shing ma zin pas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad len pa med pa zhes bya ba ste/ yang sa ma mdun du bas pa tshad med
11b7(brgyad stong): bar nges pazhan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thar mong du yin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ myur du bla na med po ya ngag par
11b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de nas sasra rgyas kyi mthus gnas bstan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'ang gang ting 'dzin 'dis gan pi byang
12a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam kyis// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rtsang
12a2(brgyad stong): bstan pa lags so// de ni ting nge 'dzin de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / ting nge 'dzin des kyang rlom semasu mi bgyid/ bdag ni mnyam par gzhag pa ste/ bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'dzago//
12a3(brgyad stong): bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyom par bzhag pa'o// bdag ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs pa'o snyam pa de lta bu de la thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad tu thams cad ma mchiso//
12a4(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smra so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang gis gnas na/ byang chub ses dpa' sems
12a5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin de bstan
12a6(brgyad stong): par nus sam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu des ni ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes/ yang dag par mi sheso// tshe dang ldan pa
12a7(brgyad stong): ga ri bu smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor mi shes yang dag par mi shes 'a zer rab/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa// tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bu mi shes yang dag par mi shes
12a8(brgyad stong): zhes zer ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin de med pas na mi shes yang dag par mi shes so// ting nge 'dzin de yang mi shes yang dag par mi shis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang lda
12b1(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ ji ltar yang khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus spongs pa dang / de bzhin pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyi bston pa ni rab 'byor legs so leg so// rab 'byor
12b2(brgyad stong): de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni de bzhin tu 'di la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na//
12b3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslob po// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shi ra'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
12b4(brgyad stong): de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags sam/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shi ra'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i
12b5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i
12b6(brgyad stong): bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos gang la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
12b7(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sra' pa ni/ chos gang la yang ba slang bo// de tso'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu chos
12b8(brgyad stong): de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye'o thos pa dang mi ldan pas ci ltar mngon par chags pa de bzhin du yod pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na de dag ci ltar mchis//
13a1(brgyad stong): // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu ci ltar med pa de bzhin du yang dag par yod de de ltar med pa de'i phyir ma rig zhes bya'o// de gral byis so so'i skye bo thos pa
13a2(brgyad stong): dang mi ldan pa rnams mngon par chags te/ de dag gis chos thams cad med pa la brtags so// de dag gis de la brtags nas mtha' gnyis la zhen pas chos de dag mi shes mi mthong ste/ de phyir
13a3(brgyad stong): de dag med bzhin du chos thams cad la rtog go// brtags nas mtha' gnyis la mngon par chagaso/ mngon par chags pa de'i gzhis dmigs pa la gnas nas 'das pa'i chos la rteg// ma 'dra ba'i ches
13a4(brgyad stong): la rtog go// da ltar byung ba'i chos la rtog go// de dag gis brtags nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen to// de dag gis med pa'i chos thams cad la brtags so// de dag gis med pa'i chos
13a5(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad la brtags pas/ lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du mi shes mi mthong ngo // lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma shes ma mthong bas khams gsum las nges par mi 'byung /
13a6(brgyad stong): yang dag pa'i mtha' khong du mi chung de/ de'i phyir de dag byis pa zhes bya'i grangs su 'gre'o// de dag ches bden pa la yid mi ches so// sha ri'i bu yang byang chub sems dang sems
13a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams ni/ chos gang la yang mngon par zhen par mi mi byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsal to// rtsa
13a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar thob na/ rnam pazad mkhyen pa nyid la sreb lags sa ma/ bcoM ldan 'dakyis bka' stsal ba ga'i dbyang chub seMs dngas sa dang gangs pa
13b1(brgyad stong): rnams thams na cad mkhyen pa nyid la mi slob ste/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos thams cad la slob do// sha ri'i bu byang chub ses dpa sa sa dang chen pode
13b2(brgyad stong): ltar slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur/ thams bcad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang
13b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig 'di skad du 'di ste/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur ma/ thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar 'gyur ram/
13b4(brgyad stong): thaMd mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram zhes de skad du yongasu 'dri na/ bcom ldan 'das de la ji ltar bstan par bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
13b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces rab 'byor de bas na 'dir khyod nyid la dri bar bya ba'i sa/ khyod kyis ci rnas pa de bzhin du ston cig ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes
13b6(brgyad stong): gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi banyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la/ gzug de bzhan
13b7(brgyad stong): nam de bzhin du sgyu ma de gzhan la/ tshor ba de gzhan nam/ 'du shes de gzhan nam/ 'du byed rnams de gzhan nam/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems sgyu ma de gzhan la/ rnam par shes pa de gzhan nas/
13b8(brgyad stong): rab byer kyis gsil ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ltam lags te/ sgyu me gzhan la/ gzugs de gzhan ra lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid sbyar lag so/ sgyu ma ning gdugs lanaso/ bco ldam sa
14a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du sbru ma de gzhan la/ tshor bde gzhan dang / 'du shes de gzhan dang / 'du byed rnams de gzhan yang ma lag te/ bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed nyid rnams
14a2(brgyad stong): sgyu ma lags so// sgyu ma nyid tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams lag so/ bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma de gzhan la/ rnam par shes de gzhan yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa
14a3(brgyad stong): nyid sgyu ma lagaso/ sgyu ma nyid rnam par shes pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po rnam pa lnga po 'di rnams la 'di lta ste
14a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i 'du shes dang / kun shes pa dang rnam par shes pa dang tha snyad 'di yin nam/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
14a5(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
14a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la ba slob pa des ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ nye
14a7(brgyad stong): bA len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sa lngar bcom ldan 'das kyis gzug ni sgyu ma lta bur gsung te/ gzug gang la/
14a8(brgyad stong): ba de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga pa de dag lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnam sgyu ma lta bur gsung shing / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ci
14b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa yang sgyu ma lta bur gsung te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga po de dag lag so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa la gsar
14b2(brgyad stong): du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bstan pa 'di thos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
14b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te theg pa lag sar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la kun tu skrag pa dang ldan pa /
14b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge' bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar gyur na ni/ mi da dang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi
14b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// de skad ces klu' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14b6(brgyad stong): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang rnams lags par rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ gang de dag la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'doms shing rjes su ston pa rnams dang / gad
14b7(brgyad stong): de dag la bdud kyi las rnams nye bar ston pa ste/ bdud kyi nyes pa ni 'di lta bur rig par bya/ bdud kyi nyes ni 'di dag yin/ bdud kyi las ni 'di dag yin par rig par bya/ bdud kyi lnga 'digra khyed kyis
14b8(brgyad stong): rtogs nas spang bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa rin po la yang dag par zhug pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag pa
15a1(brgyad stong): gnas pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen nas su rig par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsapa na/
15a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du rab 'byor 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i
15a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams su rig par bya'o// zhes bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' ba/ de la byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i
15a4(brgyad stong): gzhi don gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi'i don med pa yin no//
15a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ni chos thams cad kyi chags pa med pa la slob bo// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa'i don
15a6(brgyad stong): du gas pa med pan/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang cu gti ma ngan par rdzogs par 'chang bya ste/ rab 'byor byang nu ba don dugarker bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhin bya'o// rab 'byor
15a7(brgyad stong): rjes gsol ba bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang 'di skad dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das rgyu ba'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes
15a8(brgyad stong): bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang / sems can gyi ris chen po'i mchog nyid du bya'o snyam ste/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o//
15b1(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// /
15b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs par gyis shig/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bdag tu lta ba dang sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu
15b3(brgyad stong): lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / 'byung bar lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / rang gi lus la lta ba chen po 'di lta bu la stsogs pa'i lta ba de dag spang
15b4(brgyad stong): ba'i slad du chos bstan to snyam ste don des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
15b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das bdag kyang don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi bar spobs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i dus la bab par shes na spobs
15b6(brgyad stong): par gyis shig/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de byang chub kyi sems thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems
15b7(brgyad stong): zag pa med pa'i sems mnyam pa med pa'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems de la yang
15b8(brgyad stong): ma chags yongs su ma zin to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems de ni zag pa mchis pa yongs su ma zin pa'o// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems zag pa ma mchis
16a1(brgyad stong): shing yongs su zin pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa'i sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin te/ don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba
16a2(brgyad stong): grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i rgyus sems de la yang ma chags shing yongs su ma zin/ rab
16a3(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang ma chags shing yongasu ma zin to// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci sems gang sems
16a4(brgyad stong): med pa'i sems de yod dam/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang ci sems med pa de la yod pa 'am/ med pa yod pa 'am dmigs par 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/
16a5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gal te sems med pa de la gang yod pa 'am med pa med cing mi dmigs na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de ci ltar
16a6(brgyad stong): 'di skad du sems gang sems med pa'i sems de yod dam zhes zer/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ltar yang khyod bcom ldan 'das kyis nyon mong pa med pa la gnas pa'i
16a7(brgyad stong): mchog tu gsungs pa ltar ston pa leg so leg so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems dpa' chen po sems dpa'
16a8(brgyad stong): chen po zhes bgyi ba gang lags pa 'di ni sems dpa' deg che chen po bgos pa/ sems dpa' de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa 'gas te/ de'i srad du sems dpa
16b1(brgyad stong): chen po sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangasu mchi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa go cha chen po bgos
16b2(brgyad stong): pa zhes bgyi ba 'di gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ci tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la
16b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can gzhal du med pa yongs ma ngan las bzla bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can grangs med pa yongs mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o//
16b4(brgyad stong): snyam mo// gang gis gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can de dag kyang yod pa ma yin no snyam ste/ des sems can de snyed pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed la/ gang yongs su mya ngan
16b5(brgyad stong): las bzlas pa dang / gang gis yongs mya ngan las bzlas pa'i sems can yang 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid
16b6(brgyad stong): 'di yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dper na/ sgyu ma byed pa mkhas pa 'am/ sgyu ma byed pa'i nye gnas kyis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo'i tshogs chen por mngon par sprul te/ mngon par sprul nas ske
16b7(brgyad stong): bo'i tshogs chen po de mi snang bar byas na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ de la yang gang gis gang yang bas pa 'am shi ba 'am/ bshig pa 'am mi snang bar byas pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gas
16b8(brgyad stong): ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams yongs su
17a1(brgyad stong): mya ngan las zlo bar byed de/ gang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa dang / gang gis yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'i sems can kyang 'ga' zhig yod pa ma yin no//
17a2(brgyad stong): gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di thos nas/ mi dang kun tu mi skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na 'di tsam gyis/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
17a3(brgyad stong): chen po de go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar gsungs pa'i
17a4(brgyad stong): don bdag gis 'tshal ba de ltar na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni go cha ma mchis par bgos pa lags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
17a5(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ go cha med par bgos par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni
17a6(brgyad stong): ma byas pa/ rnam par ma bsgyur ba mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o// sems can gang dag gi don du go cha 'di bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas pa/ rnam par ma bsgyur ba mngon par 'das ma
17a7(brgyad stong): byas pa'o// de skad ces bka'i stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ri bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin no//
17a8(brgyad stong): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings
17b1(brgyad stong): ma grol ba'o// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tsher ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed kyi rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
17b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces sa so// tshe dang ldan pa
17b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa mi bcings ma grol ba zhes
17b4(brgyad stong): zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
17b5(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang ma cing ma grol ba zhes zer ram/ 'on te tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs gang ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs de gang yin/ de
17b6(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshor ba de gang yin/ 'du shes de gang yin/ 'du byed rnams de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa de gang yin/ tshe dang ldan pa
17b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams
17b8(brgyad stong): kyi de bzhin nyid de gang yin// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin ma bcings ma grol ba zhes zer ba'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid de gang yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
18a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smraso// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe// sgyu ma'i skyes bu gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcing ma grol
18a2(brgyad stong): ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang / sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'du byed rnams gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe/ sgyu ma'i skyes
18a3(brgyad stong): bu'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i tshor ba'i/
18a4(brgyad stong): de nyid dang / 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po// sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma
18a5(brgyad stong): grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yang dag pa ma yin pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pas na ma bcings ma grol ba'o ma skyes pas na ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa
18a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i go cha chen po bgos pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa'i go cha chen po go cha med pa'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang
18a7(brgyad stong): ldan pa gang po byams ma'i bu cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
18a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gocha chen po bgos par gyur pa/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / theg pa chen po yang dag par gnas par 'gyur ba'i theg pa chen po de ni gang lags/ theg pa chen po de laji ltan
18b1(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par
18b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges 'byung bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor theg pa pa chen po
18b3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhal du med pa'i tshig bla dgas so// rab 'byor ga zhal tu med pa zhes bya ba 'di ni tshad med pa'i phyiro// rab 'byor gang yang 'di skad du theg pa chen po de la ji ltar yang dag par zhugs
18b4(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi ba 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ theg pa chen po de la gang gis yang dag par zhugs pa 'am/ theg pa chen po des gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'am/
18b5(brgyad stong): theg pa chen po des gang zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhes zer ba ni// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgo nas yang dag par zhugs nas/ khams gsum nas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / mi dmigs
18b6(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pas yang dag par zhugs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du gnas par 'gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ 'on kyang gang nas kyang nges pa/
18b7(brgyad stong): 'byung ba med/ gang gis kyang yang dag par ma zhugs/ gang du yang gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ gnas pa med pa'i tshul gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur la/ theg pa chen po de gang yang
18b8(brgyad stong): nges par ma phyung / nges par 'byung bar yang mi 'gyur/ nges par byung ba yang med de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nges par 'byung ba dang / gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i tshe de gnyi ga yang med cing mi dmig te/ de ltar na chos thams
19a1(brgyad stong): cad med cing mi dmigs pa la/ chos gang zhig chos gang gis nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
19a2(brgyad stong): to/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po theg pa chen po zhe bgyi ba 'di ni/ lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du dacas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis mnan nas/ nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba la rdo rjed// nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa nyid kyi
19a3(brgyad stong): phyir de ni theg pa chen po'o// ci ltar nam mkha' la sems can gzhal du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po la yang sems can
19a4(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis tshad ma mchis pa'i go skabs mchis te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis na/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po'o// 'di la 'ong ba
19a5(brgyad stong): yang ma mthong / 'di la 'gro ba yang ma mthong zhing / 'di la gnas pa yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar theg pa chen po 'di la sngon gyi mthe' mi dmigs/ phyi ma'i mtha' yang mi dmigs/ dbus
19a6(brgyad stong): kyang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das theg pa chen po 'di ni dus gsum du mnyam pa'o// de bas na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya
19a7(brgyad stong): bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi theg pa chen po yin no// byang chub sems
19a8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di bslabs pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob par gyur to// rjes su 'thob bo// rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa gang po/
19b1(brgyad stong): byams pa'i nus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i slad du byin gyis brlabs pa 'di ni/ theg pa chen po bshad par bya bar sems lags
19b2(brgyad stong): so de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal bar/ theg pa chen po ston par ma
19b3(brgyad stong): gyur lags grang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor khyod ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la theg pa chen po rjes su mthun par ston to// de skad ces
19b4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mthus lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems
19b5(brgyad stong): dpa' sngon gyi mthar yang nye bar ma rtogs byang chub sems dpa' phyi ma'i mtha' yang nye bar ma rtogs/ byang chub sems dpa' dbus su yang nye bar ma rtogs so// nye bar ma rtogs pa/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/
19b6(brgyad stong): gzugs mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mu ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu ma mchis pas na/ byang chub seMs
19b7(brgyad stong): yang bu mchis par rig par bgyi'o// gzugs byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 'di yang ma mchis mir mig so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
19b8(brgyad stong): shes pa byang chub sems dpa'o zhes nye bar ma rtogs te/ 'di yang ma mchis mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad nas thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad
20a1(brgyad stong): du thams cad mi dmigs pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i ming 'di gang la yod pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu
20a2(brgyad stong): phyin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi dmigs/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi dmigs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos de thams cad nas thams cad/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad
20a3(brgyad stong): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong zhing ma namigs na/ chos gang zhig ces gang gis chos gang la gdams shing rjes su bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das
20a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang ming tsam mo// ming de yang mngon par ma grub pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar
20a5(brgyad stong): bdag bdag ces brjod kyang bcom ldan 'das bdag shin tu mngon par ma grub pa bzhin no// de ltar chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa la/ gang zhig gzung da ma mchis shing mngon par ma grub pa'i gzug
20a6(brgyad stong): de gang lags/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams de gang lags/ gang zhig gzung du ma mchis mngon par ma grub pa'i rnam par shes pa de gang lags/ de ltar chos de dag thams cad kyi ngo bo
20a7(brgyad stong): nyid ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mngon par ma grub pa ma gas la/ gang chos thams cad kyi mngon par ma grub pa gang lags pa de yang chos ma lags te// des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
20a8(brgyad stong): mngon par ma grub pas/ mngon par ma grub pa la ni zhig gdangs shing rjes su bsten par mabya/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par ma grub pa las gzhan chos thams cad dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
20b1(brgyad stong): sam/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos sam/ gang byang chub tu spyod pa yang mi dmigs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bshad cing de ltar bstan te/ de ltar nye bar bstan pa la/ byang chub sems
20b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi 'god kun tu mi zhum bag mi tsha/ bag 'khums par mi gyur 'dir yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ ming dang kun tu
20b3(brgyad stong): skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni na
20b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar rtog pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni shes rab
20b5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par sems pa'o zhes de ltar rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
20b6(brgyad stong): pa la chos 'ang dag nyo bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs nye bar mi rtogs/ gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/ gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gag par yang dag par
20b7(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par
20b8(brgyad stong): rjesu mi mthong / rnam par shes par 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa
21a1(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa
21a2(brgyad stong): dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis ste/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar
21a3(brgyad stong): tshor ba'i gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i
21a4(brgyad stong): 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de nas skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing / gnyis su ma mchis so// des na
21a5(brgyad stong): 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su babyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i
21a6(brgyad stong): grangs su gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du nye bar rtog na/ de'i tshe gzugs nye bar mi rtog so/ gzugs nye bar mi 'dzin/
21a7(brgyad stong): gzugs skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gzugs 'gags par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa nye bar
21a8(brgyad stong): bar mi rtogs/ rnam par shes pa nye bar mi 'dzin/ rnam par shes pa skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam par shes pa 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i slad zhe na/ 'di ltar
21b1(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags/ gzugs kyi 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs lags te/ des na skye ba mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su
21b2(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / gzugs shes bgyi ba 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad du gzugs shes bgyi ba
21b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so// de bzhin du 'di ltar tshor ba gang lags pa dang / 'du shes kyi gang lags pa dang / 'du byed rnams kyi gang lags pa dang / 'di ltar rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
21b4(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags/ rnam par shes pa'i 'jig pa ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ des na skye ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba
21b5(brgyad stong): 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su bgyir ma mchis so// des na 'jig pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba 'di yang gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su ma mchis te/ gang yang 'di skad
21b6(brgyad stong): du rnam par shes pa zhes bzhi pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su gtogs so//
21b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po gnyis pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// de'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rang
22a1(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis ji skad smras pa'i don bdag gis shes de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pa
22a2(brgyad stong): yin na/ byang chub sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod pa 'am/ sems can rnams kyi phyir sdug sngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong ba'i don du spro ba yang ji zhig yid/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab
22a3(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i bu kho bo ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bka' ba spad pa smod par mi 'dod do// gang zhig dka' ba'i 'du shes
22a4(brgyad stong): kyis spyod pa de ni byang chub sems dpar yang mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas ni/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa'i don bya bar mi nus so// 'on kyang
22a5(brgyad stong): byed pa'i 'du shes nyid du byas nas/ de sems can thams cad la mar 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes bskyed par byas shing / de bzhin du skyes pa dang /
22a6(brgyad stong): bud med dag la 'du shes de dag byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la mar
22a7(brgyad stong): 'du shes pa dang / bar 'du shes pa dang / bur 'du shes pa dang / bu mor 'du shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyi bar du yang 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ ci ltar bdag ni thams cad nas thams cad rnam par thams cad du zang
22a8(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal thams cad las thar par bya ba de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar zha'o zhes/ de ltar sems cad thams cad la yang
22b1(brgyad stong): 'du shes bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yongs su mi gtang ngo // bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po dpag tu med pa las thar par bya'o// bdag gis lus brgyar gtung
22b2(brgyad stong): kyang chung ngan 'di dag la bdag gis gnod sems kyang mi skyed do snyam du de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar gnas na dka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su spyod pa/
22b3(brgyad stong): ma yin no// bka' ba byed pa'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ci nas kyang bdag thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad
22b4(brgyad stong): du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de lta sems bskyed par bya zhing / de ltar nang dang / phyi'i chos thams cad
22b5(brgyad stong): la 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// gal te sems de ltar spyod na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes can du spyod pa la yin/ dka' ba'i 'du shes su gnas pa ma yin no// tshe dang ltar pa sha ri'i bus/ gang yang 'di skad du byang chub
22b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' yang skye ba med pa yin no zhes smras pa ni de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' ni skye ba med pa'o// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang
22b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' nyid skye ba med dam/ 'on te byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus
22b8(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci byang chub sems dpa'i chos don skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
23a1(brgyad stong): @#kyang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa kho na skye ba med dam/ 'on te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/
23a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// shi ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams khron skye ba
23a3(brgyad stong): med dam/ 'on te so si skye bo yang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med do// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci so so'i skye bo nyid
23a4(brgyad stong): skye ba med dam/ 'on te so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shi ri'i bu so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang lnga pa
23a5(brgyad stong): ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med/ thams cad
23a6(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med/ so so'i skye bo yang skye ba med/ so sa'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'on byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23a7(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa ma yin nam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu kho bo ni ma skyes
23a8(brgyad stong): pa chos la thob par mi 'dod la/ mngon par rtogs par yang ma yin te/ ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa/ ma skyes pa thob par yang mi 'gyur ro// shi ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci
23b1(brgyad stong): ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa/ 'thob par 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa/ ma skyes pa 'thob par 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha re'i bu yang cim skyes pa'i chos skyes
23b2(brgyad stong): par yin nam/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa nyid yin/ sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang ci skye ba'i chos nyid mi skye ba yin nam/ 'on te mi skye ba'i chos mi skyes pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
23b3(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba'i chos sam/ mi skye ba'i chos zhes smra ba mi spobs so// sha ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis skye ba med pa yang smra bar mi spobs sam/ rab 'byor kyi smras
23b4(brgyad stong): pa tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid brjod pa yin pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid so sor snang ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu skye ba med pa nyid spobs pa yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i
23b5(brgyad stong): bu de kho na bzhin du shin tu so sor snang ba nyid do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni chos ston pa'i nang na mchog/
23b6(brgyad stong): tu banag par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas pa de dang / de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid las kyang mi g.yong la chos nyid dang
23b7(brgyad stong): 'gag par yang mi byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos mi gnas
23b8(brgyad stong): ba'i chos can rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/ de dag ni gang dang gang nyid la yongs su dri ba byas pa de dang de nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / chos nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed la chos nyid las kyang mi 'dod// de ci'i
24a1(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar yang chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa
24a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor legs so legs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i pha
24a3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni/ theg pa thams cad pa chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir/
24a4(brgyad stong): chos thas cad la mi gnas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zab mo 'di ltar bshad cing / 'di
24a5(brgyad stong): ltar bstan pa dang / 'di ltar nye bar bstan pa la sems zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang / nem nur du mi 'gyur ba dang / rmongs par mi 'gyur ba dang / sems gzhan pa nyid du mi 'gyur na
24a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas shing / yid la byed pa 'di dang bral ba yin no zhes rig par bya'o// de nas
24a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas
24a8(brgyad stong): bas/ gnas pa gang yin pa de ji ltar yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba
24b1(brgyad stong): yin na/ de ltar na ni de shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa gnas pa dang bral bar 'gyur zhing / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
24b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa la gnas pa dang ma bral na/ de ltar na ni yid la byed pa de dang bral bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yid la byed
24b3(brgyad stong): pa dang ma bral yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa dang ma bral ba nyid du 'gyur na/ de lta yin du zin na/ sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa
24b4(brgyad stong): dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyang yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar gnas so// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe/
24b5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu legs so legs so// 'on kyang khyod la yang klan kar 'gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus ni don nyid
24b6(brgyad stong): yang dag pa'i tshig tu brjod par yongs su gzung ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can ngo bo nyid med pas na/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig
24b7(brgyad stong): par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems cad dben pas na/ yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na/ yid la
24b8(brgyad stong): byed pa bsam gyis mi khyab par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu sems can mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub pas na/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par byang ma chub
25a1(brgyad stong): par rig bya'o// tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu sems can yang dag pa ji lta ba ma yin pa'i don tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas/ yid la byed pa yang dag pa ci
25a2(brgyad stong): lta ba ma yin pa'i don tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid
25a3(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa'i rarwa dang gnas pa 'dis gnas par 'dod do// / 'phag sla shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las// thams cad mkhyen
25a4(brgyad stong): pa nyid kyi spyod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste dang po'o// // de'i tshe yang lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin sum bcu rtsa gsum ris kyi
25a5(brgyad stong): sna'i bu zhi khri dang ldan gcig tu 'khor de nyid du 'dus te/ 'khod par gyur te// 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi yang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu nyi khrir bcas pa dang / mi mjed
25a6(brgyad stong): kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu zir bcas pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu lnga stong yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod par gyur te/ lha rnams kyi rang gyi las kyi
25a7(brgyad stong): rnam par sbyin pa las skyes pa'i 'od gang yin pa de thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis zil gyis mnan to//
25a8(brgyad stong): de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa gnas garten rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor lha'i bu stong phrag mang po 'khor 'dir 'dus te 'khod pa
25b1(brgyad stong): 'di rnams/ 'phags pa rab 'byor las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nye bar bstan pa dang / gdams pa dang / rjes su bstan
25b2(brgyad stong): pa nyan par 'dod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya/ ci ltar bslab par bya/ ci ltar rnal 'byor du bya/ gnas brtan
25b3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ ke'u shi ka de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nye bar bstan par bya ste/ lha'i bu gang dag gis
25b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa de dag gis sems bskyed par bya'o// gang dag yang dag pa nyid du nges pa la zhugs pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag
25b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag gis 'khor ba'i rgyun la mtshams bcad pas de dag yang dang yang du 'khor zhing / bla na med pa
25b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med do// 'on kyang gal te de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ de dag la/
25b7(brgyad stong): yang rjes su yid rang bar bya'o// kho bo ni de dag gi dge ba la bar chad mi byed de khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams las ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos rnams la lhag pa dmigs
25b8(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnabs
26a1(brgyad stong): la spro bskyed pa gang yin pa ni// rab 'byor yang khyod legs so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces/
26a2(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' drin gzo bar bgyi ste/ bka' drin mi bzo bar mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
26a3(brgyad stong): ji ltar sngon gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa nyid kyis/ bdag cag rnams
26a4(brgyad stong): kyi don tu byang chub kyi phyir tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa ra/ nyan thos gang dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gdams shing rjes su bstan te/ de la bcom ldan 'das kyis spyad
26a5(brgyad stong): pas bla na med pa'i ye shes bskyed pa de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su gzung bar
26a6(brgyad stong): bgyi zhing / rjes su yongs su bskor bar bgyi'o// yang dag par yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing yang dag par yongs su bskor bar yang bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bco
26a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di la bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rjes su yongs su gzung zhing rjes su yongs su bskor ba dang / yang dag par yod
26a8(brgyad stong): su gzung zhing / yang dag par yongs su bskor bas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshangs rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan
26b1(brgyad stong): pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la spras pa/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyod la yid la bzung shig dang / ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
26b2(brgyad stong): chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos stong pa nyid la gnas/
26b3(brgyad stong): pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya ste/ ko'u shi ka de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go rga chen po bgos par 'gyur bar bya'o// gzugs
26b4(brgyad stong): la gnas par mi bya'o// tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig la gnas par mi bya'o//
26b5(brgyad stong): gzugs la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bya'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
26b6(brgyad stong): tshor ba la gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bya'o// sgra dang dri dang ro dang reg dang chos rnams dang / rna ba'i rnam par
26b7(brgyad stong): shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar la gnas par mi bya'o// sa'i khams la gnas
26b8(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung kyi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag
27a1(brgyad stong): pa la gnas par mi bya'o// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam la gnas
27a2(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas
27a3(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid la gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar gzugs so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na chor
27a4(brgyad stong): ba'o zhes bya ba dang / 'du shes so zhes bya ba dang / 'du byed rnam so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na rnam par shes pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na mig go zhes
27a5(brgyad stong): bya ba nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gnas par bya'o// de ltar na sa'i khams so zhes bya ba nas rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes
27a6(brgyad stong): bya ba'i bar du gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na yang dag pa'i spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /
27a7(brgyad stong): dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams so zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na lam gyi yan lag go zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
27a8(brgyad stong): 'bras bu'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba dang / de ltar na
27b1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de ltar na rang sangs rgyas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin
27b2(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes
27b3(brgyad stong): gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bde ba dang sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs
27b4(brgyad stong): stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang mi stong pa'o zhes gnas
27b5(brgyad stong): par mi bya'o// gzugs bdag dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa bdag
27b6(brgyad stong): dang bdag med pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
27b7(brgyad stong): par shes pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// gzugs sdug pa'o zhes dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
27b8(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'o zhes nye bar dmigs pas gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'dus ma byas kyis
28a1(brgyad stong): rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o/ de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa/
28a2(brgyad stong): ba nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas nyid 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas nyid 'dus
28a3(brgyad stong): ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa sbyin pa'i gnas zhes bya bar gnas par mi bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun
28a4(brgyad stong): ba'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i sbyin pa'i gnas par mi bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba yongs su mthar ma phyin pa'i phyir 'jig rten 'dir lan cig
28a5(brgyad stong): phyir 'ongs nas/ sdug bsngal mthar byed par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba sbyin pa'i gnas par mi bya'o// phyir mi 'ong ba 'jig rten 'dir phyir mi
