28a6(brgyad stong): 'ong bar de nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// dgra bcom pa 'di nyid du
28a7(brgyad stong): phung po'i lhag ma ma lus par mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas sbyin pa'i gan
28a8(brgyad stong): so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// rang sangs rgyas ni nyan thos kyi sa las 'das nas/ sangs rgyas kyi sa ma thob par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes gnas par mi bya'o//
28b1(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas ni sbyin pa'i gnas so zhes gnas par mi bya'o// sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye ba'i sa las 'das pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
28b2(brgyad stong): kyi sa las 'das nas gzhal tu med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de// gzhal tu med grangs med pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya
28b3(brgyad stong): ngan las bzlas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs
28b4(brgyad stong): rgyasas la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas/ phung po lhag med mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'das pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
28b5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro zhes des 'di ltar yang dag par gnas par mi bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'di snyam du sems te/ gal te sangs rgyas ni so so'i skye bo sa las 'das
28b6(brgyad stong): pa dang / nyan thos kyi sa las 'das pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ gzhal du med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de/ gzhal du med grangs
28b7(brgyad stong): pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yongs su mya ngan las bzlas/ gzhal tu med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / yang dag
28b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su nges par mdzad cing sangs rgyas sa la bzhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad nas phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbying sus
29a1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur re zhes de 'di sar yang gnas par mi byar// des yang ci ltar 'di la gnas par min/
29a2(brgyad stong): ci ltar bslab par bya skam pa dang / de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i snyems kyi shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad
29a3(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci zhig la gnas/ tshe dang ldan pa
29a4(brgyad stong): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ci la yang gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de
29a5(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs ni shin tu mi gnas pa ste/ de ni 'dus byas kyi khams la yang mi gnas la/ 'dus ma byas
29a6(brgyad stong): kyi khams la yang mi gnas te/ de las bzhengs pa yang ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri
29a7(brgyad stong): bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di lta bu nyid la gnas par bya zhing 'di ltar bslab par bya ste/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
29a8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'ga' zhig la gnas pa ma yin zhing / mi gnas pa yang ma yin la mi mthun par gnas pa ma yin zhing / mi mthun par mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa de
29b1(brgyad stong): bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa ci lta ba bzhin du gnas par bya'o snyam zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya'o snyam pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
29b2(brgyad stong): gnas pa ci lta ba de bzhin du gnAn/ mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis legs par gnas pa yin no snyam du 'dis de ltar bslab par bya'o// 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
29b3(brgyad stong): dpa' den pos de ltar gnas par bya zhing de bzhin du bslab par bya ste/ de ltar bslob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
29b4(brgyad stong): gnas pa 'dis gnas shing / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral ba yin no// de nas 'khor de'i nang nas lha'i bu kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ gnod sbyin rnams
29b5(brgyad stong): kyi gnod sbyin gyi skad dang / gnod sbyin sgra dang / gnod sbyin gyi tshig dang / gnod sbyin gyi gtam tu byas pa dang / gnod sbyin gyi rab tu brjod pa gang yin pa de dag/ smras
29b6(brgyad stong): pa ni shes par rung gyi gnas gartan rab 'byor gang 'chad pa dang / rab tu brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa 'di ni shes par yang mi rung ngo snyam mo//
29b7(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis sangs rgyas kyi mthus lnga'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid de lta bu sems kyis yongs su shes nas lha'i bu de dag la/
29b8(brgyad stong): smras pa/ lha'i bu dag shes par mi rung zhes bya ba de ni/ 'di ltar 'di la chung zad kyang smos pa med de 'di la chung zad kyang thos pa med do// de nas lha'i bu de dag yang
30a1(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed par 'gyur ro// e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor 'dis ni gsal bar byed
30a2(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'jug/ 'phags pa rab 'byor ni phra ba bas kyang ches phra ba zab pa bas kyang ches zab par 'jug pas
30a3(brgyad stong): ston cing 'chad do snyam mo// de nas yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyis shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smraso//
30a4(brgyad stong): lha'i bu dag de lta bas na/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma brten par
30a5(brgyad stong): mi grub bo// de bzhin du sbyar te/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang phyir
30a6(brgyad stong): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas par 'dod pa dang / gang dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / dgra bcom
30a7(brgyad stong): pa nyid thob par 'dod pa dang / gang rang byang chub thob par 'dod pa dang / rang byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma rten par 'grub bo// gang
30a8(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'dod cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par 'dod pa des bzod pa 'di la ma
30b1(brgyad stong): brten par mi 'grub bo// de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di la chos nyan pa rang bzhin ci lta bu zhig btsal bar bya snyam pa dang /
30b2(brgyad stong): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyi shes nas lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu de dag kho bo la
30b3(brgyad stong): chos nyen pa ni/ sgyu ma dang / sprul pa lta bu dag btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag ni nyan par mi 'gyur mngon byed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i
30b4(brgyad stong): bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci sems can de dag sgyu ma lta bu yin gyi/ de dag sgyu ma ni ma yin nam//
30b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag 'di skad smras so// lha'i bu de dag sems can de dag ni sgyu ma lta bu/ lha'i bu dag sems can
30b6(brgyad stong): de dag ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang / sems can dag ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang sems can dag ni gnyis su
30b7(brgyad stong): med de gnyis su byar med do// lha'i bu dag chos thams cad kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
30b8(brgyad stong): bu yang sgyum lta bu rmi lam la bu'o// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir me 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
31a1(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta'o// dgra bcom pa nyid kying sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// rang sangs
31a2(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgyu
31a3(brgyad stong): ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
31a4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer rab/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid kyang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes zer ram/ rab 'byor kyis
31a5(brgyad stong): smras pa/ lha'i bu dag mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam wA sma na chos gzhan lta ci smos/ lha'i bu de dag gis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor mya ngan
31a6(brgyad stong): las 'das pa yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o// zhes zer ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dag bdag ni gal te mya ngan las 'das pa
31a7(brgyad stong): las khyad par du 'bigs pa'i chos gzhan zhig yod yod kyang de yang sgyu ma lta bu rmi lam lta bu'o zhes nga smra'o// lha'i bu dag de ltar na sgyu ma dang mya ngan
31a8(brgyad stong): las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na rmi lam dang mya ngan las 'das pa 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do//
31b1(brgyad stong): de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa gang po byams pa'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa lto rings chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa ka t+yA ya na chen po dang / tshe dang
31b2(brgyad stong): ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag gis byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag du ma dang thabs cig tu tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad
31b3(brgyad stong): ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la su dag yang dag par 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga'
31b4(brgyad stong): bos gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sam/ lta ba phun sum
31b5(brgyad stong): tshogs pa'i gang zag rnams sam/ dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin
31b6(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis gnas brtan de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di ltar
31b7(brgyad stong): bshad pa 'di la yang dag par 'dzin pa su yang mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'di la chos gang yang ma smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar
31b8(brgyad stong): ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag go// de bas na ci ltar 'di la chos gang yang ba smos/ chos gang yang yongs su snang bar ma byas/ chos gang yang ma bzhag
32a1(brgyad stong): pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar bstan pa'i di la yang dag par 'dzin pa gang yang mi 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po/
32a2(brgyad stong): brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa rab 'byor kyis de ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa la bdag gis kyang mchod pa'i don tu 'di ltar me tog dag mngon
32a3(brgyad stong): khar sprul to// 'phags pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i tshe me tog dag bangon par sprul nas/
32a4(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la mngon par gtor ro// de nas gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha rnams dbang po brgya byin la rjes su brjod pa'i phyir 'di snyam
32a5(brgyad stong): du sems te/ yang 'di lta lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis mngon par gtor ba'i me tog 'di dag ni bdag gis sngon chad sum bcu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas
32a6(brgyad stong): na yang yod par ma mngon ste/ me tog 'di dag ni sprul pa'o// 'di ltar lha rnams kyi dbang pos mngon par gtor ba'i me tog de dag ni shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri
32a7(brgyad stong): zhing las skyes pa ma yin gyi yid las byung ba'i me tog go snyam pa dang / de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems kyi rtog sems
32a8(brgyad stong): kyi shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags rab 'byor me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid las skyes pa'i re
32b1(brgyad stong): tog ni gang yang med de shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri shing las skyes pa ni ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byid la 'di skad ces smras//
32b2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka gang khyod 'di skad du me tog 'di dag ni ma skyes pa ste/ me tog 'di dag ni yid las skyes pa ma yin/ shing dang gel ba dang / 'khri shing las skyes pa yang
32b3(brgyad stong): ma yin no zhes zer na/ ko'u shi ka gang ma skyes pa de ni me tog ma yin no// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ e ma'o 'phags pa rab 'byor
32b4(brgyad stong): ni shes rab zab za ba ste/ ming dang tshig tu btags pa de yang ston la/ de dang yang 'gal bar yang mi byed/ de nyid kyang gsal bar byed cing de nyid kyang nye bar ston to
32b5(brgyad stong): skam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/
32b6(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor ci skad du nye bar ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'di la bslab par bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang /
32b7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
32b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di la bslab par bya'o// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la mi slob bo// lan cig phyir
33a1(brgyad stong): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi slob/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la mi bslob/ dgra bcom pa nyid la mi slob bo// rang sangs rgyas nyid la pi slob/ sangs/
33a2(brgyad stong): rgyas nyid la mi slob ste/ gang sa 'di dag la mi slob pa de ni sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob bo// rang sangs rgyas nyid dang thams cad mkhyen nyid la/
33a3(brgyad stong): slob pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med pa la slob bo// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos gzhal du med/ grangs med pa la slob pa de ni gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang / 'grib
33a4(brgyad stong): par bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ de rnam par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya
33a5(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir mi slob bo// gang gzugs 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa dang / gang tshor ba la ma yin 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin gang rnam
33a6(brgyad stong): par shes pa 'phel bar bya ba dang 'grib par bya ba'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/ gzugs yongs gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// de bzhin du de tshor ba la ma yin
33a7(brgyad stong): 'du shes la ma yin 'du byed rnams ma yin/ de rnam par shes pa yongs su gzung ba dang dor bar bya ba'i phyir mi slob bo// chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/
33a8(brgyad stong): slob ste/ skye ba'i phyir mi slob/ nub pa'i phyir mi slob bo// gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing skye ba'i phyir mi slob/ nub pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni
33b1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing / skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob ste/ de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams
33b2(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces
33b3(brgyad stong): smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing / skye ba'i phyir mi slob/ nub
33b4(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir mi slob pa de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi slob cing / skye ba'i phyir mi slob nub pa'i phyir mi slob na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar
33b5(brgyad stong): slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis
33b6(brgyad stong): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos 'ga' zhig yongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi
33b7(brgyad stong): / 'i gyi mthar 'byur ma na shAs sugar bya tsham
33b8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi rgyas rnams kyang 'ongs su gzung ba'i phyir mi ba cing / skye ba'i phying ba slan/ nung pa'i phyi mi slo pa sa// dang lda pag ri'i rung kya sa thams sa
34a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob cing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
34a2(brgyad stong): gyis tshe dang ldan sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yas bcal bar bya/
34a3(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi le'u las btsal bar bya'o// de
34a4(brgyad stong): skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu 'di ltar 'phags pa rab 'byor shes
34a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus smras pa/ ko'u sha ka tshe dang
34a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par
34a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang 'di skad du 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab
34a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di su'i mthur rig par bya/ 'di su'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya'o zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka bdag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
34b1(brgyad stong): byin pa 'chad pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthur rig par bya'o// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis rlabs su rig par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gang
34b2(brgyad stong): yang 'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang las btsal bar bya zhes zer ba ni/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa'
34b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzugs las btsal bar mi bya/ gzugs las gzhan du yang btsal bar mi bya'o// de bzhin du tshor
34b4(brgyad stong): ba las ma yin/ 'du shes las ma yin/ 'du byed rnams las ma yin/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan du yang btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi
34b5(brgyad stong): ka 'di ltar gzugs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin/ gzugs las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med do// de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/
34b6(brgyad stong): 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa me'o//
34b7(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab
34b8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// /
35a1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ shes
35a2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bza' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/
35a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta
35a4(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
35a5(brgyad stong): pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs che ba'i phyir ko'u shi 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
35a6(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa che ba'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol phyin pa chen po'o// gzugs tshad med pa'i phyir
35a7(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
35a8(brgyad stong): pa tshad med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzugs med pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/
35b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa tshad med pa'i
35b2(brgyad stong): phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// gzugs mtha' yas pa'i phyir ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
35b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir kon
35b4(brgyad stong): shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa chen po zhes bya bar mngon par chags par
35b5(brgyad stong): mi byed do// de bzhin du tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du tshad med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
35b6(brgyad stong): pa'o zhes mngon par chags par mi byed do// ko'u shi ka de lta bas na 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// 'di ni tshad med pa'i pha rom
35b7(brgyad stong): byin pa'o// ko'u shi ka 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di/
35b8(brgyad stong): ni mthas yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mthas yas pa'i
36a1(brgyad stong): pa ral tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka yang ci sar nadamigs pa mtha' mas pa'i phyir 'dis ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mapa' yas pa'i pha rol/
36a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa yin zhe na/ ke'u shi ka 'di ltar chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang dbus dang tha ma mi dmigs te/ de bas na ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
36a3(brgyad stong): ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ste/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'
36a4(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang bang gi phyir 'di ltar chos thams cad mtha' yas mu med de/ de rnams kyi thog ma 'am dbus sam/ tha ma yang mi
36a5(brgyad stong): dmigs pa to// de bas na ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka gzugs kyi
36a6(brgyad stong): thob ma 'am/ dbus sam/ tha ma yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i thob ma 'am dbus
36a7(brgyad stong): sam tha ma yang mi dmigs te/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis kyang dmigs pa mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha'/
36a8(brgyad stong): yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang sems can mtha' yas mu med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la thog ma'am dbus sam tha
36b1(brgyad stong): yang mi dmigs so// ko'u shi ka de bas na sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin
36b2(brgyad stong): pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor ji ltar na sems can 'tha' ya
36b3(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka bgrang ba dang
36b4(brgyad stong): mi ldan pa'am/ bgrang ba mang pos sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no//
36b5(brgyad stong): brgya byin gyis smras pa 'phags pa rab 'byor 'o na ji ci ltar sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mtha' yas pa'i
36b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di chos gang gyi
36b7(brgyad stong): tshig bla dgas yin/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dgas kyang pha
36b8(brgyad stong): yin/ chos med pa'i tshig bla dgas kyang ma yin te/ ming du btags pa 'di na glo bur du byung ba'o// ming du btags pa 'di ni dngos po med pa'o// mi du btags
37a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni bdag gi ba med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ sems can sems can zhes ming du btags pa 'di ni dmigs su med pa'o// gnas brtan rab
37a2(brgyad stong): 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka 'di ni snyam du sems/ 'di la sems can du yongs su bstan par byas pa gang yang yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa
37a3(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka gang la sems can yongs su bstan pa byas pa 'ga' zhig med pa de la sems can mtha' yas pa yod dam/ ke'u shi ka gal te
37a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bzhugs te/ mtha' las 'das pa rnam par
37a5(brgyad stong): rig par byed pa'i dbyangs dang / gsung dbyangs zab mos sems can sems can zhes tshig tu brjod zin kyang / de la sems can gang yang skyes pa'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba
37a6(brgyad stong): 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gags pa'am/ 'gags par 'gyur ba'am/ 'gags pa yod dam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no//
37a7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can thog ma nas dag pa'i phyir dang / thog ma nas yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar
37a8(brgyad stong): sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mtha' yas pa'i pha rol phyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka de ltar yang sems can mtha' yas pa'i phyir/
37b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas par rig par bya'o// de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skye dgu'i bdag
37b2(brgyad stong): po dang bcas pa dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs dang bcas pa rnams kyis lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod de/ e ma'o/
37b3(brgyad stong): chos/ e ma'o chos/ e ma'o chos rnams kyi chos nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis legs par smras pas/
37b4(brgyad stong): brjod cing bstan te/ bshad la rab tu gzhag go// bcom ldan 'das de slan cad bdag cag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
37b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa 'di dang ma bral ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis/ gnas pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs/
37b6(brgyad stong): pa legs par 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang / skyes dgu'i bdag po dang bcas
37b7(brgyad stong): dang / drang srong dang bcas pa dang / skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs de rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag gang gi tshe/
37b8(brgyad stong): rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na mar me cad zhes bya ba'i tshong dus kyi dbus su mar me mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
38a1(brgyad stong): kyi drung dung shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dang ma bral bar gyur pas/ de'i tshe mar me mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
38a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi skal pa grangs med pa shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
38a3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang / rkang par ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten rig pa skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi
38a4(brgyad stong): rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro// zhes nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha
38a5(brgyad stong): bu de dag gis 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du sgrub pa
38a6(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / rjes su yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ngo mtshar to// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar to zhes gsol to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong
38a7(brgyad stong): stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste gnyis pa'o// / bam po gsum pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor
38a8(brgyad stong): der lha'i bu gang dag 'dus te 'khod par gyur pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor gang dag 'dus te 'khod par
38b1(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / lha'i bu de rnams 'dus te 'khod par gyur par bakhyen cing 'khor bzhi po thams cad 'dus shing 'khod par yang khyen nas/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na
38b2(brgyad stong): spyod pa'i lha'i bu dpas dang / rangs ris kyi lha'i bu dmas dang / 'dagasal ba dang / dge chung dang / 'og min gyi lha'i bu rnams dbang du bzhag ste/ lha rnams kyi dbang po
38b3(brgyad stong): brgya byin la phrogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po la stsogs pa tshangs ris kyi lci rlabs dang / 'od gsal gyi lha'i bu rnams la bstsal pa/ lha'i bu
38b4(brgyad stong): dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ rab tu 'don na/
38b5(brgyad stong): de la bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha glags blta ba dang / grags tshol ba dag gis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dol mi 'am mi ma
38b6(brgyad stong): yin pa glags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba dag gis grags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
38b7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu dag gzhan yang rtsa'i bu gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha'i bu gang dag
38b8(brgyad stong): gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma bzung ba dang / ma bcangs pa dang / ma bklags pa dang / kun chub par ma byas pa dang / rab tu mi 'dod pa'i lha'i bu de
39a1(brgyad stong): dag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du 'ong 'dod par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang //
39a2(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de la nyan par 'gyur te/ zos nas kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog pa dang / kun chub par byed par
39a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur ro// lha'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
39a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de mgon par song yang rung / shing drung du song yang rung / khyim stong du song yang rung / bla gab med par song
39a5(brgyad stong): yang rung / lam du song yang rung / lam gol bar song yang rung / 'brog dgon par song yang rung / rgya mtsho chen por song yang rung / de dang der 'gro ba 'am/
39a6(brgyad stong): 'chag pa'am/ 'dug pa'am/ nyal ba na yang rung ste/ 'jigasa'i gyur pa nyid mi 'byung mi skye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad
39a7(brgyad stong): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang //
39a8(brgyad stong): kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de ni theg pa gsum gyis sems can rnams 'dul bar bgyid cing / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang
39b1(brgyad stong): mi skyed pa ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gyis rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa 'di pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
39b2(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi
39b3(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gyis kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /
39b4(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de dag la srung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
39b5(brgyad stong): la tshangs pa mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas kyang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gyis kyang rigs kyi bu'am rig
39b6(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don par 'gyur ba de la srung ba dang /
39b7(brgyad stong): bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rig
39b8(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa de'i tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag
40a1(brgyad stong): tsho
40a2(brgyad stong): nges 'thob cing / yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzung na pha rol tu phyin pa
40a3(brgyad stong): drug po thams cad gzung bar 'gyur ram/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
40a4(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzung bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad bzung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
40a5(brgyad stong): gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don par byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi/
40a6(brgyad stong): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ tshe 'di la yon tan gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba de thams cad legs par rab tu nyon la yid la rung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom
40a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis legs so zhes gsol nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
40a8(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de la gang zhig chos 'di la rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang 'gal bar byed 'dod na/ rtsod par 'dod
40a9(brgyad stong): pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi rtsod pa dang / rgod pa dang / 'gal bar byed pa skyes shing / skyes pa rnams slar nub pa nyid du
40b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhing / gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed 'dod pa de dag gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs pa
40b2(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
40b3(brgyad stong): ba dang / klog pa dang / kur chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa de'i rtsod pa'i gni
40b4(brgyad stong): de ltar skyes shing skyes la de dag slar yang nub pa nyid du 'gyur zhing gnas par mi 'gyur te/ rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol bar 'dod pa dang / 'gal byed 'dod pa de dag
40b5(brgyad stong): gi bsam pa de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba
40b6(brgyad stong): dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton du byed pa de tshe 'di nyid le yon
40b7(brgyad stong): tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ko'o shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ rtsi ma g+hi zhes bya dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhig yod de/ der skye bo sbrul gdug
40b8(brgyad stong): pa bkres shing zas 'dod de/ zas tshol ba zhig gis srog chags su gyur pa 'ga' zhig mthong ste/ skye bo sbrul gdug pa des zas kyi phyir bzar bar 'dod nas/ srog
41a1(brgyad stong): chags su gyur pa de'i dri'i phyogs su 'brang zhing bsgrags pa dang / de nas srog chags su gyur pa de rtsim gyi gang na yod pa der song nas phyin te 'dug pa dang /
41a2(brgyad stong): de nas sbrul de rtsi de'i dri tsam gyis phyir ldog go/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar sbrul gyi gdug pa zil gyis gnon pa de ni/ rtsi de'i sman gyi yon tan du blta bar bya ste/ rtsi de ni de
41a3(brgyad stong): ltar mthu che'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub
41a4(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha tor byed pa de la ni/ ko'u shi ka rtsod pa dang / rgol ba dang / 'gal
41a5(brgyad stong): bar byed pa'i gzhi skyes shing / skyes pa gang yin pa de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzi brjid dang / stobs dang / mthu dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong
41a6(brgyad stong): bskyed pas myur du de nyid nas med par 'gyur/ nye bar zhi zhing 'phel bar mi 'gyur te/ de gang dang gang nas byung ba de dang de nyid nas 'ga' cing nub par 'gyur la gnas
41a7(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'dod chags la stsogs pa nas mya ngan las 'das pa nyid kyi bar du 'dzin pa dag nye bar zhi bar byed de/
41a8(brgyad stong): rnam par 'phel bar byed pa ma yino// ko'u shi ka rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / sangs rgyas brtso
41b1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
41b2(brgyad stong): klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton tu byed pa de la bsrung ba dang / bskya
41b3(brgyad stong): pa dang / sba bar byed de/ des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha
41b4(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang /
41b5(brgyad stong): kha ton byed pa de'i tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/ tshig 'jam par 'gyur/ tshig ran par 'gyur/ tshig 'chal ba med par 'gyur ro// khro bas zil kyis non par mi
41b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// nga rgyal gyis zil kyis non par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su dul bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
41b7(brgyad stong): byin pas yongs su 'dud par byed/ de khro ba 'phel bar mi byed/ nga rgyal 'phel bar mi byed/ khon du 'dzin pa yongs su mi 'chang / gnod sems yongs su mi 'chang
41b8(brgyad stong): la/ bag la nyal mi 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar spyod pa de la dran pa dang byams pa skye bar 'gyur zhing / de'i snyam du sems te/ gal te bdag gis
42a1(brgyad stong): gnod sems bskyed du zin na/ bdag gi dbang po rnams 'khrugs shing bzhin gyi mdog kyang 'gyur bas bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
42a2(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs shing / 'di la slob par 'dod pa khro ba'i dbang du 'gro ba 'di ni mi rigs so snyam nas de myur du dran pa rnyed par 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka rigs
42a3(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang /
42a4(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka'
42a5(brgyad stong): stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ de ltar byang chub sem
42a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su dul ba dang / khengs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du nye bar gnas pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u
42a7(brgyad stong): shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par
42a8(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur/ lung 'bogs par 'gyur zhing / kha ton byed par 'gyur zhing / gal te rigs
42b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
42b2(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pas g.yul 'gyed pa'i tshe/ g.yul du thog mar zhugs par 'gyur na/ de g.yul
42b3(brgyad stong): du 'jug gam/ g.yul du zhugs sam/ g.yul las 'das sam/ g.yul gi nang du 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam 'dug kyang rung ste/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'i
42b4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa 'di yid la 'dzin pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ klog pa 'am/ kun chub par byed pa 'am/ rab tu 'don pa 'am/
42b5(brgyad stong): ston pa'i/ nye bar ston pa 'am/ lung 'bogs pa'am/ kha ton byed pa de srog gi bar chad du gyur pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do//
42b6(brgyad stong): gzhan gyi gnod pa byed pas/ de srog gi bar chad 'gyur ba 'di yang gnas par ma yin no// ko'u shi ka yang gal te 'ga' zhig gis de la dbyug pa 'am mtshon nam
42b7(brgyad stong): bong ba 'am/ gzhan gang yang rung bas 'phangs na de'i lus la phog par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
42b8(brgyad stong): ba 'di ni rigs sngags chen mo'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes
43a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i rig
43a2(brgyad stong): sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rig sngags
43a3(brgyad stong): 'di la slob pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo ni bdag la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems/ gzhan la gnod pa bya bar yang mi sems/ gnyi ka la gnod pa bya bar
43a4(brgyad stong): yang mi sem so// ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
43a5(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur te/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog
43a6(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di la bslab pa'i byang chub sem
43a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ gang ma thob pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ mngon gsum du ma byas pa gang yang med de/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyed pa'i ye shes zhes
43a8(brgyad stong): bya'o// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rang
43b1(brgyad stong): tu 'dod pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton du byed par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro// ko'u
43b2(brgyad stong): shi ka gzhan yang gang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngu bris te glegs bam du chud par byas shing / mchod pa sngon du byas te/ bzhag nas bkur bstir byed la/ pi 'dzin/
43b3(brgyad stong): mi 'chang / mi klog/ kun chung bar mi byed/ rab tu 'don par mi byed/ ston par mi byed/ nye bar ston par mi byed/ lung 'bogs pa mi byed/ kha ton mi byed pa der yang
43b4(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/ sems can rnams la mi dang mi ma yin pa glags lta ba bdag gis glags bltas kyang grags rnyed par mi 'gyur
43b5(brgyad stong): te/ de ni gnas med do// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ tshe 'di la yon tan 'di yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ gang
43b6(brgyad stong): dag byang chub kyi snying po na 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i 'khor yug na 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po'i nang na 'dug pa dang / byang chub kyi shing gi rtsa ba na 'dug pa'i mi
43b7(brgyad stong): dang / mi ma yin pa dang / byol song yan chad kyang sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par mi dang mi ma yin pa dag gis gtse ba 'am/ gnod par bya ba'am/
43b8(brgyad stong): 'bebs par byed mi nus sa// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa dang / 'on med pa dang / mi skrag pa rab tu sgos par mdzad cing rab
44a1(brgyad stong): ston par mdzad pa/ 'das pa dang ma pyod pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams der mngon
44a2(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin du ko'u shi ka gang du
44a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / stan
44a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton du byed pa der/ ko'u shi ka sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gtogs par/ sems can mi dang mi ma yin
44a5(brgyad stong): bdag gis gtse ba 'am/ gnod par bya ba 'am/ 'bebs par byed mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis/ sa byog
44a6(brgyad stong): de sems can rnams kyi mchod rten du gyur pa byas pa dang / phyag bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur du bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang /
44a7(brgyad stong): der nye bar phyin pa'i sems can rnams skyob pa dang / skyabs dang / gnas dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur bar byas pas so// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
44a8(brgyad stong): mo des/ tshe 'di la phan yon 'di dag kyang yongs su 'dzin to// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/
44b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gyis shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par gyis te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang //
44b2(brgyad stong): gdug dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang // dugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / khor yug tu mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang /
44b3(brgyad stong): mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang / rjed pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /
44b4(brgyad stong): gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku dag mchod rten gyi nang du brtsal te/ yongs su 'dzin
44b5(brgyad stong): cing 'chang la/ de dag la yang de bzhin du lha'i me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
44b6(brgyad stong): dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug du mar me'i 'grem pa dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis/ bkur bstir bgyis pa dang / bla mar bgyis pa dang /
44b7(brgyad stong): rjed pa dang / mchod pa dang / ri mor bgyis pa dang / bsnyen bkur bgyis na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis gang bsod nams ches mang du skyed par 'gyur//
44b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de'i phyir 'di khyod nyid la dri bar bya ste/
45a1(brgyad stong): khyod kyis ci sar nus pa de bzhin du kyang kun cig/ saru sheka 'di jis dus mas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgapar rdzogs pa'i sa
45a2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi/ thams cad lakhyen pa nyid kyi bdag gi dngos po mngon par grub pa gang yin pa de lam gang zhig la bslangs sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
45a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ de skad ces
45a4(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol no// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
45a5(brgyad stong): nyid la bslabs pas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
45a6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes shing mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de lta bas na
45a7(brgyad stong): 'o na ni bdag gis dngos po'i skra 'di brnyes pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'i/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes
45a8(brgyad stong): bas ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o// ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
45b1(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba yin zhing / ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag gi dngos po'i sku
45b2(brgyad stong): brnyes pa 'di yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa las byung ba yin te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pa yin no// rten 'di
45b3(brgyad stong): la rten nas na/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rab tu 'byed par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/ chos kyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur/
45b4(brgyad stong): dge 'dun gyi sku rab tu 'byed par yang 'gyur ro// de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyud bdag gi dngos po'i sku brnyes pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ thams cad
45b5(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rten du gyur pas na/ sems can thams cad kyi mchod rten du gyur cing / phyag bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya
45b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / mchod par bya ba dang / ri mor bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar gyur pa yin la/ de bzhin du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / sku de dag la
45b7(brgyad stong): yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// de bas na ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam
45b8(brgyad stong): du chud par byas te bzhag la/ de la lha'i me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
46a1(brgyad stong): dang / dril bu dang / bdan dag dang / khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng bdag dang / mched pa rnam pasang po dag gis mtshan par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/
46a2(brgyad stong): zla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri bor byed / bsnyen bkur byed na/ koT shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do dag bsod nams chos mang du skyed pa/
46a3(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dos/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi chu
46a4(brgyad stong): mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'brib na/ glegs bam du chud pa 'di la bkur bstir byed/ tha mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri ma
46a5(brgyad stong): byed/ bsnyen bkur byed/ mchod pa rnam pa rnam pa mang po dag byed na/ 'di nyid de las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko Ta shi ka gang shes
46a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa des/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
46a7(brgyad stong): la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling 'di'i mi gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri bar mi
46a8(brgyad stong): bgyid/ 'dzin par mi bgyid/ 'chang bar mi bgyid/ kun chub par mi bgyid/ rab tu 'don par mi bgyid/ ston par mi bgyid/ nye bar ston par mi bgyid/
46b1(brgyad stong): rjed par mi bgyid/
46b2(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs par mi bgyid/ kha ton tu mi bgyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang /
46b3(brgyad stong): na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / kho ra yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par
46b4(brgyad stong): mi bgyid de bkur stir mi bgyid/ bla mar mi bgyid/ mchod par mi bgyid/ ri mor mi 'gyid/ bsnyen bkur mi bgyid pa de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das ci
46b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bgyis pa de ltar don chen po can du ma 'tshal legs sam/ bcom ldan 'das ci bcom ldan 'das
46b6(brgyad stong): kyis gsungs pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mched pa bgyis pa de ltar phan yon chen po dang ldan par rtogs par ma gyur lags sam/ de ltar 'bras bu che ba dang /
46b7(brgyad stong): rnam par smin pa che bar des rig par ma gyur lags sam/ 'on te 'tshal cing rtogs la rig kyang slar zhing dad par ma gyur pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / brtse
46b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems/ 'dzam bu'i gleng gi mi de dag las gang dag sangs
46b9(brgyad stong): rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa ci snyed cig yod/ de skad
47a1(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling gi rtsa
47a2(brgyad stong): de dag las/ gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dag dge 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa
47a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no//
47a4(brgyad stong): de bzhin te/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi de dag las/ gang dag sangs rgyas la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang chos la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa dang / gang dge
47a5(brgyad stong): 'dun la rtogs nas dad pa dang ldan pa de lta bu ni nyung ngo // ko'u shi ka gang dag rgyan tu zhugs pa'i bras bu thob pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag
47a6(brgyad stong): lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa ni chung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // dang dag dgra bcom pa thob pa ni nyung ba de dag
47a7(brgyad stong): pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag rang byang chub mngon du byed pa ni lung ba de dag pas kyang chos nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yong dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
47a8(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed nas/ sems bskyed pa de rab tu rgyas
47b1(brgyad stong): par byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ sems bskyed pa rgyas par byas nas
47b2(brgyad stong): brtson 'grus brtsams shing / gnas pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal khyor du byed pa de ni nyung ba de dag pas
47b3(brgyad stong): kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bed
47b4(brgyad stong): de/ phyir pi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se la gnas pa ni nyung ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'bad de/ bla na
47b5(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag pas kyang ches nyung ngo // gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
47b6(brgyad stong): cing babad de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag ni nyung ba de dag pas kyi ches nyung ngo // ko'u shi ka byang
47b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag phyir ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
47b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob cing 'bad pa gzhan rnams la/ shes
48a1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar spyod cing / lung 'bogs pa dang / de dag la yang 'dzin du 'jug pa/ 'chang du 'jug pa dang / klog du 'jug pa dang /
48a2(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed du 'jug pa dang / rab tu 'don tu 'jug pa dang / ston du 'jug pa dang / nye bar ston du 'jug pa dang / lung 'bogs su 'jug pa dang / kha ton du byed tu
48a3(brgyad stong): 'jug pa dang de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
48a4(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar
48a5(brgyad stong): byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed pa dag yin no// ko'u shi ka yang gang dag byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa dang / byang chub kyi sems
48a6(brgyad stong): bskyed nas/ byang chub kyi sems rgyas par byed cing / byang chub kyi sems rab tu rgyas par byas te/ byang chub tu spyod pa'i sems can dag ni gzhal du med pa grangs med pa
48a7(brgyad stong): yod mod kyi/ ko'u shi ka yang sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa/ byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa dag la/ gal te na gcig gam gnyis shig phyir mi ldog pa'i byang /
48a8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni brtson 'grus zhan pa dang / le lo can dang / sems
48b1(brgyad stong): dpa dman pa dang / sems dman pa dang / 'du shes dman pa dang / mos pa dman pa dang / shes rab dman pa rnams kyis bsgrub par dka'o// ko'u shi ka de bas na/
48b2(brgyad stong): de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang myur du bde bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ rgyun mi 'am
48b3(brgyad stong): par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya'o// 'chang bar bya'o// grogs par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// rab tu 'don par bya'o//
48b4(brgyad stong): bstan par bya'o// nye bar bstan par bya'o// lung 'bogs par bya'o// kha ton du bya'o// yongs su dri bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar rigs kyi
48b5(brgyad stong): bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag 'di snyam du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/
48b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslabs pas/ bdag cag gyis kyang 'di la bslab par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag cag gi ston pa'o zhes
48b7(brgyad stong): shes te/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs kyang rung / yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang rung ste/ byang chub sems da /
48b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten par bya'o// ko'u shi ka de bas na/ de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ de bzhin
49a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin
49a2(brgyad stong): gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can bye ba du ma byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang / des de la nam mtsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang / lha'i gdug
49a3(brgyad stong): ba dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i 'phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril bu dang / lha'i
49a4(brgyad stong): ba dan dang / kho ra yug du lha'i mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod
49a5(brgyad stong): par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis
49a6(brgyad stong): gsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di
49a7(brgyad stong): bsod nams mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dang de rtog cing mos la sems dang bas byang chub sems bskyed nas/ lhag ma'i bsam pas
49a8(brgyad stong): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed
49b1(brgyad stong): pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'brel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ci ltar bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir
49b2(brgyad stong): yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun 'chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshu
49b3(brgyad stong): dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan btags pa/ bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na/ glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam
49b4(brgyad stong): bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di la me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
49b5(brgyad stong): dril bu dang / ba dan dang / kho ra yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag gis mchod pa byed de/ bkur sti byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur
49b6(brgyad stong): byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas bsod nams kyi phung po mang du bskyed do// ko'u shi ka rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin
49b7(brgyad stong): / gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po car byed pa dus lha zhog/ ko'u shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'di kun tu rin po che sna bdun gyi
49b8(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying po can gyis yongs su gang bar byed du bcug ste/ byas nas kyang de dag la nam mtsho ba'i bar du lha'i me tog dang /
50a1(brgyad stong): lha'i bdug pa dang / lci'i dri dang / lci'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i
50a2(brgyad stong): dril bu dang / lha'i ba dan dag dang / khor yug du lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gyis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed/ za mar byed/
50a3(brgyad stong): rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nams ches
50a4(brgyad stong): mang du skyed dang / rgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
50a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'ab rigs kyi bu mo 'dis bsod napas ces mang du bskyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la/ sems dbabs
50a6(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston
50a7(brgyad stong): ba dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel
50a8(brgyad stong): ba dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ci ltar grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i
50b1(brgyad stong): chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan dgas pa/
50b2(brgyad stong): bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang /
50b3(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mcho
50b4(brgyad stong): ba rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
50b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
50b6(brgyad stong): ring srel gyi snying po can rnams kyis yongs su gang ba lta zhig/ ko'u shi ka yang gal te gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams
50b7(brgyad stong): cad las sems can re res/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring spel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam 'tsho'i
50b8(brgyad stong): bar du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang /
51a1(brgyad stong): khor yug du mar me'i 'breng ba dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa dang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur ster byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/
51a2(brgyad stong): mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci sems can dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed
51a3(brgyad stong): dang/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka de bas
51a4(brgyad stong): kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu po 'dis bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la/ sems
51a5(brgyad stong): dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu
51a6(brgyad stong): 'dod pa dang / bston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang / 'di
51a7(brgyad stong): dod rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang / ci ga bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas
51a8(brgyad stong): kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig sadam pa'i chas chung par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun reng du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas// byang chub sems
51a9(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa
51b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa/ bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu daglegs bam du chud par byas te/ 'chang ngam bkag la/ shes/
51b2(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang rtse ma dang / na za' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
51b3(brgyad stong): mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / kho ra yug du mar me'i 'breng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur stir byed/
51b4(brgyad stong): bla bar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod
51b5(brgyad stong): nams ches mang du skyed do// ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khabs kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gi khas na/
51b6(brgyad stong): sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las/ sems can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rted/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring srel gyi snying
51b7(brgyad stong): bo can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mtsho'i bar du lha'i me tog dang gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs
51b8(brgyad stong): dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dan dag dang / khe ra yug du mar me'i 'greng 'dag dang / lha'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur
52a1(brgyad stong): stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ci skab du sems/ ci sems can de dag thams cad
52a2(brgyad stong): de'i gzhi de las bsod nams ches mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka
52a3(brgyad stong): de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la sems dang
52a4(brgyad stong): bas byang chub du sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'dod pa dang /
52a5(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis
52a6(brgyad stong): rjes su rtogs pa dang / ci lta bur grub pa'i ye shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub
52a7(brgyad stong): par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
52a8(brgyad stong): bo rnams la phan gdags pa/ bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar rlung ngu na glegs bar du chud par byas te/ 'tshang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me
52b1(brgyad stong): tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug
52b2(brgyad stong): du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri
52b3(brgyad stong): mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// ko'u shi ka stong spyi bud kyi 'jig
52b4(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad las sems
52b5(brgyad stong): can re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs ring bsrel gyi snying po can re re byed du bcug ste/ de dag la nam mcho' ba'i ba bar lha'i me
52b6(brgyad stong): tog dang / lha'i gdug pa dang / lha'i dri dang / lha'i phreng ba dang / lha'i byug pa dang / lha'i phye ma dang / lha'i na bza' dang / lha'i gdugs dang / lha'i rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i dril
52b7(brgyad stong): bu dang / lha'i ba dan dag dang / khor yug du lba'i mar me'i zer ba dag dang / ldi'i mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gi mchod par byed de/ bkur bstir byed/ bla bar byed/ rjed
52b8(brgyad stong): par byed/ mchod par byed/ re mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyem du sems/ ci sems can de dag thams cad de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed
53a1(brgyad stong): dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang
53a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'dir bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de rtog cing mos la/ sems dang bas/
53a3(brgyad stong): byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang /
53a4(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjes
53a5(brgyad stong): su rtog pa dang / ci ltar bur grub shes rab kyis 'dir yongs su dpyod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig/
53a6(brgyad stong): ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang ba bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pas/ bsgrub pa byas
53a7(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byes te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / 'phreng ba

53b4(brgyad stong): sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad las sems can de dag re res rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi mchod rten/ de bzhin gshegs
