58a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa bstan par bya ba yin no// grogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nye bar ston par bya ba yin no// grogs po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lung dbog par bya ba yin no// grogs pa shes
58a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin tu phyin pa kha ton du bya ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
58a7(brgyad stong): zung shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chongs shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhogs shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun chub
58a8(brgyad stong): bar gyis shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu thon cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa ston cig/ ke'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
58a9(brgyad stong): pa nye bar ston cig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lung phog shig/ ko'u shi ka khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kha don du gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u sha ka gang gi tshe/
58b1(brgyad stong): lha ma yin rnams 'di lta bur sems kyi rgyu ba 'byung ste/ 'di snyam du sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'thab par bya'o// sum ducu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang lhan cig tu g.yul 'gyed
58b2(brgyad stong): bar bya'o snyam na/ de'i tshe ko'u shi ka khyed kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran par byos shig/ kha ton du byos shig dang / lha ma yin te dag gis sems kyi rgyu ba de lta bu de dag kyang rub par 'gyuraro//
58b3(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen
58b4(brgyad stong): me'o// bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngag so// bco
58b5(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rig sngagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol pa tu phyin pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so// bcom ldan 'ang
58b6(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam pa med pa'i rigs sngags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// /
58b7(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// dede bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
58b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rig sngags chen mo'o// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad ma med pa'i rig sngags so// ko shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi
59a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni tshad med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gong na med pa'i rig sngag so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
59a2(brgyad stong): pa 'di ni bla na med pa'i rig sngags so// ko'u shi ka 'di lA ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mnyam ba med pa'i rig sngags so// ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang
59a3(brgyad stong): mnyam pa'i rig sngags so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di la brten nas/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang+yas
59a4(brgyad stong): rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ko'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
59a5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur nga ci snyed pa de snyed kyang / ke'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas/
59a6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'dzang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka da ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med grangs med pa na/ sangs rgyas
59a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang su dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rgya ba de dag kyang / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di
59a8(brgyad stong): nyid la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chung mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas rgya'o// ka'u shi kang yang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngags 'di nyid la brten
59b1(brgyad stong): nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// ko'u shi ka rig sngags 'di nyid la brten nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams kyang 'jig rten du
59b2(brgyad stong): rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi
59b3(brgyad stong): yan lag dang ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa drug rnasaM 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub
59b4(brgyad stong): kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten du rab 'byed do// mdor na chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong yang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / rang byung gyi ye shes
59b5(brgyad stong): dang / bsam gyis mi khyad pa'i ye shes kyang 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do//
59b6(brgyad stong): / bam po bzhi pa// / ko'u shi ka gang gi tshe/ yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzog pa'i sa ng+yas
59b7(brgyad stong): rnam 'jig rten du mi 'byung bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang / ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ shA rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rig sngag 'di nyid la rten nas/ koru shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/
60a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa sngon thos pas/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka sems can rnams la rjes su brtse ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang / rjes brtse
60a2(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir 'jig rten 'di la brten te/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i bsam gtan gzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub
60a3(brgyad stong): kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i tshad med pa bzhi 'jig rten du 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag dang mi ldan pa'i gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// byang chub kyi yan lag
60a4(brgyad stong): dang mi ldan pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga rnams 'jig rten du rab tu 'byed do// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten nas/ sman dang / skar ma thams cad stengs ci lta ba dang /
60a5(brgyad stong): mthu ci lta bar kun tu snang bar byed/ rgyu skar rnams kying stobs ci lta ba dang / mthu ci lta ba bzhin du snang bar byed do// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
60a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos 'jig par ma gyur pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams 'jig rten du
60a7(brgyad stong): ma byung ba na/ la la chos spyod pa dang / mtshungs par spyod pa dang / zhi bar spyod pa dang / dge bar spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten na// rab tu 'dogs pa dang / rab tu sdom pa de dag thaMd byang chub seMs dang
60a8(brgyad stong): la skyes shing / byang chub ses dpas rab tu phye ste/ byang chub seMs dpa'i 'thabs mkhas pas las 'jug pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhra pa de yang / shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa las
60b1(brgyad stong): skyes par rig par bya'o// ko ru shi ka gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa
60b2(brgyad stong): dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / yid la byed pa dang / dran par byed pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rnams de'i bzhi las tshe 'di la yon tan mang po rnams re bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
60b3(brgyad stong): khru rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'apa rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang / tshe 'di'i yon tan gang dag dang ldan par 'gyur bcom
60b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo de dag ni yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ mtshon gyis 'chi ba'i dus
60b5(brgyad stong): byed par mi 'gyur/ mes 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chus 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dbyug pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ pha rol gyi gnod pa byed pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par
60b6(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur/ de dag la rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu'am rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po'i chen po dag gis gnod pa byung zhing skyes na yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran zhing
60b7(brgyad stong): kha ton du byed pa dag la phyir mi snang bar 'gyur// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dran zhing kha ton byed pa de dag la/ rgyal po 'am// rgyal po'i blon po chen po'am/ rgyal po'i blon po der
60b8(brgyad stong): glags lta ba dang / glags tshol ba gang dag nye bar 'ongs pa gyur na/ de dag gis glags snyed par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu gzung ba'i phyir ro// der
60b9(brgyad stong): po'i
61a1(brgyad stong): / rgyal po 'am/ rgyal po'i bu 'am/ rgyal po'i blon po 'am/ rgyal po'i blong po dag nye bar 'ongs na yang de dag smra bar 'dod cing / gtam zer bar 'dod pa de yang dag par dga' bar bya'o snyam du
61a2(brgyad stong): sem par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ sems can thaMd kyi drung na/ khyam pa'i sems kyis byams pa nye bar sgrub pa dang / snying rje'i seMs kyis snying rje nye bar sgrub pas nye
61a3(brgyad stong): bar gnas par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka de nyid kyi phyir na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang yang gdugs pa dang / sdig sbrul mang po'i dgon pa'i nang du song ba de dag la/ mi 'i mi ma yin pa klags lte ba dang / glags tshol
61a4(brgyad stong): ba de dag gis kyang / ko'u shi ka de dag la sngon gyi las kyi rnams par smin pa ma gtogs par glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de nas mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu ba rgya klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas de'i tshe/
61a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs par gyur to// de nas lga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgya de dag rgyang nas 'ongs pa mthong nas/ de dag gi sems la kan tu brtags te/
61a6(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu 'di dag klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs kyis/ bdag gis ci nas kyang mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag bcom ldan la
61a7(brgyad stong): kyis drung du nye bar mi 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir/ bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi thang nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs cha ji snyed cig bzung ba/ de tsam zhig bdag gis dran pas bsam par
61a8(brgyad stong): bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu 'don par bya ste/ de ltar byas dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa la bar chad du mi 'gyur ro zhes bsams so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/
61b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i phyogs cha ji snyed cig des bzung ba de snyed tsam zhig dran pas bsam te/ kha ton du byas shing rab tu bton par gyur to// de nas mu stegs
61b2(brgyad stong): can gzhan kun tu rgyu de dag rgyang ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ sgo de nyid dang lam de nyid nas phyir log ste dang ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di snyam
61b3(brgyad stong): du sems te/ 'dir ci'i phyir 'di ltar mu stegs can gzhan kun rgya de dag rgyang ring bas kyang ches ring ba nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba byas te/ sgo de nyid dang lam de nyid nas slar dong snyam mo// der
61b4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i de lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/
61b5(brgyad stong): mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu klan ka tshol ba'i bsam pa can de dag gi sem dag mthong nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa la bar chad byed par gyur na/ mi rung ngo snyam zhing ci nas/ shes rab
61b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par mu stegs can gzhan kun tu n+ya de dag 'ong bar ma gyur cig skam pas/ mu stegs can gzhan kun tu rgyu rtsod par 'dod pa dang / rgol dang 'dod pa dang / 'gal bar byed par
61b7(brgyad stong): 'dod pa rnams bzlog pa'i don tu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas yid la bsams te/ kha ton du byas shing / rab tu bton te/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ lngar ngas kyang gan // da ci'i phyi
61b8(brgyad stong): zhen dI'i bu mu stebs can gzhan kun tu d+h+ya de dag gcig la yang rjod kar po yod pA ngas mthong ste/ ga ri bred dag thams cad ni klan ka tshol ba'i bas pa dang / shes 'bras pa'i sems kyis 'od 'dod par gyur to//
62a1(brgyad stong): de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'khod bzhi po 'di dag 'tshog shing 'khod// de bzhin gsha pa'i mngon du gyur ci
62a2(brgyad stong): 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu 'di dag kyang mngon tu byur pa lags na/ 'dir ni nges par byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung
62a3(brgyad stong): ston par 'gyur gyis/ mig gis mi rtsol bar bya ba'i bdag nye bar 'gro'o ska'o// de nas bdud sdig can gyis yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gyi tshogs mngon par sprul te/ bco ldan 'das ga la ba deng nye bar 'ongs so//
62a4(brgyad stong): de nas lha rnapas kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sebs te/ kye ba'o 'di dag ni bdud sdig cad yin te/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung kyi tshogs mngon par sprul nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs pa yin
62a5(brgyad stong): gyi/ yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gyi/ tshogs kyi bkod pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ rgyal po gzugs can snying po'i yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gyi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin/ rgyal po ga' rgyal gyi yan lag bzhi
62a6(brgyad stong): pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin no// shAkya rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gyi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang ma yin no// li tsa byi rnams kyi yan lag bzhi pa'i dpung gi tshogs kyi bkod pa yang
62a7(brgyad stong): ma yin gyi 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis mngon par sprul pa yin te/ bdud sdig can ni yun ring po nas/ bcom ldan 'das la glags lta ba dang / klags tshol ba dang sems can rnams la gnod pa
62a8(brgyad stong): bsam pa dang / rjes su 'brel ba yin no// bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dran pas bsam par bya/ kha ton du bya/ rab tu gdon par bya'o snyam mo// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya
62b1(brgyad stong): byin gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dran pas bsams shing / kha ton tu byas te/ rab tu bton par gyur to// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis ci ltar ga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dran pas
62b2(brgyad stong): bsams shing / kha ton du byas te/ rab tu bton pa de lta de ltar bdud sdig to can sgo nga nyid dang / la ba nyid nas slar log ste song bar gyur to// de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis
62b3(brgyad stong): lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dag mngon par sprul te/ bar snang gyi nam mkhas la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba de dag mngon par rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad du kye ma shes
62b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yun ring mo zhig na/ 'dzam bu'i gling kyi mi rnams kyi nang du 'byung zhes ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod nas/ yang lha'i me tog rnams bzung nas/ bcom ldan 'das ka la
62b5(brgyad stong): ba der mngon par gtor// mngon par rab tu gtor te/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad pa dang / sgom pa dang / shes rab kyi
62b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag la ni/ bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa dang / thos nas 'dzin
62b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton du bgyid pa'i sems can de dag ni ngan ngon gyi dge
62b8(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang / sngon
63a1(brgyad stong): gyi rgyal ba rnam la dgyis pa lags na/ gang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chung bar byed pa dang / rang tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye ba
63a2(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / lung 'bog pa dag kha ton bgyi ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyi ba g+ha ci smos te/ bcom ldan
63a3(brgyad stong): 'das sems can de dag gyis ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bskur bgyis pa leg so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen
63a4(brgyad stong): banyid rab tu 'byed cing / 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa nyid btsal bar dgyi'o// bcom ldan 'dis 'di lta ste/ dper na rin po che dang / rin po che chen po gang yang rung ba de dag pas
63a5(brgyad stong): cad ni/ rgya mtsho chen pos rab tu phye ba lags/ de dag thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi ba lagaso// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po/
63a6(brgyad stong): che chen po ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa las yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po las btsal bar bgyi'o// de skad
63a7(brgyad stong): ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnam kyi dbang po rgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra btso
63a8(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thaMd mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che chen po ni 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rgya mtsho chen po 'di las skyes// de nas bco ldan
63a9(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang pa dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bsngags pa mi gsung zhing ming yongasu mi sgrogs// tshul khrim
63b1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma lags brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das ni bsam btan gyi pha rol tu phyin
63b2(brgyad stong): pa'i sngags pa mi gsung zhing ming yongasu mi sgrogs kyi/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig pu nyid kyi bsngags pa yongasu gsung ba dang / ming
63b3(brgyad stong): yongs sgrogs kyi bya pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan gyi na ma ya no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po rnams kyi sngon du/
63b4(brgyad stong): 'gro ba ste/ des na pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming tho po// kun dga' bo/ de ji snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyi du yongasu ma bsngos pa'i sbyin pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
63b5(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur ram/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma la gso/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo//
63b6(brgyad stong): de ci'i snyam du sems de bzhin tu yongasu ma bsngos pa'i tshul khrims dang / yongasu ma bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / yongasu ma bsngos pa'i bskyon 'grus dang / yongasu ma bsngos pa
63b7(brgyad stong): bsam gtan rnams dang / kun dga' bo 'di ni snyam du sems/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu ma bsngos pa'i shes rab kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming
63b8(brgyad stong): kya ring yong du sgrogs par mang // bcoM ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ kun dga' ro de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i bsngags pa smras pa dang /
63b9(brgyad stong): thob par 'gyur rab/ kun dga' bos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du sems/
64a1(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongasu sde bas yongasu sngo bar byed pa'i shes rang gang yin pa de bsam gyi mi khyab pa yin nam/ kun dga'/
64a2(brgyad stong): dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de yongasu bsngo bas/ yongasu bsngo bar byed
64a3(brgyad stong): pa'i shes rab gang lags pa de ni bsam gyi mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das de ni mchog tu bsam gyis mi khyab po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
64a4(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ de ltar dam pa yin pa'i phyir de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur te/ gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba thams
64a5(brgyad stong): cang mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsngos pa rnams/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob bo// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yong
64a6(brgyad stong): su bsngos pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon du 'gro zhing 'dren pa yongasu 'dren pa'o// tshul 'dis pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ shes
64a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na'i nang du 'dus so// kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongasu rdzogs pa'i
64a8(brgyad stong): tshig ba dgas so// kun dga' bo de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu bsgrags na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thaMd yongasu bsgrags par 'gyur ro//
64a9(brgyad stong): takun dka' bo 'di lta ste dper na/ sa chen po la sa bon btab pa dang phrad na skye bar 'gyur te/ sa chen po ni sa bon de dag gi zhi zhi yin pas sa chen po la brten nas/
64b1(brgyad stong): sa bon de dag skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par gzung bas/ thabs cad mkhyen pa nyid
64b2(brgyad stong): la rten pa yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga skye bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu bzung ba'i phyir/ pha
64b3(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyuraro// kun dga' bo lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i sngon tu 'gro zhing 'dren pa yongasu
64b4(brgyad stong): 'dren pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das res shig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzung zhing
64b5(brgyad stong): bcangs pa dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par gyis pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung phog pa dang / kha ton du bgyis pas rigs kyi bu
64b6(brgyad stong): 'am rigs bu mos yon tan gang dag yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan 'di dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
64b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yon su bsgrags pa ni ma lags te/ 'on kyang gang zhig bdag gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu ba 'di/
64b8(brgyad stong): phyogs gcig gzung zhing rab tu gton pa lag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko 'u shi ka legaso/ legaso// ko'u shi ka yang dgang shes rab kyi pha rol
64b9(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chud par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
65a1(brgyad stong): kha ten byed pa de dag nyid 'da' shig la/ yon tan 'di dag 'da' shig tu ni gnas ma zad kyi/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ sangs
65a2(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nung bar ma gyur cig ces dang pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang / tshul dang bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems
65a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas glegs bam du chung bar byas te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la/
65a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
65a5(brgyad stong): dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang kho ra yug du mar me 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod par byed/ bkur sgor byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par
65a6(brgyad stong): byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bskur byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yis tshe 'di nyid kyi yon tan ngas bshad pa yin no// de skad ces bka'
65a7(brgyad stong): bskul pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gyis kyang gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi tshul
65a8(brgyad stong): rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nus par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa'
65a9(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnam la phan gdag pa bsgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas/ glegs bam du chud par bgyis te/ 'chang ngam bzhag la
65b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang byug pa dang / bye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang //
65b2(brgyad stong): khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gyis mchod par bgyid de/ bskur stir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rjed par bgyi ba mchod par 'gyid/ ri mor dgyi
65b3(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur bgyid pa'i rig kyi bu'am rig kyi bu de la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bgyid par 'gyur na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang /
65b4(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha don bgyid pa dang / me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang /
65b5(brgyad stong): phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang
65b6(brgyad stong): po dag gis mchod par bgyi de/ bkur sti bgyid/ bla ma re bgyid/ rjed par bgyid/ mchod par bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ bsnyan bskur bgyid pa lha ci smos kyang ci 'tshal/ bac+doMn kyi bka'
65b7(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka le gso leg so// ko'u shi ka yang rigs kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu me de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di kha thon du byed pa na/ de nying du lha'i bu brgya mang po 'ong bar 'gyur/
65b8(brgyad stong): lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i brgya stong phrag mang po rnams chos nyan pI phyir/ nye bar 'ong bar 'gyur ro// lha'i bu de dag chos kun pa dang / chos smras pa de'i spob pa nye bar bsgru
65b9(brgyad stong): po snyam du sems par 'gyuraro// gang gi tshe yang chos smra ba de mi smra bar 'dod par 'gyur ba de che rgya yang lha'i bu de dag gis/ chos la gus pa de nyid kyis/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs/
66a1(brgyad stong): kyi ru mo de ji ltar smra ba nyid du 'dun pa/ de ltar spongs pa nye bar bsgrub par semaso// kro'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rib kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jim
66a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'den pa dang / sbron pa dang / le bar ston pa dang / nye bar smon pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton
66a3(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur ba de dag tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka gzhan rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
66a4(brgyad stong): 'chad pa na/ nga la klan tshol ba'i bsam pas/ 'ga' zhig rgol na mi rung ngo snyam du 'khor gyi bdun du sems zhum par mi 'gyur// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lnga ded la/ shes
66a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa srung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang / sba bar byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa des ni/ klan ka tshol ba yang yang dag par rjesu myi mtho //
66a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pas ni/ klan ka tshol bar byed pa yang yang dag par rjesu mi mtho // gang klan ka btsal ba bya ba de yang dag par rje su ma mthongango // shes rab kyi pha
66a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa de yang yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ste/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pas yongasu bzung ba'i rig kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la/ rnam grangs 'dis rgol ba
66a8(brgyad stong): yang mi 'byung // de yang mi ngang tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi byed do// ko'u shi ka rig kyi bu'am rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang
66a9(brgyad stong): 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chud par byed pa dang / rang tu 'don pa dang / smon pa dang nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur ba des/ tshe 'di la yon tan
66b1(brgyad stong): ngag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyuraka ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag pha ma dang / mdza' bo dang / blon po dang / bzhin shes dang / snag gi gnyen mchu ma rnam dang /
66b2(brgyad stong): dge slong dang / bram ze dang dag la yid du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// de pha rol sgol dbyung zhing / skyes pa dag chos dang ldan pas tshar gcod pa la stong yod cing nus pa yod par 'gyur te/ kha rol gyis
66b3(brgyad stong): brgal ba na yang / brgal ba la lung ston nus par 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub pa byed pa dang

67a1(brgyad stong): lung po gcig rtson byas te/ yang phyir 'grubar semaso// kroT shi ka su bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dag gi nang na lha'i bu gang su dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par

68b8(brgyad stong): ka rig kyi du'am rig kyi thu ma nas/ sems 'di lngar bskyeng bar byas/ gangasu ga phyogs dngu'i 'jal chen gyi khams gzhal du med ba grangs med ba dag na yang ba'i lha dang /
68b9(brgyad stong): 'i mdang mam min pa dang ga mams papa 'phrus/ #
69a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la ltom shig/ phyag 'tshal gyis shig/ zung shig/ tshangs shig/ lhogs shig/ kun chub par gyis shig/ rab tu thor tshal/ sngon tsang / nye bar sla cag
69a2(brgyad stong): 'og shig/ kha ton gyis shig/ bltas shing phyag byas te/ 'dud pa byas/ bzung ba byas/ klag pa byas/ kun chung bar byas/ rab tu 'don par byas/ smon par byas/ nye bar ston par byas
69a3(brgyad stong): phung phog cing kha sor byas nas yang phyir bdag nyid kyi gnasu dengs shig/ de dag la chos kyi sbyin pa 'di nyid byin par gyur cig ces bsam par bya'o// ko'u shi ka 'di la khyod
69a4(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du/ gling chen po ngani ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid kyi 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
69a5(brgyad stong): tu yang dag par zhugs pa de dag nyid 'ba' zhig der 'ong ba snyam du sems par 'gyur na mi rung ba ste/ ko'u shi ka de ltar mi lta'o// ko'u shi ka 'on kyang yang stong gsum gyi
69a6(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dge bar zhugs pa ci snyed yo
69a7(brgyad stong): pa de dag kyang der 'ong bar sems te/ de dag kyang der 'ongs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bar du chud ba la lta bar 'gyur/ phyag 'tshal bar 'gyur/ 'dud pa
69a8(brgyad stong): byed par 'gyur/ 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kur chung bar byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur/
69a9(brgyad stong): lung 'dogs par 'gyuraro// kha tor byed par 'gyur te/ bltas shing phyag byas nas/ 'dud pa byas/ bzung ba byas/ bcang ba byas/ klag pa byas/ kun chub par byas/ rab tu 'don pa byas
69b1(brgyad stong): ston par byas/ nye bar ston par byas/ lung phog cing kha ton byas te/ yang phyir 'gro bar sems// ko'u shi ka yang rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo de'i khyim dang / gnas khang dang / khang bzangs kyang shin tu
69b2(brgyad stong): bsrung bar 'gyur zhing / sngod gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ma gajogra par/ de la su yang 'tsheng byed par yang mi 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka de ltar deng gzi brjid chel/ gzi brjid che ba zhes bya bi l+la nga
69b3(brgyad stong): klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi rab ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dag 'ong bar sems paso// ka 'u shi ka rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu rmo
69b4(brgyad stong): che 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / bcoMco ldan 'das lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bco ldan 'das yang
69b5(brgyad stong): rig kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo des/ 'di ltar lga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin nam/ dri za 'am/ lha ma yin nam na mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ ma ma lags pa rnas/ shes rab kyi pha rol/
69b6(brgyad stong): tu ba 'di la mnyan pa dang / blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / 'dud pa bgyi ba dang / bzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / klag pa dang / kun chung bar gyi nga dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa
69b7(brgyad stong): dang / nye bar smon pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton dgying ba'i slang du/ der mchis par ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams
69b8(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos der snang ba chen po dang mthong na/ de la 'dir nges par lnga 'am/
69b9(brgyad stong): klu dang / gnod sbyin nas/ dri za 'am/ lha pa yin nam/ nam 'amakha' ldang ngam/ mi 'am ci 'am/ lto 'phye chen po'am/
70a1(brgyad stong): 'am mi ma yin pa dag 'ongs shing lhags pa yin no zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
70a2(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo des mi ma yin pa'i dri sngon chad ma bsnams pa bro bar gyur na/ di de tshor nas de la 'dir nges par lta 'am klu 'am gnod sbyin nam dri za 'am lha ma yin nam nam mkha' lding ngam mi 'am ci 'am
70a3(brgyad stong): lto 'phye chen po 'am mi 'am mi ma yin pa 'ongs shing lhags pa yin no zhes rigs kyi bu mo des shes par bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang gal te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de kun tu spyod pa gzod
70a4(brgyad stong): par 'gyur kun tu spyod pa gtsang bar 'gyur te/ de kun tu spyod pa gzob pa dang kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba des lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang
70a5(brgyad stong): lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa dag der 'ong bar sems so// der lha dang kruM dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang
70a6(brgyad stong): mi ma yin pa gang dag der 'ongs par gyur pa de dag kun tu spyod pa gzod pa dang kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba des yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste mgu ba dang yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro//
70a7(brgyad stong): de nas gzing rjid chung ba'i lha gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang de nas 'byol bar sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dro za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang
70a8(brgyad stong): mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gzi brjid chen po gzi brjid chen po de dag nyid kyi dpal dang gzi brjid dang btsun pa mi bzod pas/ de ltar lha gzi brjid
70b1(brgyad stong): chung bag zi 'arjid chung ba de dag 'byom par sems so// ko'u shi ka yang ci lta ci ltar b+ha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen
70b2(brgyad stong): bo dang mi dang mi ma yin pa gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid pa de dag rtag tu 'ong bar sems pa dang de lta de ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de yang dad pa mang bar 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka rigs
70b3(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des tshe 'di la yon tan 'di dag kyang yongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ba mo des de la bla mar bya ba dang gus par bya ba yong
70b4(brgyad stong): su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi tshul gyi gnas de'i khor ra yug tu mi gtsang ba dang mi gzob pa'i kun tu spyod pa la 'jug par mi bya'o// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'am
70b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo de lus ngal ba dang sems ngal bar mi 'gyur/ de bde bar nyal bar byed par 'gyur bde bar 'gro bar 'gyur/ gnyid kyis log na yang sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar mi 'gyur/
70b6(brgyad stong): mthong na yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ mchod rten rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
70b7(brgyad stong): nyid mthong bar 'gyur de gzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos rnams nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ sgra thos na yang pha rol du phyin pa'i sgra dag nyid thos par 'gyur byang chub kyi phyogs nyid kyi chos rnams
70b8(brgyad stong): thos par 'gyur/ byang chub kyi shing dag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ de dag du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon par rdzogs
71a1(brgyad stong): par 'tshang rgyab dag nyid mthong bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du mthong mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnams chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba mthong bar 'gyur/ sherab kyi pha
71a2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'gro ba la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po mang po dag she rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bgro bar byed pa dang / 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su
71a3(brgyad stong): bzung bar bya 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes thabs mkhas pa nye bar ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i sgra rgya chen
71a4(brgyad stong): po yang thos par 'gyur ro// phyogs ga ge mo zhig dang phyogs kyi chag ge mo zhig dang 'jig rten gyi khams ga ge mo zhig na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
71a5(brgyad stong): pa'i sangs rgyas che ni ge mo zhig bya ba de/ nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' brgya phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems
71a6(brgyad stong): dpa' stong phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems
71a7(brgyad stong): dang bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba stong brag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang nyan thos dang byang chub
71a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' bye ba phrag khrag khrig bcu stong phrag mang pos yongs su bskor cing bdan du byas te chos ston te zhes sangs rgyas kyi sgra rlangs po che yang thos par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka
71b1(brgyad stong): yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des des lta bu'i tshul gyi rmi lam 'di dag mthong bar 'gyur te/ de bde bar nyal bar 'gyur bde bar sad par 'gyur lus kyi nang du mdangs rab
71b2(brgyad stong): tu bcug pas shin tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur yang zhing yang ba nyid myod par 'gyur de la ma 'ongs par kha zas la brkam pa'i sems kyi rgyud mi skye bar 'gyur kha zos kyi 'ad
71b3(brgyad stong): shes chung bar 'gyur te/ ko'u shi ka dper na dge slong rnal 'byor spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i sems yid la byed pas yongs su brlan pas kha zas la brkam pa
71b4(brgyad stong): drag po mi 'byung zhing zas la 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de la yang kha zas la brkam pa dag po mi 'byung bar 'gyur te de
71b5(brgyad stong): zas kyi 'du shes chung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka de ni 'di ltar rig kyi bu mo ji ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la skom bI rnal 'byor la brtson pa de lta bu'i lus la mi yin pa dag mad du nye ba
71b6(brgyad stong): sgrub pa sems par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka rig kyi bu'am rig kyi bu mo de thong ba'i tshes lA tan 'di dag ljongasu 'dzin par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rig kyi bu 'am rig kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di khris te/
71b7(brgyad stong): grags pa ma du chud par byas tes mchod pa sngon du 'gro bas bzhag ste mchod par byed la/ 'dzin par mi byed 'chang bar mi byed klog par mi byed kun chub par mi byed rab tu 'don par mi byed ston par mi byed
71b8(brgyad stong): nye bar ston par mi byed lung 'bogs par byed la ston du mi byed pa de bas ni ko'u shi ka rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo 'di nyid bsod nam mang du skyed/ rig kyi bu'i rig gri bu mo dang shwesas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ji la mngon pa dang de rtog cing
72a1(brgyad stong): shAkya/ mo sa la sems dang bas byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsgrub pas nyan pa dang 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang klog pa dang kun chub par byed pa dang rab tu 'don pa dang ston pa dang /
72a2(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'brogs pa dang / kha ston byed dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang de'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang yid kyis rjes su rtog pa dang ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyis 'dir yongasu dpyod pa
72a3(brgyad stong): byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang tshul dang ma bral bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phanag
72a4(brgyad stong): gsapa bsgrubs pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na glegs bam du chud par byas te 'chang ngam bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la me tog dang bdug pa dang dri dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang na bza' gdugs dang rgyal mtshan
72a5(brgyad stong): dang dril bu dang ba dan dag dang khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis kyang mchod par byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskur stir byed bya bar byed rjed par byed mchod par byed ri mor
72a6(brgyad stong): byed bsnyen bkur byed na/ ko ru shika rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo de nyid de bas gzhi de las bsod nam me mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ ko'u shig de lta bas na 'di ltar tshe 'di la yon tan khyad par can 'di dag yong su 'dzind 'dod
72a7(brgyad stong): ba'i rig kyi bu'i rig kyi me shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la mngon par dad par bya rab tu brtag par bya lhag par mos par bya/ sems dang bas byang chub tu sem bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas rgan pa bya gzung bar bya
72a8(brgyad stong): bar bya bcang bar klag par bya kun chub par bya rab tu gdon par bya bstan par bya lung 'bog par bya khon du bya gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya de'i don rnam par dgol bar bya yid kyis rje su brtag par bya ji ltar
72b1(brgyad stong): grub pa'i shes rab kyi sa 'dir yongasu dpyad par bya/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur cig ces dam pa'i chos yung ring du gnas par bya ba dang tshul dang mo bral bas
72b2(brgyad stong): byang chub semra dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa bsgrub pa byas par 'gyur bar chung ngu na gleg bam du chud par byas te bcang zhing bzhag par bya'o// don du gnyer ba'i rig kyi bu'i rigs kyi me
72b3(brgyad stong): de dag la yang dag par mgo bar bya'o// bdag dang sems can dge ba gzhan dag la sangs rgyas kyi tshul spyan chen po dang ma bral bar 'gyu ro zhes de la lha'i me tog dang lha'i gdug pa dang lha'i dri dang lha'i phreng ba dang
72b4(brgyad stong): lha'i byug pa dang lha'i phye ma dang lha'i na bza' dang lha'i gdug dang lha'i rgyal mtshan dang lha'i dril bu dang lha'i ba dan dag dang khor yug tu lha'i mar me'i phreng ba dag dang mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis
72b5(brgyad stong): kyang rtag tu mchod par bya ste/ ba kur stir bya bla mar bya brjed par bya ba mchod par bya ri mor bya bsnyen bkur bya'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las
72b6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mchod rten la bkur sti byed pa gzhal du med pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste gsum pa'o//
72b7(brgyad stong): gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka gal te khyod la 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus
72b8(brgyad stong): byung bur yongasu su bkang ste byin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang 'bris te btad nas de las cha gang rung gcig bstabs na cha bzhag pa
73a1(brgyad stong): # pa de gnyis la/ ke'u shi ka khyod cha gang len/ rgya byin gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gar te 'jab bu'i gling 'di/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras byung bur bskum ste rtsal ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sdu
73a2(brgyad stong): bris te gtang nas/ de las ra gang rung gcig bstabs na cha bzhag pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gsheg
73a3(brgyad stong): ba'i tshul la ri mor bgyi ba'i srang du ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i don gyi sku'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku can yin te/
73a4(brgyad stong): dge slong dag 'di la ni skad ma par ma mdzin par dge slong dgang ni chos kyi skas yongs su rdzogs par ltos shig ces bya ba 'di gsungs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di yang yang dge ba'i mtha
73a5(brgyad stong): rab tu bye bar blta ste/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i skra de rnams la mi gus pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan
73a6(brgyad stong): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i ska de dag la bdag gus nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag 'khrungs te/ mchod pa brnyes
73a7(brgyad stong): so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid mchod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams la yang mchod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyis par 'gyur ro// de ci'i
73a8(brgyad stong): slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las byung ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper ni/ gang gi tshe bdag chos bzangs lha'i mdun san
73b1(brgyad stong): bdag nyid kyi lha'i stan 'di la mchis pa de'i tshe/ lha'i bu dag bdag gi rim 'gro bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// gang gi che bdag ma mchi bdag ma mchis par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gang gdag gi stan gang lags pa
73b2(brgyad stong): der b+ha'i bu de dag bdag la gus pas stan te la phyag bgyis bskor ba bgyis nas yang slar mchi'o// de'i ci'i slad du zhe ne/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin stan 'di la mchis na/ sum bcu rtsa gsum 'i
73b3(brgyad stong): lha rnams la chos sten pa zhes bya ba yin no snyam mo// bco ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang che bar grags pa rgyu dang rkyen du gyur pa'i shes rab kyis pha rol tu phyin pa yang / de bzhin gshegs pa dag
73b4(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ bsgrub par byed pa la gso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rna pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnasu gyur pa lags kyi/ de dag
73b5(brgyad stong): ni ye shes skye ba'i rgyur gyu pa ma lags/ rkyen du gyur pa ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mchod pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rgyu las byung ba lag so//
73b6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha gzhag pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams la mi gus pa yA
73b7(brgyad stong): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag la bdag gus pa nyid lags so// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongasu skos pas mchod pa//
73b8(brgyad stong): rnaso/ bcom ldan 'das yang 'jam bu'i gling de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgras byung bur bltas ba lta zhog/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhi gshegs skus byur bur bltam pa lha zhogasung
74a1(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus byung bur bltam pa shog/ stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus byung bur bltam pa lha zhog bco
74a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus byur bur bltam ste/ cha gcig tu bgyis te bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang bris la cha gnyis par bzhag
74a3(brgyad stong): te/ tsha bzhag pa 'di gnyis la khyod cha gang 'dod pa cig khyer cig ces cha gcig btabs na/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid len to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs
74a4(brgyad stong): ba'i sku de rnams la mi gus pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag la bdag gus pa nyid lags so// 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
74a5(brgyad stong): pas yongs su bskos pas mchod pa brnyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi gnas su gyur pa lags la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang shes rab
74a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa las nges par 'byung ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ cha gnyis pa de gnyis las/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan
74a7(brgyad stong): 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la gus par mi bgyid pa yang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag la gus pa nyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'on kyang
74a8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la de gshegs pa'i sku de dag kyang 'khrungs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de dag mchod pa rnyes pa ni/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bskos pa
74b1(brgyad stong): lags pa'i slad du'o// bam po lnga pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rin thang ma mchis pa'i nor bu rin po che yon tan 'di lta bu'i ngo bo
74b2(brgyad stong): 'di dag dang ldan pa zhig mchis te/ 'di lta ste/ de gang dang gang du bzhag pa de dag der mi dang / mi ma lags pa dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ gang dang gang du skyes pa 'am/ bud med la la mi
74b3(brgyad stong): ma lags pas zin pa de dang der/ nor bu rin po che chen po de stsal ma thag tu/ mi ma lags pa de de nas 'byer/ gser mas gzir cing rgyas pa'i lus la nor bu rin po che bzhag na yang / de'i gser ma
74b4(brgyad stong): de char gcod de mi 'phel ba dang zhi bar bgyid/ mkhris pas cha bar gyur pa'i lus la bzhag na yang / de'i mkhris pa de yang tshar gcod de mi 'phel ba dang zhi bar bgyid/ bad kan gyis yongasu rgyas
74b5(brgyad stong): shing kun tu gzir pa'i ster tu bzhag na yang / de'i bad kan de yang tshar gcod de mi 'phel ba dang zhi bar bgyid/ 'dus pa'i nad kyis sdug bsngal ba'i lus la bzhag na yang / de'i 'dus pa'i nad
74b6(brgyad stong): de cher bcod de mi 'phel ba dang zhi bar bgyid/ mtshan mo mun nag gi nang du ni snang bar bgyid/ tsha ba'i tshe na yang sa phyogs gang du bzhag pa'i sa phyogs de bsil bar 'gyur/ grang ba'i tshe na ya
74b7(brgyad stong): sa phyogs gang tu bzhag pa'i phyog de dro bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs gang na sbrul gdug pa mchis pa dang / de bzhin du srog chags phra mo gzhan mchis pa'i sa phyogs der 'dzin cing bzhag na/ sbrul gdug
74b8(brgyad stong): da de dag dang / srog chags phra mo de de dag kyang 'byor ro// bcom ldan 'das gal te skyes pa 'am/ bud med sbal gdugs pas zin na/ de la nor bu rin po che de stan na/ nor bu rin po che de mthong ma
75a1(brgyad stong): thag du de'i dug bcom nas ma mchis par 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de yang yon tan de dag dang / de lta bu'i ngo bo gzhan dag dang yang ldano// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag mig la chu bur ram/
75a2(brgyad stong): rab ri ba 'am/ mig nad dam/ ling tog byung na/ de dag gi mig gi steng da nor bu rin po che de bzhag na/ de dag la bzhag ma thag du/ mig gi skyon de dag byang zhing zhi bar 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de
75a3(brgyad stong): yon tan de dag dang de lta bu gzhan dang yang lda no// chab gang gi nang du stsal ba'i chab de yang rang gi mdog du mdog gcig par 'gyur/ gal te ras kar pos bkris te chab kyi nang du stsal na/ chab de yang dkar por 'gyur/ de
75a4(brgyad stong): bzhin du gal te ras sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / btsod ka dang / de lta bu dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rung ste/ ras rnam pa sna tshogs kyi nang nas ras gang yang rung bas/ nor bu rin po che de dkris sam
75a5(brgyad stong): bcings te/ chab kyi nang da stsal na/ ras kyi mtshon de dang / de dag gis chab kyang de dang / de dag gi rang bzhin gyi mdog du 'gyur la/ chab de la rnyog par gyur pa ci mchis pa de dag kyang dang bar 'gyur te/ bcom
75a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das nor bu rin po che de yon tan de lta bu'i ngo bo dag dang ldan no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras/ ko'u shi ka yang ci nor bu rin po che
75a7(brgyad stong): de dag lha'i 'jig rten 'ba' zhig na yod dam/ 'on te nor bu rin po che dag 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la yang yod/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo nor bu rin po che de dag lha'i
75a8(brgyad stong): nang na yod de/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi dag la yang nor bu rin po che yod med kyi/ de dag ni lci ba chung zhing phra la yon tan ma rdzogs te/ de lta bu'i ngo bo'i yon tan de dag dang mi ldan pas/ lha'i nor bu
75b1(brgyad stong): rin po che de dag gi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro// sdong gyi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong kyi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gyi char yang / bye ba khrag
75b2(brgyad stong): khrig brgya stong gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs su yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes bstan par bya bar yang / rten da yang / nye ba'i rgyur yang mi bzod de/ lha rnams kyi nor bu rin
75b3(brgyad stong): po che gang yin pa de dag ni/ yang zhing yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa yin no// nor bu rin po che de za ma tog gang gi nang du bcug gam phyung na/ nor bu rin po che de byung yang des za ma
75b4(brgyad stong): tog de srid du sdug par 'gyur/ nor bu rin po che de'i yon tan de dag gis za ma tog de la shin tu snying du sdug pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
75b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yongasu mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang / de bzhin gsheg pa'i sku de dog gis mchod pa brnyed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
75b6(brgyad stong): kyi yon tan lag te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di dag ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi snod du gyur pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das yang ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam 'jig rten
75b7(brgyad stong): gyi kham thams cad du chos ston pa mdzad pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las 'khrud pa'i slad du mchod par bgyi ba/ de bzhin du chos smra ba po'i chos ston pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
75b8(brgyad stong): byin pa las skyes pa'i slad du mchod par bgyi ba lag so// bcom ldan 'das dper na/ rgyal po'i skyes bu ni rgyal ba'i mthus skye bo chen po'i chog sus kyang mi 'jig par bkur bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du chos
76a1(brgyad stong): sgrab pa de chos kyi rtswa'i mthus skye ba'i tshig rkyen po sas kyang mi 'jig par mchod/ ciltar chos ston pa'i chos smra ba po mchod pa badres pa desapa/ de bzhin ga shes pa'i skagadung den pa rgya mtshod
76a2(brgyad stong): pa brnyeso// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus byur bur bltam pa lta zhog/ bcom ldan 'das gang yang gang ga'i klung gi bye
76a3(brgyad stong): ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skas byung bur bltam pa cha gcig tu bzhag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris nas cha gnyis par bzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das
76a4(brgyad stong): la la zhig gis bdag la cha bzhag pa 'di gnyis las/ khyod gang 'dod pa cha cig khyer ces bltabs na/ cha bzhag pa de gnyis las/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid len to// bcom ldan
76a5(brgyad stong): 'das bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de rnams la mi gus pa yang ma legs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra de dag la yang bdag gus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'on
76a6(brgyad stong): kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rab tu phye ba lags la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skal mchod pa ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las skyes pa lagaso//
76a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mchod na/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam la mchod pa bgyis par 'gyuraro//
76a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag chos nyid lta bar
76b1(brgyad stong): 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la sgom par bgyi'o//
76b2(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de de bzhi no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'das pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gsheg/
76b3(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byang bar gyur pa de dag kyang / ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la rten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
76b4(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ko'u shi ka ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi
76b5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// ko'e shi ka da ltar kye dras na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med/
76b6(brgyad stong): grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang / ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
76b7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon rdzogs par sangs rgya'o// ko'u shi ka da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la brten te/ bla na med
76b8(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
77a1(brgyad stong): 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems
77a2(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod rlab tu mkhyen cing yang dag par gzigaso// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
77a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po yun ring por shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ des sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yang dag par shes shing / yang dag par mthong ngo //
77a4(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lnga rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ba'
77a5(brgyad stong): zhig la spyad kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag la ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drag po thams
77a6(brgyad stong): cad la spyod de/ ko'u shi ka 'on kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na 'di dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o// sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa dang / tshul khrims
77a7(brgyad stong): srung ba dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'gras rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / chos la rnam par lta ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
77a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kho na 'di dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o// ko'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa drag po thabs mkhas pas/ yongasu zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs bsngos pa dang /
77b1(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen par yongasu bsngos pa 'di rnams la ni/ bye brag med cing tha dad du bya ba mi dmyigs so// ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing sna tshogs ni kha dog tha dad /
77b2(brgyad stong): dbyibs tha dad / lo ma tha dang / me tog tha dang / 'bras bu tha dadang / chu zheng phun sum tshogs pa tha dad kyang / shing de dag gi grib ma bye brag med cing tha dad da bya ba med cing tha dad du bya ba mi mngon ste/ gzhan du na/
77b3(brgyad stong): grib ma grib ma zhes bya ba'i grangasu 'gro ba de bzhin du/ ko'u shi ka pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thabs mkhas pa/ yongasu zin cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas/ yongs su bsngos pa dang / thams cad ma
77b4(brgyad stong): bar yongs su bsngos pa 'di rnams la ni/ bye brag med cing tha dad bya ba mi dmyig so// de skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces
77b5(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni yon tan chen po dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gzhal
77b6(brgyad stong): du ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan no// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mu ma mchis pa'i yon tan dang ldan no// / 'phags
77b7(brgyad stong): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi pa'o//
77b8(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la lce rnams kyi dbang po btu byin gyis 'di ska ces gsol to/ bcom ldan 'das rig kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mog 'ashes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa 'di la mngon par dad de/ rtog cing
78a1(brgyad stong): mos la sems dang bas/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas nyan cing 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang klog pa dang / kun nub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don
78a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bres pa dang / kha ton bgyi ba dang / gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang / 'di'i don rnam par 'grel pa dang / yid kyis rjesu rtog pad
78a3(brgyad stong): ci lta bur grub pa'i shes rab kyi 'dir yongasu dpyod par bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun chad par ma gyur cig/ dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur cig ces dam pa chos sun ring du gnas pa 'gyi ba dang /
78a4(brgyad stong): tshul dang ma bral bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phan gdags pa/ bsgrub pa bgyis par 'gyur bar chung ngun glegs bam du chud par bgyis te/ 'chang ngam 'jog pa dang /
78a5(brgyad stong): da ltar bstan pa 'di thos nas/ kyes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'di ltar don che'o// kyi ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ni 'di ltar phan yon che'o// 'di ltar 'bras bu che'o// kyem
78a6(brgyad stong): shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'di ltar rnam par smin pa che'o// kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni 'di ltar yon tan mang po dang ldan pa ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 'dide ni bdag gis bta
78a7(brgyad stong): bA mi bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag gis bsrung bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa 'di ni bdag gis sba bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni shin tu rnyed pA dag don
78a8(brgyad stong): lhag par mos shing / bdag zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la me tog dang / 'dug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / naba'a' dang / gdug dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang /
78b1(brgyad stong): bdan dag dang // khor yug du mar me'i phreng ba dag dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis mchod de/ bkur stir bgyid pa dang / bla mar babyed pa dang / rjed par bgyid pa dang / mchod pa bgyid pa dang / rim
78b2(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang / bsnyen bkar bgyid pa dang / yang gzhan zhig tha na glegs bam du chud par bgyis nas/ mchod de/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo// gzhan du gnyer zhing 'dun nas/ slong ba la sbyin pa
78b3(brgyad stong): dang / stob cing 'bul la yongasu gtong na/ bco ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa gang lags pa dang / gtong ba'i blo dang mi ldan pa gang lags pa de gnyis gang gi
78b4(brgyad stong): bsod nams ches mang nga skyed/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi ka de'i phyir 'dir khyod nyid la dri ste// khyod kyis
78b5(brgyad stong): ci ltar nus pa de bzhin du lung ston cing / ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i ska la bdag nyid kyis bkur stir byas nas/
78b6(brgyad stong): bsnyen bkur byed cing 'dzin par byed de/ bkur stir byed pa dang / bla mar byed pa dang / rjed par byed pa dang / mchod par byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / rig kyi bu
78b7(brgyad stong): 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul bdag nyid kyis kyang bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed la/ mchod pa rgyas pa
78b8(brgyad stong): 'gyur snyam pas/ sems can rnam la yang snying brtse ba'i phyir/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par smon par byed/ sbyin par byed/ kun 'ged par byed/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
79a1(brgyad stong): @#// gnyis gang bas na pa sachis yang dbyung / cibadag nyid kyis kyang mchad par bya ga/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag pasnyen par byed/ sbyin par byed// kun 'bred pa byed pa gang yi
79a2(brgyad stong): ba de ches bsod nam mang du snyed dag/ ci 'on ta gang zhig rang cing kho nas bdag nyid sos la/ mchod pa bsod nam mang du spyad/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rig kyi bu rig kyi bum
79a3(brgyad stong): gang bdag nyid kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i skul bkur stir bgyid/ bla mar bgyid/ rjed par bgyid/ mchod pa bgyid/ ri mor bgyid/ bsnyen bkur bgyid la/ mchod pa rgyas par 'gyur na pas/
79a4(brgyad stong): seMs can rnam la blo ba brtse ba'i sladadu/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag pa ston par bgyid/ sbyin par bgyid/ kun 'ged par bgyid na/ 'di gnyis las rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di nyid/
79a5(brgyad stong): de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed// bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin// ko'u shi ka de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo gang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
79a6(brgyad stong): ri bris nas gleg bam du chud par byas te/ 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang /
79a7(brgyad stong): kha na byed pa dang / rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu ma gzhan don du gnyer nang mdun nas slong ba dag la/ chung ngun glegs padu yang chud par byas te/ sbyin pa dang / sgrub cing 'bul la yongasu gtong na/
79a8(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo de gnyis las/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan rdza su 'dzin par byed pa yongasu gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa 'di nyid/ gni de las ches bsngonas mang du sgyu
79b1(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i snod du gyur pa'i rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo gang dang bA na 'dug pa de dang der song ste/ de rnas la
79b2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di sbyin par byed/ yA dag pa 'ged pa byed na/ 'di nyid ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo de bas ches bsod namA mang du skyed// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang rigs kyi bu
79b3(brgyad stong): baM rig kyi bu mo gA gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag tham cad/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi laM la yang dag par bkod cing bzhag na/ ko& shi ka 'di ji snyam du sems/
79b4(brgyad stong): rig kyi bu'i rig kyi bu mo de de'i bzhi las bsod nas ches mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gso la pa/ bcoM ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mdo/ bcoM ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas
79b5(brgyad stong): kyang rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nam mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngun glegs pa du chud par byas te/ mngon par dad pas mngon par dad pa la/
79b6(brgyad stong): rab tu rtog pas rab tu rtog pa la/ lhag par mos pas lhag par mos pa la/ sems dang bas sems dang bal/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun su chog pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa pun
79b7(brgyad stong): sum 'tshogs pa la byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ byang chub tu sems skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las ldag pa'i bas pas byin na/ chung ngun 'dri ba dang / klog pa la snyom las med pa
79b8(brgyad stong): bslab cing / brtson pas de la 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par 'god pa dang / yA dag pA gzeng bstod pa dang / yA dag pA rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / tshig gis
80a1(brgyad stong): mtshon pa dang / rnam par mtshon pa dang / rje su mtshon pa dang / de la 'di'i don yang dag par stan cing / de la 'di skad rig kyi bu khyod tshur sheg/ byang chub sems dpa'i lo 'di la 'di ltar sngong
80a2(brgyad stong): shig/ khyod kyis la 'di la bslabs spyad de 'bad na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /
80a3(brgyad stong): sems can gyi kham gzhal du med pa rnam phung po yang dag par zad pa bla na med pa 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la mngon par 'dul bar byed par 'gyuraro zhes smra zhing / de ltar de'i sems
80a4(brgyad stong): rna bar sbyong ba dang / be tsem med par byed na/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo yong su gtong ba'i blo dang ldan pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu'i rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas kyang ches bsod nams mang du skyed/
80a5(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs 'dis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thos cad kyang /
80a6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bkad cing bzhag pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems
80a7(brgyad stong): can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad gzhag/ zugag rnam grangs de la drang / stong spyi phung kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ci snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs
80a8(brgyad stong): kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gyis/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi la la yang dag par bkod cing bzhag pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag bam cad
80b1(brgyad stong): lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs de lta bur stong nyid bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag tham cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ dge ba bcu'i las
80b2(brgyad stong): kyi lam la yang dag par bkod cing bzhag pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka rnam grangs de lta bur stong gsum gyi stong

80b6(brgyad stong): ci snyam du sem/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// de de'i gzhi las bsod nams ches mdad skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma // bde bar gsheg pa mang ngo // bcom ldan
80b7(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rig kyi bu'am rig kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nam mang du spya de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngun gleg bam du yang chud par byas nas/ mngon par dang
80b8(brgyad stong): pra mngon par dad pa la/ rab tu rtog pas rab tu rtog pa la/ lhag par mos pas lhag par mo pa la/ sems dang sems dang ba la/ lhag pa'i phun sum tshogs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum

85a4(brgyad stong): deras byom ldan 'das la grad mas kyi bang ba tu byed kyis 'dis ces gas pad bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa 'di yang nye bar bstan par brtse ba lags sa gang rnang sa

85a6(brgyad stong): ba'adi yang ci bar bstun par byar/ tso'i phyir zhe ke'ashig pa'i ngas pa'i dus / shi sa gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mazugs rnyer 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de la rigs kyi bu'ang rigs chung mjugs pa/

85a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la wa rnams kyi dbang po brgya byid kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa'i gzugs bded bstad pa de ni/ 'di lags so nas ci ltar pa 'ongs
85a9(brgyad stong): nga'i dun/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa'i gzugs brgyan du rig par bgyi de nad ces gsol pa dang / bco ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byid la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
85b1(brgyad stong): ke'u shika ma 'ongs pa'i dus pa dge slong kha cig lus pa bsgongs pa/ tshul khri pa ma bsgom pa sems sa bskabs pa/ shes rab sa bsgoms gshes 'tshal ba lug zur lkug pa'i rang bzhin can// shes ra
85b2(brgyad stong): yongasu nyams pa dag 'byung ste/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan to snya ma nas/ de'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur ro// ke'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzugs bsten ci sngar ston par 'gyur
85b3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ gzugs 'jig pa ni/ gzugs mi rtag pa pa nyid do zhes ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ni/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa nyid do/

85b8(brgyad stong): gzhan yang rigs kyibu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gyis/ 'jam bu'i gling gi sems can ci srid yod ba de dag thas cad / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bul bkod na/ ke'u
86a1(brgyad stong): @shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'ab rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod na pa mang du skyed dang/ brgya byin gyis gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das pang ngo // bde
86a2(brgyad stong): bar gsheg pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ga ko'u shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'ab rigs kyi bu po 'di ches bsod nas pang du bskyed do// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

86a6(brgyad stong): dag par gzer stod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / tshig gis mtshon pa dang / rnam par mchon pa dang / rje su mtshon pa dang / de la 'di'i don yang dag par spyod pa dang de la 'di skad

90b2(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko& shi ka stong gnyis pa bar
