90b4(brgyad stong): gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i bsod nam mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen por
90b5(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong
90b6(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'ang byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shig ka stong gsum gyi stong
90b7(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gyis/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i
90b8(brgyad stong): 'bras bu la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu me de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam rgya byin gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
90b9(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa mang // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal ba/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs bu po 'di ches bsod nam zang du skyed de gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
91a1(brgyad stong): @#// pa 'di chung du dgrags pam du la chung pa byas nas// mngon par dad pas mngon par dpal/ rab tu rtag pas rab tu rtog pa la/ lhag par mos pas lhag par mos pa la/ sems
91a2(brgyad stong): rang bas sos dang ba la/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas lhag pa'i bsam pa sum tshogs pa la/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ lhag pa'i bsam pas
91a3(brgyad stong): byin nam/ chung ngan bri ba dang / klag pa la yang snyom las med par bsgrub pa dang / brtson pas de la 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag par ston pa dang / yang dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par
91a4(brgyad stong): gzeng stod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / chog gi mtshon pa dang / rnam par mtshon pa dang / rjesu mtshon pa dang / de la 'di'i don yang dag par ston pa dang / de la 'di skad
91a5(brgyad stong): nga rigs kyi bu khyod tshur sheg byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di la slobs shig/ khyod kyi lam 'di la bslab shing / spyad de 'bad na/ myur tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
91a6(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can gyi khams gzhal du med pa rnams/ phung po yang dag par zad pa bla na med pa 'di lta ste/
91a7(brgyad stong): yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la mngon par 'dul bar byed par 'gyur zhes smra zhing / de ltar de'i sems rnam par spyod pa dang / the tsom med par byed pa dang tshig 'di skad du rig kyi bu khyed
91a8(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyis shig ces zer na/ ko ru shi ka rigs kyi bu'am rig kyi bu me de bas/ 'di nyid bsod nams ches mang du skyad/
91b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhes ko'u shi ka 'di las phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed/ ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'jam du'i gling na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag tham cangad rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi
91b2(brgyad stong): bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod na/ ko'u shi ka de 'i snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu ma de de'i gzhi las bsod nam mang du bskrad dam/ brgya byid kyigasal
91b3(brgyad stong): ba/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko& shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du skyed/
91b4(brgyad stong): gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngun glegs bam du yang chud par byas nas/ mngon par dad pas mngon par dad pa la/ rab tu rtogs pas rab tu rtog pa la/ lhag par mos pas lhag
91b5(brgyad stong): bar mos pa/ sems dang bas sems dang bal/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa la/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pas/ byang chub tu sem
91b6(brgyad stong): bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/ lhag pa'i bsam pas byin nam/ chung ngu na bri ba dang / glag pa la yang snyom las med par bsgrub pa dang / brtson pas de la 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / yang dag
91b7(brgyad stong): par snyan pa dang / yang dag par 'god pa dang / yang dag par gzeng stod pa dang / yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang / tshig gis mtshon pa dang / rnam par mtshon pa dang / rjesu mtshon pa dang /
91b8(brgyad stong): de la 'di'i don yang dag par ston pa dang / de la 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod cur sheg/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam 'di la spobs shig/ khyod kyis lam 'di la bslab shing / spyad de 'thad na/
92a1(brgyad stong): @#// myur nga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / sems can gyi khams gzhal du
92a2(brgyad stong): med pa rnams/ phung po yang dag par zad pa blan med pa 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' rab tu 'byed pa la/ mngon par 'dul bar byed par 'gyur ra zhes smra zhing / de 'altar de'i sems rnam
92a3(brgyad stong): par sbyong ba dang / the tsom med byed pa dang / tshig 'di skad du rigs kyi ba khyod 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos de dag nyid thob par gyis zhig ces rjen/ ko she ka
92a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas/ 'di nyid bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka 'di las dgra bcom pa nyid kyang rab tu 'byed do// de la 'di ltar rigs
92a5(brgyad stong): kyi bu khyod ci lta ji ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa de lta de ltar/ khyod kyis mthar gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob par 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i
92a6(brgyad stong): byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro// khyod kyis bslab pa 'di la bslab shing / spyad de 'bad na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyuraro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyur
92a7(brgyad stong): phyir ma 'o zla ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas nyid nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
92a8(brgyad stong): nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes spro ba 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa'i bsod nam mngon par 'du byed pa
92b1(brgyad stong): lta zhog/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas cang ragang 'brad par 'gyur ro// ko ru shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham+ba na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs

92b5(brgyad stong): ka spong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi kham na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang /

93a1(brgyad stong): / ru zhig stang gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten khams gang gi klung gi byes snyed dgan sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mgong la la zhig gis/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bad

93a3(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi phung po de'i grangs su bgyi sla ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang / rten du yang / nye ba'i rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lag

96a1(brgyad stong): @#// ci gar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sleb par 'gyur gangs/ desar mthar gyis grangasangs rgyas kyi chos nas thong par 'gyuro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ro//
96a2(brgyad stong): khyod bslab pa 'di la slob cing spyad de 'bad na/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rab
96a3(brgyad stong): tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur ro// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'byed par 'gyur
96a4(brgyad stong): zhes spro ba 'phel bar byed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'jam bu'i gling gyi sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/
96a5(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa dang / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang
96a6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug nas/ de dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te byin pa dang / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig
96a7(brgyad stong): gis 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la slob par 'gyur zhing / rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur te/ 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bsgom pa dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas pa dang / yangs pa
96a8(brgyad stong): gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam yong su rdzog par byed par 'gyur ro snyam pas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sos dpa' sem dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo
96b1(brgyad stong): snga ma de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du skye do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nges par kho nar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar byin par
96b2(brgyad stong): 'gyuro// ko'u shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka gling chen
96b3(brgyad stong): po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
96b4(brgyad stong): ke'u shi ka yang gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/
96b5(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
96b6(brgyad stong): chub du sems bskyed pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nam
96b7(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gyis/ bla na/
96b8(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang song gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
97a1(brgyad stong): du sems bskyed pa'i dasong nams mngon par 'du byed bstan na// gdu shi ga stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yon pa de dag rnams cad kyang/ rin
97a2(brgyad stong): bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad bla na
97a3(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma skyed na/ sems can
97a4(brgyad stong): ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug pa dang / ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am
97a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang la la zhig gis de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug nas de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris te byin
97a6(brgyad stong): ba dang / komuzhi ga rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo ga nig gis 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa 'di la slob par 'gyur zhing / rnal 'byor dbyed par 'gyur te/ de ltar na 'di 'i shes rab kyi
97a7(brgyad stong): sa tu pa spyang smram pa banas pa dang / 'dres 'dang / rgyas pa dang / 'angs par gyur bas/ yongs su rdzogs par gyur snyam pas khyed the rnam pa'i byed du se pa pa ngems dang
97a8(brgyad stong): na pos shes rab kyi pha ras tu byin pa 'dis bar gtang na ko dug ka rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas 'di ces bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni nges par
97b1(brgyad stong): bla na med med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal mthar 'byin par 'gyuraro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sem
97b2(brgyad stong): can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ de dag nyid la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi
97b3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa ston na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi
97b4(brgyad stong): las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang po/ bde bar gshegs pa mang po/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de grangasu bgyi bar sla ba ma lags te/
97b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang / rten du yang / rgyur yang bgyi bar sla ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
97b6(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du/ bla na med pa yang
97b7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas
97b8(brgyad stong): shing / yi ge dang bcas pa ston pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa'o// ko 'u shi ka yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi ldog par gyur/
98a1(brgyad stong): pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod
98a2(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
98a3(brgyad stong): bam la bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad la/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / ko'u shi ka gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi ldog par
98a4(brgyad stong): gyur par la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad
98a5(brgyad stong): kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la/ de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs
98a6(brgyad stong): bam la bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston dang / ko'u shi k+Sha stong spyi bud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir
98a7(brgyad stong): mi ldog par 'gyur ba la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
98a8(brgyad stong): sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhigs
98b1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong gnyis pa bar ma'i
98b2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen
98b3(brgyad stong): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur la/ de dag la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la
98b4(brgyad stong): zhig gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston pa dang / ko'u shi ka yang stong gsum gyi stong chen
98b5(brgyad stong): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad phyir mi ldog par gyur pa la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nye bar gtad pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ ko'u shig stong
98b6(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i rlung gis bye ma snyed na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog
98b7(brgyad stong): par gyur la/ de dag la yang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam la bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang
98b8(brgyad stong): bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston na/ kolu shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du bskyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol
99a1(brgyad stong): pa bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de grangs su bgyi bar sla ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bsod nams kyi phung po de 'brang ba
99a2(brgyad stong): yang dper yang / dpes bstan par bgyi bar yang / rten du yang / rgyur yang / bgyi bar sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de bas kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo 'di
99a3(brgyad stong): ches bsod nams mang du bskyed de/ gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa
99a4(brgyad stong): de dag la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di glegs bam du bri ba byas nas/ byin zhing nye bar gtad de/ don dang bcas shing / yi ge dang bcas pa nye bar ston cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
99a5(brgyad stong): 'doms shing rjesu ston pa dang / ko'u shi ka de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan zhig byung ste/ de 'di skad du/ bdag ni 'di dag pas ches myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
99a6(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes zer te/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo gang zhig gis/ mngon par shes pa shin tu myur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
99a7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'doms shing rjesu ston na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo snga ma de bas 'di nyid ches bsod nams mang du skyed do// de nas bcom ldan
99a8(brgyad stong): 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci lta ci ltar/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
99b1(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa de lta de ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing / rjesu bstan par bgyi ba lag so// de lta de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi ba dang / rjes su
99b2(brgyad stong): bstan par bgyi ba lags pas de bzhin nyid la nye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin nyid la nye bar gyur na/ gang dag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / stan dang / bro 'tshal ba'i gsos
99b3(brgyad stong): sman dang yo byad rnams yongs su spyad pa de dag gi bya ba byas pa/ de dag 'bras bu chen po dang / sman yon chen por bgyid pa des na/ de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
99b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar 'gyur ba 'di ni/ de lta bu nyid lags pa'i srad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/
99b5(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka gang khyod byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la/ spro ba sbyin pa dang / yong su 'dzin pa dang / rjesu bstan par byed pa
99b6(brgyad stong): ni legs so// leg so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi bya ba ni 'di yin te/ 'phags pa nyan thos gang zhig sems can thams cad/ rjesu 'dzin par byed 'drod pa des ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
99b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la/ sprob pa 'phel bar byed pa dang / yongasu 'dzin par byed pa dang / rjes bstan par byed pa de ltar 'di bya ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang /
99b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'di las skyes te/ gas te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis/ byang chub kyi
100a1(brgyad stong): sems 'dis bskyed du zin na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la slob par yang mi 'gyur zhing ba rol tu
100a2(brgyad stong): byin pa drug la slob par yang mi 'gyur la/ ma bslabs na ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba zhig na/ gang gi phyir de ltar ba
100a3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de'i phyir bla na med pa yang
100a4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// // 'phags pa shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad snyed pa las bsod nams kIl+le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o//
100a5(brgyad stong): / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/
100a6(brgyad stong): gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes yi rang ba/ yongasu bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod
100a7(brgyad stong): nams bya ba'i dngos po bang yin pa dang / gang yang sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang /
100a8(brgyad stong): bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rje su yi rang ba/ yongasu sngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams
100b1(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na mod pa zhes bya'o//
100b2(brgyad stong): gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
100b3(brgyad stong): chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// byams pa yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis/ thams cad nas thams cad du song ba'i phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/ stong gsum gyi stong
100b4(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/ gzhal du med pa'i gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs med pa/ tshad med pa'i tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas mu
100b5(brgyad stong): med pa yod pa rnams kyi/ phyogs re re'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i 'das pa'i dus na/ gzhal du med pa'i gzhal du med pa/ grangs med pa'i grangs pa/ tshad med pa'i tshad med
100b6(brgyad stong): ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtha' yas mu med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang /
100b7(brgyad stong): srid par 'dren pa chad pa/ mchi ma zad pa/ tsher ma bcom pa/ khu shin tu bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba/ yongasu bad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
100b8(brgyad stong): sems thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs mya ngan las 'das pa/ de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bran
101a1(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i
101a2(brgyad stong): bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang /
101a3(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs
101a4(brgyad stong): pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam dang / stob dang / mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / de bzhin du mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / yongasu shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin
101a5(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes phun sumachog pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang /
101a6(brgyad stong): byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med pa grangs med pa gang yin pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang yin pa dang /
101a7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad la dbang phyug gi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / zil gyis ma non pa dpag tu med pa dang / thad zil gyis
101a8(brgyad stong): non pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du byed pa'i mchog gang yin pa dang / sgrib pa med pa/ ma chab pa/ thob pa med pa/ mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ dpe med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i yang
101b1(brgyad stong): dag pa/ ci lta ba'i ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa/ stobs kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi stobs gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / gzigs pa gang yin pa dang / stobs bcu'i
101b2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi mchog tu yongs su rdzogs par khong da chud pa gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad don dam par mngon par bsgrub pas/ chos khong du chud pa gang yin
101b3(brgyad stong): pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba gang yin pa dang / chos kyi sgron ma thogs pa dang / chos kyi rnga rdung ba dang / chos kyi dung 'bud pa dang / chos kyi dung sgrogs pa dang / chos kyi ral gri 'debs
101b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / chos kyi mchod sbyin sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sems can thams cad yang dag par tshim par mdzad cing / yang dag par ston pa dang / gang yang chos bstan pa de dag dang /
101b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sam/ nyan thos kyi chos rnams la/ gang dag brtul ba dang / bslabs pa dang / mos par gyur pa dang / nges par gyur pa dang / rdzogs pa'i byang
101b6(brgyad stong): chub la gzhol bar gyur pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ blan
101b7(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang sangs
101b8(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi byang chub la lung bstan pa/ de dag thaMd kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnam dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnam gyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrim las byung ba'i bsod nam bya bI dngos po/
102a1(brgyad stong): dang bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngas pa nang yin pa dang / slob pa'i gang zag med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i gang bag med pa'i dge ba'i la
102a2(brgyad stong): gang yin pa rnams dang / sa so'i skye bo gang dag gis/ chos de dag pa dge pa'i rtsa bskrun pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi 'khar bzhi pa dge slong rnams dang / dge slong ma rnams dang / dge bsnyen
102a3(brgyad stong): rnams dang dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrim las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang
102a4(brgyad stong): yin pa rnams dang / deng sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos ston pa de dag la/ lha dang dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin
102a5(brgyad stong): ba gang dag dang / byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang de dag thams cad kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
102a6(brgyad stong): la yang gang gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs mya ngan las 'das pa la yang gang gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang dag yin pa dang / sangs rgyas
102a7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la brten pa dang / chos rnams la brten pa dang / dge 'dun rnams la brten pa dang / yid kyis bsgom pa'i gang zag dag la brten nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa gang yin pa'i dge ba'i rtsab
102a8(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad ma lus shing lus pa med par gcig tu mngon par bsdus te/ bsdoms shing gzhal nas rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang ste/ dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / rab mchog dang /
102b1(brgyad stong): gya nom pa dang / bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjesu yi rang bas/ rje su yi rang la/ de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/ rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan
102b2(brgyad stong): ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo'o zhes bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig snyam pas ngag tu brjod par bya
102b3(brgyad stong): ba yin te/ de la gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag dngos po gang dag dang / dmigs pa gang dag dang / rnam pa gang dag gis yongs su sngo zhing sems de bskyed pa na/ cig dngos po de dag
102b4(brgyad stong): dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag ci ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du dmigs sam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas
102b5(brgyad stong): brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor dngos po de dag dang / dmigs pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag ci ltar mtshan mar byas pa de bzhin du mi dmig so//
102b6(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so// gal te de dngos po med pa dang / dmigs pa med
102b7(brgyad stong): pa la dmigs par byed cing mtshan mar byed na/ ci ltar 'di 'du shes byin ci log pa dang / sems byin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dod chags kyang
102b8(brgyad stong): dngos po med bzhin du/ mi rtag pa la rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba la bde ba dang / bdag med pa la bdag dang / mi sdug pa la sdug par rnam par brtags shing / kun tu brtags nas/ 'du shes
103a1(brgyad stong): byin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta bcilog pa dang 'byung ngo // gzhan yang dngos po ci lta ba dang / dmyigs pa ci lta ba dang / rnam pa sis pa bzhin du/
103a2(brgyad stong): byang chub kyang de bzhin sems kyang de bzhin yin na/ desar gcos yang dang khams thaMd kyang de bzhin no// gal te yang dngos po cil ba dang / dmyig pa ci blta ba dang / rnam pa ci lta ba bzhin tu byang chub kyang de bzhin/ sems
103a3(brgyad stong): kyang de bzhin yin na// des na dngos pa gang dag dang / dbyings pa gang nga ba dang / rnam pa gang dag gis/ sems gang zhig bla na byed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems tu yong su sde bar byed pa'am/ rjes su
103a4(brgyad stong): yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gang du longasu sngo bar byed/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du bshad byar
103a5(brgyad stong): pas/ de dang ldan pa gnas bas rab 'byer pa 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor 'di ni theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 'phams chen po'i mdun du bshad par gyi
103a6(brgyad stong): bya/ brtan par byi bya'o// de ci'i phyir theg/ de la gang dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba cam dang // mes pa tsam dang / gus pa tsam dag med pa de dag bod kyang 'jig par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rab 'byor phyir phyi ldog
103a7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mdun du 'di bshang bar bya'o// nye bar bstan par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nye bar brtan
103a8(brgyad stong): par gyur pa de dag 'di la myi 'god/ kun du mi zhum/ bag mi che/ bka' khums par myi 'gyur/ 'di'i yid phyir phyogs par myi byed/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur// myi dang kun tu
103b1(brgyad stong): skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par myi 'gyur// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos// rjes su yi rang ba byas nas/ rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po med
103b2(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid du yong su bsngo bar bya'o//
103b3(brgyad stong): bam po bdun pa// / de nas gnas brtan che dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di
103b4(brgyad stong): skad ces smras so byams pa sems gang gyis rjes su re yi rang nas/ gang yongasu sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang zad cing 'gags par gyur la/ bral zhing rnam par gyur pa yin te// des na gang gyis bla na myed
103b5(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du yongasu sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang gang yin la/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
103b6(brgyad stong): chub du yengasu sngo bar byed pa'i sems de yang gar yin la/ gang gi tshe sems gnyis phrad pa myed pa dang / sems de rang bzhin gyis yongasu sngo bar yang myi nus na/ sems kyis sa yongasu bsngo
103b7(brgyad stong): bar nus par yang ji ltar 'gyur// de nas lha rnams kyis dbang po brgya byin gyis// gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor theg pa la gsar
103b8(brgyad stong): zhus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bstan pa 'ang bos nas/ dngang zhing kun tu skrag la/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par gyur na gyi rung ngo // 'phags pa rab 'byor yang ci skur byang chub
104a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rjes su yi rang ba la dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu sngo bar bya/ rjes
104a2(brgyad stong): su pri rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yongasu 'dzin pa dang / rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsad nam sems yengasu sngo ba'i byed pas/ ji ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems de
104a3(brgyad stong): legs par yongasu bzung zhing / legs par yongasu sngos par 'gyur// de ras gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la brtsams shing / byang chub sem
104a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa gang zhig byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byams pa la smras pa/ byams pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig
104a5(brgyad stong): rten na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing / grangs myed pa yengs pa'i phyogs re re zhing stengs gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams re rer yang / 'das pa'i sangs
104a6(brgyad stong): rgyas bcor ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa ched pa/ spros pa dang srid par 'dren pa chad pa/ mchim zad pa/ cher ma bcom pa khur shin tu bor la/ bdag gi den rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba
104a7(brgyad stong): yongasu zad pa/ yang dag pa'i kun shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam par grol pa/ sems thams cad kyi dbang dag pa'i pha rol tu son pa// gzhal du myed cing grangs myed pa// yongs su mya
104a8(brgyad stong): rang bas 'das par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa'i nas bzung ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang /
104b1(brgyad stong): phung po lhag ma phyed pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu yongs mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos nub par ba 'gyur ba'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das deng ga gi dge
104b2(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas
104b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnams par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang /
104b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rjes chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing / grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams
104b5(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de la gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang /
104b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de dag gi dge ba'i
104b7(brgyad stong): rtsa ba/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag rang byang chub tu lung bstan pa de
104b8(brgyad stong): dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dag gi/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung bri dab 'i
105a1(brgyad stong): rtsa ba dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i zad pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos des so so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa dang /
105a2(brgyad stong): lnga dang klang dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldeng dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dgang dag gis chos de thos te/ thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskur ba dang /
105a3(brgyad stong): byol seng gyi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis chos de thos te/ thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bskrun pa dang / sems can gang dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba
105a4(brgyad stong): dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa ste/ de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gcig du bsdus te bsdoms shing / gzhal nas ma lus par/
105a5(brgyad stong): byas te/ rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngon na/
105a6(brgyad stong): yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
105a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas/ gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
105a8(brgyad stong): sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la/ sems su 'du shes par ma gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya
105b1(brgyad stong): pa'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de 'di yin no zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
105b2(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar sems gang gis gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la sems de ni 'di
105b3(brgyad stong): yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing / sems su 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log pa dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang /
105b4(brgyad stong): lta ba phyin ci log par 'gyur ro// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems gang yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de la/ 'di ltar yang dag par shing shing / 'di ltar sems te/
105b5(brgyad stong): sems de la sems pa na/ 'di ltar zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang par shes la/ 'gags pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin no// zhes de ltar shes te/ gang zad pa de yang yongs su
105b6(brgyad stong): bsngo bar mi nus so// sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin te/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag du yongs
105b7(brgyad stong): su sngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes gal te/ de ltar yongs su sngon yang dag par yongs su sngo ba yin gyi/ log par yongs su sngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems/
105b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos/ yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'das pa ci lta ba de bzhin du/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas
106a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang srid pa 'dren pa chad ga/ gzhal du med cing grangs med pa de dag gi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag
106a2(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos
106a3(brgyad stong): nub par mi 'gyur ba'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul
106a4(brgyad stong): khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi bung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed
106a5(brgyad stong): pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal du med cing / grangs med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de
106a6(brgyad stong): ngag gis chos gang 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams dang / chos de la slob par 'gyur ba dang yin pa rnams dang / lhag par mos par 'gyur ba rnams dang / gnas par 'gyur ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang /
106a7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bston par 'gyur ba de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drag dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba
106a8(brgyad stong): gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston par 'gyur ba/ de dge gi dge dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa
106b1(brgyad stong): rnams dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las byang ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
106b2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos de la so so'i skye bo gang
106b3(brgyad stong): dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / gang yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin pa dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto po chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
106b4(brgyad stong): gang dag gis chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / gang yang byol song gi skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag gis kyang / chos de thos par 'gyur ba dang /
106b5(brgyad stong): thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / sems can gang dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de dag la/ dge ba'i
106b6(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag yin pa de thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par byas te rjes su yi rang bar bya ba/ ma lus pa la rjes su yi rang
106b7(brgyad stong): nas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ci ltar 'dug gyi/
106b8(brgyad stong): ci log par mi 'gyub sems phyen ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba byin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ zhe na gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems gang gis gang yong su sngo ba'i sems de la/ sems su
107a1(brgyad stong): @#// 'du shes par mi brgya / deltar dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pas/ rjes su ye rang ba dang ldan pa'abs nas bya ngas pa blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byangadu chub tu ma du
107a2(brgyad stong): sngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de 'di yin zhes yang dag par mi shes pa de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'du shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems byin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba
107a3(brgyad stong): phyin ci log par mi 'gyur ro// de lta sems gang gis gang yongs su sngo ba'i sems de la/ sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing / sems su 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
107a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes byin ci log pa dang / sems byin ci log par 'gyur/ lta ba byin ci log par 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gang yongs su bsngo ba'i
107a5(brgyad stong): sems de la/ 'di ltar shes shing / 'di ltar sems te/ sems de la sems pa na/ de ltar na zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing 'gags pa dang / bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin no/
107a6(brgyad stong): zhes de ltar shes te/ gang zad pa de yang yongs su sngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang
107a7(brgyad stong): yin/ ches gang dag tu yongs su bsngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no zhes/ gal te de ltar yongs su sngon/ yang dag par yongs su sngo ba yin gyi/ log par yongs su sngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar
107a8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su bsngo bar bya'o// 'phags pa rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
107b1(brgyad stong): gzhal du med cing / grangs med pa rnams na/ da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das lam chad pa/ 'jug pa chad pa/ spros pa dang sred par 'dren pa chad pa/ gzhal du med cing / grangs med pa bzhugs te/
107b2(brgyad stong): tshong zhing gzhes pa rnams kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzung ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar dang / phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las dras pa'i
107b3(brgyad stong): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos mi nub pa'i bar dang / de dag gis bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin
107b4(brgyad stong): ba rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
107b5(brgyad stong): gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / phan par bzhed pa gang yin pa dang khyams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gzhal tu med cing / grangs
107b6(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi chos gang bshad pa dang / chos de dag gang gis bslabs pa dang / lhag par mos pa dang / gnas pa de dag gi dge ba'i tsa ba gang yin pa rnas
107b7(brgyad stong): dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston pa de dag gi pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i
107b8(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la lung ston pa dag gi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang
108a1(brgyad stong): @yin pa rnams dang / gang zag can zas kyi theg pa can nas kyi sbyin 'a las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrim las byung ba'i 'asod
108a2(brgyad stong): nam bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / slob pa'i zag pa myed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / myi slob pa'i zag pa myed pa'i
108a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnam dang / chos de la so'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi lta
108a4(brgyad stong): ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa gA dag gis chos de thos te/ thos na kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba sman pa dang / byol song gi skye gnasu song ba'i ses can gang dag gis chos de thos te/ blo nas kyang dge bI rtsa ba
108a5(brgyad stong): sman pa dang / gang dag gis sang rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag yongasu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / yongs mya ngan las 'das pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa gang yin pa de dag rdzas cad kyi/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin
108a6(brgyad stong): paM de dag zas cad gcig tu bsdus te sngos shing / gzhalags ma lus par byas te/ rjes su yi rang bar bya ba ma lus pa la rje su yi rang nas/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na
108a7(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu longasu sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnga ltar 'du shes byin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems pan ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lnga ba phyin pa la
108a8(brgyad stong): yaN+Da mi 'gyur ten/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sa su pa' chen po de sems gang gis gang yongs su sngo pa'i sems de la semasu 'dra shes par mi 'gyur na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/
108b1(brgyad stong): rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin no// ci ltar sems de la sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par mi
108b2(brgyad stong): shes pa/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'di shes phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log par mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log par mi 'gyuraro// de lta sems gang gis gang
108b3(brgyad stong): yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la/ sems de ni 'di yin no zhes yang dag par shes shing / sems su 'du shes par gyur na/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'du shes phyin ci log
108b4(brgyad stong): ba dang / sems phyin ci log pa dang / lta ba phyin ci log pa 'gyuraro// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang yongasu bsngo ba'i sems de la/ 'di ltar shes shing 'di ltar sems
108b5(brgyad stong): te/ sems de la sems pa na/ de ltar zad pa la zad pa'o zhes de ltar yang dag par shes shing / 'gags pa dang / bral ba dang / rnam par gyur pa yin no zhes de ltar shes te/ gang zad
108b6(brgyad stong): bde yang yongs su bsngo bar mi nus/ sems gang gis yongs su bsngo ba'i sems de'i chos nyid kyang de yin/ chos gang dag gis yongs su sngo ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin//
108b7(brgyad stong): chos gang dag tu yongs sde ba'i chos de dag gi chos nyid kyang de yin no// gal te de ltar yongs su sngon/ yang dag par yongasu sngo ba yin gyi/ log par yongasu sngo ba ma yin te/ de ltar

109a3(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / phung po lhag byed pa'i myang ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su myang ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su myang ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / yongs su
109a4(brgyad stong): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar dang / dam pa'i chos ma nub pa dang / nub par myi 'gyur ba dang / nu par ma 'gyur ba'i bar te/ de dag gi bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnaMs kyi/ pha rol

109a8(brgyad stong): chos de dag la gang gyis bslabs pa dang / slob par 'gyur ba dang / slob pa dang / mos par gyur pa dang / mos par byed pa dang / gnas pa dang / gnas par 'gyur ba dang / gnas par byed pa de dag gi dge
109b1(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstam
109b2(brgyad stong): pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag ces cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag ra
109b3(brgyad stong): byang chub la lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung son pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnaMs dang / gang dag can thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi sbyin pa las drung ba'i dge ba'irtsa
109b4(brgyad stong): bdang tshul khrims las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa gang yin pa rnams dang / slob pa'i zag pa med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / mi slob pa'i dag pa med
109b5(brgyad stong): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa rnams dang / chos des mo ma'i skye bo gang dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sman par 'gyur ba dang / spun pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / sum yin dang /
109b6(brgyad stong): nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / sto phye chen po dang / mi dang phye ma yin pa gang dag gis kyang chos ni tshos par gyur pa dang / thos zer 'gyur ba dang / tham pa dang / thos nas kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang / skyed
109b7(brgyad stong): gyur ba dang / rgyas rgong kyi kyi banas su rlos pa'i sems can dang dag gis dam pa'i tshes po la gyu pa dang / sa ma tha pa dang dang/ seMnas kyang she bldan pa dang / na pa gyur dadang /
109b8(brgyad stong): klan pa dang / se mo'i can gang dag gi sangs bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bal dge ba 'irtsa bskrun pa dang / bskrun par 'gyur ba dang / spun pa de rnas ngas cad kyi
109b9(brgyad stong): ngas su mya rnams 'ad yang 'gyur ba dang /
110a1(brgyad stong): @dge ba'i du la gang yin paded mams cadagaca tu nus te/ bsdoms shing / gags nas/ ma lus par byas te/ rjes yin par bya ba ma lus pa la/ rje su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rje su yi rang 'das
110a2(brgyad stong): dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog rab dang / gya nom pa dang / bra ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rjes yi rang bas rjes yi rang
110a3(brgyad stong): la/ de ltar rjes yi rang nas/ rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
110a4(brgyad stong): byang chub yongs su sgrub par gyur cig snyam pas rab tu rjod na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ci ltar 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin

110a7(brgyad stong): rtog pa/ de ltar na/ yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa yin te/ btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
110a8(brgyad stong): chen po ni 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ sems phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur/ lta ba phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni yongs su sngo ba de la mngon par zhen pa med do//
110b1(brgyad stong): gal te yang 'di snyam du sems kyis sems mi shes shing / chos kyis chos mi shes so zhes yang dag par shes pa/ de ltar na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
110b2(brgyad stong): su bsngos pa yin te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu sngo bla na med pa'o// gal te yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed

110b4(brgyad stong): 'di snyam du/ bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa de yang dben pa/ zhi ba'o// rjesu yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang yin pa de yang dben pa/ zhi ba'o zhes sems pa de lta
110b5(brgyad stong): na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin no// gal te 'du byed thams cad ni dben pa'o// zhi ba'o snyam du de ltar yang mi shes pa de ltar na/ 'di ni byang chub
110b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// gang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa/ de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci 'dra ba ltar
110b7(brgyad stong): yongs sngo ba de dang / de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang de 'dra ba nyid de/ gang gis de yongs bsngos pa de yang / de'i rigs can/ de'i mtshan nyid can/ de'i ris su rtog pa/ de'i rang bzhin can yin pa dgas te de lta
110b8(brgyad stong): shwen/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas bco ldan 'du nas ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis/ yongasu sngo ba gnang bar mi mdzad do// gang 'das pa de ni zad pa 'gags pa/
111a1(brgyad stong): @#/ bral ba rnam par gyur pa'o// gang ma 'das pa de yang ma thob pa'o// da ltar byung ba de la ni/ gnas pa mi dmigs la/ gang mi dmigs pa de ni mtshan ma yin zhing / yul ma yin par/ gal/
111a2(brgyad stong): te de ltar mtshan mar byed cing mi sems na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa ma yin no// de ste dran pa dang bral bas mtshan mar mi byed cing / mi sems pa dang /
111a3(brgyad stong): dran pa dang bral 'am/ khod du mchud pas/ yid la mi byed na/ de lta na yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngos pa ma yin// de ste mtshan ma de la sems shing / mtshan ma
111a4(brgyad stong): mi byed na/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngos pa yin no// 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
111a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di la bslab par bya ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o// gang thabs mkhas pa 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongasasu bsngo

111a8(brgyad stong): yongs dri bar bya/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ma brten par thos pa dang mi ldan pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su sngo ba'i bya ba 'di la 'jug mi nuso// de la gang
111b1(brgyad stong): 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma brten kyang / bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar nus so zhes zer na/ de la de skad ma

111b3(brgyad stong): ni yang dag pa ji lta ba nyid la mtshan mar byas shing / rnam par brtags nas/ yang dag pa ji lta bzhin ma yin pa la/ yang dag pa ji lta bar 'du shes pas/ dmigs pa la/ mi dmigs par yongasu sngo
