111b6(brgyad stong): pa chen po yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rnams ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yongasasu bsngo ba/ don chen po byed pa'o zhes mi gsung ngo // de ci'i phyir
111b7(brgyad stong): zhe na/ yongs su sngo ba de ni dug dang bcas shing / zug rngu dang bcas pa yin no// 'di lta ste dper na/ kha zas bzang po dug can zhig yod la/ de bzhin du de'i kha dog dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i
111b8(brgyad stong): sgo nas 'dod par bya ba yang yin mod kyi/ 'on kyang dug dang bcas pa yin pas na mkhas pa rnams kyis yongasu spang bar bya ba yin gyi/ yongs longs spyad par bya ba ma yin no// de nyid skyes bu byis pa'i
112a1(brgyad stong): rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal ba'i rang bzhin can gyis yongs su longs spyad par bsam te/ nges zas de za ba na de'i kha dog dang dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i sgo nas myangs pa na/ bde bar byed
112a2(brgyad stong): la zhu ba'i tshe/ de la rnam par smin pa sdug bsngal bar 'gyur te/ de de'i gzhi las shi ba 'am shi ba tsam gyi sdu bsngal du 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rab 'byor de bzhin du/ 'di la kha cig log par zin
112a3(brgyad stong): cing log par rig pa dang log par kha ton byas pas/ legs par smras pa'i don ma shes shing don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi du/ khong du ma chud pa dag 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu khyod chung sheg/ 'jin
112a4(brgyad stong): rten thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi thugs dang po bskyed pa nas
112a5(brgyad stong): nye bar gzung nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings
112a6(brgyad stong): su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas dang / 'da' bar 'gyur ba dang / 'da' ba'i bar dang dam pa'i chos nub par ma gyur pa dang / nub par mi 'gyur ba dang ma nub pa'i bar te/ bar de'i 'das
112a7(brgyad stong): pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang de dag gyi nyan thos rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po
112a8(brgyad stong): dab rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po gang yin pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
112a9(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / sman par
112b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba dang / snyan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / gang zag rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gang dag/ rang byang chub tu lung stan pa dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa de dag
112b2(brgyad stong): gis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / snyan par 'gyur ba dang / snyan pa gang yin pa rnams dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag gang dag/ nyan thos kyi byang chub tu lung bstan pa
112b3(brgyad stong): dang / lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung ston pa de dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba snyan pa dang / sman par 'gyur ba dang / skrun pa gang yin pa rnams dang so so'i skye bo gang dag gis der dge ba'i rtsa
112b4(brgyad stong): ba bskrun pa dang / skrun par 'gyur ba dang / sman pa dgA yin pa rnams te// de rnams thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsnyoms te/ gnas nas ma
112b5(brgyad stong): lus par byas te/ me lus pa la rje su yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos go bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar
112b6(brgyad stong): gyis shig ces 'doms shing / rjes su ston par 'gyur te/ da ltar yongs su sngo ba de ni mtshan ma'i tshul gyis yongasu sngo bas/ dug nyid du 'gyur te// 'di ltar ste/ dper na/ kha zas de
112b7(brgyad stong): dug dang bcas pa bzhin no// de ltar na/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can la yongs su bsngo ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmigs pa ni dug dang bcas pa'o// de bas na/ gang zag byang chub
112b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa'i theg pa ma gyis de ltar bslab par mi bya'o yang des ci ltar bsgribs par bya zhig ci ltar 'dra ba dang / mabyon pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
113a1(brgyad stong): sa kyi dam pa pa sangs su gzung bar byab dpa sa ltar yangs bzung sa/ legs par 'angs su babyung bar 'gyur nab ga yongs srubasngobang bya sa sur yongs su //
113a2(brgyad stong): bla na med pa sang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos par 'gyur zhes 'dri ba rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mi byang chubasams dpa'i theg pa can dab
113a3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa pa skar ba me gdapa par 'dod pades dge pa'i rtsa ba dedag thams cad 'di ster rjes su mi ring shes 'di ltar yongs su bsde bar byaste/ dge pa rtsa ba de ces pa de bani
113a4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rab sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa dang / dge pa'i rtsa ba da regs
113a5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang / ris gar gartog pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang rang bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de bzhin du rjes su yi rang zhi ba dge ba'i
113a6(brgyad stong): rtsa ba de ci ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis rjes su
113a7(brgyad stong): gnang ba de bzhin du/ bdag gis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o snyam pa ste/ de ltar rjes su yi rang zhing de ltar longs su bsngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/
113a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la gnod par mi 'gyur zhing / yang dag par rjes su mi rang bar byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de/ bla na me ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
113a9(brgyad stong): legs par yongs su bsos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la skur ba mi 'deb pa yin te/ lhag pa'i bsam pa
113b1(brgyad stong): mos pas yongs su sngo bar byed pa de'i yongasu sngo ba de lta bu ni/ dug med pa'i yongs su bsngo ba yin/ yongs su sngo ba chen po yin/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yin/ yongs
113b2(brgyad stong): su rdzogs shing / shin tu yongasu rdzogs pa yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyis/ tshul khrims gang len pa dang ting nge na
113b3(brgyad stong): gang yin pa dang shes rab gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa gang yin pa dang ci ltar 'dod pa'i khams su mi gtogs/
113b4(brgyad stong): gzugs kyi khams su mi gtogs/ gzugs med pa'i khams su mi gtog pa dang / 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba yang ma yin pa de ltar yongasu bsngo bar
113b5(brgyad stong): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dus gsum dang / khams gsum ma gtogs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin du yongs su bsngo ba yang ma gtogs pa'o// chos gang du yongs su sngo ba des/ yongasu bsngo
113b6(brgyad stong): ba'i chos de yang ma gtogs pa'o// gal te de ltar mos shing / de ltar yongs su sngon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa/ de'i yongs su sngo
113b7(brgyad stong): ba ni chud ma zos pa yin te/ ma gtog pa'i yongasu bsngo ba/ yongs su bsngo ba dug med pa/ yongasu bsngo ba chen po chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba yongasu rdzogs shing / legs par yongasu
113b8(brgyad stong): rdzog pa yin no// de ste yongs su bsngo ba de la mngon par chags shing mtshan mar byed na/ log par yongs su bsngo ba yin no// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu
113b9(brgyad stong): bsngo ba gang zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba de ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mkhyen cing / ci ltar rjes su gnang ba/ de ltar chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu bsngo ba des/ bla na med
114a1(brgyad stong): / pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de lta na/ de legs par yongs su bsdus pa yin no snyam zhing de ltar bdag gis yongs su bsngo snyam na/ 'di
114a2(brgyad stong): ni yang dag par yongasu sngo ba yin te/ de ltar yongasu bsngos pa ni/ bla na med pa ya dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu legs par yongs su bsngos pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
114a3(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod ston pa'i bya ba byed cing / gang khong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la chos ston pa ni/
114a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor legs so leg so// de ci'i byer zhe na/ rab 'byor yongs su sngo ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dpyid kyi yongs su sngo ba'o// chos nyid
114a5(brgyad stong): 'di nyid la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis ci ltar mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba de rigs gang yin pa dang ris gar gtog pa dang / ci 'dra ba dang / rang
114a6(brgyad stong): bzhin gang yin pa dang / mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / chos nyid gang gis yod pa de ltar rjes su yi rang ba dang / ci ltar rjes su gnang ba de ltar bdag gis yongasu bsngo'o// snyam pa 'di'i
114a7(brgyad stong): bsod nams kyi phung po gang yin pa dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ rigs
114a8(brgyad stong): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis// dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la yang dag par bkod cing gzhag pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de
114a9(brgyad stong): las/ byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongasu bsngo ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di nyid mchog ces bya'o// dam po zhes bya'o / gtson
114b1(brgyad stong): zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o/ bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gon na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam
114b2(brgyad stong): ba dang mnyam zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ dge ba
114b3(brgyad stong): bcu'i las la bkod pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod
114b4(brgyad stong): pa de dag thams cad bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur par de dag gi/ bsod nas mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de bas kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yongasu
114b5(brgyad stong): bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di ni/ mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o gtso bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes
114b6(brgyad stong): bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// ma mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
114b7(brgyad stong): rten gyi khams gang gi klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ bsam gtan bzhi rdzogs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab
114b8(brgyad stong): 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ tshad med pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang
114b9(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi krung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong
115a1(brgyad stong): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
115a2(brgyad stong): thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa'i
115a3(brgyad stong): bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ dbyor spong gsam gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ mngon par
115a4(brgyad stong): shes pa lnga thob par gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa'i bsod
115a5(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun tu
115a6(brgyad stong): zhugs par gyur ba dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi steng chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad rgyun tu zhugs par gyur pa'i bsod nams mang
115a7(brgyad stong): bar 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad lan cig phyir 'ong bar
115a8(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stang chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mang/
115a9(brgyad stong): bar 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stengs gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ci sred yod pa de dag thams cad phyir mi 'ong bar
115b1(brgyad stong): gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi byed ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ phyir mi 'ong bar gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par
115b2(brgyad stong): 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom par gyur pa
115b3(brgyad stong): dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi 'aklung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ dgra bcom par gyur pa'i bsod nams mngon par
115b4(brgyad stong): 'du byed pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor stong gsum gyi ston chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/ rang
115b5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas su gyur pa dang / rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad/ rang sangs rgyas su gyur pa'i bsod
115b6(brgyad stong): nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sems can ci snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad/
115b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pas pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur la de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi grung gyi bye ma snyed gzhan dang
115b8(brgyad stong): gzhan dag nyid na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad la/ byang chub sems dpa' re res chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang
115b9(brgyad stong): yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang bde ba la reg pa'i gnas pa thams cad kyis/ bskal pa gang gi klung gyi bye
116a1(brgyad stong): ma steng du rim 'gro byas te/ sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la rnam grangs des na/ yongs su brtags nas/ sems can de rnams thams cad las re re la yang byang chub
116a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' de rnam thams cad las kyang byang chub sems dpa' re res/ skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du chos gos dang / bsod snyom dang / mal cha dang / na pa'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sgrar
116a3(brgyad stong): ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim 'gror byas te/ bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed de/ de bzhin du re re la yang bya ba
116a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyis/ rnam grangs 'dis sbyin pa byin zhing / de bzhin du thams cad la yang sbyin pa byinan/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci byang chub sems dpa' de dag de'i gzhi las
116a5(brgyad stong): bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das gzhal du ma mchis so// bde bar gshegs pa gzhal du ma man+di
116a6(brgyad stong): so// bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni/ grangasu bgyi bar yang sla ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni bgrang bar yang / dper yang dpes bstan par bgyi bA
116a7(brgyad stong): yang bzhir yang / rgyur yang bgyi bar smra ba ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das gal te bsod nams kyi phung po de gzugs can zhig lags na ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
116a8(brgyad stong): rkang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu yang mi shong bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
116b1(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor yang gang gi phyir/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa cas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su bzung ba chos kyi dbyings kyi
116b2(brgyad stong): yongs su bsngo ba 'dis dge ba'i rtsa ga bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo bar byed pa de'i phyir/ de'i bsod nams mang du skyed/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs bsngo
116b3(brgyad stong): ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa
116b4(brgyad stong): snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang brgya phrag stong gi char yang bye ba'i char yang / bye ba phrag brgya'i char yang bye ba phrag steng gi char yang dbye ba brgya stong gi char yang / bya
116b5(brgyad stong): ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs yang nye bar mi 'gro// bgrang bar yang dper yang dpes bstan par bya bar yang / gzhir yang rgyur yang mi bzed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
116b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar snga ma dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa ni/ shin tu mang po byin na yang / shin tu mang por yang grangasu yang de 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis lha'i bu
116b7(brgyad stong): stong phrag nyi shu rnams thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol
116b8(brgyad stong): dbyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongasu bzung ba'i dge ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yong su bsngos pa 'di ni/ yang su bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmig pa dang bcas
117a1(brgyad stong): byed du pa sems dpa sbyin pa las bya bso lag par nga byu pa kyang ba rdzas pa gas// sa sum ban+d+ha rtsa ga
117a2(brgyad stong): kyi m+bu'i bu brgya brag stong gis lha'i me tog dag gA'i 'gu pa dang / kyi 'dri ga khyi'i phreng bapa dang / dz+ha'i byug bdag lnga'i byis rnams kyi mang dang / lha'i rin zem ma dang / bla na pa 'i gyis
117a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das lamangon par gtog / mngod par rab tu gtogs/ lnga'i bdugs dang / khwa'i rgyal mchen dang / lha'i dril bu dag / lnga'i bad dag dang lha'i mchod pa rnam pa yang bdagags
117a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas/ ri mor byas/ bsnyen bkur byas te/ lha'i sil snyan rnams rab tu bkrol nas/ tshig 'di skad ces gsol to//
117a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kye ma/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi dbyings kyi yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ bsngo ba chen po lags te/ 'di ltar gang du dmigs pa can gyi byang chub
117a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod na pas mngon par 'du bgyid pa'i phung po chen po de srid kyang zil gyis gnon pa lagaso// 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas
117a7(brgyad stong): pas/ yongs su bzung ba'i slad du 'di ni sngo ba chen po lags so// de bzhin du lha'i ris gzhan dag nas kyang lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir bya ba dam pa dang / bla mar bya ba dam pa
117a8(brgyad stong): dag rjed par bya ba dam pa dang / mdzod par bya ba dam pa dang / ri mor bya pa dam pa dag bsnyen bkur bya ba dam pa rnams kyis bkur stir byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas/
117b1(brgyad stong): ri mor byas/ bsnyen bkur byas nas/ de skad du sgra phyung zhing dbyangs rjes su bsgragaso// de bzhin du spar ba bya ste/ 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang
117b2(brgyad stong): byed dang / tshangs ris dang tshangs pa'i 'dun na 'dod dang / tshangs 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'od chung dang / tshad med 'od dang / 'od gsal dang / dge chung dang / tshad med dge dang / dge rgyas dang / sprin
117b3(brgyad stong): med dang / bsod nams 'phel ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / 'og min gyi lha de dag kyang /
117b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin du thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
117b5(brgyad stong): dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su bsngo ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi yun ring po de tsam du bsrugs pa dang / de ltar rgya che
117b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de snyed kyang zil gyis gnon pa ngo mtshar to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu la bsregs te/ lha'i bu de dag
117b7(brgyad stong): thams cad la/ bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyis khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
117b8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don du/ sbyin pa byin pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa lta zhog/ lha'i bu dag
117b9(brgyad stong): rnam grangs 'dis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag na sems can gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag
118a1(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab te/ byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi 'aklung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang /
118a2(brgyad stong): gzhan dag gi sems can thams cad la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams
118a3(brgyad stong): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang / skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ sbyin pa byin zhing de bzhin du dmigs pa'i 'du shes can de dag thams cad kyis kyang / sbyin pa byin pa'i bar
118a4(brgyad stong): dang / rnam grangs 'dis sems can de rnams thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad re re nas yongs su brtags nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad kyi bar gyi/
118a5(brgyad stong): skal ba gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug ste/ sems can de dag thams cad la chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams
118a6(brgyad stong): cad dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thams cad kyis rim gror byed cing / sbyin pa de yang dmigs pa'i 'du shes kyis byin la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
118a7(brgyad stong): du phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongs su zin pa zhig gis/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang /
118a8(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas dang / gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can de rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
118b1(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po dang / de la sems can gzhan dag gis kyang / dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskrun pa dang / snyan par 'gyur ba dang / skrun par byed pa de dag thams cad gcig tu/
118b2(brgyad stong): bsdus shing sdoms te/ gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa de rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis/ rjes su yi rang shing dam pa dang / gtso bo dang rab dang mchog rab dang / gya nom pa dang /
118b3(brgyad stong): bla ma dang / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang gong mi'i yang god ma dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / rab tu mnyam pa med pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjes
118b4(brgyad stong): su yi rang la/ rjesu yi rang nas/ rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan bI bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub par gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang
118b5(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngon/ rjes su yi rang ba yongs su bsngo ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa'i 'du shes
118b6(brgyad stong): can dag gis bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa snga ma des/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba
118b7(brgyad stong): stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya steng gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs yang / bgrang bar yang dper yang / dpes bstan par bya bar yang
118b8(brgyad stong): bzhir yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis smin pa sbyin par byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro//
119a1(brgyad stong): bam po brgyad pa/ dedas bcom ldan 'das la che dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'di na du
119a2(brgyad stong): bdags byed pa dngar sa byung ba'i sa pacas bcom ldan 'das dang drang chub sengs pa 'dag pas sanas dag 'a thos kyid ge 'du thams cad dag sems panathams tsha kyi na
119a3(brgyad stong): rtsa ba 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs dag da ltar byung ba zhis bya ba'i gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus shing bsdoms sde gzhal nas ma lus par byas te/ ma lus pa la rjes su mi
119a4(brgyad stong): rang ba'i mchog gis/ rje su yi rang zhing / dam pa dang / gtso bo dang / rab dang / mchog rab dang / gya nom pa dag bla ma dge / bla na med pa dang / gong na med pa dang / gong ma'i yang gong ma dang / mnyam
119a5(brgyad stong): pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / rab tu mnyam pa med pa dang / bsams kyi mi khyab pa'i rjes su yi rang bas/ rjes su yi rang la/ zhes gang gsungs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
119a6(brgyad stong): tsam gyis na/ rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog tu byung/ de snyed ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te gang
119a7(brgyad stong): zag byang chu ba sems dpa'i theg pa can dag/ 'das bdag sa 'ongs padug dkar gyi nas rnams mi'i na/ rlom sems mi byed/ dmigs mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog / yang dag par
119a8(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong zhing / chos de dag la 'di ltar yang yongs su rtog ste/ chos thams cad ni rtsig pas rnam par bsgrubs pa steng ma skyes pa/ nges par ma skyes pa 'ong ba med pa 'gro
119a9(brgyad stong): ba med pa'o// 'di la chos gang yang ma skyes so// chos gang yang skye bar mi 'gyuraro// chos gang yang mi skye'o// 'di la chos gang yang 'gag pa medo// chos gang yang 'gag par mi 'gyur//
119b1(brgyad stong): chos gang yang mi 'gago zhes de ltar chos de dag nye bar brtags nas/ chos de dag gi chos nyid ji ltar rjes su yi rang bar byed do// de ltar rjes su yi rang nas/ de kho na bzhin du/ bla na med pa yang
119b2(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ste/ rab 'byor 'di tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog tu 'gyuraro// rab 'byor dge ba'i
119b3(brgyad stong): rtsa ba yongs su bsngo ba 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' snga ma dmigs par 'du shes pa dang / dmigs par lta ba de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po des
119b4(brgyad stong): ni/ brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi char yang / brgya stong gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba brgya stong gi char yang /
119b5(brgyad stong): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang / nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangasu yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes bstan par bya bar yang / gzhir yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// rab
119b6(brgyad stong): 'byor gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi/ sbyin pa la
119b7(brgyad stong): rjes yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / bzod pa la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus la rjes su yi rang bar 'dod pa dang /
119b8(brgyad stong): bas gtan la rjes yi rang bdod pa dang / shes rab la rje su yi rang bar 'dod pa des/ 'di ltar rjes yi rang ba bya ste/ rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de bzhin du sbyin pa'o// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de
120a1(brgyad stong): bzhin du tshul khrim mo// rnam par grol bci lta ba bzhin du bzod pa'o// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du brtson 'gruso// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin
120a2(brgyad stong): du bsam gtano// rnam par grol ba co lta ba de bzhin du shes rab bo// rnam par grol ba ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'o// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rnam par grol ba'i
120a3(brgyad stong): yis mthong ba'i phung po'o// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rje su yi rang ba'o// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po'o//
120a4(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du yongasu bsngo ba'o// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnam so// rnam par grol ba ci/ \u0f7f
120a5(brgyad stong): ba de bzhin du de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yongasu mya ngan las 'das pa rnam so// rnam par grol pa ci lta ba de bzhin du chos gang dag 'das shing / 'gags pa de rnam so// rnam par grol ba ci/
120a6(brgyad stong): lta ba de bzhin du chos gang dag ma 'ongs pa de rnam so// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du chos gang dag da ltar byung ba gnas bzhin pa rnam so// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba de bzhin du/
120a7(brgyad stong): 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi nyan thos rnams so// rnam par grol ba ci lta ba bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang / de dag gi ca
120a8(brgyad stong): tho ma mo// rnam par grol pa sbyi ba bang dbang / la ga na gyi khams pakras med 'i zangs med pa mas na bzhugs te 'dro ga gzhes gang ltar byung ba'i sa
120a9(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / de dag gi can pos rnams dang / rnam par grol bani sta ba de bzhin du 'angs pa dang / mabyon pa dang / de t+ta byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan das rnams
120b1(brgyad stong): de ltar ma bcings ma grol la/ ma chags pa'i chos 'di dag gi chos nyid gang yin pa de la/ rjesu ya~M rag / bla na med pa rje su yi rang ngo // rje su yi rang nas/ rje su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nas
120b2(brgyad stong): bya ba'i dngos po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu mi sngo ba'i tshul gyis mi 'pho ba dang / mi 'jig pas yongasu bsngo'o zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di tsam gyis na/ byang chub
120b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rje su yid rang ba'i mchog yi'o// rab 'byor yang gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang /

120b5(brgyad stong): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag ni yod pa'i sems can thams cad byang chub tu sems bskyed la/ byang chub sem dpa'

120b7(brgyad stong): dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad dang / bde bar bskur ba thams dang / bde ba la reg par gnas pa thad kyis/ rim gror byed cing / rnam grangs 'dis thams cad kyang /
120b8(brgyad stong): thams cad la rim gror be cing / dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyis sgron byin pa lta zhig/ rab 'byor gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi brim snyed dag
120'a1(brgyad stong): @sems can ci snying long ba de dag thams cad blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
120'a2(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ skal pa gang gi'i klung gi bri ma snyed du lus kyis legs par sbyong ba dang / ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis legs par spyod pa'i/
120'a3(brgyad stong): tshul khrims dmigs pa'i 'du shes can dag gis yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa dang / rnam grongs 'dis byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad las/ byang chub sems dpa'
120'a4(brgyad stong): rir kyang / skal pa gang gA'i klung gyi byis skyed du 'dug ste/ skul ba gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed du lus kyis legs par spyong ba dang / ngag gyis legs par spyod pa dang / yid kyis leg

120'b9(brgyad stong): cad / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ skal pa gang ba'i klung bri bris snyed

121b7(brgyad stong): rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su sngon/ rab 'byor rjes yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i/

121'a1(brgyad stong): mi 'gro/ brgya steng gyi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bre ba brgya'i char yang / bre ba brgya stong gyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ grangasu yang / bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes/
121'a2(brgyad stong): bstan par bya bar yang / gzhir yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes gyis bzod pa yang dag par blang
121'a3(brgyad stong): te/ gnas pa'i phyiraro// rab 'byor yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
121'a4(brgyad stong): byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
121'a5(brgyad stong): gzhan dag dang / gzhan dag gi sems can thaMd kyis mtshang brus shing / brdegs te/ spos kyang / nga rgyal dang bcas pa/ dmigs pa'i 'du shes can gyi skal ba gang ba'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzod
121'a6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par blangs te/ gnas pa lta zhog/ rab 'byor gang dag stong gsu gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed na/ sems can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad/
121'a7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ skal pa gang ba'i klung bri byem snyed 'dug cing /
121'a8(brgyad stong): 'chag pas mngon par gnas te/ skal pa gang gi'i glang gi byim snyed mi mi gsod cing / rmugs pa dang / gnyid kyis thil kyi mnon pa pa brtson 'grus dmigs pa'i 'du gas can gyis yang
121'b1(brgyad stong): dag par blangs te/ gnas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pas/ yongasu zin pa gang zhig/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang /
121'b2(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting 'dzin kyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i
121'b3(brgyad stong): yis gzigs pa'i phung po dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i las mthong ba'i phung po dang /
121'b4(brgyad stong): thos de dag gi yang tshul khrims dang / ting 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam pa'i grol ba'i yis mthong ba'i phung po dang / sems can thams cad kyi 'das pa dang /

127a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di rgyang ring du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsog tu byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gsod tu byed pa dang /
127a2(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi byed par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs 'di ni yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su gas
127a3(brgyad stong): bar byas na/ gzugs yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed pa yin/ rnam par shes pa yongs su gsal bar byas
127a4(brgyad stong): pa ma yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong/
127a5(brgyad stong): ba'i 'bras bu yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas nyid yongs su gsal bar byas pa
127a6(brgyad stong): ma yin no// gnas gtan rab 'byor gyis gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lags sa// bcom ldan 'das
127a7(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ni snyam du sems/ rnam grangs gang gis 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di pha rol tu phyin pa chen po yin/ gdas
127a8(brgyad stong): gartan rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ gzugs sdud par mi bgyid/ g.yengs par mi bgyid do//
127b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba ma lags/ 'du shes ma lags/ 'du byed rnams ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ rna/
127b2(brgyad stong): par shes sdud par mi bgyid/ g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs gang lags pa de dag kyang / stobs
127b3(brgyad stong): dang ldan par yang mi bgyid/ stobs ma mchis par yang mi bgyid/ sdud par mi bgyid g.yengs par mi bgyid do// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang lags pa
127b4(brgyad stong): yang chen por mi bgyid/ chung ngur mi bgyid/ sdud par mi bgyid/ g.yengs par mi bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa
127b5(brgyad stong): nyid ni ma bsdus/ ma g.yengs pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gal te de ltar 'tshal na yang / shes rab kyi pha
127b6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags na/ bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa ste/ 'di ltar sems can rnams la chos bstan par bya'o// 'di ltar sems can
127b7(brgyad stong): 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam du 'tshal ba lta spos su ci mchis/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sems can 'di dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o bskus
127b8(brgyad stong): ba gang lags pa 'di ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ma lags te/ sems can du dmigs pa 'di nyid de'i dmigs pa chen por 'gyur ro// de ni'i srad
128a1(brgyad stong): du zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems can ngo bo nyid pa mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bgyi ste/ sems
128a2(brgyad stong): can ngo bo nyid ma mchis pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// sems can dben pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
128a3(brgyad stong): par rig par bgyi'o// sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyi mi khyab par rig par bgyi'o// sems can mi 'jig pa'i chos
128a4(brgyad stong): nyid lags pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi 'jig pa'i chos nyid rig par bgyi'o// sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgya bas na/ shes rab kyi pha
128a5(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can yang dag pa'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par mi rgya bas na/ shes rab kyi
128a6(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag pa'i don ci lta ba bzhin du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar rig par bgyi'o// sems can stongs yang dag par sgrub pas na/ de bzhin gshegs
128a7(brgyad stong): pa'i stobs yang dag par sgrubs par rig par bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa chen po lag so//
128a8(brgyad stong): de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// n+dos bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab mo 'di la
128b1(brgyad stong): mos shing / nem nur mi bgyid/ the tsom mi 'tshal/ rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de gang nas shi 'phos nas/ 'dir skyes par rig par bgyi/ btsam/
128b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i don dang / chos nyid dang / don gyi tshul dang / chos nyid kyi tshul gyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur la/ rjes su 'tshal bar 'gyur
128b3(brgyad stong): zhing / rjes su rtogs par bgyid par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yun ring po ci srid cig tu spyad cing tshul bsrungs par rig par bgyi/ de
128b4(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
128b5(brgyad stong): po de ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byas shing / yongs su dris nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par rig
128b6(brgyad stong): par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
128b7(brgyad stong): yongs su dri nas 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes par gyur pa/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / he bA
128b8(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa nyan te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed do// bdag
129a1(brgyad stong): gyis ston pa mngon gsum du gyur te/ bdag gis ston pa mthong ngo slab du sems skyed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang /
129a2(brgyad stong): nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa la rna ba blags nas gus par nyan te/ rnam gyi bar chad mi byed do// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/
129a3(brgyad stong): yun ring por spyad cing tshul bsrungs pa de lta bu'i rang bzhin du rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen
129a4(brgyad stong): bkur byas pa de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang shes rab
129a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyan pa 'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ bskyed pa 'am/ nye bar gzung bar nus sam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni 'di'i zhe na/
129a6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni 'di ga 'o zhe'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ni ga ge mo zhig na'o zhes sam/ rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma 'dis so
129a7(brgyad stong): zhes kyang bstan pa 'am/ mnyan par nus sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
129a8(brgyad stong): po 'am/ khams sam/ skye mched du bstan pa'ab/ mnyan pa'am/ rtogs pa 'am/ bsam pa 'am/ skyed pa'am/ nye bar gzung bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
129b1(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad dben pa nyid dang / chos thams cad shin tu dben pa nyid yin pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bstan pa'ab/ mnyan pa'am/ rtogs pa'ag
129b2(brgyad stong): bsam pa 'am/ bskyed pa 'am/ nye bar gzung bar mi nus so// shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched las gzhan na yang bde par rig
129b3(brgyad stong): par bya ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched nyid stong pa/ dben pa/ zhi bas so// 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pud
129b4(brgyad stong): bo dang / khams dang / skye mched 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// stong pa dang / dben bzhi pa'i dmigs su med de/ chos thams cad kyi mi dmigs pa/
129b5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa zhes brjod do// gang gi tshe 'du shes dang / kun shes pa dang / brtags pa dang / tha snyed mi 'byung ba de'i tshe/ shes rab
129b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi ba
129b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la rnal 'byor du bgyid pa/ de yun ring po ci srid cig spyad cing / tshul bsrungs par rig par dkyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
129b8(brgyad stong): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dbang po'i rim pa yod pas/ 'di ni rnam par phye ste/ lung bstan par bya ba yin no// rab 'byor
130a1(brgyad stong): yang rnam grangs gang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang / sangs rgyas stong breg mang po dang / sangs
130a2(brgyad stong): rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dag mthong nas/ de dag gi drung du tshangs par spyod pa spyad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma dang / ma mos par 'gyur ba'i
130a3(brgyad stong): rnam grangs yod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sngon yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis thad nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang / ston
130a4(brgyad stong): pa dang / nye bar ston pa la ma gus so// mgus pas legs par mi nyan to// legs par mi nyan pas bsnyen bkur mi byed do// bsnyen bkur mi byed pas yongs su
130a5(brgyad stong): mi 'dri'o// yongs su ma dris pas mngon par mi dad do// mngon par ma dad pas 'khor de nas 'byol te/ de dag gzhi de las chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang /
130a6(brgyad stong): mthun pa'i las byas shing bstsags la/ kun nas bstsags la/ nye bar bsngags pas/ da ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa dang /
130a7(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa na ma gus pas 'grol zhing ma dad la/ mos par mi byed pas lus dang sems kyis tshogs pa sgrub par mi byed do// tshogs pa sgrub
130a8(brgyad stong): par mi byed pas ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mi shes/ mi mthong / khong du mi chud/ rig par mi byed de/ de dag de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
130b1(brgyad stong): ma dad par 'gyur ro// ma dad pa ni mi nyan to// pi nyan pa ni mi shes so// ma shes pa ni mi mthong ngo // ma mthong bas ni khong du mi chung ngo // khang du chud pas ni
130b2(brgyad stong): chos kyis 'bongs par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i las byed/ yang dag par stsogs par byed/ kun tu stsogs par byed/ nye bar sngags par byed do//
130b3(brgyad stong): de dag chos kyis phongs par 'gyur ba dang / mthun pa'i las byas pa dang / bstsags pa dang / kun nas bsngags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa des/ shes rab
130b4(brgyad stong): 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i las mngon par 'du byed par 'gyur ro// de dag shes rab 'chal par 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i las mngon par 'dus byas pa
130b5(brgyad stong): dang / bstsags pa dang / kun nas bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa na spong
130b6(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ skur bar 'gyur/ mi snyan par rjod par 'gyur te/ bskur nas kyang 'byol bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spong ba dang / skur
130b7(brgyad stong): ba dang / mi snyan par brjod pas ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid spangs par 'gyur/
130b8(brgyad stong): bskur bar 'gyur/ mi snyan par brjod par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rang gyi rgyud bcom zhing bsregs nas/ blo chung ba/ shes rab chung ba/ bsod nams chung ba/ dge ba'i
131a1(brgyad stong): rtsa ba chung ba'i gang zag dad tsa ma dang lnga pa/ dga' ba tsa ba dang ldan pa/ dad pa tsam dang ldan pa/ bdun pa tsam dang ldan pa/ las dang po skal ba
131a2(brgyad stong): med pa'i rang bzhin can gzhan rnams kyi yang dad pa tsam dang / dga' ba tsam dang / dad pa tsam dang / 'dun pa tsam de yang phyir zlog cing 'bral bar byed/ ldog par
131a3(brgyad stong): byed de/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o zhes smra zhing / 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gsung ma yin no zhes tshig tu brjod par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag gis rgyud bcom ning
131a4(brgyad stong): bral te/ gzhan gi rgyud kyang bcom zhing bral nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskur ba 'debs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bskur ba ba#
131a5(brgyad stong): na/ thams cad bakhyen pa nyid la bskur ba btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la skur pa btab na 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs
131a6(brgyad stong): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la skur pa btab par 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi drung nas 'byol bar 'gyur/ chos kyis yongs
131a7(brgyad stong): btang bar 'gyur dge 'dun las yongs su phyi rol tu 'gyur ro// de ltar de rnams thams cad nas thams cad/ rnam pa thams du thams cad dkon mchog gsum la
131a8(brgyad stong): phyi rol tu 'gyur te/ de dag sems can rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba nye bar gcod par byed pas/ sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su rnam par smin par 'gyur ba dang /
131b1(brgyad stong): 'thun pa'i las nye bar stsogs par 'gyur ro// de dag de lta bu'i las mngon par 'du byed pa dang / nye bar gzhag pa dang / kun nas bslang ba dang / chos kyis 'tshal
131b2(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa dang / shes rab 'chal bar 'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i rang bzhin de nyid kyis lo brgya phrag mang po dang / lo stong phrag mang po dang / lo
131b3(brgyad stong): brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba stong zag mang po dang / lo bye ba brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang
131b4(brgyad stong): por sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su ltung bar 'gyur ro// de dag sems can dmyal ba chen chen po nas sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro bar 'gyur te/ de dag
131b5(brgyad stong): de ltar yun ring por sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can dmyal ba chen por 'pho ba na/ mes 'jig pa'i skal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mes 'jig pa'i
131b6(brgyad stong): skal ba 'byung na/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po gang dag yod pa de dag tu 'dor bar 'gyur te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen
131b7(brgyad stong): po de dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ro// des bor te sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu ltung bar gyur pa/ de dag der yang sems can dmyal ba chen po nas/ sems can

132a1(brgyad stong): 'jig pa'i skal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag ces 'jig pa'i skal ba 'byung na/ de nas shi 'bos ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams
132a2(brgyad stong): gzhan na/ sems can dmyal ba chen po yod pa der 'dor te/ de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// der yang de kho na bzhin du sems can

132a4(brgyad stong): bor 'pho ba na/ der yang mes 'jig pa'i skal ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de dag mes 'jig pa'i skal ba 'byung ba na/ yang de dag de nas shi 'phos te/ mazad

132a6(brgyad stong): su skye bar 'gyur ro// de dag slar sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams su sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal chen po de dag myong bar 'gyur te/ ji srid du mes 'jig pa
132a7(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur/ da srid nga myong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar de dag sdug bsngal mang po myong ba dang / mthun pa'i las nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de lta
132a8(brgyad stong): bu'i tshig nyes pa smras pa'i phyir ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'dis skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'tshams ma mchis

132b4(brgyad stong): bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa 'di'i gzugs brnyan nam/ rjes su 'thun pa 'am/ tshul 'thun pa tsam yang ma yin no// gang su dag shes rab

132b8(brgyad stong): rang nyid badrag nas gzhan yang brlag par byed par 'gyur/ bdag nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo ma shes ma rtogs la/ gzhan dag kyang 'di la/
133a1(brgyad stong): 'asas par mi bya nas 'dzin du 'dug par/ shari'i bu gang zag das bu'i rang bzhin ca ni blta bar yang ngas kyi gan na/ dadag dang
133a2(brgyad stong): 'grogs pa lta ci smos/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta ci spos/ gnas pa lta ci spos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu de lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi gang zag de dag ni/
133a3(brgyad stong): chos la sun 'byin par rig par bya ba yin no/ sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can de dag ni/ lo 'dab rul ba lta bur gyur par rig par bya'o//
133a4(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag ni/ nag po'i rang bzhin can nag po nye bar skyed par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bu gang zag de lta bu de dag las gang dag
133a5(brgyad stong): mnyan pa dang / dad pa bya bar sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang tshul ma yin pas brlag par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

133a8(brgyad stong): ba chen po der skyes pa de'i lus kyi tshad zhog shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyi lus kyi tshad thos nas khrag dron po kha nas sdug cing 'chi
133b1(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'chi ba tsam 'am/ sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang / nad kyis reg cing tshig pa'am/ de la mya ngan gyi zug rngu zhugs pa'am/ gsangs chen
133b2(brgyad stong): por ltung ba 'am/ skam pa 'am/ rnyis par gyur na mi rung bas na/ gang la nyes pa de dag yod pa'i lus de'i tshad 'jigs pa chen po can/ de lta bu thos par ma gyur
133b3(brgyad stong): cig ces/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lus de'i tshad 'di tsam du 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la go skabs ma phye'o// lan gnyis lan gsum du yang / bcom
133b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// gang zag de'i lus kyis tshad kyis phyi ma'i skye bo la snang bar bgyis par 'gyur bas/ ngag dang yid
133b5(brgyad stong): kyi las byas shing bstsags pa dang / kun tu bstsags pa dang / nye bar bstsags pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba chen po'i lus 'di lta bu chen po yongs su 'dzin par
133b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu gang ngag dang yid kyis nye bar spyad pa/ mi
133b7(brgyad stong): dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byed pa mngon par 'dus byas pa bsngags shing / kun nas bstsags pa 'dis yun ring po 'di tsam du sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur ro zhes bya
133b8(brgyad stong): ba 'di nyid kyis/ phyi ma'i skye bo la snang ba byas par 'gyur te/ sha ri'i bu sdug bsngal de nyid la gzhal du med pa dang / sdug bsngal mang por bshad pa gang yin pa de nyid
134a1(brgyad stong): kyis/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag dkar ba'i skal ba can rnams skyo bar 'gyur zhing / de nas de chos kyis phongs par 'argyar
134a2(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'thun pa'i las de dag las rnam par ldog cing / bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa khar byed de/ bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i sdug bsngal dang phrad
134a3(brgyad stong): par mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir/ srog gi phyir yang dam pa'i chos spong bar mi byed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces
134a4(brgyad stong): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos lus kyi lA dang / ngag gi las dang / lid kyi las shin tu bsdam par bgyi'o//
134a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ngag gis nongs par smras pa/ de lta bu'i ngo bos bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po 'di skyes pa la gso//
134a6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das yang las gang gyis bsod nams ma lags pa'i phung po chen po 'di skyes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
134a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ngag gi nyes pa smras pa des bus thobs/ mabar rnams ma yin pa'i phung chen po 'di tsam skyes so// rab 'thor bang dag gas ra
134a8(brgyad stong): phyin pa zab mo 'di su dbyung bar sems par 'gyur/ bskur bar sems par 'gyur/ phyir gnil bar sems par 'gyur ba'i skyes bu gti mug can de dag legs pa
134b1(brgyad stong): gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba nyid du rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di phyir bcil na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub kyang /
134b2(brgyad stong): phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub phyir bcil na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi//
134b3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phyir bcil na/ dam pa'i chos phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// dam pa'i chos phyir bci/
134b4(brgyad stong): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun phyir bcil ba de lta na ni/
134b5(brgyad stong): dkon mchog gsum las thams cad nas thams cad rnam pa thams cad du/ thams cad phyi rol tu gyur pa yin pas ches gzhal du med cing grangs med pa'i mi
134b6(brgyad stong): dge ba'i las chen po mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis
134b7(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir gzhil bar sems pa de'i rgyu gang lag/
134b8(brgyad stong): rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ shes rab 'tshal bar
135a1(brgyad stong): @'gyur ba dang / 'thun pa'i ngag gi las kyis 'di chos zab mo dag la mi dad cing rab tu dang bar mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor sdig pa'i chos/
135a2(brgyad stong): 'di gnyis dang ldan pas/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo do shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la phyir 'jil bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol
135a3(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chang pa dang / kun pa dang / nye bar ston pa na phyir gnyil bar sems par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni/ rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par 'gyur
135a4(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par mi brtson par 'gyur ba 'am/ phung po la mngon par zhen par

135a8(brgyad stong): ba'i rtsa ba dang bral ba dang / sdig pa'i grogs po'i lag tu song bas mos par dka'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de de bzhin no// rab 'byor de de bzhin
135b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni mngon par mi brtson pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / blo zhan pa dang / thos pa nyung ba dang / shes rab zhan pa dang / sdig pa'i

135b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rab 'byor de bzhin

135b7(brgyad stong): la sngon gyi mtha'i ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gzugs kyi phyi ma'i mtha' ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs la phyi ma'i

140a8(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor khyod de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la/ chags pa'i mtha' 'di
140b1(brgyad stong): dag khong du chud par byed pa legs so// legs so// rab 'byor de'i phyir chags pa rab tu phra ba gzhan dag kyang brjod par bya ste/ legs par rab tu nyon la
140b2(brgyad stong): yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
140b3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dang ngag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
140b4(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mtshan mar yid la byed na yang / rab 'byor mtshan ma ci srid pa de srid du chags pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor mtshan
140b5(brgyad stong): ma las ni chags par 'gyur ro// de ltar na/ de 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i
140b6(brgyad stong): chos gang yin pa de dag la rjes su yid rang ngo // de ltar rjes su yid rang nas/ rjes su yid rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo
140b7(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhe/ yongs su sngo bar byed na/ rab 'byor yang chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de ni/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'o/ da
140b8(brgyad stong): ltar byung ba ma yin/ gang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'am/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de ni/ dus gsum las nges par grol ba/ gang dus gsum las nges
141a1(brgyad stong): par grol ba de ni/ yos su sngob dang / mtshan par bya ba dang / dmigs par bya bar mi nus shing / de ni mthong ba dang / zos pa dang / rtogs
141a2(brgyad stong): pa dang / rnam par shes pa yang ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnams kyi rang bzhin ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis
141a3(brgyad stong): bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor dben pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor kyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin zab pa'o// 5
141a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i phyir dang rab 'byor rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/
141a5(brgyad stong): rang bzhin zab bo// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin dben pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab
141a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin dben pa nyid de/ rab 'byor chos
141a7(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi rang bzhin dben pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rab 'byor chos thams cad ni de bzhin gsheg
141a8(brgyad stong): ba dgra bcom pa yang dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma byas par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
141b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas//
141b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rang bzhin gyis chos de dag gang yang med do// rang bzhin gang yin gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa//
141b3(brgyad stong): rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir na/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
141b4(brgyad stong): de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de ci'i phyir zhe/
141b5(brgyad stong): na/ rab 'byor chos kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med de/ rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin ni gcig tu zad do// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
141b6(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin med pa/ rang bzhin med pa gang yin pa de ni rang bzhin te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ chags pa'i mtha' de dag thams cad rnam
141b7(brgyad stong): bar spangs pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
141b8(brgyad stong): stsal pa/ rab 'byor nem mkha' zab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi
142a1(brgyad stong): paras tu byin pa rdzas su chags pa dka' ba lags sa pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar su yang mdzan par
142a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa lags sam/ @
142a3(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ sems kyis shes par bya bar ma yin/ sems kyis rtogs par bya bas
142a4(brgyad stong): yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bgyis pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
142a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byar byed pa po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma byas pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsam pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na/ byang chub
142a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ci ltar snang bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub
142a7(brgyad stong): masna pa sems pa chen po// shes rab tha rom tu phyid pal byud pa/ gzugs sa mi spyadas/ gas rab kyi pha rol pa rkyen pa la zu nga// de bshin dugs tshar ba la ma'i/
142a8(brgyad stong): 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rna pA la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa la mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs mi rtag pa'o zhes mi spyod na/ shes
142b1(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'o zhes mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
142b2(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs stong pa'o zhes mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams
142b3(brgyad stong): ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa stong pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gal te gzugs pa rdzog pa dang rdzogs pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes
142b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzugs kyi rdzogs pa ma yin pa'i/ rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin te/ gal te de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
142b5(brgyad stong): la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la yin 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ gal te rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa dang / rdzogs pa'o snyam du mi spyod na shes rab
142b6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa rdzogs pa ma yin pa 'am/ rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te/ gal te de ltar yang mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi
142b7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang
142b8(brgyad stong): gi phyir de ltar ji srid du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi chags pa dang bcas pa nyid dang / chags pa ma mchis pa nyid bshad pa ni ngo mtshor to// bco ldan 'dra
143a1(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal be/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzugs chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa ded
143a2(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gal te rnam par shes pa la chags pa

143a5(brgyad stong): ba'i bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// sa'i khams la chags pa dang bcas pa dang /
143a6(brgyad stong): chags med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi
143a7(brgyad stong): spyodan/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la snang ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyir pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi ma
143a8(brgyad stong): cu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyid ba dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtar gyi
143b1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de
143b2(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
143b3(brgyad stong): la chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa dang bcas
143b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / chags pa med pa'o snyam mal/ du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du lan cig phyir 'ongs ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i

143b7(brgyad stong): pa med pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang chags pa dang bcas pa dang / chags pa med
143b8(brgyad stong): pa'o snyam du mi spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni/ gzugs la chags pa mi skyed do//
144a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du nor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes lam yin/ 'du byed rnam la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la chags pa mi sbed do// rab 'gyur byang chub
144a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar gyud dade/ mig la chags pa mi skyed pa nas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bar la chags pa babyung / pa'i
144a3(brgyad stong): la chags pa mi skyed pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la chags pa mi skyed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi skyed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin/

144a5(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la chags pa mi skyed/ byang chub kyi phyogs rnams la ma yin/ stobs rnams la ma yin/ mi 'jigs pa rnams la ma yin/ so so yang dag par rig

144a7(brgyad stong): 'bras bu la ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu lam yin/ dgra bcom pa nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas nyid la chags pa mi skyed/ sangs rgyas nyid

144b1(brgyad stong): par ma 'das pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar chags pa tham cad las rab tu ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad/

144b3(brgyad stong): bstan kyang mi 'grib/ bstan kyang mi 'phel/ ma bstan kyang mi 'phel ba ni ngo mtshar to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rag
144b4(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor legs so// legs so// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin
144b5(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bzhugs shing / nam mkha'i bsngags pa brjod kyang / nam mkha'i yongs
144b6(brgyad stong): su 'phel bar bar mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang nam mkha' yongs su 'grib par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la
144b7(brgyad stong): bsngags pa brjod kyang rjes su chags par yang mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ bsngags pa ma brjod kyang khro bar mi 'gyur/ nyon mongs par mi 'gyur
144b8(brgyad stong): ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos rnams kyi chos nyid gang yin pa de yang bstan kyang de snyed du zad do// ma bstan kyang de skad du zad do// gnas rten rab 'byor gyis
145a1(brgyad stong): / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
145a2(brgyad stong): sgom pa gang zhig zhum par mi 'gyid/ ya la bor mi 'gyur te/ 'di la rnal 'byor du yang bgyid la/ phyir mi ldog pa ni dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta
145a3(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mkha' skom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis go cha 'di
145a4(brgyad stong): bgos pa de dag ni/ phyag bgyi bar lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha bgo bar 'tshal ba de ni nam mkha' dang //

145a7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' bo lags so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de ni/ bcom ldan 'das
145a8(brgyad stong): nam mkha' yongs su thar par 'tshal ba lags so// de ni bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' 'degs par 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
145b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems can rnams kyi slad du/ go cha 'tshal ba de ni/ brtson 'grus kyi pha/
145b2(brgyad stong): tu byin pa'i go cha chen po thob pa lags so// de nas dge slong gzhan zhig gis/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan
145b3(brgyad stong): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
145b4(brgyad stong): ni chos gang yang mi skyed/ chos gang yang 'gog par mi bgyid do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so//
145b5(brgyad stong): 'phags pa rab 'byor gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ de ltar rnal 'byor du byed pa de ci la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur/ rab 'byor kyis smras pa/ ko'u
145b6(brgyad stong): shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de ni nam mkha' la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
145b7(brgyad stong): la slob cing rnal 'byor du byed par sems pa de ni/ bla gab med pa la rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis
145b8(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la 'dzin par 'gyur ba de la bsrung ba dang /
146a1(brgyad stong): bsgrub pa dang / sba ba ci zhig bgyi ba bka' stsal par gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces
146a2(brgyad stong): smras so// ko'u shi ka chos gang la bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba bar bya ba'i chos de khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ 'phags par ba
146a3(brgyad stong): 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis spras pa ko'u shi ka gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar bshad pa 'di la gnas
146a4(brgyad stong): na de nyid de la srung ba dang / slob pa dang / sred par 'gyur ro// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar gyur na ni/ mi dang pi ma yin de la grags lhang dang /
146a5(brgyad stong): glags tshol bdag gis grags rnyed par 'gyur ro// ko'u shi ka gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa la bsrung ba/
146a6(brgyad stong): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba bya bar sos pa de ni nam mkha' la bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra ba bya bar sems so// ko'u shi ka 'di ci snyam du sems/ khyod kyis zag/
