146a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing gnas pas ni/ chos thams cad kyang brag cha lta bur yongs su shes so// de bas na de la rlog
146b1(brgyad stong): sems su mi byed/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong mi shes/ yang dag par mi shes/ chos de dag kyang med cing yang dag par mi snang la/ yang dag par med cing mi dmig go//
146b2(brgyad stong): zhes gnas te/ gal te de ltar gnas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/
146b3(brgyad stong): rgyal po cheran po bzhi po dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po gang dag yod pa de dag thos
146b4(brgyad stong): cad/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der 'ongs te lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
146b5(brgyad stong): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / rgyal po chen po de dag dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin thams cad dang / tshangs pa chen po thams cad dang /
146b6(brgyad stong): tshangs pa chen po mi mched kyi bdag pos kyang / sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas stong dang / de dag gis ming 'di dag nyid dang //
146b7(brgyad stong): tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid dang / rab 'byor ces bya ba'i dge slong 'di dag nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol
146b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di nyid nye bar bstan cing / der yang lha rnams kyi dbang po rgya byin rnams nyid kyis yongs su dris shing / yongs su zhus te/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab
147a1(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid bshad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
147a2(brgyad stong): ba'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur ba shes par gyur to// 'phags
147a3(brgyad stong): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rnam dag pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
147a4(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni ming tsam mo// ming de yang
147a5(brgyad stong): 'di'o zhes mi dmigs te/ ngag gi dngos po nyid ming zhes bgyi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yang ma mchis mi dmigs te/ ming ji lta ba bzhin du shes
147a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang de bzhin// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci lta bar ming yang de bzhin te/ chos 'di gnyis ni ma mchis shing mi dmigs na/ bcom
147a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ci'i srang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
147a8(brgyad stong): ming 'di dag nyid dang / tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis/ sa phyogs 'di nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid 'chad par 'gyur de skad ces
147b1(brgyad stong): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams
147b2(brgyad stong): pa ni/ gzugs rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag pa ma yin/ gzugs bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin pas/ mtha' las 'das shing / rnam par dag pa'o zhes
147b3(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'du byed rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa rtag pa ma yin/ mi rtag
147b4(brgyad stong): pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa bcings pa ma yin/ grol ba ma yin pas mtha' las 'das shing / rnam par dag pa'o zhes mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
147b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rgyu 'dis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
147b6(brgyad stong): ming 'di dag nyid dang / tshig 'di dag nyid dang / yi ge 'di dag nyid kyis sa phyogs 'di nyid du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chad par 'gyur ro// de skad ces
147b7(brgyad stong): bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni
147b8(brgyad stong): yongs su dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor
148a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin tu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par dag pas// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
148a2(brgyad stong): pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa
148a3(brgyad stong): rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tsher dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa
148a4(brgyad stong): shes paskye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
148a5(brgyad stong): ba yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nam mkha' rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor gzugs gos pa med cing po
148a6(brgyad stong): su 'dzin pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
148a7(brgyad stong): bgos pa med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rang 'byor nam mkha' dang brag cha smras med cing brjod du
148a8(brgyad stong): med la dmigs su med pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa'o// rab 'byor nye bar gos pa dang gos pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyis gos pa med
148b1(brgyad stong): 'gag par bya ba'i phyir dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ mi 'jig pa'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
148b2(brgyad stong): ni chos gang la yang mi gnas/ chos gang la yang mi sbyor/ chos gang la yang yongs su mi 'dzin to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos de dag thams
148b3(brgyad stong): cad ni med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor pa skyes pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mgos pa'o// rab 'byor ma gos pa zhes bya ba 'di ni/ shes rab
148b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor gzugs ma gos pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gos pa'o// de bzhin du tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
148b5(brgyad stong): dang / rnam par shes pa ma gos pas na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ma gos pa'o// rab 'byor gal te de ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
148b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po yang dag par mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni chos gang la ya
148b7(brgyad stong): 'jug par byed pa'am/ nges par 'jug par byed pa'am/ yang dag par ston par byed pa'am/ nges par ston par byed pa 'am/ yongs su thob par byed pa
148b8(brgyad stong): 'am/ nges par thob par byed pa med do// de nas lha'i bu stong phrag mang po dag par snang la ca co dang gzha dag byed de/ gos dag 'thor zhing 'di skad du/ e ma
150a1(brgyad stong): 'jam bu'i gling du rgyas kyi 'amarnam thaska ba lan gnyis su byung bar snang ba zhes kyang zer ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
150a2(brgyad stong): ba gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis su bskor ba ma yin te/ chos gang la yang rab tu
150a3(brgyad stong): bskor ba 'am/ ldog pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// de skan
150a4(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gas paso/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gang zhig chos thams cad la
150a5(brgyad stong): chags pa ma mchis pa dang / gang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'chal yang / chos gang yang mngos
150a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor yang / chos gang yang yang dag par mi ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po//
150a7(brgyad stong): ri'i pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang zhig dmigs par bya 'am/ chos gang zhig bstan par ba de ni med la/ 'ga' zhig gis 'ga'
150a8(brgyad stong): zhig bskor bar bya ba yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni shin tu mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos gang yang ldog par mi 'gyur/
150b1(brgyad stong): rab tu bskor bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni thog ma nas mngon par ma grub pa ste/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin
150b2(brgyad stong): gyis dber ba'i phyir ro// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin
150b3(brgyad stong): no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor stong pa nyid ni rab tu 'jug pa 'am/ ldog pa med do// rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa yang 'jug pa'am ldog pa med do//
150b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor smod pa med pa yang 'jug pa 'am ldog pa med do// rab 'byor gang 'di ltar bstan pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad bstan pa yin te/ sus kyang bstan
150b5(brgyad stong): pa med la/ sus kyang thob pa yang med/ sus kyang mnos pa yang med/ sus kyang mngon sum du byas pa yang med/ sus kyang mngon sum du byed pa yang ma yin//
150b6(brgyad stong): sus kyang mngon sum du byed par yang mi 'gyur ro// chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ma
150b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/ chos bstan pa 'dis ni su yang sbyin pa'i gnas su byas pa yang med do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
150b8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin tsa/
151a1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis par mnyam pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol
151a2(brgyad stong): byin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu stong pa'i slad du/ 'di ni dben pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad
151a3(brgyad stong): 'di ni mi rdzi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ming ma mchis shing / lus ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
151a4(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rtog pa ma mchis
151a5(brgyad stong): pa'i slad du/ 'di ni brjod tu ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po lnga dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni ming ma mchis pa'i pha rol
151a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni 'gro ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams
151a7(brgyad stong): cad gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'phrogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi bas pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi bas pa'i pha
151a8(brgyad stong): ma du phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ces thams cad mngon par mgrub pa'i sladadang/ 'din tsamatshas cad pa bye pa'i pha la pa byed pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rkyen
151b1(brgyad stong): ba po mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni byed pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni shes
151b2(brgyad stong): pa po ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'chi pho ba dang skye ba dag mi skye ba'i slad du/ 'di ni mi 'pho ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'ad
151b3(brgyad stong): sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i 'tha' dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni 'dul ba med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das skye
151b4(brgyad stong): ba ma mchis pa rnam par shes par bgyid pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / sgyu ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
151b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin
151b6(brgyad stong): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rten mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' gos pa ma
151b7(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni gos pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rlom sems thams cad las 'das pa'i slad du/ 'di ni zlos
151b8(brgyad stong): pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das g.yo ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rlom sems pa mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
152a1(brgyad stong): chos kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni mi g.yo ba'i pha rol tu phyin par// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad phyin ci ma log pa de bzhin nyid
152a2(brgyad stong): kyi slad du/ 'di ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni lnga pa ma mchis pa'i
152a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mtshan pa mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yon tan gyi
152a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa slad du/ 'di ni skyon ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yongs su rtog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni nyon mongs pa ma
152a5(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha'i slad du/ 'di ni sems can ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos
152a6(brgyad stong): thams cad ldang ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni tshad ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma zhen pa'i slad du/ 'di ni
152a7(brgyad stong): mtha' gnyis mi rtogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni tha mi dad pa'i rol tu phyin pa'o//
152a8(brgyad stong): ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad la 'dod pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mchog tu mi 'dzin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan
152b1(brgyad stong): 'das rnam par rtog pa zhi pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos nyid tshad ma mchis pa nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni
152b2(brgyad stong): gzhal du ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
152b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad 'das pa bgyis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mi rtog pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thas cad nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i
152b4(brgyad stong): slad du/ 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
152b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par ma chags pa'i slad du/ 'di ni bdag ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mngon par
152b6(brgyad stong): ma grub pa'i slad du/ 'di ni mtshan nyid ma mchis pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mtha' yas su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid thams cad kyi pha
152b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs de rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la stsogs pa byang chub kyi
152b8(brgyad stong): phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mi dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang /
153a1(brgyad stong): smon pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di rnams dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rnam par thar par brgyad kyi pha rol
153a2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan dang ma mtshugs pa mi dmigs pa'i srad du/ 'di ni 'thar gyis gnas pa dgu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das
153a3(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal la stsogs pa 'i dmigs pa'i slad du/ 'di ni bden pa bzhi'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sbyar pa la stsogs pa 'i dmigs pa'i slad du
153a4(brgyad stong): 'di dris bcu'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mi ji ba'i slad du/ 'di ni skabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shin tu ma zhum pa'i slad du
153a5(brgyad stong): 'di ni mi 'jigs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ye shes thams cad chags pa ma mchis pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni so so
153a6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rig pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las yang dag par 'das pa'i slad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad
153a7(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma log pa de bzhin nyid kyi slad du/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
153a8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du/ 'di ni rang byung gi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi rnam
153b1(brgyad stong): pa thams cad yongs su mkhyen pa'i slad du/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa'o// 'phags
153b2(brgyad stong): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ dgu pa'o// // bam po bcu pa//
153b3(brgyad stong): de nas lha rnam kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi rna lam du snang bar 'gyur ba yang /
153b4(brgyad stong): sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang / dge ba'i shes gnyen gyis yongs su zin par
153b5(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba yin na gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/
153b6(brgyad stong): rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur/ lung 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur zhing / gzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang /
153b7(brgyad stong): klag pa dang / kun chub pa dang / rab tu 'dzin pa dang / bstan pa dang / rga bar bskrad pa dang / lung bag pa dang // kha kon byas nas/ de bzhin du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin du
153b8(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon tsam dang ldan par mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sangs
154a1(brgyad stong): rgyas pang po la bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur ro// gang dag de ltar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / mnyan nas/
154a2(brgyad stong): kyang 'dzin par 'gyur/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klag par 'gyur/ kun chub par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur
154a3(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs par 'gyur/ kha ton byed par 'gyur/ de bzhin du slob par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du sgrub par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur
154a4(brgyad stong): ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo do dag gis ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi thad nas kyang / shes
154a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su zhus zhing / yongs su dris par byas pa
154a6(brgyad stong): yin no// gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar zab pa 'di bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa la 'gong ba ru mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par
154a7(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur/ bag tsha bar mi 'gyur/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ bcom zhing phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ mi dang kun tu mi skrag
154a8(brgyad stong): kun tu skrag pa dang mi ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
154b1(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bus/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyi 'di lta bu'i sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
154b2(brgyad stong): 'das rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyid 'chang ba dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / mngon par dad de rtog cing mo
154b3(brgyad stong): la/ sems dang bas byang chub sems bskyed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / rab tu
154b4(brgyad stong): 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / de bzhin du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin
154b5(brgyad stong): nyid du rnal 'byor du bgyid par 'gyur ba de ni/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ci lta ba de bzhin du gzung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i
154b6(brgyad stong): slad du she na/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
154b7(brgyad stong): la mngon du mthos shing / yongs su pa dris pa'i rang bzhin cad du gyur pa dang / sngon spyod pa dang ma ldan pa rnams kyis ni 'di ltar zab pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
154b8(brgyad stong): 'di la mos par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das yang gang dag 'di mi mos shing ma rtogs pas/ spong bar mi sems pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag
155a1(brgyad stong): zhes de/ dza kyi la mar ya pa papa gas ga na 'di nyid ga ga sa sa/
155a2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba'i slad du/ sngon gyi mthar pa spyad pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab 'di la ci ltar yang mos par mi nus so//
155a3(brgyad stong): gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'chad pa na spong bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang / de bzhin du rig par bgyi ste/ de dag gis sngon gyi mthar yang / shes rab kyi
155a4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin zab mo 'di nyid bshad pa na spangs pa lags te/ 'di ltar de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la dad pa ma mchis/ bzod pa
155a5(brgyad stong): ma mchis/ sred pa ma mchis/ 'dun pa ma mchis/ brtson 'grus ma mchis/ dang ba ma mchis/ mos pa ma mchis so// de dag gis ni sngon gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
155a6(brgyad stong): 'das rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos rnams la yongs ma dris te/ yongs su dri ba ma bgyis so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa ga ri'i bu
155a7(brgyad stong): la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa sha ri'i bu/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon ma spyad pa dag/ shes rab kyi/
155a8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mos par mi 'gyur ba de la ngo mtshar ci zhig yod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
155b1(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ge
155b2(brgyad stong): shes la phyag 'tshal ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko'u shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
155b3(brgyad stong): ba la phyag 'tshal ba de ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la phyag 'tshal ba yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zam
155b4(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di las skyes te/ ko'u shi ka thams cad mazhen pa'i ye shes las skyes pas kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu phye ba yin no// de ltar
155b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la gnas par bya/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor
155b6(brgyad stong): du bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
155b7(brgyad stong): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa lags/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha ro/
155b8(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du bgyid/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko'u shi
156a1(brgyad stong): ka legs so// legs so// ko'u shi ka gang tha~Md de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la dan 'di ma
156a2(brgyad stong): su 'dri bar bya ba dang / yongs su dri bar byed par sems pa ni yang khyod legs so// ko'u shi ka khyod kyi spobs pa 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus skyes pa yin no//
156a3(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ gzugs la mi gnas/ gzugs so zhes mi gnas te/
156a4(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gzugs la mi gnas gzugs so zhes mi gnas pa de ltar na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpang
156a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gzugs la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/
156a6(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la mi gnas/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes
156a7(brgyad stong): mi gnas pa de ltar na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// ko'u shi ka gzugs so zhes
156a8(brgyad stong): mi sbyor te/ ko'u shi ka 'di ltar gzugs so zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na/ gzugs so zhes mi gnas pa yin no// ko'u shi ka de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dra
156b1(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyar te/ ko'u shi ka rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi sbyor ba de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa'o zhes mi gnas pa yin te/ shes ra
156b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar gnas shing / de ltar rnal 'byor du byed par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
156b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes
156b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzung bar dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
156b5(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu gzugs zab po snyam du mi gnas te/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na/ gzugs la
156b6(brgyad stong): rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas te/ sha ri'i bu 'di
156b7(brgyad stong): ltar rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas pa de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa yin no// sha ri'i bu gzugs zab mo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi
156b8(brgyad stong): byed de/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs za ba po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de ltar na/ gzugs zab bo snyam du mi gnas pa yin no// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
157a1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / sha ri'i bu rnam par shes pa zab bo snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de/ sha ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam par shes paH
157a2(brgyad stong): po snyam du rnal 'byor du mi byed de ltar na/ rnam par shes pa zab po snyam du mi gnas pa yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan
157a3(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// phyir mi
157a4(brgyad stong): ldog par lung bstan pa rnams kyi mdun du bshad par bgyi ba lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni dem nur mi bgyid/ the tshom 'tshal bar mi
157a5(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ mongs par mi 'gyur/ rtsod par mi 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa bu la/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
157a6(brgyad stong): ba sha ri'i bu yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa'i 'dun du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad na nyes ba cir 'gyur/ de skad
157a7(brgyad stong): ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lung ma
157a8(brgyad stong): bstan pa gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mnyan pa thos par gyur la/ thos nas kyang dngang bar mi
157b1(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ ko'u shi ka rgyang ring po nas 'ongs par

157b3(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur te/ de ni lung bstan pa la bsnyen pa yin par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'

157b6(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas de rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ mnyes par byas nas kyang / thugs byung bar byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba yang
157b7(brgyad stong): lung bstan pas 'bras bu yod par byed par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba de las kyang / bran mod pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan

158a1(brgyad stong): phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / rim gror bya ba nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs/

159b3(brgyad stong): 'jug cing / rab tu dad par 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bstsags pa lag te/ bcom ldan 'das de dag ni dge ba'i
159b4(brgyad stong): rtsa ba bstsags par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa'i/

160b3(brgyad stong): ma mthong na/ des 'di snyam du 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po ni rung ring nge snyam du 'chal bar bgyi'o// gal te phyis sdong po 'am/ sdong po'i mtshan ma'am/ ri 'am/ ri'i/

160b6(brgyad stong): su du ma mthong ba de lta na yang / rgya mtsho chen po ni bdag gis bsnyen te 'di phan chad rgya mtsho chen po mi ring ngo snyam mo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ byang chub sems da'

160b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis bdag mngon sum du ni lung ma bstan pa de ltar na yang / 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bdag lung
161a1(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / bsnyen par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang /
161a2(brgyad stong): phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa thob pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dbyed ka'i dus nye bar gnas pa na/ shing sna
161a3(brgyad stong): tshogs kyi yal ga'i lo ma rnying pa rnams lhags pa las lo ma sna tshogs byung ste/ lo ma rnams byung ba dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gyi mi rnams nags tshal dag la
161a4(brgyad stong): sngar gyi mtshan ma de dag mthong nas/ da ni me tog dang / 'bras bu rnams ring po mi thogs par 'byung ngo snyam nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad
161a5(brgyad stong): du zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sdong po las mtshan pa 'di lta bu dag sngar gda' ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
161a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa rnyed pa'i slad du nye bar gnas
161a7(brgyad stong): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ba de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par lags par rig par brgya
161a8(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la dge ba'i rtsa yongs su smin par lags par rig par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni/
161b1(brgyad stong): de la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis nye bar bstobs pa lags so// de la gang sngon sangs rgyas mthong ba'i lha de dag ni 'di snyam du sems te/ sngon gyi byang chub
161b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i mtshan ma sngar byung ba yin pas/ byang chub
161b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro snyam nas rab
161b4(brgyad stong): tu dga' bar 'gyur zhing rangs te/ yid mgu ba skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na/ bud med sbrum pa mngal lci bar gyur pa gang gi tshe/
161b5(brgyad stong): lus bskyod na cher snyam par 'gyur te/ de 'chag pa la dad cher mi 'gyur/ kha zas chung ngu 'tshal bar 'gyur/ rmugs pa dang gnyid chung bar 'gyur/ smra ba nyung
161b6(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ stobs chung bar 'gyur/ sdug bsngal mang bar 'gyur/ smre bzhin du bang du gnas par 'gyur/ 'grogs pa la dad che bar mi 'gyur/ sngon gyi tshul
161b7(brgyad stong): bzhin ma lags pa/ yid la bgyid pa bsnyen cing / nges par bsten pa la bsgoms te/ mang du byas pas 'di lta bu'i tshor ba lus kyis myong ngo snyam pa de'i tshe//
161b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sngar gyi mtshan ma 'di dag mthong ba de ltar bud med 'di ni ring po mi thogs par bu 'byung bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan
162a1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa de/ gang gi tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
162a2(brgyad stong): zab po 'di blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / mnyan pa'i slad du nye bar gnas la/ nyan pa na de la dga' zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
162a3(brgyad stong): byin pa la don du gnyer ba'i sems skyed pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
162a4(brgyad stong): chub tu ring po mi thogs par lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur bar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pag ri'i
162a5(brgyad stong): bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu legs so// legs so// sha ri'i bu 'di yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus khyod spobs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
162a6(brgyad stong): 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/
162a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag 'di ltar legs par yongs su gzung ba dang / legs par yongs su sbyangs pa dang / legs par yongs
162a8(brgyad stong): su gtad pa'i bar 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni//
162b1(brgyad stong): skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa ste//
162b2(brgyad stong): lnga dang mi rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par
162b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bla na med pa'i chos ston par 'dod pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
162b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa na/ ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgoms pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
162b5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs kyi
162b6(brgyad stong): 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams
162b7(brgyad stong): kyi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'phel ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu m+b+ha la spyod do// gzugs kyi 'grib pa yang dag par rjes
162b8(brgyad stong): su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba'i ma yin/ 'du shes kyi me yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ba yin/ rnam par shes pa'i
163a1(brgyad stong): 'grib pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyid pa la spyad do// chos yang dag par rjes su pi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha ro//
163a2(brgyad stong): du phyin pa la spyod do// chos ma yin pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de ltar na/ 'di'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
163a3(brgyad stong): sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba bcom ldan 'das bstan pa 'di ni bsapa gyi mi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
163a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pas bsam gyis mi khyab
163a5(brgyad stong): bo// rab 'byor gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
163a6(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa bsam gyis mi khyab ces bya bar yang mi shes na/ shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
163a7(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar zab pa 'di la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'ad
163a8(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par gyur pa/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
163b1(brgyad stong): pa 'di la mos par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyad par gyur pa lags/

163b4(brgyad stong): yang mi rtog/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sha ri'i bu stobs rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang bsam gyi mi khyab/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
163b5(brgyad stong): rnams kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang bsam gyis mi khyab/ chos thams cad kyang bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ sha ri 'i bu de ltar

163b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rin po che'i phung po'o// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' dag pa'i slad

166b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / na
166b8(brgyad stong): ba dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin
166b9(brgyad stong): nyid du rnal 'byor du byed par gyur pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen te/ sha ri'i bu de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni/ de
167a1(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi rnam par gzigs so// thos nas kyang bzung ba dang /
167a2(brgyad stong): bcang ba dang / klags pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / rab tu 'aton pa dang / bstan pa dang / nye bar bstan pa dang / lung phog pa dang / kha ton byas pa dang / yi ger
167a3(brgyad stong): bris nas/ de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
167a4(brgyad stong): tu nye bar 'gyur te/ bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub deng de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bris
167a5(brgyad stong): nas/ 'chang bar 'gyur/ klog par 'gyur/ kun chub par byed par 'gyur/ rab tu 'don par 'gyur/ ston par 'gyur/ nye bar ston par 'gyur/ lung 'bogs par 'gyur/
167a6(brgyad stong): kha ton byed pa 'gyur/ yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur gyi de bzhin nyid du mi slob/ de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub/ de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pa de dag ni/ de bzhin nyid du mi slob pa dang /
167a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub pa dang / de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ de bzhin dring / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gnas par mi 'gyur mod kyi/ sha ri'i
167a8(brgyad stong): bu de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi brlabs/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gzigs te/ sha ri'i bu de dag kyang de bzhin
167b1(brgyad stong): gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag gi 'bang ba dang / yongs su g.yo ba de yang don chen po dang / phan 'a yon chen po//
167b2(brgyad stong): dang / 'bras bu chen po dang / rnam par sbyin pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ chos thams cad kyi
167b3(brgyad stong): don dam pa dang ldan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad la yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin tu rtogs par byas pas nye bar gnas so// sha ri'i bu yang rol tu
167b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde/ 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'das nas/ dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i dus kyi tshe/ chos 'dul ba snying
167b5(brgyad stong): bo sar pa 'thob pa na/ lho phyogs su 'byung bar 'gyur ro// lho phyogs nas yang bar ta nir 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bar ta ni nas
167b6(brgyad stong): yang byang phyogs su 'byung ste/ sha ri'i bu de'i dus gang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'cha nga dang / klog
167b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed par 'gyur/
167b8(brgyad stong): zhing / tha na glegs bam du chud par byas nas/ 'chang bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas
168a1(brgyad stong): dgongs so// de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas mkhyen to// sha ri'i bu de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs so// shi ri'i bu
168a2(brgyad stong): de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// sha ri'i bu de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis rnam par gzigs so// sha ri'i bus
168a3(brgyad stong): gsol pas/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bur zab po 'di yang 'di ltar phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe na/ byang gyi yul dang / byang gi phyogs char
168a4(brgyad stong): rgyas par 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ de la sha ri'i bu byang gi yul dang / byang gyi phyogs kyi cha der gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu
168a5(brgyad stong): byin pa zab mo 'di mnyan nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la rnal 'byor du byed pa de dag rgyas par 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
168a6(brgyad stong): ba 'di nyan pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa

168a8(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ mun ring ba nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang gi yul
168b1(brgyad stong): dang / byang gi phyogs kyi char gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang mo 'di nyan pa dang / 'dri ba dang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
168b2(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang /

168b4(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang gyi yul dang / byang gyi phyogs kyi char byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mang po
168b5(brgyad stong): zhing shin tu mang bar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de dag mang mod kyi mang po de dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyen pa dang / 'dri ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /

168b8(brgyad stong): bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur/ bag tsha bar mi 'gyur/ bag 'khums par mi 'gyur/ yid phyir phyogs par mi 'gyur/ dngang bar mi 'gyur/ kun tu
169a1(brgyad stong): skrag par mi gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni ches nyung
169a2(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ yun ring po nas theg pa la yang dag par zhugs par rig par bya'o// de dag ni sngon gyi de bzhin
169a3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su 'brang zhing / yongs su dris pa dang / yongs su zhus dang / yongs su dri ba byas shing /
169a4(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis sngon gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
169a5(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams la mchod pa yin no// de dag ni tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ro// de dag ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
169a6(brgyad stong): 'di nyid las brtsams te/ skye bo mang po'i don byed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag la nga nyid kyis/ thams cad
169a7(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i gtam byas so// de dag ni tshe rabs 'phos kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'di
169a8(brgyad stong): nyid la yang dag par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas/ de nyid kyi gtam byed par 'gyur/ de nyid
169b1(brgyad stong): kyi gtam la mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro// de dag la legs par gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur te/ bdud kyis kyang
169b2(brgyad stong): dbye bar byed mi nus na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gzhan dag gis 'dud pa 'am/ sngags kyi sgo nas dbye ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar bla na med pa yang
169b3(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mthu brtan pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dag gis de thos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la dga' ba dang / dang ba
169b4(brgyad stong): dang / rab tu dang ba rgya chen po 'thob par 'gyur ro// de dag gis ni 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la skye bo mang po dag gi dge ba'i rtsa skyed
169b5(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de dag gis ni nga'i mngon sum du tshig 'di skad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na
169b6(brgyad stong): bdag gis srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang / srog chags stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang / srog chags bye ba brgya mang po dang /

170a1(brgyad stong): bskyed pa par bya'o// yang dag par rab tu dbye bar bya'o// rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas par bya'o// slar mi ldog par bya'o zhes smras so//

173a4(brgyad stong): par bya'o// rab 'byor de dag glab pa dang / rgod pa dang / steg cing le ger 'dra bar gyur na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor sems rnam par g.yengs
173a5(brgyad stong): pas kun chub par byed na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rnam par shes pa phan tshun dang ldan pas/ yi ger 'dri na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su
173a6(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// rab 'byor dran pa mi 'thob na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun gzhan gang byed cing yi ger 'dri na// 'di yang bdud kyi las
173a7(brgyad stong): su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor phan tshun co 'dri zhing yi ger 'dri na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor mig g.yeng zhing yi ger 'drin/ 'di yang bdud
173a8(brgyad stong): kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yi ger 'dri ba dag phan tshun tshogs pa dang mi 'thun par gyur na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag
173b1(brgyad stong): gis 'di'i rting mi rnyed ro mi myong ngo zhes stan las langs te 'gro na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las
173b2(brgyad stong): lung ma bstan to zhes sems ma dad pas langs te song na/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor bdag gang du skyes pa'i grong khyer dang / grol rdal gyi ming yang
173b3(brgyad stong): 'dir pa spos/ 'dir bdag gi ming dang rigs kyang 'dir ma smos/ bdag gyi pha ma'i ming dang rigs kyang 'dir ma smos/ bdag gang du skyes pa'i rigs kyang ma smos so snyam nas/
173b4(brgyad stong): de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi nyan par sems shing / de nas 'gro bar sems na/ sems bskyed pa de dag ji snyed kyis de dag ji lta ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur ba// de lta de
173b5(brgyad stong): ltar gang du de dag gis slar rnal 'byor nyid du bya bar 'gyur ba/ bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar yong su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha
173b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di mi nyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur
173b7(brgyad stong): te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// gzhan yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad
173b8(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa 'di spangs shing bor nas/ mdo sde gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed pa ma yin pa nyid/ de dag yongs su btsal bar
174a1(brgyad stong): sems par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang ci ltar 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten
174a2(brgyad stong): las 'das pa'i chos dag la slob par mi 'dod pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dag la nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa de ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
174a3(brgyad stong): la mi slob ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la ma bslabs pas/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos cha dag la nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro//
174a4(brgyad stong): de ltar blo chung ba de dag 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams yang dag pa ci lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i rtsa ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs
174a5(brgyad stong): shing bor nas/ yal ga la 'jug par sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ khyi ni jo bo'i thad nas zan gong bslang ba btang ste/ las byed pa'i mi las zan kham btsal
174a6(brgyad stong): bar sems pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la la dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen
174a7(brgyad stong): pa'i ye shes kyi rtsa ba 'di bor te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma lta bu las snying po sangs rgyas nyid btsal bar sems par
174a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ blo chung ba de dag ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
174b1(brgyad stong): 'di thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed par mi shes te de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spangs shing bor nas de las gzhan pa'i mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyis mngon par ston
174b2(brgyad stong): ba dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag la lhag par kun chub par bya bar sems par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i tshul gyi byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni yal ga dang / lo ma
174b3(brgyad stong): dang / 'dab ma lta bu la zhugs pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ ci ltar gang zag nyan thos kyi theg
174b4(brgyad stong): ba can dag dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dag slob pa de slob pa de ltar bslab par mi bya'o// rab 'byor gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg
174b5(brgyad stong): pa can dag ci ltar slob ce na/ rab 'byor de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o snyam ste/
174b6(brgyad stong): bdag 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba rtsom ste/ rab 'byor yang de ltar
174b7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ 'jig rten thams cad la phan
174b8(brgyad stong): gdags pa'i phyir/ bdag nyid kyang de bzhin nyid la gnas par bya/ sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin nyid la dgod par bya ste/ sems can gyi khams gzhal du med
175a1(brgyad stong): pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o zhes de ltar bslab par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon
175a2(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa'i sbyor ba de ltar brtsam par bya zhing / des rlom sems su yang mi bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ glang po che ma mthong ba'i skyes bu la la zhig glang po che'i
175a3(brgyad stong): kha dog dang dbyibs tshol te/ des mun khung nas glang po che zhig rnyed nas snang ba ga la der brtags so// der brtags nas glang po che'i rjes btsal bar sems shing / glang po che'i rjes
175a4(brgyad stong): las glang po che'i kha dog dang / dbyibs gzung bar sems na rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
175a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
175a6(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di mi shes shing / mi 'dri bar de spangs ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos
175a7(brgyad stong): kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems pa de dag de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang de
175a8(brgyad stong): ngag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu rin po che don tu gnyer ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po mthong nas/ der rin po che dag la mi dpyod
175b1(brgyad stong): cing / mi sems la mi 'jug par/ de rin po che'i rgyur nga lang gi thig rjes kyi nang du tshol bar sems shing / ba lang gyi myig rjes dang / rgya mtsho chen po mtshungs par
175b2(brgyad stong): bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lagaso//
175b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed kyang / ma rtogs shing mi
175b4(brgyad stong): shes pas 'dor bar byed de/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos kyis mngon par ston pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag la brtson pa chung ngus gnas par 'dod pas/
175b5(brgyad stong): btsal bar sems pa de dag ni de lta bu'i tshul du rig par bya'o// gang du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ma brjod par// bdag gcig pu dul ba dang / zhi bar gnas pa dang /
175b6(brgyad stong): 'di ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya ba nyid do zhes bya ba dang / nang du yang dag bzhag pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
175b7(brgyad stong): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par bya'o// tshe 'di nyid la len pa med par zag pa las/ sems yongs su grol bar byas nas/
175b8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes brjod pa de ni/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa zhes bya ste/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
176a1(brgyad stong): de ltar sems bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shig
176a2(brgyad stong): go mchen po bgos pa yin te/ de dag gis nam du yang spro ba chung ngu la sems mi skyed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dab pa de dag ni 'jig rten yongs su 'dren pa 'jig rten gyi don
176a3(brgyad stong): byed pa yin te/ de bas na de dag gis dus rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la legs par bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i
176a4(brgyad stong): theg pa can gang ga dge ba'i rtse ba yongs su ma smin pa blo chung ba/ lhag pa'i bsam pa zhan pa de dag pha rol pa drug dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag mi shes shing khong du ma chud pas/ shes rab
176a5(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs shing bor nas/ mdo sde gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon par ston pa de dag yongs su btsal bar sems te/ rab 'byor gang zag
176a6(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can 'di lta bu'i tshul can de dag gi/ 'di yang bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing 'khan nam/ shing mkhan gyi
176a7(brgyad stong): slob ma zhig rnam par rgyal ba'i khang pa'i tshad du khang pa byed par 'dod / sgrub par 'dod nas/ de nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang gyi tshad dang dkyil 'khor yongasu tshol te/
176a8(brgyad stong): de yongs su tshol bas/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i gzhal med khang mthong ba dang / de de dag gi tshad gzung bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang
176b1(brgyad stong): khang pa'i tshad kyi khang pa byed par 'dod pa dang / sgrub par 'dod pas/ nyi ma dang zla' ba'i gzhal med khang gi tshad gzung bar bya ba yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
176b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar ba'i gang zag byang chub sems
176b3(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa can la la dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di spangs/ shes
176b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su tshol bar sems te/
176b5(brgyad stong): mdo sde gang dag bdag gcig pu dul bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu zhi bar bya'o// bdag gcig pu yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes de ltar mngon par ston pa/ bdag
176b6(brgyad stong): 'ba' zhig dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba thob par byed pa de lta bu'i tshul gyi mdo sde dag/ yongs su tshol zhing de lta bur slob par sems na/ rab
176b7(brgyad stong): 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lag so//
176b8(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig 'khor los sgyur/
177a1(brgyad stong): ba'i rgyal po lnga 'dod par gyur la/ des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthong ste/ mthong nas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i kha dog dang /
177a2(brgyad stong): dbyibs dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra'o zhes mtshan par bzung nas des mkhar gyi rgyal po mthong na/ des mkhar gyi rgyal po de'i kha dog dang / dbyibs
177a3(brgyad stong): dang / gzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mtshan ma ma bzung ste/ bye brag shes par mi nus pas/ 'di skad du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po de ni kha dog dang /
177a4(brgyad stong): dbyibs dang / bzi brjid dang / rdzu 'phrul dang / mtshan ma ma 'di kho na 'dra'o zhes zer na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ gang 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal ba

177a7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bor/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring
177a8(brgyad stong): du byas nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag las/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar sems par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor
177b1(brgyad stong): 'di yang de dag gi bdud kyi las su rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i mdo sde 'di dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos//
177b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su btsal bar bya'o zhes nga mi smra ste/ rab 'byor yang 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/ de byang chub
177b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa/ gang bshad pa de la ma bslabs par/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang
177b4(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mdo sde gzhan dag tu byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub pa de ni dka' ba yin no//
177b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan yon de dag yang dag par gzigs pas/ rnam grangs du mas/ byang chub sems dpa'
177b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang dag par ston/ yang dag par 'god/ yang dag par gzeng bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed/
177b7(brgyad stong): yang dag par 'jug par byed/ yang dag par 'jog par byed de/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
177b8(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang de ci snyam du sems/ gang dag phyir mi ldog pa'i theg pa chen po/ thob cing bsgrubs nas/ de lta bu bor te theg pa dman pa yongs
178a1(brgyad stong): su btsal bar sems na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan

178a3(brgyad stong): thug pa'i bar du bkres pa dang / skem pa zlog pa zhig rnyed la/ des de bor te zhag drug bcu pa'i 'bras can btsal bar sems shing / zhag drug bcu pa'i 'bras can
178a4(brgyad stong): rnyed nas kha zas ro brgya pa bor te/ zhag drug bcu pa'i 'bras can de za bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci skyes bu de mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can yin nam/ rab 'byor

178a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di rnyed nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa btang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
178a7(brgyad stong): pa por// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du byas nas/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dag btsal bar sems shing /
178a8(brgyad stong): mdo sde gang dag nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa mngon par ston pa de dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang thabs mkhas pas btsal bar sems na/ rab 'byor de
178b1(brgyad stong): snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can du rig par bya 'am/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so//

178b3(brgyad stong): bu rin po che rin thang med pa zhig snyed nas/ nor bu rin po che rin thang chung zhing byin chung ba dang lhan cig mtshungs par bya bar sems na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/

178b5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang la la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'od gsal
178b6(brgyad stong): ba rin po che 'di thos rnyed nas/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang mtshungs par bya bar sems par 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las thams
