222b6(brgyad stong): nas/ 'jig rten gyi skyabs su 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor sems sems can gang skye ba'i chos can/ ga ba'i chos can/ rna ba'i chos can/ 'chi ba'i chos can/ mya ngan dang / sna
222b7(brgyad stong): sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa'i chos can gyi sems can de dag/ skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan
222b8(brgyad stong): dang / smre sngags 'don 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa las yongs su thar bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sem
223a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi skyabs su
223a2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/
223a3(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor gang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i med par bya ba'i phyir/ sems
223a4(brgyad stong): can rnams la chos ston te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par
223a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na/ sbyor ba ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das
223a6(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa'o// gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs
223a7(brgyad stong): kyi 'brel pa med pa'o// gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'o// gzugs kyi skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa
223a8(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs kyi sbyor ba med pa'o// gang gzugs pa sbyor ba med pa 'di ni/ gzugs kyi 'brel pa med pa 'di ni/ gzugs sbyor ba med pa'o//
223b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa'o// rnam
223b2(brgyad stong): par shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba
223b3(brgyad stong): med pa dang 'gag pa med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa dang 'gag pa med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i sbyor ba
223b4(brgyad stong): med pa gang yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa'i 'phred ba med pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ rnam par shes pa'i sbyor ba med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na/ chos thams cad ni sbyor ba
223b5(brgyad stong): med pa/ 'brel pa'o zhes rnam par shes pas mthong bas sbyor ba med par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang
223b6(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gnas su 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na
223b7(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'jig rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi pha rol gang yin pa de ni/
223b8(brgyad stong): gzugs ma yin/ rab 'byor pha rol ci lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin te/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam dang / 'byor rnam par shes pa'i pha rol gang
224a1(brgyad stong): yin pa de ni/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ rab 'byor pha rol ci lta ba bzhin du rnam par shes pa'ang de bzhin te/ rab 'byor gzugs dang //
224a2(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i pha rol ci lta ba chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan
224a3(brgyad stong): 'das gal te gzugs dang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang // rnam par shes pa'i pha rol ci lta ba chos thams cad kyang de bzhin na/ bcom ldan 'ad
224a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nyid ma lags sam/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
224a5(brgyad stong): 'das 'di la rnam par rtog pa gang yang ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ pha rol gang yin pa de la
224a6(brgyad stong): rnam par rtog pa gang yang med de/ rab 'byor rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis/ chos thams cad mngon par rdzogs
224a7(brgyad stong): bar sangs rgyas pa nyid yin te/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi mchog tu dga' ba byed pa yin no// gang de ltar chos thams
224a8(brgyad stong): cad la nges par sems shing / mngon du yang mi byed/ zhum par yang mi byed par/ 'di ltar bdag cag gyis chos 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par/
224b1(brgyad stong): bya'o// 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas nas/ chos 'di dag bstan par bya'o// rab tu brgad par bya'o//
224b2(brgyad stong): snyam na/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig
224b3(brgyad stong): rten gyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
224b4(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'bab chu'am/ rgya mtsho dag gi nang na phyogs gang chus yongs su bskor ba
224b5(brgyad stong): gyur pa ni/ gling zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du gzugs ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi mi'i mtha' yongs su chad pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
224b6(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor de bzhin du rnam par shes pa ni sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa 'dis/ chos thams cad mngon gyi
224b7(brgyad stong): mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' yongs su chad pa yin no// rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi yongs su chad pa gang yin pa de ni zhi ba'o// 'di ni gya nom pa'o// 'di ni
224b8(brgyad stong): yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o// 'di ni ci lta bzhin no// 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na
225a1(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi gling du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na/
225a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur
225a3(brgyad stong): zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ dus ring
225a4(brgyad stong): po ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs dang / ling tog gyis yongs su khyab pa'i sems can mun pas zil gyis non pa rnams/ shes rab kyis snang bar byed cing / mi shes pa'i mun
225a5(brgyad stong): pa mun nag thams cad sel bar byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
225a6(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par
225a7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi snang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// /
225a8(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rte yongs su 'dren par 'gyur zhe na/ 'byor 'di la byang chub sems
225b1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ gzugs rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang /
225b2(brgyad stong): 'gag pa med par chos ston to// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med
225b3(brgyad stong): par chos ston to// so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba
225b4(brgyad stong): med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pas chos ston to// byang chub
225b5(brgyad stong): sems pa'i chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang
225b6(brgyad stong): 'gag pa med par chos ston to// chos thams cad kyang rang bzhin gyis skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par chos ston to// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
225b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dren par 'gyur ro//
225b8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor ci ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten du
226a1(brgyad stong): 'gyur zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
226a2(brgyad stong): rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig rten la gzugs ni nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang /
226a3(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa yang na mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang nam mkha'i rten can no// zhes 'gro ba med pa/ 'ong
226a4(brgyad stong): ba med pa na mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ ci ltar nam mkha' 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ma byas pa/ rnam par mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par 'das ma byas pa mi gnas
226a5(brgyad stong): pa/ yang dag par mi gnas pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gag pa/ de bzhin rab 'byor chos thams cad kyang 'ong ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ma
226a6(brgyad stong): skyes pa/ rnam par mi 'gyur ba/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ mi gnas pa/ yang dag par mi gnas pa/ sa skyes pa/ ma 'gag pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
226a7(brgyad stong): phyir rnam par mi rtag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba'am 'gro med do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
226a8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni 'ong ba mem 'gro ba med de/ rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid ni 'ong ba
226b1(brgyad stong): 'am/ 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'dir// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan pa med
226b2(brgyad stong): pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni smon pa med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de dag las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni/
226b3(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i rten can te/ de dag ten de las mi 'anga'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor
226b4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni skye ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni rmi lam gyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos
226b5(brgyad stong): thams cad ni bdag gi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni zhi ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams
226b6(brgyad stong): cad ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'byung du med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las 'da'o// rab 'byor
226b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ni 'ong ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni 'gro ba med pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab
226b8(brgyad stong): 'byor chos thams cad ni mi g.yo ba'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni gzugs kyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// 8
227a1(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// rab 'byor tsam/
227a2(brgyad stong): thams cad ni dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi rten can te/ de dag rten de las mi 'da'o// de bas na byang chub sems
227a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i rten can no zhes chos ston to//
227a4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ 'jig gyi rten du 'gyur/
227a5(brgyad stong): ba yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di su dag gyis 'tshal bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
227a6(brgyad stong): pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du spyad
227a7(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par
227a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bu zab mo 'di 'chas
227b1(brgyad stong): par 'gyur ba de dag gi ngo bo nyid ci lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor byang chung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag/ shes rab
227b2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ba de dag ni/ 'dul ba las byung ba dben pa'i rang bzhin can no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang
227b3(brgyad stong): chub chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ci de lta bu'i rten can kho nar 'gyur ba dang / rten de dag nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can
227b4(brgyad stong): dag la yang rten 'di nyid ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur lags sam/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe
227b5(brgyad stong): ldan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byo char de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/
227b6(brgyad stong): 'di lta bu'i rten can du 'gyur ba dang / rten 'di dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can dag la rten 'di dag ston par 'gyur zhing / de dag de ltar
227b7(brgyad stong): sems can rnams kyi rten du 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
227b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can gzhal du med pa grangs med pa dag gi rten du 'gyur ro// rab 'byor kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das sems can
228a1(brgyad stong): / gzhal du ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dag/ yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes/ go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems/
228a2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni/ dka' ba bgyid pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab
228a3(brgyad stong): 'byor de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ sems can gzhal du med pa dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla'o zhes gang gis go cha 'di bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
228a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni dka' ba byed pa'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha de ni/ gzugs dang 'brel
228a5(brgyad stong): ba yang ma yin/ gzugs kyi don tu 'brel pa yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang 'brel ba yang ma
228a6(brgyad stong): yin/ rnam par shes pa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa dang 'brel yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
228a7(brgyad stong): dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don tu 'brel pa
228a8(brgyad stong): yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// go cha chen po bgos pa'i go cha 'di ni chos thams cad dang ma 'brel pa'o// /
228b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga cha chen po bgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa za' mo pa de/
228b2(brgyad stong): ltar spyod pa des/ gnas gsu la re bar mi bgyi ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di ska ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o//
228b3(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na 'di skad du/
228b4(brgyad stong): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la de ltar spyod pa des/ gnas gsum la re bar
228b5(brgyad stong): mi bya ste/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sa'o zhes zer/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
228b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo pa de ltar spyod pa/ de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la re ba 'di ni/
228b7(brgyad stong): gan med cing go skabs med do// 'on kyang gang gis sems can thams thad kyi don du go cha chen po bskos pa ni/ sangs rgyas kyi sa nyid la re bar bya'o// rab
228b8(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab ste/ da ni sus kyang sgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ de ni gang gis kyang sgoms
229a1(brgyad stong): par ma gyur/ gang gis kyang bsgom par mi byed// gis kyang sgom par bar mi 'gyur/ sgom par bgyi ba cung zad ma mchis/ gang du bsgom par
229a2(brgyad stong): bgyi ba yang mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 'dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la chos gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o//
229a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni nam mnakha' sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes kyi pha rol tu phyin
229a4(brgyad stong): pa sgom pa 'di ni/ chos thams cad sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin sgom pa 'di ni/ ma chag pa sgom pa lags so//
229a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ mtha' yas pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
229a6(brgyad stong): phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ dngos po ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa 'di ni/ yongs su gzung ba
229a7(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa sgom pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor pa 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin/
229a8(brgyad stong): de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zang po'i gnas pas/ gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med/
229b1(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bdag par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi /
229b2(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di mngon par chags par mi byed pa dang / 'di ltar gzhan gyis smras pa dang / gzhan gyis bgros pa dag la mngon par mi byed pa dang / 'di ltar byang
229b3(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// pha rol gyi dad pa'i phyir mi 'brang ba dang / rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi
229b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi 'god/ kun tu mi zhum/ mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur/ nem nur mi byed/ the tsomi mi
229b5(brgyad stong): ba/ rmongs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtogs par byed mos par byed/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthong ba dang / thos par dga' bas na/ rab 'byor 'dis sngon gyi
229b6(brgyad stong): mthar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dris par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad
229b7(brgyad stong): pa la mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po/ ga shes
229b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la mi dngang / kun tu me skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gis/ des shes rab kyi
230a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa bye brag du brtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'ad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis/
230a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bye brag du rtags pa yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar thams
230a3(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud bye brag tu brtags pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nam mkha' la gzhol ba'i rgyud dang / rab 'byor
230a4(brgyad stong): nam mkha' la 'bab pa dang / rab 'byor nam mkha' la phyogs pa'i rgyud kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud bye brag du brtags pa yin no// rab 'byor yang
230a5(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gzhol ba'i rgyud kyis/ bye brag du brtags pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ bye brag du brtags pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
230a6(brgyad stong): ni gzhal du med pa'o// rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni tshad ma med pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan du med pa dang / tshad med pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba ma
230a7(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ thob pa ma yin/ mngon par rtog pa ma yin/ khong du chud pa ma yin/ lam ma yin/ lam gyi 'dra
230a8(brgyad stong): bu ma yin/ yi ge ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ 'jig pa ma yin/ 'byung ba ma yin/ 'grib pa ma yin/ 'gag pa ma yin/ sgom pa ma yin/ rnam par
230b1(brgyad stong): sgom pa ma yin te/ sus kyang ma byas/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs/ gang du yang mi 'gro/ yul gang du yang mi gnas/ phyogs gang du yang mi gnas te/ gzhan du na gzhal da med
230b2(brgyad stong): pa/ tshad ma med pa bya de lta bu'i grangs su 'gro'o// nam mkha' gzhal du med pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gzhal du med pa ste/ gzhal du med pa gang yin pa de ni/ sus
230b3(brgyad stong): kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus te/ gzugs kyis yin/ tshor bas ma yin/ 'du shes kyis ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyis ma yin/ rnam par shes pas
230b4(brgyad stong): ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin/
230b5(brgyad stong): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pas ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs nyid tham
230b6(brgyad stong): cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba nyid dang / 'du shes nyid dang / 'du byed rnams nyid dang / rab 'byor rnam par shes pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rab 'byor/
230b7(brgyad stong): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / brtson 'grus kyi
230b8(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid dang / rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// de nas lha rnams kyi
231a1(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa nyid dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa yang gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang /
231a2(brgyad stong): bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo zos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byas
231a3(brgyad stong): nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi mched kyi
231a4(brgyad stong): bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na sprod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
231a5(brgyad stong): phyin pa ni zab pa'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gting dpag dka' ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni blta bar dka'
231a6(brgyad stong): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rtogs par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang 'di gzigs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
231a7(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa ni/ brtson
231a8(brgyad stong): ba'i chung ba la thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa la gzhol bar ma mdad// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang
231b1(brgyad stong): po brgya byin dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / mi mched kyi 'dag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 6
231b2(brgyad stong): bu dag de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin/ lha'i bu dag kye ma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab pa'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gting dpag
231b3(brgyad stong): dka' ba'o// lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni blta dka' ba'o// lce'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni rtogs par dka' ste/ don gyi dbang
231b4(brgyad stong): 'di gzigs nas kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
231b5(brgyad stong): par sangs rgyas ma thag tu byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa na/ kye ma chos zab mo 'di ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so snyam pas/ brtson pa chung ba la
231b6(brgyad stong): thugs gzhol bar mdzad de/ chos bstan pa la gzhol bar ma mdzad do// e ma'o chos zab mo 'di ni ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te gang du sus kyang mngon
231b7(brgyad stong): par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur/ su yang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba 'di ni chos kyi zab pa yin no// nam
231b8(brgyad stong): mkha' zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// bdag zab pa'i phyir chos 'di zab bo// chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa'i phyir chos 'di zab po// chos thams cad 'gro ba med
232a1(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir ngas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos 'di zab yin no// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lharnam
232a2(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to//
232a3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to/ bde bar gshegs pa rmad du byung ba'o// bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun par bstan te/ bcom ldan
232a4(brgyad stong): 'das chos thams cad mi bzung ba'i srad du chos 'di bstan pa lags na/ 'jig rten dag ni 'dzin pa la spyod do// // 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad
232a5(brgyad stong): stong pa las// lha'i le'u zhes bya ste// bco'i lnga pa'o// / bam po bcwo lnga// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
232a6(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma chos bstan pa 'di ni chos thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di ni gang la yang
232a7(brgyad stong): thogs pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kye ma nam mkha' dang mtshungs pas/ gnas thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa'i srad du/ chos 'di ni thogs pa ma mchis
232a8(brgyad stong): ba'i mtshan nyid de// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnyis su ma mchis pa'i srad du/ chos 'di ni mtshung ba ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgol bas
232b1(brgyad stong): mchis pa'i srad du/ chos 'di ni de zla ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid do// bcom ldan 'das kye ma mngon par grub pa ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni gnas ma mchis pa'o//
232b2(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kye ma skye ba thams cad skye ba thams cad skye ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ chos 'di ni 'byung ba mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kye ma lam thams cad mi
232b3(brgyad stong): dmigs pa'i srad du/ chos 'di ni lam ma mchis pa'o// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang /
232b4(brgyad stong): gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos/ 'phags pa gnas
232b5(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor 'di ni rjes su mthun par skyes pa lags so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gnas brtan rab 'byor 'di 'di ni 'di ltar chos gang dang gang
232b6(brgyad stong): kho nar ston pa'i chos de dang / de nyid stong pa nyid las brtsams te/ ston pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
232b7(brgyad stong): mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu dag gang 'di skad du gnas
232b8(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su mthun par skyes so zhes smras pa ni/ ma skyes pa'i phyir gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs
233a1(brgyad stong): @pa'i rjes su mthun par skyes te/ gnas brtan rab 'byor na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// ciskar de bzhin gshegs
233a2(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid 'ong ba med/ song ba ya med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'ong ba med/ song ba yang med de/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab
233a3(brgyad stong): 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba'o// gnas brtan rab 'byor ni dang po nyid nas de ba bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu song
233a4(brgyad stong): ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang
233a5(brgyad stong): yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni//
233a6(brgyad stong): gnas gartan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid do// gnas gartan rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba ste/ de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so//
233a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song ba'o// de ltar na/ gnas gtan rab 'byor de bzhin gsheg
233a8(brgyad stong): pa'i rjes su skyes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi gnas pa gang yin pa'i gnas pa des/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
233b1(brgyad stong): rjes su skyes pa'o// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa
233b2(brgyad stong): med pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur ba med pa dang / rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med
233b3(brgyad stong): pa'o// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor yang de bzhin nyid des 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par 'gyur ba med pa dang / rtog pa med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pas/
233b4(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'gyur ba med/ rnam par 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog pa
233b5(brgyad stong): med de/ gang la yang thogs pa med pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyang 'gyur med/ rnam par 'gyur ba med/ rtog pa med/ rnam par rtog
233b6(brgyad stong): pa med de/ gang la yang thogs pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin
233b7(brgyad stong): ba'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gcig ste/ gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar medado// gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gang du yang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang du
233b8(brgyad stong): las kyang de bzhin nyid ma yin/ gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin te/ gang phyir de ni gang gi yang de bzhin nyid ma yin pa des na/ de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su med ste//
234a1(brgyad stong): gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gsheg/
234a2(brgyad stong): pa'i rjes su skyes te/ ma byas pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni/ nam mkha' de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur ro// gang gi phyir de nam yang de bzhin nyid ma yin par mi
234a3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid de ni gnyis su de gnyis su med pa'i de bzhin nyid ni gnyis su byar med do// de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ de bzhin gsheg
234a4(brgyad stong): pa'i rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid rnam pa thams cad du chos thams cad du chos thams cad la mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ gnas brtan rab 'byor
234a5(brgyad stong): gyi de bzhin nyid kyang thams cad du/ chos thams cad la mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog go// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rab 'byor ni de bzhin nyid kyis mngon par sprul
234a6(brgyad stong): pa ste/ 'di gnyi ga yang bskal pa ma yin zhing tha mi dad pa ste/ tha dad par byed pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes
234a7(brgyad stong): su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid ni/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin du rab
234a8(brgyad stong): 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid kyang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin la chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid las gzhan ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni/ gang gi yang
234b1(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid ma yin par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin nyid ni chos thams kyi de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid de las gnas brtan rab 'byor gyis gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis
234b2(brgyad stong): rjes su song bar khas blangs te/ 'dir 'ga' zhig 'ga' zhig tu rjes su song bar khas blangs pa yang med do// de ltar na gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
234b3(brgyad stong): rjes su skyes so// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'das ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid
234b4(brgyad stong): kyang 'das pa ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa ma yin/ da ltar byung ba ma yin te/ de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor de bzhin nyid de'i rjes su song bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
234b5(brgyad stong): rjes su skyes pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes sa spong ngo // 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
234b6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin
234b7(brgyad stong): nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshe
234b8(brgyad stong): pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da skar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ngo //
235a1(brgyad stong): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / daltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ste/ de ltar na/ gnas
235a2(brgyad stong): brtan rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de
235a3(brgyad stong): gnyis su byar med do// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang / rab 'byor gyi de bzhin nyid 'di ni gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// bcom ldan 'das
235a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i de bzhi nyid gang yin pa de nyid ni bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
235a5(brgyad stong): ba'i de bzhin nyid de de bzhin nyid gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
235a6(brgyad stong): rgyas par gyur pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming 'thob par 'gyur ba de ni/ de bzhin nyid 'di yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid 'di bstan pa de'i tshe na
235a7(brgyad stong): yang / de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba bzhin du sa chen po 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug dang / ltas
235a8(brgyad stong): chen po bco brgyad du 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg
235b1(brgyad stong): 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/ rab tu chem ches/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro// gzhan
235b2(brgyad stong): yang gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis lha'i bu de dag la smras pa/ lha'i bu dag de lta na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshogs pa'i rjes su skyes so// gzhan
235b3(brgyad stong): yang gnas brtan rab 'byor ni/ gzugs kyi rjes su ma skyes te/ tshor ba'i ma yin/ 'du shes kyi ma yin/ 'du byed rnams kyi ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i rjes
235b4(brgyad stong): su ma skyes so// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes te/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i ma yin/ dgra bcom pa'i
235b5(brgyad stong): 'bras bu'i rjes su ma skyes so// rang sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes/ sangs rgyas nyid kyi rjes su ma skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar gang gis rjes su skye
235b6(brgyad stong): ba dang / gang rjes su skye ba'i chos de dag ni yang dag par yod pa ma yin zhing nye bar mi dmigs so// de ltar na/ gnas brtan rab 'byor ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
235b7(brgyad stong): rjes su skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo
235b8(brgyad stong): lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin//
236a1(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid 'di ni spyod pa zab mo yin no// de bzhin nyid bstan pa 'di bshad pa na yang / dge slong sum brgya len pa
236a2(brgyad stong): med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// dge slong ma lnga brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdug med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha'i bu lnga stong
236a3(brgyad stong): sngon yongs su sbyang ba byas pa dag gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems/ drug bcu len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par
236a4(brgyad stong): grol lo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra da ti'i bus/ byang sems dpa' de rnams len par med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar shes nas/
236a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 'di rnams len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par
236a6(brgyad stong): grol ba'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rkyen ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas lnga brgya
236a7(brgyad stong): la bsnyen bkur byas shing / thams cad du yang sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gan dag bskyed de
236a8(brgyad stong): de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur to// sha ri'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
236b1(brgyad stong): 'di dag gi las stong pa nyid dam/ mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa 'am/ smon pa med pa yin mod kyi/ de ltar na de dag thabs mkhas pa dang ma ldan pa'i phyir/ yang /
236b2(brgyad stong): dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byas nas/ nyan thos kyi sar nges par byung gi/ sangs rgyas kyi sar ni ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ 'dab chags bya zhig
236b3(brgyad stong): gi lus dpag tshad brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad nyis brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad sum brgya pa la/ dpag tshad bzhi brgya pa 'am/ dpag tshad lnga brgya pa tsam du gyur pa zhig yod de/
236b4(brgyad stong): de sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i nang na 'dug pa las/ 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir 'gro'o snyam du sems shing / shA ri'i bu 'dab chags bya de 'dab ma ma skyes pa'am/ 'dar ma
236b5(brgyad stong): byi bar 'gyur pa 'am/ 'dab ma bcad par gyur pa la/ des 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gnas par bya'o snyam du bsams te/ sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris nas
236b6(brgyad stong): bdag nyid mchongs te/ 'dab chags bya de de nas lhung ba dang / nam mkha'i bar snang la gnas pa'i bar der 'di snyam du/ kye ma'o bdag phyir sum bcu rtsa gsum
236b7(brgyad stong): pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par bya'o bsnyam du sems na/ sha ri'i bu de ci snyam du sems/ ci 'dab chags bya des phyir sum bcu rtsa gsus pa'i lha'i nang du gnas par/
236b8(brgyad stong): nas sam// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ri'i bu gal te 'di snyam
237a1(brgyad stong): du kye sa bdag ni ma sbas pa snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par bya'o snyam na/ sha ri'i bu de ci snyam du sems/ ci 'dab chags bya
237a2(brgyad stong): de ma smas ma snad par 'dzam bu'i gling du gnas par 'gyur ram/ sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das de 'dzam bu'i
237a3(brgyad stong): gling du lhung na sbas shing snang bar 'gyur to// de 'gum pa 'am/ 'gum pa la thug pa tsam gyi sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
237a4(brgyad stong): 'di ltar legs te/ kang gi lus kyang chen por gyur pa dang / 'dab ma yang ma mchis par gyur pa dang / mthon po zhig nas kyang lhung bar gyur pa'i slad du'o// de skad
237a5(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu'i la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i
237a6(brgyad stong): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ skal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
237a7(brgyad stong): snyed du gnas shing / sbyin pa byin/ tshul khrims bsrungs/ bzod pa bsgrubs/ brtson 'grus brtsams/ bsam gtan la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de
237a8(brgyad stong): cher yang dag par zhugs par gyur cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar de'i sems cher bskyed par
237b1(brgyad stong): gyur kyang / gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dis yongs su ma zin cing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur na/ 'di ltar nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas/
237b2(brgyad stong): kyi sar ltung ngo // sha' ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi tshul khrims
237b3(brgyad stong): de dang / shes rab de dang / rnam par grol de dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa de la mtshan ma'i tshul gyis sems shing / 'dzin par byed pa des ni/ de bzhin
237b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims mi shes/ mi shes mi mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin ma yin/ shes rab ma yin//
237b5(brgyad stong): rnam par grol ba ma yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa mi shes/ mi
237b6(brgyad stong): mthong ngo // des ma shes ma mthong bas/ stong pa nyid kyi sgra nyan cing / des sgra de la mtshan mar byed de/ des sgra de mtshan mar byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag
237b7(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa de'i phyir/ 'di ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o//
237b8(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ri'i bu gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral bar gyur pa de ni 'di ltar 'gyur ro// sha ri'i
238a1(brgyad stong): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ci ltar bshad pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' gang bsod nams kyi/
238a2(brgyad stong): tshogs shin tu mang po dang ldan du lags kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung la/ thabs mkhas pa dang bral zhing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen
238a3(brgyad stong): dang ma ldan par gyur na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'thob pa la the tsom du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dang
238a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par
238a5(brgyad stong): bgyi zhing / thabs mkhas pa la yang brtson par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
238a6(brgyad stong): sha ri'i bu de de bzhin no/ de de bzhin te/ sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing
238a7(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba ni bsod nams kyi tshogs mang po dang ldan yang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral bar gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238a8(brgyad stong): bya'i chub 'thob pa ni the tsom du 'gyur ro// sha ri'i bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
238b1(brgyad stong): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang yang ldan par bya'o// de nas lha rnams kyi/
238b2(brgyad stong): dbang po brgya byin 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pa dang / mi mched kyi bdag po tshangs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan
238b3(brgyad stong): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
238b4(brgyad stong): ni 'byung bar dka'o// bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas bcom ldan
238b5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis dbang po brgya byin la stsogs pa 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la stsogs pa gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams
238b6(brgyad stong): la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
238b7(brgyad stong): byang chub kyang 'byung bar dka' ste/ shes rab 'chal pa dang / brtson 'grus dman pa dang / mos pa dman pa dang / thabs mi mkhas pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs
238b8(brgyad stong): po la sten pa rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba shin tu 'byung bar dka'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe

239a5(brgyad stong): du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad stong pa lag pa'i slad du/ chos gang mon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar nus pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so//
239a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang spang bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ chos bstan pa'i chos de yang ma mchis so// de bzhin
239a7(brgyad stong): du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba gang lags pa dang / mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba gang lags pa
239a8(brgyad stong): dang / 'tshal ba gang lags pa dang / 'tshal bar bgyi ba gang lags pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni stong pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs 'dis kyang bdag ni 'di
239b1(brgyad stong): snyam du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ni 'byung bar sra ba lags te/ 'byung dka' ba ni ma lags so zhes sems so//

240a1(brgyad stong): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'cha

243b1(brgyad stong): ba'i chos de gang yin// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa gang zhig
243b2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor kyi bshad pa ltar na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las gang phyir ldog pa'i chos de gang yang med do// tshe dang
243b3(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'i gang zag gsum po dag yin pa 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yin na/ ji ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
243b4(brgyad stong): kyis bstan pa ltar na ni/ gsum po dag gi rnam par gzhag pa yod par mi 'gyur gyi/ theg pa gcig kho nar 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi theg pa byang chub sem
243b5(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gnas brtan rab 'byor nyan
243b6(brgyad stong): thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yod par khas mi len nam/ re shig gnas brtan che/

243b8(brgyad stong): yang ci khyod nyan thos kyi theg pa can nam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can nam/ theg pa chen po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gcig kyang yod par khas mi len tam/ rab
243b9(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu yang ci//

244a8(brgyad stong): ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de bzhin nyid la rab tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams khyad par med pa dang / bye brag med pa dang / tha dad da byar med/

251a3(brgyad stong): dge sbyong gyi cha byad du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gan du 'ongs nas 'di skad ces zer te/ gang khyod kyis sngon thos pa de phyir bshag

251a5(brgyad stong): ba de lta na/ nga khyod kyi gan du yang dang yang 'ong ngo // gang khyod kyis da ltar thos pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin te/ 'di ni snyan dngags byed pas rang
251a6(brgyad stong): bzor byas pa'o// yang gang nga 'chad pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ste/ 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka'o zhes zer ba thos nas/ gal te byang chub sems
251a7(brgyad stong): dpa' 'khrug cing g.yo na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis lung ma bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni bla na
251a8(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa ma yin zhing / 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i khams la gnas pa ma yin par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang gal
251b1(brgyad stong): te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bdud sdig can las tshig 'di dag thos nas kyang mi 'khrug mi g.yo zhing / de chos nyid rton te/ mi skye ba nyid
251b2(brgyad stong): dang / mi 'gag pa nyid dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa nyid la rton cing / gzhan gyi dad pa'i phyir mi 'gro zhing / rab 'byor dper na/ dge sbyong dgra bcom pa
251b3(brgyad stong): zag pa zad pa gzhan gyi dad pa'i phyir mi 'brang ste/ chos nyid la mngon gsum du byed cing / bdad sdig can gyis mi 'phrogs pa de bzhin du/ rab 'byor phyir
251b4(brgyad stong): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos kyi theg pa can rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi gang zag dag gis mi rdzi ba yin te/ nyan thos
251b5(brgyad stong): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar phyir mi ldog pa'i chos can du 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges shing / rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzhol bar
251b6(brgyad stong): 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi tshe/ phyir mi ldog pa'i khams la gnas par gyur pa de'i tshe/ gzhan gi
251b7(brgyad stong): dring la mi 'jog par 'gyur ba yin no// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
251b8(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni/ yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// // bam po bcu drug pa//
252a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnad la la 'ongs nas 'di skad ces zer te/
252a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di ni 'khor ba'i spod pa yin te/ khyod 'di nyid du sdug bsngal mthar phyung la/ phyir 'khor ba ni spod pa'i sdug bsngal
252a3(brgyad stong): dang / yid mi bde ba dag myong bar ma byed cig/ kye ma ma la re shig 'di nyid du khyod kyi phung po 'di mngon par grub par mi 'gyur bar yang khyod phung po
252a4(brgyad stong): gzhan yongs su bzung bar sems pa lta ga la srid ces zer ba la/ gal te mi 'khrug/ mi g.yon/ bdud sdig can bdag nyid der 'ongs nas de la 'di
252a5(brgyad stong): skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis skal pa gang gi'i klung gyi bye ma snyed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la chos
252a6(brgyad stong): gos dang / bsod snyom dang / mal stan dang / snyan gyi gsos sman dang / yo byad dag gis rim 'gro byas pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan gang
252a7(brgyad stong): ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed dag gi drung du/ tshangs pa spyod pa spyad pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag pa bsnyen bkur byas
252a8(brgyad stong): shing / byang chub sems pa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi phyir/ ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag gis gnas par bya zhes yongs su zhus/
252a9(brgyad stong): yong su dris/
252b1(brgyad stong): yongs su dri ba byas te/ ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas par bya ba de ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag gis bstan pa de bzhin
252b2(brgyad stong): du gnas/ de bzhin du spyad de bzhin du rnal 'byor du byas kyang / de dag gis da dang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sad
252b3(brgyad stong): ma rgyas te/ de ltar gdoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa la gnas shing / de ltar bsrabs pas kyang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su ma thob na/ yang
252b4(brgyad stong): khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur zhes byas kyang / gal te de lta bus kyang mi 'khrug/ mi g.yo' na/ bdad sdig
252b5(brgyad stong): can gyis sa phyogs de nyid du/ dge slong dag mngon par sprul nas/ 'di skad ces zer te/ 'di ltar dge slong dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ gang dag yin
252b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di dag ni/ byang chub tu zhugs par gyur pa las/ da ltar dgra bcom pa nyid thob cing / dgra bcom pa nyid la gnas pa yin na/ khyod kyis bla na med pa
252b7(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par ga la 'gyur zhes/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la de skad bshad/ de skad bstan kyang //
252b8(brgyad stong): sems mi 'khrug/ maM g.yo na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
253a1(brgyad stong): gzung bar bya'o// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i 'bral bar byed pa'i tshig rnams gzhan las thos
253a2(brgyad stong): nas/ sems chos nyid las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/ de'i yid phyir ldog par mi 'gyur/ de'i sems gzhan du mi 'gyur zhing / bdud kyi las
253a3(brgyad stong): de dag thams cad de ltar shes na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gang de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa dag la spyod pa'i de thams cad
253a4(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid mi 'thob par 'gyur ba/ 'di ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de ltar spyod cing /
253a5(brgyad stong): de ltar slob ste/ de bzhin gshegs pas ci ltar gsungs pa'i spyod pa de dang ma bral ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral
253a6(brgyad stong): ba la/ bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyes par 'gyur ba/ de ni gnas ma yin zhing go skabs med do// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
253a7(brgyad stong): de bdud kyi las rnams khong du chud cing / 'bral bar byed pa'i tshig rnams gzhan las thos nas yongs su mi nyams de'i yid phyir mi ldog/ sems gzhan du
253a8(brgyad stong): mi 'gyur te/ bdud kyi las de dag de ltar shes na/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
253b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
253b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ni/ gzugs kyi 'du shes mngon par 'du byed pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'du shes skyed pa ma yin//
253b3(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba'i 'du shes ma yin/ 'du shes kyi 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed nams kyi 'du shes ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes mngon
253b4(brgyad stong): par 'du byed pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes skyed pa ma yino// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
253b5(brgyad stong): chen po ni/ rang gyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/ chos rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/ chos de yang mi dmigs shing mngon par
253b6(brgyad stong): 'du mi byed/ mi skyed do// de bas na mi skye ba'i ye shes kyi bzod pa can zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag
253b7(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rab
253b8(brgyad stong): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du/ bdad sdig can dge slong kyi cha byad du bsgyur te nye bar 'ongs nas/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
254a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ 'dun pa zlog par byed de/ 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen nyin ni na mkha' dang mtshungs so// 'di lta ste/
254a2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos 'di ni med pa'o// 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba'i chos 'di ni yod pa ma yin pa ste/ su zhig de la shes
254a3(brgyad stong): par 'gyur/ su zhig de la mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ des gang yang nges par mi 'byung ste/ gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
254a4(brgyad stong): gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / gang shes par byed pa dang / gang shes par bya ba'i chos de dag thams cad na mkha' dang mtshungs te/ khyod
254a5(brgyad stong): ni don med par nyon mongs so// 'di lta ste/ bra na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o// 'dad kyi las su bstan te/
254a6(brgyad stong): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa ma yin no zhes zer zhing / gang 'bral bar byed pa 'di ni bdud kyi las yin no zhes rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu ba des de ltar shes par/

254a8(brgyad stong): rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// yang bla na med pa yang dag par
254b1(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa gzung bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rang/
254b2(brgyad stong): 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa dag las ldog cig/ thams cad mkhyen
254b3(brgyad stong): pa nyid la 'jug par 'gyur ba yin no// de dag 'dod na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa dang / de
254b4(brgyad stong): bzhin du bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug ste/ de bsam gtan bzhi po de dag la gnas shing / gsam gtan la yongs su 'dris par byed do// de bsam
254b5(brgyad stong): gtan dag la snyoms par 'jug kyang / bsam gtan gyi dbang gyis mi skye zhing / yang de nyid 'dod pa na spyod pa'i chos rnams la gnas par byed de/ rab 'byor 'di yang
254b6(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i mtshan nyid du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i sems dpa'
254b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po ni/ ming ched cher byed pa ma yin/ grags pa dang / skra dang / tshigs su bcad pa ched cher byed pa ma yin te/ ming la chags par mi byed do//
254b8(brgyad stong): de sems mi 'khrug cing / sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te de 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba nas sems 'khrul pas mi 'gro// sems 'khrul
255a1(brgyad stong): pas mi 'ong ste/ dran bzhin du 'ong / dran bzhin du 'gro'o// de gal te khyim na gnas na yang 'dod pa rnams la/ 'dod pa la mngon par
255a2(brgyad stong): chags pa 'am/ bsam pa lhag par cher mi 'byung ste/ de skyo bar 'du shes pas 'dod pa la yongs su spyod cing / de skrag par 'du shes pas 'dod pa la yongs su spyod
255a3(brgyad stong): do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu zhig chom rkun gyi gnas dgon pa'i nang du song ste/ zas kyi bya ba byed na/ skrag pa'i 'du shes kyis zas kyi bya ba

255a6(brgyad stong): yongs su spyod pa'i 'dod pa de dang / de dag la don tu mi gnyer ba nyid dang / mi rkam pa nyid dang / ma chags pa nyid du yongs su spyod do// 'dod pa'i yon tan

256b7(brgyad stong): sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ bzhon pa dang / skyed mos tshal dang / gtsug lag lag khang dang / gzhal yas khang dang / mche'u dang /
256b8(brgyad stong): mtsho dang / lteng ka dang / rdzing dang / nags tshal dang / kun dka'i ra ba dang / ri'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas gnod sbyin dang /
257a1(brgyad stong): srin po dang / yi dag sa dang / sha za dang / lus srul po dang / grul bum gyi rtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par
257a2(brgyad stong): mi gnas/ zas dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gan
257a3(brgyad stong): srang dang / lam gyi bzhi mdo dang / pong sa dang / tshong du sa dang / bu gzi'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi ga nas/ klu dang / gar dang / snyan
257a4(brgyad stong): pa brjod pa dang / bro rdung ba dang / rol mo 'khan gyi tam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ rgya mtsho dang / chu bo dang / gling gyi rnam gyi sbyor
257a5(brgyad stong): ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ chos dang 'gal ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ so so'i skye bo la dga'
257a6(brgyad stong): ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ gzhan du na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson
257a7(brgyad stong): par gnas shing / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma bral bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni thab mo dang / 'tshang 'bru ba dang / rtsod pa dang /
257a8(brgyad stong): rgol ba'i gtam gyi sbyor ba dang / rjes su sbyor ba la brtson par mi gnas/ de dag ni chos 'dod pa kho nar 'gyur te/ chos ma ma yin pa 'dod par mi 'gyur/ de/
257b1(brgyad stong): dag mi 'byed pa rjod pa smra bar 'gyur te/ 'byed pa rjod pa smra bar mi 'gyur/ de dag ni mdza' bar 'dod pa yin te/ mi mdza' bar 'dod pa ma yin/ de dag ni chos
257b2(brgyad stong): smra bar 'gyur te/ chos ma yin pa smra bar mi 'gyur/ de dag ni de bzhin gshegs mthong ba kho nar 'dod pas re bar byed/ de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/ gang de
257b3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag gi drung du/ nye bar skye bar bya ba'i phyir sems bskyed
257b4(brgyad stong): cing / de dag 'dod na der nye bar skyes te/ de dag de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bya ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// rab
257b5(brgyad stong): 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dag las shi 'phos pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha
257b6(brgyad stong): dag las shi 'phos pa dang / gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha dag las shi 'phos nas/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi yu gyi dbus 'di nyid kyi nang na/ mi dag sgyu rnal la mkhas
257b7(brgyad stong): pa/ snyan dngags la mkhas pa/ sngags dag la mkhas pa/ rig pa dag la mkhas pa/ bstan chos dag la mkhas pa/ mtshan ma dag la mkhas pa/ chos kyi don
257b8(brgyad stong): la mkhas pa dag yod par skye ste/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo dag tu skye ba ni nyung ngo // phal cher yul gyi dbus su skye'o// gang dag mtha' 'khob kyi skye bo'i nang du skyes
258a1(brgyad stong): pa de dag kyang / grong khyer chen po'i nang du skyes te/ de dag la yang yon tan 'di dag yod do// rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de/
258a2(brgyad stong): dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems chen po// yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung
258a3(brgyad stong): bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du bdag phyir mi ldog pa 'am/ phyir mi ldog pa me yin
258a4(brgyad stong): ba snyam du mi sems te/ de ni 'di ltar rang gi sa la the tsom mi skye/ som nyid mi byed/ de kun tu zhum par yang mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ rgyun
258a5(brgyad stong): tu zhugs pa ni rang gis rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la nem nar mi byed/ the tsom mi za ba de bzhin du rab 'byor phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
258a6(brgyad stong): chen po// yang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i sa la nem nur mi byed/ the tsom mi za/ som nyir mi byed/ de rang gi sa la de kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur ro// bdud kyi las
258a7(brgyad stong): skyes shing / byung ba rnams kyang myur du rig cing / de dag bdud kyi las skyes shing / byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gro'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes
258a8(brgyad stong): bu zhig gis mtshams med pa byas na/ 'chi ka'i gnas skabs kyi bar du/ mtshams med pa'i sems dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur te/ sems de bsal ba 'am/
258b1(brgyad stong): kanan par mi nus shing / 'chi ka'i dus kyi bar du de'i sems de rjes su 'brang ngo // rab 'byor de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
258b2(brgyad stong): po'i phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang gnas par 'gyur zhing / rang gi phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la mi bskyod par 'gyur te/ de lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig
258b3(brgyad stong): rten gyis kyang bskyod pa 'am/ bsgral bar mi nus so// bdud kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag kyang rig par byed/ de bdad kyi las skyes shing byung ba dag gi dbang
258b4(brgyad stong): du mi 'gro ste/ de rang gi sa la nem nur mi byed cing / the tsom mi byed pas/ tshe 'phos na yang / nyan thos kyi sems dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems mi skye'o//
258b5(brgyad stong): de tshe 'phos nas yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
258b6(brgyad stong): chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang brgya'o snyam nas/ de rang gi sa la gnas shing / de gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'gyur/ rang gyi sa la mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro//
258b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di lta mi 'phrogs pa'i sems dang / mi 'brogs pa'i ye shes kyis gnas pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// gal te yang bdud
258b8(brgyad stong): sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad kyis nye bar 'ongs nas/ 'di skad zer te/ khyod 'di nyid du dgra bcom pa nyid mngon du gyis shig/ khyod ni bla na med pa yang
259a1(brgyad stong): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du lung ma bstan te/ rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag dang ldanam
259a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang ba'i rnam pa de dag med/ rtags
259a3(brgyad stong): de dag med/ mtshan ma de dag med/ de dag yod pa ma yin na/ ci khyod de la spyod dam zhes zer la/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i//
259a4(brgyad stong): sems gzhan du 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
259a5(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par rig par bya'o// gal te yang de 'di snyam du/ kye ma 'di ni 'dud sdig
259a6(brgyad stong): can yin te/ sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ 'ongs pa'am/ bdud kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'am/ bdud kyis sprul pa zhig yin te/ 'di ni de
259a7(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa ma yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ci skad gsung ba de ni bzhin te/ gzhan ma yin no//
259a8(brgyad stong): zhes sems sam/ gal te de 'di snyam du so sor rtog cing / 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma 'di ni bdud sdig can gyis sangs rgyas su byin gyis rlabs te/ bdag
259b1(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las 'bral bar 'dod do snyam la/ rab 'byor gal te bdud sdig can phyir log na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
259b2(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po// 'di ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
259b3(brgyad stong): byang chub tu lung bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa la gnas par rig par bya'o//
259b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnam pa 'di dag dang / rtags 'di dag dang / mtshan ma 'di dag yod na/ rab 'byor ci ltar
259b5(brgyad stong): de la yon tan 'di dag yod pa dang sbyar na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// 'di ni gdon mi za bar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
259b6(brgyad stong): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lung bstan pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpe/
259b7(brgyad stong): sa la gnas pa yin par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa de dag dang /
259b8(brgyad stong): rtag de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang / de dag yod pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub
260a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gzung bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang phyir
260a2(brgyad stong): mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ bdag kyang yang yongs su gtong bar byed/ srog
260a3(brgyad stong): kyang yongs su gtong bar byed do// de'i phyir rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa ni dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir
260a4(brgyad stong): shin tu brtson par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / de ltar byung ba rnams la dga' ba dang / gus pa dang / sar

260a6(brgyad stong): ldan 'das/ 'das pa 'ba' shig gi nges pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dam pa'i chos
260a7(brgyad stong): yongs su gzung ba yang 'di nyid yin/ ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba yang 'di nyid yin te/ de la
260a8(brgyad stong): bdag kyang ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi grangs su bgrang bar gtogs pa'i des na/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
260b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub de la lung bstan te/ 'di ni bdag gis yang dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'o snyam te/ don gyi dbang 'di mthong nas dam pa'i chos yongs su
260b2(brgyad stong): gzung ba'i phyir/ bdag nyid yongs su gtong ba dag byed do// srog yongasu gtong ba dag kyang byed de/ de la zhum par mi 'gyur/ le lo mi byed do// rab 'byor nam
260b3(brgyad stong): pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

260b6(brgyad stong): na chos ston pa la nem nur ma mchis shing / the tsom mi 'tshal ba lags kyi/ nyan thos la ma lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nyan

260b8(brgyad stong): la bzod pa thob pas na/ de'i phyir de chos thams cad kyi chos nyid dang / mi 'gal bar nyan te/ thos nas kyang nem nur mi byed/ the tsom mi za ste/ rab 'byor

261b1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag skal pa

264a1(brgyad stong): / rgya snang du 'dug cing rgyun tu zhug drug nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas kyi bapa la smin pa sbyin par byed cing rab tu 'dzag pa dang rgyal khris kyang yo su rdzog pa/
