300a6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pas yongs su ma bzung zhing / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i sdig pa'i grogs pos yongasu zin pa des//
300a7(brgyad stong): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de las gang yang rung ba gcig re bar bya'o// gal te yang yun ring mo dang / sbyangs shing dul bar
300a8(brgyad stong): gyur nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod par gyur la/
300b1(brgyad stong): gal te de dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsten cing / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag gi thad du rtag par 'gro bar gyur na/ lus yongs su grub pa de nyid kyis
300b2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de dag la rnam par smod par 'gyur/ byang bar byed par 'gyur/ gnong bar 'gyur/ 'dor bar 'gyur/ so sor 'chags par
300b3(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de lta na yang / de'i sangs rgyas kyi sa rnyed par dka' bar 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
300b4(brgyad stong): rlom sems kyi ltung ba'i gnas ni 'di snyed du ches lci ste/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ dge slong nyan thos kyi theg pa can gyi/ nyan thos kyi sa la
300b5(brgyad stong): rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi lci ba yin te/ de las ltung ba bzhan dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba 'ga' zhig byung na/ dge slong ma yin/ dge sbyongs ma yin/
300b6(brgyad stong): shag kya'i sras po ma yin no// ltung ba bzhi po de dag pas kyang rlom sems dang / brnyas pa'i sems bskyed pa de ches lci ste 'di lta ste/ byang chub sem
300b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ming bstan pa las brnyas pa'i mi dge ba chen po'i/ sems bskyed pa byung ba 'di ni ltung ba de dag pas/ sems bskyed
300b8(brgyad stong): pa ches lci bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor rtsa ba'i ltung ba bzhi po lta zhog gi/ rab 'byor mtshams med pa'i las lnga po de dag pas kyang gang 'di byang chub
301a1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ ming ston pas rlom sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'di ni ches lci ste/ mtshams med
301a2(brgyad stong): pa'i las lnga po'i ltung ba dag pas kyang / sems bskyed pa 'di ches lci bar rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar ming bstan pa de lta bus kyang / bdud kyi
301a3(brgyad stong): las phra mo phra ba dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtogs par bya'o// rtogs nas rnam par spang bar bya zhing /
301a4(brgyad stong): gzhan dag kyang khong du chud par byed du gzhug cing / spong du gzhug go// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301a5(brgyad stong): drung du 'ongs nas/ dben pa'i yon tan gyis skul zhing dran par byed do// rab 'byor ci ltar bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301a6(brgyad stong): drung du 'ongs nas/ dben pa'i yon tan gyis skul zhing dran par byed ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la bdud sdig can byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung
301a7(brgyad stong): du 'ong zhing 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni dben pa'i bsngags pa gsung gyis dgon pa dang nags 'dab dang / ri'i phug dang / dur khrod dang /
301a8(brgyad stong): sog ma'i phung po las stsogs pa'i nang du gnas par bya'o zhes zer te/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste// dgon pa dang bas mtha' dang / yul med pa dang / nag 'dab
301b1(brgyad stong): dang / ri'i phug dang / dur khrod dang / sog ma'i phung po la stsogs pa'i gnas mal sna tshogs ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301b2(brgyad stong): dben pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang gal te dgon pa dang bas mtha' dang / yul mi med pa dang / nags 'dab
301b3(brgyad stong): dang / ri'i bug dang / dur khrod dang / sog ma'i phung po la stsogs pa'i gnas mal sna tshogs na gnas pa'i las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
301b4(brgyad stong): dben pa gzhan gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa gzhan ci lta bu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
301b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang
301b6(brgyad stong): ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis dben par gyur/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa de dag gis dben par gyur na/ de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa'
301b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po dben par gnas pa yin no// de grong gi nang na gnas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang / sems can thams cad
301b8(brgyad stong): la byams pa dang / snying rje chen po'i gnas pas gnas te/ gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de ni dben pa nyid du gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor yang ngas byang chub sem
302a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis dben pa 'di gnang ste/ byang chub
302a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa 'dis gnas pas/ nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed na/ dben par gnas pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa'
302a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po/ dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / ri'i phug dang / dur khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal dag na gnas pa 'dis gnas na/ byang chub
302a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben par gnas pa yin no// rab 'byor gang yang bdud sdig can gyis dgon pa dang / nags 'dab dang / ri'i bug dang /
302a5(brgyad stong): dur khrod dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal du gnas pa'i dben pa nye bar bstan pa'i dben pa des/ de nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag
302a6(brgyad stong): dang 'dres pa nyid du gyur pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par mi brtson zhing / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par mi byed de/ de ltar
302a7(brgyad stong): 'dres par gnas pas gnas shing / de ltar yid la byed pa yongs su ma dag pas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag par 'gyur ro// /
302a8(brgyad stong): lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma yin pa gzhan dag/ grong gi nang na gnas
302b1(brgyad stong): kyang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma 'dres shing / shes rab dang / thabs dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pas/ gnas//
302b2(brgyad stong): ba dag la brnyas par sems shing / dgon pa na gnas kyang de'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag cing / 'dres par gnas pa
302b3(brgyad stong): nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ dben par gnas pa ma yin la/ shes rab dang / thabs dang / snying rje chen po la gnas pas/ gnas pa/ grong na gnas pa lus
302b4(brgyad stong): dang ngag dang / yid kyi las yongs su dag par spyod pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis dben par gyur pa/ nyan thos dang /
302b5(brgyad stong): rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma 'dres pa de dag la/ des brnyas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang /
302b6(brgyad stong): rnam par bar pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams thob par mi 'gyur zhing / de'i de dag yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de thabs mi
302b7(brgyad stong): mkhas pa yin pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'brog dgon pa dpag tshad brgya pa gcan zan dang / ri dgas dang / bya'i
302b8(brgyad stong): tshogs med pa/ ri dgas dang gcan gzhan phra mo dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po rjes su rgyu ba med pa/ chom rkun byed pa'i dgon pa 'jigs pa mi bzad pa dang /
303a1(brgyad stong): 'tshe ba med pa dag na/ lo 'am/ lo brgya 'am/ lo stong ngam/ lo bye ba 'am/ lo bye ba brgya 'am/ lo bye ba brgya stong ngam/
303a2(brgyad stong): lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ngam/ de bas kyang lhag par gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dben pa gang du lhag pa'i bsam pas
303a3(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs shing / lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pas gnas pa/ ngas bstan pa'i dben pa'i nga mi shes na/ byang chub sems dpa' thabs
303a4(brgyad stong): mi mkhas pa de mi shes pas/ dgon pa lhur byed cing gnas te/ dben pa de la rten pa dang / zhen pa dang / chags pa dang / lhag par chags pa dang ldan na/
303a5(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// des de tsam gyis nga'i sems mgu bar byas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dben pa
303a6(brgyad stong): 'dis gnas pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi dben par ngas ston pa gang yin pa'i dben pa de la mi snang ngo // de ltar bdud sdig
303a7(brgyad stong): can 'ongs nas/ steng gyi bar snang gyi nam mkha' la 'dug ste/ de la 'di skad du rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub
303a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dben pa bstan pa ni 'di yin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod dben pa 'di nyid kyis gnas par gyis shig dang / de ltar na rigs kyi bu
303b1(brgyad stong): khyod myur du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing / de yang dgon pa'i
303b2(brgyad stong): dben pa des/ grong gyi nang du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzhan nges pa/ dge slong tshangs par spyod pa dang bcas pa/ dge ba'i chos
303b3(brgyad stong): can/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag dang ma 'dres pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba yongasu
303b4(brgyad stong): dag pa dag la/ brnyas par byed cing / de 'di skad du/ kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni 'dres par gnas pas gnas par byed de/ dben par gnas pa ma yin no//
303b5(brgyad stong): kye ma tshe dang ldan pa 'di dag ni kun tu 'dres par gnas pas gnas par byed de/ dben par gnas pas gnas pa ma yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur zhing / byang chub
303b6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ dben par gnas pas gnas pa gang yin pa de dag la 'dres par gnas pas rtsod par byed/ kun tu 'dres par gnas pa/
303b7(brgyad stong): rtsod par byed par 'gyur ro// gang 'dres par gnas pas gnas pa de dag la ni/ de dben par gnas pas kun tu spyod pa yin no zhes zer zhing / de la gus pa/
303b8(brgyad stong): skyed par 'gyur la/ gang la gus pa bskyed par 'os pa de la ni/ nga rgyal skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gnas pa gang gis bdag gnas
304a1(brgyad stong): pa 'di dag ni gnas pa yin te/ bdag ni mi ma yin pa dag gis dran par byas pa yin na/ grong gyi nang na gnas pa su zhig la mi ma yin/
304a2(brgyad stong): ba dag skul bar byed de/ grong gi nang na gnas pa su zhig la mi ma yin pa de dag dran par byed par 'gyur snyam nas/ de ltar de gang zag byang chub sems
304a3(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa'i can dag la brnyas par byed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' gdol bar rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sun 'byin par
304a4(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan du rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' bcos bur rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sre dar
304a5(brgyad stong): rig par bya ste// dge sbyong gyi cha byad du 'chos pa chom rkun pa'o// gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gyi nang na chom rkun pa'o// lha dang bcas pa'i
304a6(brgyad stong): 'jig rten gyi chom rkun pa yin te/ rab 'byor yang gang zag de lta bu'i rang bzhin can ni/ bsnyen par mi bya/ gus par mi bya/ bsnyen bkur mi bya'o//
304a7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zag de lta bu ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal can du ltung bar rig par bya ste/ de lta bu 'dis yang gzhan mthu chung ba/ theg pa la zhugs nas
304a8(brgyad stong): ring por ma lon pa dag la sun 'byin par byed de/ gang zag de lta bu ni rnam par ma dag pa'i chos can du rig par bya/ gang zag de lta bu ni slob dpon dang mi ldan la
304b1(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// gang zag de lta bu ni 'phags pa'i chos dang mi ldan par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang/
304b2(brgyad stong): gis sems can thams cad yongs su ma btang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su ma btang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongasu
304b3(brgyad stong): ma btang ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lhag pa'i bsam pas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
304b4(brgyad stong): bar sangs rgyas par 'dod cing / sems can thams cad kyi don bya bar 'dod pa des/ gang zag de lta bu'i bsnyen par mi bya/ gus par mi bya/ bsnyen
304b5(brgyad stong): bkur mi bya ba ste/ rab 'byor 'on kyang 'di ltar sems can thams cad kyi don du mngon par brtson pas/ bdud kyi las de dag dang / gzhan yang shes par bya/
304b6(brgyad stong): ba'i phyir/ rtag tu sems skyo bar bya'o// lam pa thob pa'i sems can thams cad la lam nye bar bstan pa'i don tu yid mi skrag pa dang / khams gsum
304b7(brgyad stong): pa dang ma 'dres par bya ste/ der yang reg shig byams pa'i yid dang / snying rje'i yid kyis snying rje chen po bskyed de/ snying brtse ba nye bar bzung nas/
304b8(brgyad stong): yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams la dga' ba'i sems dang mi dmigs pa'i chos nyid kyis chos rnams la btang snyoms pas/ 'di ltar ci nas bdud
305a1(brgyad stong): kyi las kyi nyes pa thams cad thams cad nas/ rnam pa thams cad du thams cad gtan mi 'byung mi skye ba de ltar bya zhing / gal te de lta bu byug
305a2(brgyad stong): na yang myur du spang ba de ltar bslab bo zhes sems bskyed par bya ste/ 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnams kyi rang gi mngon par shes pas/
305a3(brgyad stong): pha rol gnon par yin par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ dben pa'i yo tan gyis bdud kyi las su rig pa bya'o//
305a4(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ bdud kyi las kyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gcig pa//
305a5(brgyad stong): / bam po bcu dgu pa// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
305a6(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ lhag pa'i bsam pa la yang dag par zhugs shing / bla na
305a7(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ dang po nyid du dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag la bsnyen par bya/ gus par bya//
305a8(brgyad stong): btsun bkur bya'o// rab kyar gyis gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lhag pa'i bsas pa la yang dgapa
305b1(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ dang po kho nar dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag la bsnyen par bgyi/
305b2(brgyad stong): ba dang / gus par bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gang lags par 'tshal
305b3(brgyad stong): bar bgyi/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor sangs rgyas bcom
305b4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das nyid dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang yin pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la mkhas pa gang dag pha rol
305b5(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di dag legs par 'doms shing / rjes su ston pa de dag dang / gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston cing / nye bar ston pa de dag ni/
305b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid/ byang chub seMs
305b7(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
305b8(brgyad stong): po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po nyid ni ston pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o//
306a1(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgron ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni 'od do// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyob pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug
306a2(brgyad stong): ni skyabs so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gnas so// pha rol tu phyin pa ni dpung gnyen no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gling ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o// /
306a3(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni shes pa dang / rtogs pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par bya ba'i don tu gnas
306a4(brgyad stong): bar gyur pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni 'di la rten pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams la'o// rab
306a5(brgyad stong): 'byor 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
306a6(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang / 'di lta ste/
306a7(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skyes so// rab 'byor ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
306a8(brgyad stong): rgyas gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi thams cad
306b1(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skye'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du med/ grangs med/ dpag tu med
306b2(brgyad stong): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag/ da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par
306b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes la chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi
306b4(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skyes so// rab 'byor da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
306b5(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nga'i thams cad mkhyen pa yang
306b6(brgyad stong): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag las skyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor pa rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi nang du byang chub kyi
306b7(brgyad stong): phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun rnams 'dus shing / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ci snyed yod pa ste/
306b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / rang byung gyi ye shes dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang / gzhal du med pa'i ye shes dang / grangs med pa'i ye shes dang /
307a1(brgyad stong): mnyam pa med pa'i ye shes dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de dag thams cad
307a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi nang du 'dus pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
307a3(brgyad stong): dge ba'i bshes gnyen no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid ston pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni lam mo// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni snang ba'o// pha rol tu phyin
307a4(brgyad stong): pa drug ni smon pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni 'od do// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyob pa'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni skyabs so// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gnaso//
307a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni dpung gnyen no// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni gling ngo // pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni ma'o// pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni pha'o// pha rol tu phyin pa
307a6(brgyad stong): drug ni shes pa dang / rtogs pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i don tu gnas pa 'gyur b.ro//
307a7(brgyad stong): nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la slob pa na/ lan ldon mi nus pa'i sems can thams cad la yang de phan 'dogs par 'gyur
307a8(brgyad stong): ba yin no// rab 'byor yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
307b1(brgyad stong): 'di nyid mnyan par bya'o// gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu 'don par bya/ ston par bya/ nye bar ston par bya/
307b2(brgyad stong): lung dbog par bya/ kha tor du bya/ don dang / chos dang / tshul gyis nye bar yongs su brtag par bya/ nye bar bsam par bya/ 'dri bar bya/ yongasu 'dri ba
307b3(brgyad stong): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drag po 'di dag gi sngon du 'gro ba'o// 'dren pa'o// rab tu 'dren pa'o//
307b4(brgyad stong): yang dag par ston pa'o// kun tu ston pa'o// skyed pa'o// ma ma'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral na/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga
307b5(brgyad stong): mi snang zhing / pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
307b6(brgyad stong): gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog par 'dod cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa la gnas par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
307b7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang lags//
307b8(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
308a1(brgyad stong): ni chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs gang dang / chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan
308a2(brgyad stong): nyid gang gyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchis par 'gyur ba'i chags pa ma mchis pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad mchis par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs
308a3(brgyad stong): mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rnam grangs gang dang / chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid
308a4(brgyad stong): gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod par 'gyur ba'i/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad yod par 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod do//
308a5(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni dben pa'o// rab 'byor chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang
308a6(brgyad stong): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa dang / stong par gyur pa'i chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid de nyid kyis/ chos thams cad ni dben pa dang stong pa'o// rab 'byor
308a7(brgyad stong): kyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad dben pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sems can rnams kun na
308a8(brgyad stong): nyon mongs par rab tu shes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ci ltar sems can rnams rnam par byang ba rab tu shes par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni kun nas nyon
308b1(brgyad stong): mongs par mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa ni rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das stong pa ni kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ bcom
308b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das stong pa ni rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa 'am stong pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
308b3(brgyad stong): rdzogs par mtshang mi rgyal/ bcom ldan 'das dben pa dang / stong pa nyid las gzhan yang gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
308b4(brgyad stong): bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'am/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i chos de dmigs su mchis na
308b5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das bshad pa 'di'i don bdag gyis ci ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bstan du gsol/ de skad
308b6(brgyad stong): ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ sems can rnams yun
308b7(brgyad stong): ring po nas ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/
308b8(brgyad stong): sems can rnams ni yun ring po nas ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems//
309a1(brgyad stong): cingar 'dzin pa dang / ngar 'dzin pa stong pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das stong pa lags so//
309a2(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa stong pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ci snyam du sems/ ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin
309a3(brgyad stong): pas/ sems can rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ram/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no// bde bar gshegs pa de de bzhin te/
309a4(brgyad stong): ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pas sems can rnams 'khor ba na 'khor ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ sems can
309a5(brgyad stong): rnams kun nas nyon mongs par rab tu shes so// ci ltar sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang / mngon par chags pa de ltar kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyi 'di
309a6(brgyad stong): la su yang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba ni su yang med do// rab 'byor ci ltar 'dzin pa med pa dang / mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar ngar 'dzin pa dang /
309a7(brgyad stong): ngar 'dzin pa rab tu mi shes te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ sems can rnams rnam par byang bar rab tu shes so// ci ltar sems can rnams la 'dzin pa med cing /
309a8(brgyad stong): mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar rnam par byang bar 'gyur gyi/ 'di la su yang rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ni med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen
309b1(brgyad stong): de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// rab 'byor de ltar chos thams cad dben zhing / chos thams cad stong pa la sems can rnams kun nas
309b2(brgyad stong): nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar rab tu shes so// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos thams cad dben zhing / chos thams cad stong
309b3(brgyad stong): ba la sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang rab tu shes pa 'di ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
309b4(brgyad stong): chen po de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs la mi spyod de/
309b5(brgyad stong): tshor ba la ma lags/ 'du shes la ma lags/ 'du byed rnams la ma lags/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
309b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
309b7(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can thams cad kyi spyod pa zil gyis gnon te/ zil gyis mi non pa'i
309b8(brgyad stong): gnas kyang 'thob bo// de ci'i sad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen
310a1(brgyad stong): pa nyid ni zil gyis mi non pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
310a2(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa'i gnas pa 'dis kyang gnas te/ nyin mtshan 'da' bar bgyid na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar 'gyur zhing /
310a3(brgyad stong): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang
310a4(brgyad stong): ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de bzhin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod
310a5(brgyad stong): na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/ gzugs la mi spyod de/ de bzhin du tshor ba la ma
310a6(brgyad stong): yin/ 'du shes la ma yin/ 'di rnams la ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la mi spyod do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod na/
310a7(brgyad stong): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dag gis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spong
310a8(brgyad stong): na/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi spyod pa zil gyis gnon te/ zil gyis mi non pa'i gnas kyang 'thob par 'gyur//
310b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sangs rgyas nyid dang / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dang / rang byung nyid dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni zil kyis mi non par
310b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi sa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa'i gnas pa 'dis kyang gnas te/ nyin
310b3(brgyad stong): mtshan 'da' bar byed na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar gyur pa yin te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
310b4(brgyad stong): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor yang gal te 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ snga phyi ma
310b5(brgyad stong): bar mi'i lus thob par gyur la/ mi'i lus thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
310b6(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ ci'i srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas shing / ci srid 'tsho'i bar du gnas nas/ ci srid 'tsho'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
310b7(brgyad stong): cad la bkur stir byed/ bla bar byed/ rjed par byed mchod par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed cing / de bzhin du sems can thams cad la sbyin pa
310b8(brgyad stong): byin la/ sbyin pa de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo na/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
311a1(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de dag/ de'i gzhi las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //
311a2(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chung ngu na nyin
311a3(brgyad stong): cig tsam yang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas gnas na/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des ches bsod nams mang du skyed do//
311a4(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor ci lta ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ nyin mtshan du
311a5(brgyad stong): gnas pa de lta de ltar sems can thams cad kyi sbyin pa'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
311a6(brgyad stong): po// de'i byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems de lta bu ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma gtogs par sems can gzhan dag la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor/
311a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa ni gang zag zla med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni dpe med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
311a8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos rnams dang ldan pa'o// rab 'byor ci ltar na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo des/ de snyed kyi bsod nams mngon par
311b1(brgyad stong): sgrub ce na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de shes rab ci lta bu dang ldan par gyur pas/ sems can thams cad gsad par bya bar gyur
311b2(brgyad stong): ba lta bur mthong ste/ des de'i tshe na/ snying rje chen po yongs su gzung bar gyur cing / des lha'i mig gis bltas pa dang / sems can gzhal du med/ bgrang du med/
311b3(brgyad stong): tshad gzung du med pa/ dpag tu med pa rnams mtshams med pa'i las rnams dang ldan par gyur par mthong zhing / mi khom par gyur pa dang / rnam par nyams pa dang /
311b4(brgyad stong): lta ba'i dra bas khebs pa dang / lam ma rnyed pa dang / mi khom par gyur pa gzhan dag kyang mthong la/ ngal ba chud ma gzon pa dag mthong nas/ de'i dus na de skyo ba chen
311b5(brgyad stong): po skyes te/ des sems can de dag thams cad la byams pa chen po de dang / snying rje chen po des khyab par byas nas/ bdag ni sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi
311b6(brgyad stong): mgon du gyur par bya zhing / bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad sdug bsngal las thar bar bya'o snyam du yid la byas par 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma de dag
311b7(brgyad stong): gaM gzhon dag lhan cig mi gnas par 'gyur ba'i shes rab de lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bla na
311b8(brgyad stong): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba la/ shes rab kyi snang ba chen po'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar gnas pas gnas pa'i
312a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'jig rten thams cad kyi sbyin gnas su yongs su 'dzin cing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
312a2(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// sbyin pa po dang / sbyin pa'i bdeg po gang dag gi chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / mal cha dang / nad kyi gsos sman dang /
312a3(brgyad stong): yo byad rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la/ sems rab tu nye bar gzhag pas yongs su spyod na/ sbyin pa po dang / sbyin pa'i bdag po rnams kyi sbyin pa
312a4(brgyad stong): dang / yon rnam par sbyong bas de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid nye bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul 'khor
312a5(brgyad stong): gyi bsod snyoms 'bras bu yod par longs spyod par 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad la lam ston par 'dod pa dang / rgya cher snang bar byed 'dod pa dang /
312a6(brgyad stong): sems can 'khor ba na gnas pa rnams 'khor ba las thar par byed 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi mig rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha
312a7(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'dis gnas par bya'o// gal te yid la byed pa 'dis gnas par 'dod na/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i
312a8(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang zhig 'di dag shes par bya bar sems pa de nyid de'i yid la byed par 'gyur te/ de las gzhan shes rab kyi pha
312b1(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa'i skabs dbye bar mi bya'o// ci ltar 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ nyin mtshan zad pa
312b2(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nor bu rin po che shes pa la gnas pa'i skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis nor bu rin po che'i rigs shes pas
312b3(brgyad stong): sngon ma rnyed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po zhig rnyed par gyur la/ des nor bu rin po che chen po de rnyed pas dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba che zhing yangs pa dang
312b4(brgyad stong): ldan par gyur pa las/ de'i nor bu rin po che chen po de yang stor ba dang / de de'i gzhi las sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/
312b5(brgyad stong): de 'di ltar kye ma bdag ni nor bu rin po che chen po de dang bral lo zhes rtag tu rgyun mi chad ber nor bu rin po che chen po dang bral ba'i yid la byed pa 'byung zhing / de
312b6(brgyad stong): ltar nor bu rin po che chen po 'am/ de ma yin pa gzhan de dang yon tan 'dra zhing rigs mthun pa rnyed par gyur gyi bar du skyes bu de nor bu rin po che chen po de mi brjed
312b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po las yongs su nyams pas kyang /
312b8(brgyad stong): nor bu rin po che chen po las yongs su nyams pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po la rin po cher 'du shes pa ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang ldan ni
313a1(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yid la byed pa dang ma bral bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems kyis ci srid du de 'am/ gnan
313a2(brgyad stong): rnyed par gyur pa de srid du btsal bar bya zhing / de srid du des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po rnyed pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang /
313a3(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi nor bu rin po che chen po rnyed pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
313a4(brgyad stong): ldan 'das gang yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad dang / yid la bgyid pa thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba dang stong par gsungs lags na//
313a5(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das ci ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa dang / thams cad
313a6(brgyad stong): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bgyid pa dang ma bral bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad
313a7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du/ chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'o// chos tham
313a8(brgyad stong): cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'o zhes yid la byed na/ de ltar yid la byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang / thams cad brgya
313b1(brgyad stong): ba dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral ba yid yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni stong pa ste/ do ni mi 'phel mi 'grib //
313b2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pa ste/ mi 'phel mi 'grib na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci ltar
313b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phel ba ma mchis pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas byang chub sgrub par 'gyur/ ci ltar na/ bla na med pa
313b4(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab
313b5(brgyad stong): 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'phel ba
313b6(brgyad stong): 'am/ 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong pas de 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
313b7(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang stong pas/ de 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med do// rab 'byor gang gi phyir ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong
313b8(brgyad stong): bas/ de 'phel ba med cing / 'grib pa med pa yin la/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pas/ de 'phel ba med/
314a1(brgyad stong): cing / 'grib pa med pa yin pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir yang dag par sgrub cing / de
314a2(brgyad stong): ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rab 'byor gal te de skad du bshad pa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
314a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po// mi dngang / kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang mi ldan zhing zhum par gyur na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ de
314a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ shes rab kyi
314a5(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes
314a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// /
314a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid las gzhan na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
314a8(brgyad stong): chos 'ga' yang dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci
314b1(brgyad stong): stong pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
314b2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das yang ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos 'ga' yang stong pa nyid 'di la dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
314b3(brgyad stong): de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci stong pa nyid stong pa nyid spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
314b4(brgyad stong): rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci gzugs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan
314b5(brgyad stong): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci tshor ba dang / 'du shes dam/ 'du byed rnam
314b6(brgyad stong): dang / bcom ldan 'das yang ci rnam par shes pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni/
314b7(brgyad stong): ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci gzugs las gzhan na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de 'ga' yang
314b8(brgyad stong): dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci tshor ba dang /
315a1(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams las gzhan dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
315a2(brgyad stong): chos de 'ga' yang dmigs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
315a3(brgyad stong): 'o na/ ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
315a4(brgyad stong): kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor yang ci gang zhig/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i chos de khyod kyis yang
315a5(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab
315a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de/ khyod kyis yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/
315a7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ chos gang zhig dmigasu
315a8(brgyad stong): med pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ chos de nyid skyes pa 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ skye ba 'am/ 'gags pa 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag
315b1(brgyad stong): pa yin nam ci/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub
315b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ni de lta bu'i ngo bo yin te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i ngo bo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem
315b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ de bzhin
315b4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i lam 'di bsgrubs nas de ltar spyod cing / de ltar brtson te/ de ltar 'bad na/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa dang / ye shes chen po
315b5(brgyad stong): dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang / ded dpon chen po'i ye shes thob par mi 'gyur ba 'di ni gnas med do// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
315b6(brgyad stong): chos thams cad kyi mi skye ba'i chos nyid gang lags pa de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das
315b7(brgyad stong): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na da chos gang la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
315b8(brgyad stong): byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor yang ci khyod kyis chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
316a1(brgyad stong): tu lung bstan pa ma chos de yang dag par rjes su mthong ngag/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/
316a2(brgyad stong): ldan 'das chos gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ba dang / lung bstan pa'i chos de ni bdag gis yang dag par rjes su
316a3(brgyad stong): ma mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa 'am/ chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya bar bgyi ba 'am/
316a4(brgyad stong): chos gang gis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i chos de yang bdag gis yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo // de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos
316a5(brgyad stong): thams cad dmigs su ma mchis pa la bdag 'di snyam du/ chos 'di ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
316a6(brgyad stong): bgyi'o// chos 'dis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mi sems pa'i slad du'o// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
316a7(brgyad stong): brgyad stong pa las/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi le'u zhes bya ste// nyi shu gnyis pa'o//
316a8(brgyad stong): yang de'i tshe/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur 'dug go// de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di/
316b1(brgyad stong): skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab bo// bcom ldan 'das kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni blta bar
316b2(brgyad stong): dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kon
316b3(brgyad stong): shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab bo// ko'u shi ka shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni blta dka' zhing
316b4(brgyad stong): rtogs par dka' ba ste/ nam mkha' bab pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dben pa'i phyir blta dka' ba'o//
316b5(brgyad stong): stong pa'i phyir rtogs par dka' ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
316b6(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par
316b7(brgyad stong): bgyid pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton bgyid pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de da/
316b8(brgyad stong): ni ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma lags so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
317a1(brgyad stong): ko ru shi ka de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ko'u shig gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing / zos nas kyang
317a2(brgyad stong): 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang /
317a3(brgyad stong): ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ni ngan ngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa ma yin no// ko'u shi ka 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can ci snyed yod
317a4(brgyad stong): ba de dag thams cad dge ba'i bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod par gyur na/ ko'u shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ ci sems can de dag yang de'i gzhi las bsod nam
317a5(brgyad stong): mang du skyed dam/ brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
317a6(brgyad stong): ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo 'di de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas
317a7(brgyad stong): kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun nub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang /
317a8(brgyad stong): kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba ste/ ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di nyan par 'gyur
317b1(brgyad stong): zhing / thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / lang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang /
317b2(brgyad stong): lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba de dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams kyi phung 'di la snga ma 'ja
317b3(brgyad stong): bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyi tshul khrims lus byung ba'i bso mas kyi phung pos brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro/ stong gi cha yang / brgya stong
317b4(brgyad stong): gi char yang / bye ba'i char yang / bye ba brgya'i char yang / bye ba stong gi char yang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
317b5(brgyad stong): grangs su yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bgrang bar yang / dper yang / dpes bstan par bya bar yang / gzhir yang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas
317b6(brgyad stong): dge slong gzhan gyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ko'u shi ka rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu
317b7(brgyad stong): byin pa zab mo 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa
317b8(brgyad stong): dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri bar 'gyur ba des khyod zil gyis mnan to// de skad ces smras pa dang /
318a1(brgyad stong): lha rnams kyi dbang po la sbyin gyis dge slong de la 'di nad ces smras so// 'phags pa rigs kyi bu 'ag/ rigs kyi za ba dang/
318a2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa gcig gis kyang bdag zil gyis banan na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang /
318a3(brgyad stong): pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger 'dri
318a4(brgyad stong): 'gyur bas lta yang ci spos/ gang gis thos kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang /
318a5(brgyad stong): ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / yi ger bris te/ de bzhin nyid du slob pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa dang /
318a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid du rnal 'byor du byed pa lta yang ci smos te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang / de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du
318a7(brgyad stong): bcas pa'i 'jig rten zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas
318a8(brgyad stong): ba'i 'jig rten 'ba' zhig zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ gang yang rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
318b1(brgyad stong): bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/
318b2(brgyad stong): rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'ba' shig zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar
318b3(brgyad stong): ma zad kyi/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang
318b4(brgyad stong): bral ba de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
318b5(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i bdag po chen po 'ba' shig zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar mi zad kyi/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
318b6(brgyad stong): yongs su dag cing / tshul khrims kyi phung po ma nyams dang / skyon med pa dang / 'dren mar ma gyur pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa dang / yongasasu dag pa dang /
318b7(brgyad stong): lhad ma zhugs pa'i tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang zil kyis
318b8(brgyad stong): gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi phung po ma
319a1(brgyad stong): nyams pa/ skyon med pa/ 'dren mar ma gyur pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa/ lhad ma zhugs pa dang ldan pa dag
319a2(brgyad stong): 'ba' shig zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ zhi ba phun sum
319a3(brgyad stong): tshogs pa/ chung ngu na sdong du mes tshig pa la yang gnod pa'i sems mi skyed la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang bral ba de dag
319a4(brgyad stong): thams cad kyang zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// /
319a5(brgyad stong): bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa/ zhi ba phun sum tshogs pa/ sems khong khro ba med pa dag 'ba' shig zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ gang yang byang chub
319a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ snyom pa med pa/ le lo med pa/ ma zhum pa'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha
319a7(brgyad stong): dang ldan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub
319a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ snyom pa med pa/ le lo med pa/ ma zhum pa'i rgyas dang /
319b1(brgyad stong): ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang ldan pa dag 'ba' shig zil kyis gnon cing // 'gro bar ma zad kyi/ gang yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
319b2(brgyad stong): gtan la dga' zhing / bsam gtan la mos pa/ bsam gtan gyi stobs can/ bsam gtan dang ldan pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ bsam gtan la dbang
319b3(brgyad stong): ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang ma bral ba de dag thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon cing / 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'
319b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar bstan pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni lha dang / mi dang /
319b5(brgyad stong): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad zil kyis gnon cing 'gro bar 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can thams cad
319b6(brgyad stong): dang / thabs mi mkhas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams zil kyis gnon par 'gyur te/ de dag ni zil gyis mi non par 'gyur ro// /
319b7(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar bstan pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
319b8(brgyad stong): phyin pa'i rjes su 'jug na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i gdung mi gcad par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa yin no// byang
320a1(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rgyang ring du mi byed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
320a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di de ltar nan tan byed na/ byang chub kyi snying por yun mi ring bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
320a3(brgyad stong): po 'di/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslob na/ sems can nyon mongs pa'i 'dam du bying ba rnams 'byin par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems
320a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di de ltar slob na/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la slob pa yin te/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob po// rang sangs rgyas
320a5(brgyad stong): kyi bslab pa la mi slob bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i drung du/ 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po
320a6(brgyad stong): bzhi 'ongs nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu khyod myur du byang chub sems dpa'i beslab pa la slobs shig/ la gor slobs shig dang / gang khyod byang
320a7(brgyad stong): chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ blar bar bya ba'i lhung bzed pani
320a8(brgyad stong): po ni 'di dag yin no zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// ci ltar ston pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar sro
320b1(brgyad stong): pa'i drung du/ 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ba' shig mchi bar sems par yang mi zad de/ bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'
320b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de'i drung du mchi bar sems na/ lha'i bu gzhan dag lta ci smos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de/ de bzhin gabye ba
320b3(brgyad stong): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag gis kyang rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab
320b4(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni/ 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal ba dang / pha rol gyi gnod pa gang yang rung ba dag 'byung ba de dag dang / gzhan dag thams cad
320b5(brgyad stong): nas/ thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
320b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di'i yon tan lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo 'di snyam du sems te/ ci lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di bdag
320b7(brgyad stong): nyid kyi spobs pas sgra 'am/ 'on te sangs rgyas kyi mthus/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'i sems kyi rtog pa sems
320b8(brgyad stong): kyis shes nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa kun dga' bo 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi mthur rig par bya'o// 'phags
321a1(brgyad stong): pa kun dga' bo 'di ni/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs su rig par bya ste/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo bdag ni/ byang chub sems
321a2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la brtsams te/ sgra mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
321a3(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo ci ltar lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis smras pa/ de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// 'di ni de bzhin
321a4(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis/ lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gis bshad pa yin no// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
321a5(brgyad stong): pa brgyad stong pa las/ brgya byin gyi le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu gsum pa'o//
321a6(brgyad stong): / bam po nyi shu'o// / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad
321a7(brgyad stong): ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa dang / shes rab
321a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa de'i tshe/ kun dga' bo gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
321b1(brgyad stong): gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can/ de dag thams cad 'di ltar the tsom za bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ci bar ma dor nyan thos
321b2(brgyad stong): kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du byed dam/ 'on te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
321b3(brgyad stong): 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur snyam mo// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa
321b4(brgyad stong): gnas pa de'i tshe/ gang bdud sdig can de dag mya ngan gyi zug rngus zug par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'
321b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnal 'byor du byed pa de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can de dag byang
321b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la 'tshe bar byed de/ ci nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhum par 'gyur ba dang / spu zid
321b7(brgyad stong): zhes byed par 'gyur ba dang / des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de'i sems bskyed pa gcig tsam yang zad par 'gyur snyam ste/
321b8(brgyad stong): 'jigs pa dag kyang 'byin cing phyogs pa dang / phyogs su skar mda' ltung ba dang / me thar pa lta bu dag kyang gtong zhing ston to// kun dga' bo de la
322a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi drung du bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing mi 'ong ste/ 'on kyang /
322a2(brgyad stong): kha cig gi drung du ni 'ong / kha cig gyi drung du ni mi 'ong ngo // kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ci
322a3(brgyad stong): lta bu'i drung du bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing mchi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
322a4(brgyad stong): chen po gang gis sngon gyi mtha' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la mos pa'i sems ma bskyed par gyur na/ kun dga' bo byang chub sem
322a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing 'ong ste/ glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub
322a6(brgyad stong): sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa la/ 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin nam ma yin snyam du the tsom za ba 'gyur/
322a7(brgyad stong): yid gnyis skye bar 'gyur te/ kun dga' bo de ltar the tsom skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang bdud sdig can 'che bar
322a8(brgyad stong): sems shing 'ong ste/ de la glags dang rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang 'di la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i
322b1(brgyad stong): bshes gnyen dang bral zhing sdig pa'i grogs pos yongs su zin par 'gyur na/ de zab mo zab mo'i gnas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bshad pa la mi nyan te/
322b2(brgyad stong): mi nyan pas mi shes so// mi shes pas ci ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgom par bya zhes mi 'dri ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sem
322b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po 'di la 'ang bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing 'ong ste/ de la glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang byang chub sems
322b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig dam pa'i chos ma yin pa yongs su 'dzin pa la sbyor ba la rten par 'gyur te/ 'di ni bdag gi grogs po don thams
322b5(brgyad stong): cad la yang nga mi 'dor ba bdag gi grogs po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan du mang du yod mod kyi/ de dag ni bdag gi bsam pa
322b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs par mi byed de/ 'di ni bdag dang mthun pa'i grogs po rnyed pa yin te/ 'dis bdag gi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed do snyam na/ kun dga'
322b7(brgyad stong): bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la yang bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing / glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan lnga
322b8(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan
323a1(brgyad stong): 'di skad ces zer te/ kye ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'don bab ste/ khyod la 'di mnyan pas ci zhig bya/ ci ltar mdo sde gzhan
323a2(brgyad stong): dag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa de ltar 'dir brtson par byas na ni ma yin te/ bdag gis ni 'di'i bting mi rnyed/ ro mi myong na khyod la 'di mnyan pa 'am/
323a3(brgyad stong): bris pas ci zhig bya zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang de ltar 'bral bar byed de/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
323a4(brgyad stong): chen po 'di la yang bdud sdig can 'tshe bar sems shing 'ong ste/ glags kyang rnyed par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpas
323a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag la brnyas par byed cing / bdag ni dben par gnas pas gnas te/ gzhan dag ni dben par gnas pas mi gnas so//
323a6(brgyad stong): gzhan dag la ni dben par gnas pa med do snyab na/ kun dga' bo de'i tshe/ bdud sdig can dga' mgu yid rangs par 'gyur zhing / rab tu dga' ba dang /
323a7(brgyad stong): rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skye ste/ kun tu tshim bskye zhing sems rim par gyur la/ rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i sa phyir zhe na/ 'di ni bla
323a8(brgyad stong): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyang ring du byed do snyab mo// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gad ci/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
323b1(brgyad stong): ming nas smos pa 'am/ rus nas smos pa 'am/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa de'i tshe/ de de tsam gyis de ma yin pa'i byang chub sems
323b2(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des pa/ dge ba'i chos can gzhan dag la brnyas par byed de/ de la yang yon tan med de/ phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub
323b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de dag dang / rnam pa de dag dang / rtags de dag dang /
323b4(brgyad stong): mtshan ma de dag med do// de dag de la med bzhin du de phyir mi ldog pa'i yon tan rnams la nyon mongs pa skyed de/ 'di lta ste/ nga gang la snang ba'i chos de dag
323b5(brgyad stong): la/ khyed mi snang ngo zhes bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod do// de la bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ bdud kyi gnas stongs par mi 'gyur zhing sems
323b6(brgyad stong): can dmyal ba chen po zhig par mi 'gyur/ byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang / lha ma yin gyi tshogs zhig par mi 'gyur ba lta snyam nas//
323b7(brgyad stong): de la bdud sdig can gyis ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'di ltar rnyed pa dang / bkur stis non pa'i rang bzhin can du 'gyur zhing /
323b8(brgyad stong): tshig btsun par 'gyur ba dang / tshig btsun pa des skye ba mang pos 'dzin par 'gyur zhing / de dag la skye bo mang po yang mnyan pa dang / dad par bya ba snyam du
324a1(brgyad stong): sems par de ltar byin gyis rlob ste/ mthong ngam thos nas kyang de dag gi rjes su byed par 'gyur zhing / de dag mthong ba dang / thos
324a2(brgyad stong): pa'i rjes su byed pa nang / de bzhin nyid du mi slob/ de bzhin nyid du mi sgrub/ de bzhin nyid la rnal 'byor du mi byed par 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar de bzhin nyid
324a3(brgyad stong): la slob cing / de bzhin nyid la mi sgrub/ de bzhin nyid la rnal 'byor du mi byed pas/ nyon mongs pa rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// de dag de ltar sems kyi rgyud
324a4(brgyad stong): phyin cing log pas lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las gang dang / gang byed pa de dag thams cad mi 'dod pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / mi dga' ba dang / yid du
324a5(brgyad stong): mi 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de ltar sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag zhig par mi 'gyur ro// byol song gi skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul dang /
324a6(brgyad stong): lha ma yin gyi tshogs dang / bdud kyi gnas rnams zhig par mi 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo don gyi dbang 'di yang mthong nas/ bdud sdig can dga'
324a7(brgyad stong): mgu yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gzhan yang gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dang
324a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang lhan cig 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed gshe zhing skyo bar byed/ gnod pa
324b1(brgyad stong): sems shing zhe sdang skyed na/ de'i tshe bdud sdig can 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rigs kyi bu 'di ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyang ring du byed par 'gyur te/
324b2(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las shin tu rgyang ring bar gnas par 'gyur ro// snyam mo// gal te yang gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can/ gang zag
324b3(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dang lhan cig 'thab par byed pa/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ gshe zhing spyo bar byed/ gnod par sems
324b4(brgyad stong): shing zhe sdang skyed na/ de la bdud sdig can shin tu dga' mgu yid rangs shing / rab tu dga' ba dang / tshim pa dang / yid bde ba skye bar 'gyur te/
324b5(brgyad stong): de 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di gnyi ga yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las rgyang ring du gnas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// kun dga'
324b6(brgyad stong): bo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung ma bstan pa gang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lung bstan pa dang lhan cig
324b7(brgyad stong): 'thab par byed/ rtsod par byed/ 'gyed par byed/ gshe zhing spyo bar byed/ gnod par sems shing zhe sdang skyed la/ sems la gnod par byed na/ byang
324b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ gal te thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma btang na/ sems bskyed pa de snyed kyi bskal par go cha bgo dgos so// /
325a1(brgyad stong): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
325a2(brgyad stong): sems bskyed pa de dag la nges par 'byung ba cung zad cig mchis sam/ 'on te skal pa de snyed du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des/ gdon
325a3(brgyad stong): mi 'tshal bar go cha bgo 'tshal btsal ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can dang / rang sa
325a4(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi theg pa can dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dag la ngas nges par 'byung ba dang bcas pa'i chos bstan to// de la kun dga' bo
325a5(brgyad stong): gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang zhig/ gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dang lhan cig 'thabs shing brtsod de/ bkye nas
325a6(brgyad stong): gshe zhing spyos/ gnod par bsams zhe sdang bskyed nas/ so sor bshags par mi byed/ phyis sdom par mi 'dzin/ khon du 'dzin cing / khon du
325a7(brgyad stong): bzung nas 'dug na/ kun dga' bo gang de dag de la nges par 'byung ba yod par nga mi smra ste/ kun dga' bo gang zag des phyir yang skal ba de snyed du/
325a8(brgyad stong): gdon mi za bar go cha bgo dgos so// kun dga' bo gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can gang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa can dang lhan
325b1(brgyad stong): cig 'thabs cing brtsod de/ bkye nas gshe zhing spros/ gnod par bsams/ zhe sdang bskyed nas/ so sor bshags par byas nas/ phyis kyang sdom
325b2(brgyad stong): ba 'dzin la/ sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ ci nas bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rtsod pa gcad par bya ba yin/ gsal bar bya ba yin na/ bdag
325b3(brgyad stong): nyid rtsod par byed pa dang / smras pa la bdag slar smra ba ni/ rnyed pa ngan pa rnyed pa yin no// ngan pa rnyed de legs pa ma rnyed do// bdag gis ci nas sems
325b4(brgyad stong): can thams cad kyi zam pa lta bur 'gyur bar bya ba yin la/ bdag pha rol la/ khyod ces tshig drag tu smra ba 'am/ tshig rtsub pos lan ldon zhing / smra ba
325b5(brgyad stong): 'di ni bdag gis smra bar mi bya ste/ 'thab cing rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa rnams la bdag ni glen pa dang / 'on pa dang / lkug pa dang / 'dra' bar bya'o//
325b6(brgyad stong): pha rol gyis ngan du sbas pa dang / ngan du brjod pa dang / ngan du zer ba rnams smra ba thos kyang / gzhan gyi drung du ngan sems su mi bya'o// pha rol gyi nyes
325b7(brgyad stong): pa dang / skyon bdag gis shes par bya ba 'di ni bdag la legs pa ma yin te/ bdag gi cha ma yin no// bdag gis gzhan gi nyes pa dang / skyon mnyan
325b8(brgyad stong): to snyam du bsam pa 'di ni bdag gi cha ma yin no snyam mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa 'khrug par bya ba ma yin no// ci nas bdag
326a1(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sems can thams cad bde ba'i yo byad thams
326a2(brgyad stong): cad kyis bde bar bya ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes bya ba de bdag gis/ gnod sems bskyed pa yin nam/ bdag dang yang gzhan dag
326a3(brgyad stong): bgras pa na yang / bdag gis gzhan la gnod sems mi bya ba zhes bya ba de bdag 'khrug par gyur pa yin nam/ 'di ni bdag gis bya ba ma yin te/ bdag
326a4(brgyad stong): gis ni brtun pa brtan pas pha rol gnan par bya zhing / srog gi bar chad byed pa la yang bdag 'khrug par mi bya ba dang / gzhin la khro gnyer 'byung bar mi bya'o//
326a5(brgyad stong): snyam pa 'di ni/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de'i nges par 'byung bar yin par ngas bshad do// kun dga' bo byang chub sems
326a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa can rnams kyi drung du yang de ltar gnas par bya ste/ ci ltar sems can su'i drung du yang 'khrug par mi//
326a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba/ de ltar sems can thams cad kyi drung du gnas par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang zag byang chub sems
326a8(brgyad stong): dpa'i theg pa can gzhan dag gi drung du ci ltar gnas par bya zhe na/ kun dga' bo 'di lta ste/ ston pa la ci lta ba bzhin du ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
326b1(brgyad stong): chen po 'di dag ni nga'i ston pa'o zhes/ de ltar gnas par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni/ bdag dang theg pa gcig la zhugs
326b2(brgyad stong): ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni/ bdag dang lam gcig tu zhugs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
326b3(brgyad stong): 'di dag ni/ bdag dang bsam pa mthun pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni/ bdag dang theg pa mthun pa la yang dag par zhugs pa/
326b4(brgyad stong): ste/ gang la 'di dag gis bslab par bya ba de la bdag gis kyang bslab par bya'o// 'di dag gis ci ltar bslab par bya ba de bzhin du/ bdag gyis kyang bslab pa bya'o//
326b5(brgyad stong): gal te 'di dag las kha cig 'dres par gnas pas gnas par gyur na/ yang bdag gis ni 'dres par gnas pas gnas par mi bya'o// yang gal te 'di dag
326b6(brgyad stong): thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ ma 'dres par gnas pas gnas na/ bdag gis kyang de bzhin du bslab par bya'o// kun dga' bo byang
326b7(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bar chad med
326b8(brgyad stong): par 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
327a1(brgyad stong): byin pa brgyad stong pa las/ mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyi le'u shes bya ste/ nyi shu bzhi pa'o//
327a2(brgyad stong): / de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang byang chub sems
327a3(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la bslabs na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang
327a4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slab po// de bzhin du 'byung ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang /
327a5(brgyad stong): skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / nam mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / rab 'byor gal te
327a6(brgyad stong): byangang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob po// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom
327a7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das ci'i srad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags/ de bzhin du 'byung ba/
327a8(brgyad stong): ma mchis pa dang / 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / skye ba ma mchis pa dang / dngos po ma mchis pa dang / dben pa dang / 'dod chags dang / bral ba dang / nam
327b1(brgyad stong): mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan
327b2(brgyad stong): 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang 'di skad du/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zad pa la
327b3(brgyad stong): slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob/ de bzhin du 'byung ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / dben pa dang /
327b4(brgyad stong): 'dod chags dang bral ba dang / nam mkha' dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / mya ngan las 'das pa slob na/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob par 'gyur zhes zer
327b5(brgyad stong): ba/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ ci de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin
327b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed pa de zad par 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// de ci'i srad du zhe na/ bcom
327b7(brgyad stong): ldan 'das zad pa ni zad par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das zad pa ni mi zad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du/
327b8(brgyad stong): sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed
328a1(brgyad stong): pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gag par 'gyur ba 'am/ skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ dngos por 'gyur ba 'am/ dben par 'gyur
328a2(brgyad stong): ba 'am/ rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ba 'am/ 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ namakhar 'gyur ba 'am/ chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur ba yin no//
328a3(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ci snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de
328a4(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin nyid gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes rab tu 'byed pa de mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ram/
328a5(brgyad stong): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen
328a6(brgyad stong): po de ltar slob na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bo// sangs rgyas kyi sa la slob bo// stobs dag la slob bo// mi 'jigs pa dag la slob bo//
328a7(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la slob bo// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
328a8(brgyad stong): slob na/ bslab pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/
328b1(brgyad stong): bdud dam/ bdud kyi 'khor tam/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis rdzi bar mi nus so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/
328b2(brgyad stong): myur du phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ myur du byang chub kyi
328b3(brgyad stong): snying po la 'dug par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ rang gi spyod yul la spyod do// rab 'byor byang
328b4(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ mgon du 'gyur ba'i chos dag la slob bo// byams pa la chen po la slob po// dga' ba chen po/
328b5(brgyad stong): la slob po// btang snyoms chen po la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum
328b6(brgyad stong): du bzlas pa rnam pa bcu gnyis su rab tu bskor ba la slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ sems can gyi kham
328b7(brgyad stong): bri bar mi bya'o zhes slob bo// ba 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba la
328b8(brgyad stong): slob po// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ bdud rtsi'i dbyings kyi sgo dbye'o zhes slob po// rab 'byor bslab pa rgya chen
329a1(brgyad stong): po 'di ni sems stobs zhan pas slob mi nus shing / bslab pa 'di la mthu chung ngus bslab par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
329a2(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gang bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni/ sems can thams cad kyi thun mong ngo // rab 'byor de dag ni sems can thams cad kyi 'gon no// gang
329a3(brgyad stong): bslab pa 'di la slob pa de dag ni sems can thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa rjes su thob par 'dod pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
329a4(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi skye/ yi dgas kyi yul rnams su mi skye/ lha ma yin gyi lus su mi skye/ mtha' 'khob kyi skye
329a5(brgyad stong): bo'i nang du mi skye/ gardol ba'i rigs mi skye/ rngon pa dang / nya ba dang / chom rkun pa dang / shan pa'i rigs su mi skye ste/ de lta bu'i rigs ngan pa las ngan pa
329a6(brgyad stong): sten/ ngan pa'i rigs gzhan du mi skye'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ long bar mi 'gyur/ 'on par mi
329a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ zhar bar mi 'gyur/ rkun por mi 'gyur/ sgur por mi 'gyur/ 'theng por mi 'gyur/ zha bor mi 'gyur/ grum por mi 'gyur/ rkug par mi
329a8(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ dag par mi 'gyur/ rna ba mi gsang bar mi 'gyur/ yan lag nyams par mi 'gyur/ yan lag ma tshang bar mi 'gyur/ yan lag mi sdug par
