359b6(brgyad stong): kyi 'khor lo bskor cing rjes su bskor nas/ chos ston pa khyod kyis da mgu ba byas par 'gyur gyi/ sngar gyi chos bshad pa des ni ma' yin no// gang gis stong gsum gyi stong
359b7(brgyad stong): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can gang dag ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid thob par byas na/ kun dga' bo de ci tsam du sems/ dgra bcom
359b8(brgyad stong): pa de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams
360a1(brgyad stong): kyi phung po de mang ba yin nam/ kun dpa' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
360a2(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag de dag pas gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa de bsod nams/
360a3(brgyad stong): ches mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo de bas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la chung ngu ni nyi ma gcig
360a4(brgyad stong): tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/ kun dga' bo nyi ma gcig lta zhog gi/ chung ngu na snga dro tsam 'am/ kun dag
360a5(brgyad stong): bo snga dro chos ston pa lta zhog/ chung ngu na chu tshod gcig tsam 'am/ kun dga' bo chu tshod gcig lta shog/ chung ngu na thang cig gam/ kun dga' bo thang cig lta zhog/ yud tsam gcig /
360a6(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo yud tsam gcig lta zhog/ chung ngu na skad cig gcig tsam du yang ste/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang skad cig dang / thang cig dang /
360a7(brgyad stong): yud tsam du yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun
360a8(brgyad stong): dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'dis ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba zil gyis gnon
360b1(brgyad stong): to/ kun dga' bo de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'
360b2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ni kun dga' bo gnas med skabs med do// 'di ni gnas ma yin no// de nas
360b3(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ ci lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor bzhi dang / lnga
360b4(brgyad stong): dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag thams cad kyis sangs rgyas
360b5(brgyad stong): kyi mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyed pa dge slong gyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing byang chub sems dpyi/
360b6(brgyad stong): tshogs kyis mdun du byas pa mi bskyod pa rgya mtsho lta bu zab po// 'khor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / dgra
360b7(brgyad stong): bcom pa thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang
360b8(brgyad stong): po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba/ yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas/ sems shin tu rnam
361a1(brgyad stong): par grol ga sems can thams cad kyi dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te chos ston pa mthong bar 'gyur ba/
361a2(brgyad stong): de ltar rdzu 'phrul mngon par mngon par 'du badzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de dag slar brtul to// bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul
361a3(brgyad stong): mngon par 'du mdzad pa de slar brtul nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa yang mi snang bar gyur//
361a4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang nyan thos chen po de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad 'khor bzhi po de dag dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin
361a5(brgyad stong): dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / namakha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa de dag gi mig lam du mi snang bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
361a6(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de brtul bar gyur pas/ de dag thams cad de dag gi mig lam du mi/
361a7(brgyad stong): snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar chos thams cad ni mig lam du yang mi snang bar gyur te/ chos
361a8(brgyad stong): rnams la chos rnams snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi mthong / chos rnams kyis chos rnams mi shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo thams cad shes pa
361b1(brgyad stong): ba po ma yin/ mthong ba po ma yin/ dgos pa byed nus pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo nam mkhara' byed pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad byed pa med pa'o// kun dga' bo chos
361b2(brgyad stong): thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab po/ kun dga' bo chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i phyir tshor ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
361b3(brgyad stong): de ltar spyod na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// ku ni dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob na/ shes
361b4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob po// bslab pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i byang chub chen po rjes su thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
361b5(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di dag ni/ bslab pa thams cad kyi mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gtso bo zhes
361b6(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang
361b7(brgyad stong): mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad phan pa thob par byed pa'o// 'jig rten thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'o// mgon med pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur ba'o// sangs rgyas kyis
361b8(brgyad stong): gnang zhing sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa ste/ kun dga' bo bslab pa 'di la bslabs shing / bslab pa 'di la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
362a1(brgyad stong): rgyas rnams kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zhabs kyi the bo gcig gis bteg ste/ slar bzhag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan
362a2(brgyad stong): 'das de dag 'di snyam du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bteg pa 'am bzhag par mi dgongs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gzhal du med
362a3(brgyad stong): pa grangs med pa'i yon tan dang ldan te/ kun dga' bo sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di la bslabs nas 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
362a4(brgyad stong): da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams la chags pa med pa nyid rjes su brnyes so// kun dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi bslab pa ci snyed yod pa'i bslab pa de
362a5(brgyad stong): dag thams cad las kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bslab pa 'di ni mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gartse bo zhes bya'o// rab ces bya'o// mchog rab ces bya'o//
362a6(brgyad stong): gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla ma zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo shes
362a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni med pa nyid yin pa'i phyir//
362a8(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am/ zad pa 'am/ mtha' ma bzung bar sems pa de ni/ nam mkha'i tshad ma 'am/ zad pa 'am mtha' ma bzung bar semaso// /
362b1(brgyad stong): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi zad pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol
362b2(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa ni mtha' ma med pa'o// kun dga' bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma 'am/ zad pa'am/ mtha' ma ni ma bshad de/ kun dga' bo yang ming gi tshogs dang / tshig
362b3(brgyad stong): gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs rnams la ni tshad ma 'am 'brel pa yod kyi/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad ma dang 'brel pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
362b4(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo ming gi tshogs dang / tshig gi tshogs dang / yi ge'i tshogs ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma dang ldan pa
362b5(brgyad stong): ma yin no// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad ma med pa'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das yang ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis shes rab kyi pha
362b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa'i tshad ma ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma ma
362b7(brgyad stong): bstan pa'o// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas tshad ma ma brjod do// kun dga' bo dben pa'i chos la dben pa dmigs su med na/
362b8(brgyad stong): de'i tshad ma lta ga la yod/ kun dga' bo de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gzhal du med pa'i phyir tshad ma med pa yin no// kun dga' bo 'das pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs/
363a1(brgyad stong): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag byung bar gyur pa de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab
363a2(brgyad stong): tu phye ba yin yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad pa'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
363a3(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu 'byed par 'gyur yang /
363a4(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo da ltar gzhal du med grangs med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
363a5(brgyad stong): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing bzhes pa de dag kyang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
363a6(brgyad stong): 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// kun dga' bo da ltar de bzhin
363a7(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nga yang kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis rab tu phye ba yin yang / kun dga' bo shes
363a8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di zad pa 'am yongs su zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zad par bya bar sems
363b1(brgyad stong): ba de ni ma mkha' zad par bya bar sems te/ kun dga' bo de lta bas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni mi zad pa'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin
363b2(brgyad stong): gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnas 'di ni zab mo zhig yin gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bdag gis gnas 'di zhu'o snyam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab
363b3(brgyad stong): 'byor kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi bas pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi
363b4(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa ni zab pa ste/ 'di lta ste na mkha' mi zad pa'i phyir chos thams cad skye ba med pa'o// rab 'byor kyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
363b5(brgyad stong): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ci ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs
363b6(brgyad stong): zad pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
363b7(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zad pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
363b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma rig pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon pa/
364a1(brgyad stong): bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'du byed mi zad pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi zad pa dang / ming dang gzugs
364a2(brgyad stong): mi zad pa dang / skye mched drug mi zad pa dang / reg pa mi zad pa dang / tshor ba mi zad pa dang / sred pa mi zad pa dang / len pa mi zad pa dang / srid pa mi zad pa dang / skye ba mi zad pa dang /
364a3(brgyad stong): rga shi mi zad pa dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa mi zad pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bskug
364a4(brgyad stong): par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba mtha' gnyis spangs pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar rnam par lta ban
364a5(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mtha' dang dbus med par rnam par lta ste/ rab 'byor gang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la de ltar lta ba de ni byang
364a6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la yang 'dug pa'i ma 'dres pa'i chos so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de ltar rten cing 'brel par
364a7(brgyad stong): 'byung ba la lta ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa 'dis shes rab
364a8(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta na/ de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang thams cad ma
364b1(brgyad stong): pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa de dag thams cad ni
364b2(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa 'di dang thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma brten pas mi shes so// ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mi zad pa mngon
364b3(brgyad stong): par bsgrub pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par bya/ ji ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brten cing 'brel pa la rnam par lta zhe
364b4(brgyad stong): na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par 'gyur ba de dag thams
364b5(brgyad stong): cad ni thabs mkhas pa 'di la ma brten pas phyir ldog go/ phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang su dag bla na med pa
364b6(brgyad stong): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma log pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brten nas
364b7(brgyad stong): phyir ma log go// phyir mi ldog go// phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub
364b8(brgyad stong): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// de ltar mi zad pa mngon par bsgrubs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta'o//
365a1(brgyad stong): rab 'byor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rnam par lta bas chos gang yang rgyu med par 'byung ba yang /
365a2(brgyad stong): dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos gang yang rtag pa 'am/ ther zug pa 'am/ rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i chos can du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // chos gang yang
365a3(brgyad stong): byed pa po'am/ tshor ba por yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi zad pa
365a4(brgyad stong): mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par bsgrub cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba yin no// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
365a5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pas mngon par sgrub pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la rnam par lta ba de'i tshe/ rab 'byor byang chub sem/
365a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du tshor ba ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin/ 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yang yang dag par/
365a7(brgyad stong): rjes su mi mthong / ma rig pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du 'du byed rnams ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin/ ming dang gzugs ma yin/ skye mched drug ma yin//
365a8(brgyad stong): reg pa ma yin/ tsher ba ma yin/ sred pa ma yin/ len pa ma yin/ srid pa ma yin/ skye ba ma yin/ rga shi ma yin/ mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid
365b1(brgyad stong): mi 'di ba dang / 'khrug pa yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di'o zhes kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan no zhes yang
365b2(brgyad stong): dag pa rjes su mi mthong / chos gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di 'am gzhan no zhes yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i chos yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rab 'byor
365b3(brgyad stong): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
365b4(brgyad stong): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig can shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ mi zhig pha ma 'chi ba'i dus byas par gyur na/ shin tu mya ngan gyi
365b5(brgyad stong): zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud sdig can yang shin
365b6(brgyad stong): du mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci bdud sdig can gcig gcig shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan
365b7(brgyad stong): 'das ci bdud sdig can gcig gcig shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ 'on te bdud sdig can mang po shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ram/ 'on te stong gsum gyi
365b8(brgyad stong): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bdud sdig can ci snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i tshe shin tu mya ngan dang zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom/
366a1(brgyad stong): ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
366a2(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pas gnas pa de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni bdud sdig can ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad shin tu mya ngan gyi zug rngu
366a3(brgyad stong): dang ldan par 'gyur te/ rang rang gi stan la yang nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
366a4(brgyad stong): gnas pas gnas pa la ni/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bdag cag gis 'di bzung la 'tho 'tsham mo snyam pa 'am/ bla na med pa yang dag par
366a5(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar bzlog par bya'o snyam pa'i glags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ gting rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
366a6(brgyad stong): chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
366a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha
366a8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rab
366b1(brgyad stong): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// thabs
366b2(brgyad stong): mkhas pa thams cad sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni/ bdud kyi las gang cung zad
366b3(brgyad stong): 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad 'byung ba'i tshe/ rab tu shes par 'gyur te/ rab tu shes nas rnam par spong bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor thabs la mkhas pa thams cad yongs su
366b4(brgyad stong): gzung bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par bya'o// rab 'byor gang
366b5(brgyad stong): gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub par byed pa de'i tshe/ rab 'byor byad
366b6(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du grangs med pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i de dag la de dag
366b7(brgyad stong): gi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las skyes so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de ltar bsams nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
366b8(brgyad stong): chen po des yang sems 'di ltar skyed par bya ste/ ci ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang dag rjes su brnyes pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang chos dag rjes su
367a1(brgyad stong): @#// thob par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rten cig 'das kyi bar la tha na se gol gtogs pa srid tsam du
367a2(brgyad stong): yang sems skyed pa 'di dag bskyed par bya/ mngon par bsgrub par bya'o// rab 'byor gang yang dmigs pa dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis skal pa gang
367a3(brgyad stong): ka'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa byin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs pa can de bas ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis nyi ma cig 'das
367a4(brgyad stong): kyi bar gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chung ngu se gol gtogs pa cig tsam du mngon par bsgrub pa na bsod nams ches mang du skyed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di na
367a5(brgyad stong): phyir mi ldog pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang nyin cig 'das kyi bar la chung ngu na se gol gtogs pa srid tsam yang shes rab kyi pha rol
367a6(brgyad stong): tu phyin pa 'di la spyod cing sems pa bskyed pa 'di bskyed pa de de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs par rig par bya na/ gang sems bskyed pa 'di nyid thob ma thag rjes su 'jug par byed/
367a7(brgyad stong): pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pas 'gro ba gang zhig la re bar bya zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpal
367a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma gtogs par 'gro ba gzhan du dogs par mi bya ste/ de ni skal ba med
367b1(brgyad stong): pa dang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur te/ mtho ris su skye bar re bya'o// der yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral/
367b2(brgyad stong): ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing skye bar 'gyur te/ sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis chung ngu na sel gol
367b3(brgyad stong): gtogs pa gcig tsam du yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par bsgrub cing / sems skyed pa 'di bskyed par byed pa'i yon
367b4(brgyad stong): tan 'di dag dang phan yon 'di dag yin na gang zhig sems bskyed pa 'di nyid thob ma thag rjes su 'jug par byed pa lta ci smos/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
367b5(brgyad stong): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi bskyod pa'i drung na da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spos kyi glang po che zhes bya ba tshangs par spyad par spyod pa
367b6(brgyad stong): bzhin no// / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ me tog bkram pa'i le'u ste/ nyi shu brgyad pa'o// /
367b7(brgyad stong): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ltar rjes su rig par bya ste/ chos thams cad chags pa med pa'i phyir/
367b8(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad dper mi phyed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad
368a1(brgyad stong): 'byung ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad bdag med pa dang rnam par rig pa med par shes rab
368a2(brgyad stong): kyis rjes su rtogs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad ming tsam dang tha snyad gdags pa tsam gyis brjod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
368a3(brgyad stong): phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// tha snyad gdags pa yang gang la yang ma yin gang gis kyang ma yin gang yang tha snyad gdags pa med do// chos thams cad tha snyad med pa/ brjod du/
368a4(brgyad stong): med pa/ smras pa med pa/ tshig med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par
368a5(brgyad stong): rjes su rig par bya'o// gzugs tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba tshad med pa dang / 'du shes tshad med pa dang / 'du
368a6(brgyad stong): byed tshad rnams tshad med pa dang / rnam par shes pa tshad ma med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mtshan med pa'i phyir shes
368a7(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad nges par 'byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad rang bzhin
368a8(brgyad stong): gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o//
368b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad 'gog pa med pas spong ba dang mnyam pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa thob cing /
368b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin nyid dang mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mi 'ong mi 'gro mi shes mi skye/ shin tu mi skye ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
368b3(brgyad stong): tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// bdag dang gzhan du mi lta ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad 'phags pa dgra bcom pa
368b4(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad khur bor zhing khur mi khyer ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
368b5(brgyad stong): phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad yul med cing phyogs med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor
368b6(brgyad stong): gzugs ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid
368b7(brgyad stong): kyis yul dang phyogs med pa'o// chos thams cad 'gog pa rab tu tshim par byed pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// dga' ba med cing dga' ba/
368b8(brgyad stong): dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// 'dod chags med cing 'dod chags dang bral ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
369a1(brgyad stong): par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na 'dod chags par mi byed/ 'dod
369a2(brgyad stong): chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni de kho na dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis na/ 'dod
369a3(brgyad stong): chags par mi byed/ 'dod chags dang bral bar mi byed do// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad chags/
369a4(brgyad stong): pa dang ma chags pa'i zhen pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes khong du chud par byed pas chos thams cad byang chub po
369a5(brgyad stong): zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes
369a6(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro bas chos thams cad sman lta bu zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad byams pa la gnas
369a7(brgyad stong): pa dang snying rje la gnas pa dang dga' ba la gnas pa dang gtang snyoms la gnas pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad tshangs par
369a8(brgyad stong): gyur pas zhe sdang mi skyed cing zhe sdang thams cad mi len pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyir dang khong khro ba
369b1(brgyad stong): med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// na mkha' mu med pa'i
369b2(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// ri rab sna tshogs kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs par rjes su rig par bya'o//
369b3(brgyad stong): gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i
369b4(brgyad stong): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// nyi ma'i 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor mu med par snang ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su
369b5(brgyad stong): rig par bya'o// sgra thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa mu med pa'i phyir
369b6(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
369b7(brgyad stong): phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams
369b8(brgyad stong): dang / rlung gi khams dang / na mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
370a1(brgyad stong): chos bstsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad bstsags pa tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
370a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o// chos thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mu med pa thob pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o//
370a3(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med par rig par bya'o// chos thams cad mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa su med
370a4(brgyad stong): par rjes su rig par bya'o// stong pa nyid mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'i phyir shes rab
370a5(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rjes su rig par bya'o// sems kyi spyod pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med par rig par bya'o// dge ba dang mi dge
370a6(brgyad stong): ba'i chos tshad med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshad med par rjes su rig par bya'o// seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par/
370a7(brgyad stong): bya'o// chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khrug pa med par rjes su rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs ni rgya mtsho dang
370a8(brgyad stong): mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du rab 'byor tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rgya mtsho dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o//
370b1(brgyad stong): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni ri rab sna tshogs dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba
370b2(brgyad stong): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni ri rab sna tshogs dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes
370b3(brgyad stong): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gi 'od zer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
370b4(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'byung ba dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sgra thams cad mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin
370b5(brgyad stong): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra thams cad mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub
370b6(brgyad stong): pa med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa mu med pa dang /
370b7(brgyad stong): mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
370b8(brgyad stong): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni sa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du
371a1(brgyad stong): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni chu dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
371a2(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chu dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni me dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
371a3(brgyad stong): shes pa ni me dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rlung dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs
371a4(brgyad stong): ni na mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs
371a5(brgyad stong): pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bstsags pa
371a6(brgyad stong): dang bral bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni dge ba dang mi dge ba'i chos bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos thams cad
371a7(brgyad stong): bsags pa dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad bsags pa dang bral ba'o// gzugs ni chos thams cad
371a8(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin bu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin mu med pa dang mtshungs pa'o//
371b1(brgyad stong): gzugs ni bral ba ste/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni//
371b2(brgyad stong): bral ba ste/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gzugs ni chos thams cad mu med pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang /
371b3(brgyad stong): 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni chos thams cad mu med pa'i chos nyid do// gzugs ni stong pa mu med pa'i chos nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
371b4(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni stong pa mu med pa'i chos nyid do// gzugs ni sems can sems las byung ba mu med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
371b5(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sems dang sems las byung ba mu med pa'o// gzugs ni sems kyi spyod pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
371b6(brgyad stong): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni sems dang spyod pa las byung ba'o// gzugs ni dge ba dang mi dge ba dang mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
371b7(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni dge ba mi dge ba dang mi dmigs pa'i bar du'o// gzugs ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
371b8(brgyad stong): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni seng ge'i sgra dang mtshungs pa'o// gzugs ni 'khrug pa med pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang /
372a1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa ni 'jug pa med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rjes su rig par
372a2(brgyad stong): bya'o// rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de ltar rjes su rig par byed pa'i dang / rnam par spyod pa dang / 'jug pa dang / rtogs
372a3(brgyad stong): par byed pa dang / sems dpa' dang 'jal ba dang nye bar rtogs pa dang / sgyu dang / g.yo' thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / le lo thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i
372a4(brgyad stong): yid la byed pa dang / rlom sems thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / bdag stod pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / gzhan spong ba rnam par spong ba yid
372a5(brgyad stong): la byed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes pa rnam par spang ba'i yid la byed pa dang / sems can du 'du shes pa rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang /
372a6(brgyad stong): bsgrib pa lnga rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna rnam par spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dang / skye bo thams cad spangs pa'i yid la byed pa dag gis
372a7(brgyad stong): bsgom par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ de la yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams yongs su rdzogs pa rnyed
372a8(brgyad stong): dka' bar mi 'gyur ro// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rjes su rig pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ nyi shu dgu pa/
372b1(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa/ bam po nyi shu gsum pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
372b2(brgyad stong): pa 'di ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du gang da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs mi bzad par sgrogs
372b3(brgyad stong): pa'i drung du/ tshangs par spyad pa spyod pa des yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das le tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
372b4(brgyad stong): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshol ba na/ ci ltar yongs su btsal ba lags/
372b5(brgyad stong): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du sngon shes rab kyi pha
372b6(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol ba na lus la ched che bar mi byed/ srog la mi lta/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang tshigs su bcad pa dag la mi gnas par yongs su btsal yongs su btsal to//
372b7(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su tshol zhing 'brog dgon pa zhig du phyin pa na bar snang las sgra thos ste rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos
372b8(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur gyis/ ci ltar lus ngal ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / gnyid dang rmugs pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang / mtshan mo yid la byed
373a1(brgyad stong): pa mi bskyed pa dang / nyin mo yid la byed pa mi skyed pa dang grang ba yid la byed pa mi bskyed pa dang / tsha ba yid la byed pa mi skyed pa de ltar song shig/ nang ngam phyi
373a2(brgyad stong): rol gang la yang sems smon par ma byed cig/ rigs kyi bu g.yon du ma lta bar song shig/ g.yas su ma yin/ shar du ma yin/ nub tu ma yin/ byang du ma yin/ steng du ma yin/ 'og tu ma yin/
373a3(brgyad stong): phyogs mtshams su yang ma lta bar song shig/ rigs kyi bu ci ltar bdag las ma g.yos shing 'jig tshogs las kyang ma yin pa dang / ci ltar gzugs las kyang ma g.yos pa dang / ci ltar tshor
373a4(brgyad stong): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / ci ltar rnam par shes pa las kyang ma g.yos pa de ltar song shig/ gang 'di las g.yos pa de ni rnam par nyams par 'gyur ro// ci las nyas
373a5(brgyad stong): par 'gyur zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ro// gang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nyams par 'gyur ba de ni 'khor ba la spyod do// gang 'khor ba la spyod pa de ni shes rA/
373a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su mi thob bo zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
373a7(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu dus sgra de la 'di skad ces de bzhin du bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga ni sems can thams cad la snang bar byed 'dod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrub par 'dod
373a8(brgyad stong): pa'i phyir ro zhes smras so// de skad ces smras pa dang / sgra des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu rtag tu du legs so legs so zhes smraso//
373b1(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus yang sgra thos te rigs kyi bu khyod kyis stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa chos thams cad la mos pa bskyed/
373b2(brgyad stong): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o// khyod kyis mtshan ma yongs su spang ba dang / dngos po yongs su spang ba dang / sems can du lta ba yongs su spang bar
373b3(brgyad stong): bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sdig pa'i grogs po dag yongs su spang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
373b4(brgyad stong): byung ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags pa dang / dngos po med par chos rnams ston pa dag la khyod kyis bsnyen par bya gus par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bsgrub
373b5(brgyad stong): na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du chud pa 'am dge slong chos smra ba'i lus la yod pa thos par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
373b6(brgyad stong): pa 'di thos pa de la khyod kyis ston par 'du shes skyed par bya zhing / khyod kyis byas pa bzo' ba dang byas pa tshor bar byas te/ gang las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos pa 'di ni bdag gi dge
373b7(brgyad stong): pa'i bshes gnyen yin te/ 'di bdag gis zos pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa
373b8(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bsnyen par 'gyur zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dang ma bral ba rnams su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa rnams spong bar 'gyur ro// dal
374a1(brgyad stong): ba phun sum tshogs pa spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu phan yon 'di rnams khyod kyis yongs su rtogs la dge slong chos smra ba la ston pa yin par 'du shes bskyed
374a2(brgyad stong): par bya'o// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'jig rten gyi zang zing dang ldan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyis dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar mi bya'i/ khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba la chos don tu gnyer/
374a3(brgyad stong): ba dang / chos la gus par bya bas phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// khyod kyis bdud kyi las rnams kyang rtogs par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu bdud sdig can ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
374a4(brgyad stong): chen po rnams la gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg pa dag bsnyen pa dang bsten pa dang / spyad par bya ba'i phyir nye bar sgrub ste/ de dag chos smra ba des zil kyis mnan nas
374a5(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pas 'grogs shing bsten pa dang snyen par byed pa yang yod de rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge slong chos smra ba de la ma dad pa bskyed par mi bya'o// gzhan du na sems 'di ltar/
374a6(brgyad stong): bskyed par bya ste/ bdag ni thabs mkhas pa de mi shes kyi/ 'di ni thabs mkhas pa rab tu shes so// 'di ni sems can gdul ba'i tshul gyis sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba
374a7(brgyad stong): yongs su bzung ba'i phyir chos 'di dag la brten cing 'grogs te bsnyen par byed kyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni gang la yang chags pa 'am sgrib pa med kyis
374a8(brgyad stong): skad cig de nyid la rigs kyi bu khyod nyid kyis chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul so sor brtag par bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos
374b1(brgyad stong): thams cad kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa'o// chos thams cad sems can med pa/ srog
374b2(brgyad stong): med pa/ gso' ba med/ skyes bu med pa/ gang zag med pa/ sgyu ma lta bu/ rmi lam lta bu/ sla brnyan lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i tshul de ltar rtog cing /
374b3(brgyad stong): chos smra ba'i rjes su 'brang na ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang khyod kyis bdud kyi las la soms shig/ rigs kyi
374b4(brgyad stong): bu gal te chos smra ba dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don du gnyer ba'i rigs kyi bu la brnyas par byed cing mi sems na/ de la rigs kyi bu khyod kyis phyir bsngo bar mi bya ste/ gzhan du na
374b5(brgyad stong): chos don du gnyer ba nyid dang chos la gus par byed pa nyid dang yid mi skyo bas dge slong chos smra ba'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar bya'o// zhes de skad kyang thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems/
374b6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu ngus sgra de las rjes su bstan pa 'di blangs nas shar phyogs ga la ba der song ba dang / ring por ma phyin par de 'di snyam du bdag gis sgra de la ci srid du 'gro bar bya ma byas/
374b7(brgyad stong): so snyam du bsams nas des phyogs de nyid du ngu zhing cho ngas 'debs te mya ngan byed la sme zhing 'dug ste/ de 'di snyam du sa phyogs 'di nyid du nyin zhag gcig gis bar du nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed do//
374b8(brgyad stong): nyin mtshan gnyis sam gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am drug gam/ nyin mtshan bdun yang 'da' bar bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par ma gyur gyi bar du lus ngal ba yid la
375a1(brgyad stong): byed pa mi skyed/ thugs pa dang gnyid yid la byed pa mi skyed/ dba' ba med la byed pa mi byed/ btung ba yid la byed pa mi skyed/ mtshan mo yid la byed pa mi bskyed/ nyin/
375a2(brgyad stong): mo yid la byed pa mi skyed/ tsha ba dang grang ba yid la byed pa mi skyed do snyam du bsams so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu la la zhig bu 'chi ba'i dus byas na sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bdeg
375a3(brgyad stong): bachen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de lta bu'i mya ngan gyis bu cig pu yid la byed pa nyid ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang mi 'byung ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
375a4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang de'i tshe bdag gis nam shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur snyam pa ma gtogs par yid la byed pa gzhan gang yang ma byung ngo // rab 'byor
375a5(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar gdung zhing 'dug pa'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs shig bzhugs nas legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/
375a6(brgyad stong): 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis tshig de skad smra ba legs so// ci ltar khyod kyis da ltar yongs su btsal ba de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
375a7(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu btsal to// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir khyod kyis brtson 'grus 'di nyid
375a8(brgyad stong): dang spro ba 'di nyid dang / don du gnyer ba 'di nyid dang / 'dod pa 'di lta bu nyid kyis rjes su 'brang zhing shar phyogs nyid du song shig dang / rigs kyi bu 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgya na spos dang ldan
375b1(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i grong khyer rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ba/ 'obs rim pa bdun dang / shing ta la rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ nur dpag tshad bcu gnyis
375b2(brgyad stong): zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ 'byor pa rgyas pa/ bde ba lo legs pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis gang ba/ bar gi tshong khang gi phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur blta na sdug pa/ pags par
375b3(brgyad stong): gyur pa mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang / khyogs kyi gzhon pa dang / rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gis legs par bsgrubs pa/ grong khyer gyi kho ra yug
375b4(brgyad stong): du zhol gyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyis bskor la/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba de dag gi mnga' yab rnams ni 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/ mthong zhing tshad
375b5(brgyad stong): dang ldan pa/ mda' yab thams cad kyi rtse mo las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi shing skyes te/ rin po che sna tshogs bkra ba'i shing tog 'bras bu chags pa/ mda' yab las shing skyes pa
375b6(brgyad stong): thams cad las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi tha gu byung bas mda' yab gnyis pa'i shing gzhan dang 'brel ba/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i grong khyer de gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas khe'us
375b7(brgyad stong): te/ dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba 'di lta ste/ dper na yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i rol mo tshogs pa/ rol mo mkhan
375b8(brgyad stong): mkhas pas brdungs shing blangs na sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ba de bzhin du dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba de dag la rlung gis btab na/ sgra 'jam zhing snyan pa yid du 'ong ba dag 'byung ste/
376a1(brgyad stong): sla des sems can de dag ce dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do/ grong khyer de'or sug du 'bab tu rjes su brdzun par 'bab pa'i nus yongs su gang zhing / chu bcang ya
376a2(brgyad stong): mi grang ha chang yang mi dro bas gang ba dag yod do// chu de dag nyid la sngon sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin par grub pa/ rin po che sna bdun las rnam par bkra zhing blta na
376a3(brgyad stong): sdug pa'i gru dag yod de/ der sems can dag zhugs nas rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// chu de dag thams cad kyang ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dag
376a4(brgyad stong): gis khebs pa/ me tog rigs che zhing bzang la dri bzang po'i ngad dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis kyang khebs te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i me tog
376a5(brgyad stong): gi rigs las de na med pa gang yang med do// grong khyer de'i nang na/ skyed mos tshal lnga brgya yod de/ thams cad kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin/ rnam par bkra zhing blta na bsdu ba
376a6(brgyad stong): shas tag ste/ skyed mos tshal de dag re re nas yang rdzing bu kho ra yug tu rgyang grags kyi tshad tsam lnga brgya lnga brgya yod de/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad nas rin po che sna bdun gyi
376a7(brgyad stong): rang bzhin gyi me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu te dang / badz+ra dkar po rnam par bkra zhing blta na bsdug pa dag skyes te/ de dag gis chu de khebs te/ ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dad
376a8(brgyad stong): pad ma dkar po bzang po de dag thams cad kyang chu zhed du shing rta'i 'khor tsam ste/ dri bzang ba/ sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon por ston pa/ sngon por snang ba/ ser po kha dog ser
376b1(brgyad stong): bo/ ser po ston pa ser por snang ga dmar po kha dog dmar po/ dmar por ston pa dmar por snang ba/ dkar po kha dog dkar po/ dkar por son pa dkar por snang ba dag
376b2(brgyad stong): yod do// rdzing bu de dag thams cad na dang dur dang / khrung zhung dang / ka ran da dang / sa ra sa sgra 'byin pa dag yod do// skyed mos tshal de dag thams cad kyang nga yir bya ba med cing yod
376b3(brgyad stong): su 'dzin pa med de/ 'di ltar yun ring por sems can dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu pa la spyod cing / sangs rgyas kyi tshul la gus par byed pa rjes su 'gro ba'i thos pa dang / sems
376b4(brgyad stong): pa legs par rtogs pa/ yun ring por chos zab mo la mos pa'i sems can de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas grub pa yin no// de la rigs kyi bu grong khyer spos dang
376b5(brgyad stong): ldan pa de'i dbus kyi bzhi mdon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khang pa rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ kho ra yug du dpag tshad kyi tshad tsam/ rnam par
376b6(brgyad stong): bkra zhing blta na sdug pa/ ra ba rim bdun dang ta la'i 'phreng rim pa bdun gyis yongs su bkor ba zhig yod de/ khang pa de na khang pa'i yongasu longs spyod pa dang / nye bar longs spyad pa dag
376b7(brgyad stong): tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / mya ngan med pa dang / mya ngan dang bral zhes bya ba dang / me tog sna tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mos tshal dang / skyed mos tshal bzhi yod de/
376b8(brgyad stong): skyed mos tshal de dag re re na yang 'di lta ste/ rdzing bu bzang po zhes bya ba dang / bzang mchog ces bya ba dang / dga' ba zhes bya ba dang / dga' mchog ces bya ba dang / bde ba zhes bya ba dang /
377a1(brgyad stong): bde mchog ces bya ba dang / nges pa zhes bya ba dang / mi 'bab ces bya ba brgyad brgyad yod de/ yang rdzing bu de dag gi ngos gcig ni gser gyi rang bzhin/ ngos
377a2(brgyad stong): gnyis pa ni dngul gyi rang bzhin/ ngos gsum pa ni bai dUr+ya'i rang bzhin/ ngos bzhi pa ni shel gyi rang bzhin/ 'og gi sa gzhi ni kar ka ta na'i rang bzhin la gser gyi bye ma bdal ba
377a3(brgyad stong): ste/ rdzing du de dag re re la yang them smras them pa rin po che'i rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas brgyan pa brgyad brgyad yod de/ them skas de dag thams cad kyi bar nas
377a4(brgyad stong): kyang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser gyi shing ljon pa dag skyes so// rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu ni me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs kyis kheb
377a5(brgyad stong): shing / ngang dur dang khrung khrung dang / ka ran da dang sa ra sa rnams skad 'byin to// rdzing bu de dag gi khor yug du me tog gi shing rnam pa sna tshogs skyes te/ me tog gi shing de dag
377a6(brgyad stong): la rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog rnams rdzing bu'i nang du lhung bas/ rdzing bu de dag thams cad kyi chu yang tsan dan gyi drir yang phyogs shing kha dog dang ldan dri dang ldan ro dang
377a7(brgyad stong): ldan reg pa dang ldan no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'khor dang bcas pa bud med drug khri brgyad stong dang lhan cig tu 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
377a8(brgyad stong): dang ldan zhing dbang du gyur te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// grong khyer de na sems can skyes pa dang bud med gang gzhan dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang skyed mos tshal
377b1(brgyad stong): lam rdzing bu dag na rtag tu dga' zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan nas dbang du gyur te/ rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod do// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
377b2(brgyad stong): 'phags de dus de srid du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig tu rtse dga' zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed cing de na dus gsum du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// sems can gang
377b3(brgyad stong): dag grong khyer spos ldan na 'khod pa de dag kyang grong khyer gyi dbus kyi bzhi mdor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi khri gser gyi rkang pa dang dngul gyi rkang
377b4(brgyad stong): pa dang / be dur+ya'i rkang pa dang / shel gyi rkang pa btsugs pa shing bal bting ba/ stan par tshangs can bting ba/ steng snying po can du byas pa/ ka shi ka'i gos bting ba/ 'phang du
377b5(brgyad stong): rgyang grags byed yod pa bshams te/ steng gyi bar snang la yang gos kyi bla re mu tig gis brgyan pa bres pa la ci 'di legs par gnas sam snyam pas/ legs par gnas pa sna
377b6(brgyad stong): tshogs pa rnam par smin pas lhan cig tu mnyam par rab tu 'dzin par byed cing / sa phyogs de khor yug du yang me tog kha dog lnga pa dag mngon par gtor yang dag par gtor bar byed
377b7(brgyad stong): la/ ci ltar yang 'di chos kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos la gus pas/ sa phyogs der yang dri dang gdug
377b8(brgyad stong): pa sna tshogs kyis shin tu 'dug par byed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ rigs kyi bu sem
378a1(brgyad stong): can de dag ni de ltar chos la gus par byed cing chos rnams la rten pa dang / dad pa dang ldan pas dang ba dang / dad pa bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa'
378a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan to// de na gang dag nyan pa'i lha dang / mi srog chags brgya phrag mang po// srog chags stong phrag mang po//
378a3(brgyad stong): srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po tshogs pa de dag las la la ni lung 'bogs/ la la ni kha ton byed/ la la ni yi ger 'dri/ la la ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rtogs par byed de/
378a4(brgyad stong): sems can de dag thams cad kyang log par mi ltung ba'i chos can te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs bu'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ma yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod byang chub sems
378a5(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song shig dang / de las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de ni yun ring po nas khyod kyi dge ba'i
378a6(brgyad stong): bshes gnyen yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa/ yang dag par gzeng stong pa/ yang dag par rab tu
378a7(brgyad stong): dga' bar byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu des kyang sngon da ltar khyod ci ltar tshol ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su btsal gyis/ rigs kyi bu khyod nyin mtshan du yid
378a8(brgyad stong): la byed pa rgyun ma gcad par bskyed pas song gig dang / ring po mi thogs par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
378b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de thos nas/ dga' mgu yid rangs rab tu mgu zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skyes bu mde'u dug can zhig gis/
378b2(brgyad stong): phog na yid la byed pa gzhan mi skyed kyi/ gang bdag zug rngu 'di sgrol zhing bdag sdug bsngal 'di las thar par byed pa zug rngu 'byin pa'i sman pa bdag gis nam snyed snyam sems dpa' de
378b3(brgyad stong): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du yang de'i tshe gang bdag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de zos par byed cing / chos gang thos nas bdag gi dmigs pa yid
378b4(brgyad stong): la byed pa spong bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi bu de dag gis nam mthong snyam sems pa ma gtogs par chos gang yang yid la mi byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
378b5(brgyad stong): po rtag tu du sa phyogs de nyid du 'dug pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// thos nas kyang chos thams
378b6(brgyad stong): cad la mi gnas pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas/ de ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo du ma mngon du gyur pa 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos
378b7(brgyad stong): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
378b8(brgyad stong): tha dad pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad 'gyur ba med par mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad snang bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
379a1(brgyad stong): dang / chos thams cad mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi shes pa sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
379a2(brgyad stong): rnam par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me tog bkram pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad
379a3(brgyad stong): ba dag gi dngos po mi sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgyu ma rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / me long gi dkyil 'khor snang ba sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
379a4(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad mngon
379a5(brgyad stong): par dga' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad kyi sgra la mkhas pa'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra dang tshig dang yig 'bru sna tshogs
379a6(brgyad stong): sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rang bzhin gyis tha snyad med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgrib pa med pa'i rnam
379a7(brgyad stong): par thar pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming dang nges pa'i tshig dang / tshig dang yig 'bru zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzi
379a8(brgyad stong): dang / chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yul dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
379b1(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' dang tshungs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs kyi rdul sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
379b2(brgyad stong): phun sum 'tshogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i mig ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges
379b3(brgyad stong): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings las nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbugs 'byin pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge mngon
379b4(brgyad stong): par sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems can thams cad zil kyis gnon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul dang rnam par bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun
379b5(brgyad stong): nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po thams cad kyi rjes su song ba
379b6(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par shes pa dang stobs dang mi 'jigs pa thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
379b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad la de khar 'bigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi 'byor pa rgya mtsho zhes bya ba/
379b8(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bye brag med par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lta bar gyur pa'i thibs po thams cad rnams par spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin da//
380a1(brgyad stong): mun pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las rnam par grol/
380a2(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / le lo thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos zab mo'i 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ri rab 'dra ba zhes bya/
380a3(brgyad stong): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'phrogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par sel bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten gsum la/
380a4(brgyad stong): mngon par ma chags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // 'od zer bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
380a5(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas bcom ldan
380a6(brgyad stong): 'das gzhal du med grangs med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid rab tu ston pa dag mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
380a7(brgyad stong): gis legs so zhes bya ba byin nas dbugs dbyung bar mdzad de/ tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu nged kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bzhin
380a8(brgyad stong): du yongs su btsal te/ yongs su tshol ba na yang bang 'dir khyod kyis thob pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu nyid dag thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'di lta bu thob nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
380b1(brgyad stong): rtogs par khong du chud par gyur te/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la gnas par gyur to// nged kyis ting 'dzin 'di dag gi ngo bo nyid dang rang bzhin la ltas te/ gang mnyam par gzhag par
380b2(brgyad stong): bya ba 'am/ ldang bar bya ba 'am/ gang byang chub tu spyad pa 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba'i chos de gang yang yang dag par
380b3(brgyad stong): rje su ma mthong ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de yin te/ chos gang gis kyang rlom sems sam/ rlom sems med par mi byed pa la gnas nas/ nged kyis 'di 'dra ba'i
380b4(brgyad stong): lus gser gi kha dog lta bu thob ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya cu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / sangs rgyas
380b5(brgyad stong): kyi shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bla na med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la re shig de bzhin
380b6(brgyad stong): gshegs pa dag gis kyang tshad gzung ba 'am/ mtha' bstan par nus na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dag gis lta ci smos/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod kyis chos 'di dag nyid la rab
380b7(brgyad stong): tu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dod pas gus pa mchog du bskyed par bya ste/ rigs kyi bu don tu gnyer ba dang / 'dod pa la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnyed par dka'
380b8(brgyad stong): ba ma yin no// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen la shin tu gus pa bskyed par bya ste/ phangs par bya'o// rab tu dang bar bya'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongasu zin pa'i
381a1(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes kyang gsungs so// de nas de bzhin
381a2(brgyad stong): gshegs pa de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags zhes gsol to// de dag gis de la 'di skad ces
381a3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas shing yongs su bzung
381a4(brgyad stong): ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la slab so// rigs kyi bu de ni khyod kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yongs su 'dzin pa yin te/
381a5(brgyad stong): byas pa shes pa dang byas pa tshor bas des bsko ba dang / des pa bzhin du zung shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la skal pa gcig
381a6(brgyad stong): gam/ skal pa gnyis sam/ skal pa gsum 'am/ skal pa brgya'am/ skal pa stong ngam/ skal pa brgya stong ngam/ de las lhag par yang 'go la thod bzhin du thogs shing /
381a7(brgyad stong): bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg pa ci snyed yod pa de dag
381a8(brgyad stong): thams cad phul yang rigs kyi bu de'i byas pa de nyid la lan lon pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu rigs kyi bu de'i mthus khyod kyis 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rnams
381b1(brgyad stong): rnyed par 'gyur te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa thos shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to// de nas de bzhin gsheg
381b2(brgyad stong): pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du dbugs phyungs nas mi snang bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu de yang ting nge 'dzin de dag las langs te/
381b3(brgyad stong): langs nas yang 'di snyam du sems so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud snyam ste/ de de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
381b4(brgyad stong): ma mthong bas rab tu gdung zhing mi dga' gyur ro// yang de 'di snyam du sems te/ 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/
381b5(brgyad stong): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag par bya ba byas pa ste/ bdag gi dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag par yongasu 'dzin pa/ yun ring po nas des bdag
381b6(brgyad stong): gi don byas pa yin gyis/ bdag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mngon par song ste/ nye bar phyin nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang
381b7(brgyad stong): nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces don 'di nyid dri'o snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la dga' ba dang / dang
381b8(brgyad stong): pa dang / ri mo dang gus par bya ba nye bar bzhag ste/ nye bar gzhag nas 'di snyam du bdag gis ci lta bu'i bkur stir bya bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
381'a1(brgyad stong): chos 'phags de'i drung du 'gro bar bya/ bdag ni dbul te bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bdag gis bkur stir bya ba'i
381'a2(brgyad stong): gos sam/ rin po che 'am/ gser ram/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gam/ bai dur+ya 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byi ru 'am/ dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa'am/
381'a3(brgyad stong): dri'am/ phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ phye ma 'am/ chos gos sam/ gdugs sam/ rgyal mtshan nam/ dril bu 'am/ ba dan de lta bu yang bdag la ci yang med na/ bdag
381'a4(brgyad stong): 'di bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du song na ni de dag gis mi rigs pa byas par 'gyur te/ bdag dga' ba 'am/ rangs pa
381'a5(brgyad stong): yang mi skye'o snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de lta bu'i yon tan dag dang / ma la gus pa byed pa yid la ldan pas song nas/ mthar kyis
381'a6(brgyad stong): grong khyer gzhan du phyin par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du grong bar gi srang ga la ba der song ste/ de'i grong bar gyi dbus su phyin nas de 'di
381'a7(brgyad stong): snyam du 'di ltar bdag gis lus btsongs la/ de'i rin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya'o// yun ring po nas bdag gi lus stong /
381'a8(brgyad stong): zhig cing zad de/ 'gags par btsongaso// 'khor ba dpag tu med pa na 'dod pa'i rgyu dang / 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa dag myong
381'b1(brgyad stong): yang 'di lta bu'i chos kyi phyir ram/ 'di lta bu'i sems can chen po la bkur sti bya ba'i phyir ma yin no snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag
381'b2(brgyad stong): tu dus grong bar gyi tshong 'dus kyi dbus su 'dug ste/ mi su 'dod/ mi su 'dod/ mi su nyo bar 'dod ces sgra bsgrags shing skad kyis bos so// de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'di
381'b3(brgyad stong): skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chos 'phags la bkur
381'b4(brgyad stong): stir byed cing / ci ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su
381'b5(brgyad stong): rdzogs par 'gyur zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa yongs su 'dri bar bya ste/ des thos pa rgya mtsho rjes su thob par 'gyur/ bdud dang
381'b6(brgyad stong): bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu dag gis mi thub par 'gyur/ yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rjes su thob par 'gyur/ der sems can mang po dag gi don byed par
381'b7(brgyad stong): 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de gzhan dag kyang nga'i yul las 'da' bar byed par 'gyur
381'b8(brgyad stong): gyis/ bdag gis 'di'i bar chad bya'o snyam du bsams so// // de nas bdud sdig can gyis ci nas bram ze dang khyim bdag de dag gis byang chub sems
382a1(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus mi su 'dod mi su 'dong mi su tso bar 'dod ces zer bsna ci ltar thos par mi 'gyur ba de ltar long su bsgribs so// de nas
382a2(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu gang gi tshe bdag nyo ba ma rnyed de'i tshe/ phyogs gcig tu sor nas ngus te mchi ma byung nas 'di skad du bdag gi lus
382a3(brgyad stong): btsongs la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya snyam na/ lus nyo ba yang bdag gis ma rnyed de/ kye ma bdag ni thob pa ngan pa thob
382a4(brgyad stong): po zhes sbas so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di snyam du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gi lu
382a5(brgyad stong): yongs su gtang bar lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa yin nam ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la bdag gis sad par bya'o snyam du bsams so//
382a6(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i cha byad du mngon par sprul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngug la ba der song ste/ 'ongs nas
382a7(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar khyod mi dga' zhing gdung la tshim byung zhing gnas pa ci nges/
382a8(brgyad stong): de la rtag tu dus 'di skad ces sbas so// bram ze'i khye'u nga'i lus 'tshong bar 'dod na/ lus 'di nyo bar yang ma rnyed do// brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs can
382b1(brgyad stong): gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu dus de la smras pa/ bram ze'i khye'u nga ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag nyid btsongs te/
382b2(brgyad stong): chos 'dod par bya bar 'dod cing / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bags la yang bkur stir bya bar 'dod na/ lus nyo ba de ngas ma rnyed nas/
382b3(brgyad stong): de la nga 'di snyam du sems so// kye ma nga ni bsod nams chung bas 'di ltar lus btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems
382b4(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur sti bya snyam na/ bdag gi lus nyo ba yang ma rnyed do snyam mo// de nas bram ze'i khye'u des byang chub sems dpa'
382b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bung la mis ni bya ba med kyi/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed de/ der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang /
382b6(brgyad stong): rus pa dang / rkang dag la dgos na/ rin gyis nyor byin cig ces byas pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/
382b7(brgyad stong): gang bdag gis bram ze'i khye'u 'di bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang nyo ba rnyed pa 'di ni rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed do// bdag gi lus ni shes
382b8(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// snyam nas de sems dga' ba dang / sems bde ba dang //
383a1(brgyad stong): sems rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/ bram ze'i khre'u del 'di skad ces sbas so// bram ze'i khye'u de'i lus 'di las khyod gang dang gas
383a2(brgyad stong): 'dod pa sbyin no// des de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod rin du 'dod pa sbyin no zhes byas pa dang / des de la 'di skad ces smras so// bram ze'i
383a3(brgyad stong): khye'u khyod kyis gang btang ba de ngal byin cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mtshon rnon po thogs nas/ lag pa g.yas pa dug ste
383a4(brgyad stong): khrag gzags so// brla g.yas pa sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ngo // de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig khang pa'i yang thog na 'dug pa
383a5(brgyad stong): des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du khrag mang po 'dzag pa dang / brla sha med par btogs nas rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song ba mthong nas/
383a6(brgyad stong): de 'di snyam du sems te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ci'i phyir bdag nyid la bdag nyid 'di lta bu'i na cha byed pa/ bdag rigs kyi bu de'i drung du song ste dri'o snyam nas/ tshong dpon gyi
383a7(brgyad stong): bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu la 'di skad ces smras so//
383a8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod ci'i phyir/ khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i na cha dag byed/ khrag dang rus pa dang / rkang 'dis ci zhig bya zhes smras pa dang / rtag tu dus bu mo de la 'di
383b1(brgyad stong): skad ces sbas so// bram ze'i khye'u 'di la btsongs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
383b2(brgyad stong): 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod
383b3(brgyad stong): 'di ltar bdag gi snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang yang btsongs te rigs kyi bu de la bkur stir bya bar 'dod pa dang khyod la yon tan gyi rnam par ci zhig 'gyu
383b4(brgyad stong): bar 'gyur/ des de la smras pa/ bu mo rigs kyi bu de ni gang la ngas slab par bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa dag ston par 'gyur te/
383b5(brgyad stong): de la ngas ba srabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur/ lus gser gyi kha
383b6(brgyad stong): thog lta bu yang thob par 'gyur/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe' byad bzang po brgya bcu dang / 'od 'dom gang ba dang / 'od zer mtha' yas dang /
