383b7(brgyad stong): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas chos ma 'dres pa
383b8(brgyad stong): bco brgyad dang 'thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / de bzhin
384a1(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / bla na med pa yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ gang gis
384a2(brgyad stong): sems can thams cad la kun tu dgo bsha bya'i bla na med pa'i chos rin po che yang rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
384a3(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu du la 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di ltar chos brgya chen po 'di dag yongs su brjod pa ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta'i chos re re'i/
384a4(brgyad stong): phyir yang bskal pa gang ga'i klung gi bye snyed du lus yongs su btang bar bya ba'i yin na gcig lta ci smos/ de tsam du khyod kyis chos 'di dag rgya cher yongs su brjod na/
384a5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba'i gser ram nor bu 'am mu tig gam/ bai DUr+ya 'am/
384a6(brgyad stong): dngul lam/ me tog gam/ bdug pa 'am/ spos sam/ 'phreng ba 'am/ byug pa 'am/ bye ma 'am/ gos sam/ gdugs sam/ khyod la ci dgos pa de khyod pa/
384a7(brgyad stong): sbyin gyis bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal ma byed cig/ kho mo yang khyod dang 'grogs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong
384a8(brgyad stong): la/ bdag dang khyod dang lhan cig du 'di lta ste/ de lta bu'i chos 'di dag thob par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par bya'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/
384b1(brgyad stong): bram ze'i cha byad mi snang bar byas nas/ bdag nyid kyi lus su byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i mdun du 'dug nas 'di skad ces/ rigs kyi bu khyod de
384b2(brgyad stong): lta bu'i yi dmal brtan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos don tu gnyer ba legs so legs so// sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
384b3(brgyad stong): dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa yongs su zhus pas chos rin po che yongs su thob nas/
384b4(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rigs kyi bu nga la snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang / rkang gis bya ba med kyi/
384b5(brgyad stong): nga khyod la sad pa'i phyir 'dir 'ongs kyis mchog slongs shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod la mchog ci lta bu zhig sbyin par bya zhes smras so// des de la smras pa/ rgya byin sangs rgyas
384b6(brgyad stong): kyi chos bla na med pa yang bdag la stsol cig/ brgya byin gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu'i yul 'di la ni nga'i nus pa yod pa ma yin te/ yang yul 'di ni sangs rgyas
384b7(brgyad stong): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul du gyur pa yin gyis/ mchog gzhan spongs cig/ rtag tu ngus smras pa/ bdag gi lus yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i gnas 'di la/
384b8(brgyad stong): ni lha'i dbang po brtson pa chung bar gyis shig/ lha'i dbang po nga'i 'di la bdag nyid kyis bden pa'i byin gyi rlabs bya'o// lha'i dbang po bden pa gang gis bdag bla na med
385a1(brgyad stong): @pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
385a2(brgyad stong): lung bstan cing / bdag gis lhag pa'i bsam pa g.yo med par mkhyen na/ bden pa de dang / bden pa'i tshig des bdag gi lus sngon gyi ci lta ba bzhin du gyur cig ces
385a3(brgyad stong): byas pa dang / de nas skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la sangs rgyas kyi mthur dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
385a4(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu'i lus sngon gyi ci lta ba bzhin du gnas pa dang / nad med pa dang / gnod pa med par gyur to// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / bdud sdig can
385a5(brgyad stong): yang spobs pa med par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la lan glan par spobs pa ma bskyed nas/ de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// de nas
385a6(brgyad stong): tshong dpon gyibu mo des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces sbas so// rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog/ bdag gi khyim gan yod pa der dong nga/
385a7(brgyad stong): bdag gis pha ma'i drung nas nor blangs te 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir bdag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de la yang mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub
385a8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags de la bkur stir bya ba khyod la sbyin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dag
385b1(brgyad stong): 'grogs nas/ de rang gi khyim ga la yod pa der dong ste phyin nas sgo drung du bsdad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de rang gi khyim du phyin nas/ pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so// /
385b2(brgyad stong): yangab yum gser dang / dngul dang / rin po che dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / gos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang /
385b3(brgyad stong): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / rol mo'i cha spyang tshogs dag bdag la gsol cig/ bdag kyang khyed
385b4(brgyad stong): kyis gsal ba'i g.yog mo bu mo lnga brgya 'di dag dang lhan cig dger gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dang bdag cag 'grogs te byang chub
385b5(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du mchod pa bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de yang bdag la chos ston par 'gyur zhing des bdag gis kyang sangs
385b6(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi chos rnams rnyed par 'gyur ro// de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// bu mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu zhes bya
385b7(brgyad stong): bsu zhig/ de da ltar gang na 'dug/ bu mos sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu de daltar ro skol gyi drung na mchis te/ rigs kyi bu de ni lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag/
385b8(brgyad stong): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang dag par zhugs pa 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa
386a1(brgyad stong): las par bar 'tshal bas/ decos bcal ba'i slad du bdag nyid btsongs la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bgyi bar 'tsham/
386a2(brgyad stong): 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la yang bkur bstir bgyi bar 'tshal na/ de'i lus nyo ba 'ga' yang ma rnyed cing / ma rnyed pas
386a3(brgyad stong): sdug bsngal bsngal zhing yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing / mchi ma byung nas mchis pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs su
386a4(brgyad stong): bsgyur bas sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde bas mi dga' bar sems shing / mchi ma byung nas gnas pa ci nges/ des de la smras
386a5(brgyad stong): ba/ bdag nyid 'tshong bar 'dod na/ bdag gis de nyo ba yang ba rnyed do// bram ze'i khye'u'i gzugs kyi brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang gi phyir
386a6(brgyad stong): lus 'tshong bar 'dod/ rtag tu rus smras pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya ba dang / 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
386a7(brgyad stong): chos 'phags de la yang bkur stir bya'o// nga'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de la rag las pas 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir ro zhes bgyis pa dang / bram
386a8(brgyad stong): ze'i khye'u'i gzugs brgya byin gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod ni nga mi 'dod de/ 'on kyang nga mchod sbyin zhig byed pa der mi'i snying dang / khrag dang / rus pa dang /
386b1(brgyad stong): rkang dag dgos so zhes bgyis pa dang / rigs kyi bu des yim bsad par de la 'di skad du sbyin no zhes sbas nas/ de mtshon rnon po thogs te/ bdag gi lag pa
386b2(brgyad stong): phug ste khrag gzags brla sha med par btogs te/ rus pa gcog tu rtsig pa'i drung du song nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ rus pa dang rkang sbyin no snyam nas
386b3(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de khrag gzags pa bdag gis khang pa'i yang thogs na mchis pas mthong ste/ de la bdag 'di snyam du bgyid do// mi 'di ci'i slad du 'di lta bur
386b4(brgyad stong): bdag nyid la na tsha dag bgyid snyam ste/ de'i thad du mchis nas 'di skad du bgyis so// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bdag nyid la bdag nyid kyi lus kyi khrag gzags
386b5(brgyad stong): ba 'dis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa da/ de bdag la 'di skad ces mchi ste/ bu mo bram ze'i khye'u 'di la khrag dang / snying dang / rus pa dang / rkang sbyin no// de ci'i
386b6(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ nga ni dbul te nga la nor gzhan ci yang med do zhes mchi'o// bdag gyis khyod la nor gyis ci zhig bya zhes bgyis pa dang / de bdag la 'di skad
386b7(brgyad stong): du 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod par bya'o// 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
386b8(brgyad stong): 'phags la yang bkur stir bya'o// zhes mchis nas/ bdag gis de la 'di skad ces bgyis te/ rigs kyi bu des khyod la yon tan gyi rigs sam/
387a1(brgyad stong): yon tan gyi khyad par ci zhig 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bdag la 'di skad du sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa brjod pa dang /
387a2(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas kyi chos gzham du med pa rnams rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams de las 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bdag la mchi ste/ sangs
387a3(brgyad stong): rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag thos nas/ bdag kyang dga' ba dang / rab tu mgu ba chen po skyes nas 'di snyam du bgyid de/ rigs kyi bu 'di shin tu
387a4(brgyad stong): chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'di lta bur gang rang gi lus kyi bar du yang mi gnas par spro ba bgyid pa dka' bgyid pa ste/ ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni chos 'dod pa'i phyir bad/
387a5(brgyad stong): kyang yongs su gtong na/ bdag cag la longs spyod gang dag mang zhing rgya che ba dag yod na/ ci'i phyir bdag cag chos la mchod pa mi bgyid/ 'di lta bu'i gnas dag la
387a6(brgyad stong): ci'i phyir smon lam mi gdab/ snyam nas rigs kyi bu de la bdag gis 'di skad ces bgyis so// rigs kyi bu khyod bdag nyid la 'di lta bu'i srog 'phrog pa'i tshul gyi na
387a7(brgyad stong): tsha dag ma byed cig/ khyod don gang gis 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la bkur stir bya ba dang / bla mar bya'i nor mang po dag
387a8(brgyad stong): bdag gis pa ma la blangs te/ bdag kyang khyod dang 'grogs te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der mchi'o// bdag gyis kyang rigs
387b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu de la mchod par bgyi'o// gang khyod kyis yongs su brjod pa 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa de lta bu'i chos dag bdag gis kyang rdzogs par bgyi'o//
387b2(brgyad stong): zhes bgyis na yab yum gyis dkor gyi phung po chen po bdag la stsal ba de gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis kyang rigs kyi bu de dang lhan cig tu 'phags pa byang chub
387b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'bags la mchod par bgyi'o// /
387b4(brgyad stong): / 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa// / bam po nyi shu bzhi pa//
387b5(brgyad stong): de nas bu mo de'i pha mas bu mo de la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de'i dka' ba'i gnas dag khyod kyis bstan pa las na/ chos de dag ni cig tu nges par bsam gyis
387b6(brgyad stong): mi khyab pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa/ sems can thams cad bde ba thob par byed pa'i bar ni ngo mtshar to// rigs kyi bu gang dag de dag gi
387b7(brgyad stong): phyir de lta bu'i dka' ba'i gnas dag la spo bar byed na/ khyod nged kyis gnang gis bu mo nged kyang khyod dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags
387b8(brgyad stong): blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / mchod pa byed du 'gro yis nged 'gro ba'i skabs phye shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang chen /
388a1(brgyad stong): @chos 'phags la mchod par bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba'i brir chas te/ rang gi ba ma sa rig par byas nas/ 'di skad ces yab yum/
388a2(brgyad stong): ci skad gsungs pa de bzhin du mdzod cig dang bdag ni dge ba'i phyogs gang gi yang bar chad mi bgyid do zhes sbas nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de/ byang chub sems dpa'
388a3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la mchod pa dang / bkur stir bya ba'i phyir chas par 'gyur to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo des shing rta lnga brgya yang rgyan gyis brgyan
388a4(brgyad stong): bu mo lnga brgya de dag kyang brgyan gyis brgyan to// rgyan gyis brgyan nas/ me tog tha dad pa kha dog sna tshogs pa dag dang / gos kha dog sna tshogs thogs/ bdug pa dang /
388a5(brgyad stong): dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dag thogs/ rin po che sna tshogs rnam pa
388a6(brgyad stong): tha dad pa'i rang bzhin gyi me tog dag kyang thogs/ bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / byang ba mang po pha mas kyang thogs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
388a7(brgyad stong): rtag tu ngu dang / shing rta gcig tu zhugs te/ bu mo lnga brgya shing rta lnga brgya'i nang du zhugs pa de dag kyis yongs su bkor zhing mdun du ma bdar nas/ ba mal stsogs 'khod
388a8(brgyad stong): mang po dang / shar phyogs ga la ba der log su dong ste/ mthar kyis song ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus rgyang mo zhig nas grong khyer
388b1(brgyad stong): spos ldan/ rin po che sna bdun rnam par bkra ba lta na sdug pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin gyi ra ba rim pa bdun gyis bskor ga rta babs yod pa//
388b2(brgyad stong): 'obs rim pa bdun dang / ta la'i 'breng ba rim bdun gyis yongs su bskor ba/ chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis/ zheng du dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa 'byor cing rgyas
388b3(brgyad stong): ba/ bde ba lo legs pa/ mi dang skye bo mang pos/ gang ba bar gi tshong khang gi 'phreng ba ri mo sna tshogs su bris pa lta bur lta na sdug pa/ 'phags par gyur pa/
388b4(brgyad stong): mnyam zhing mtshungs pa/ skye bo dang / khyogs kyi bzhon pa dang rkang gis 'gro ba'i gnas 'dzer dog med par gnas pa lnga brgya dag gyis legs par bsgrubs pa/

388b6(brgyad stong): stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du byas nas chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu de 'di lta bu'i bde ba thob pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam
388b7(brgyad stong): gtan dang po rtse gcig tu yid la byed pas snyoms par zhugs pa bzhin no// de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems so// bdag shing rta'i nang du zhugs bzhin du byang chub
388b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi drung du 'gro ba ni bdag gis mi cha'o snyam nas shing rta las babs so// de nas shing rta de las babs pa dang /

389a2(brgyad stong): rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sem
389a3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba der dong ngo // yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i khang pa
389a4(brgyad stong): brtsegs pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin las byas pas/ tsan dan dbar pos brgyan pa/ mu tig gi dra bas g.yogs pa zhig byed du bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs
389a5(brgyad stong): pa de'i grwa bzhir nor bu rin po che bzhag par gyur te/ de dag smon pa'i bya ba byed do// bdug spos gi snod dngul las byas pa bzhi yang phyogs bzhir btags ste/
389a6(brgyad stong): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ a ka ru nag po 'ba' zhig gis gdug par byed do// khang pa brtsegs pa de'i dbus su/
389a7(brgyad stong): rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri bzhi btsugs te/ de'i steng du rin po che'i sgom pazhi bzhag nas/ de'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gser gi glegs bam
389a8(brgyad stong): la bai DUr+ya bzhu bas bris pa/ bcug ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa de yang dar gyi chun po sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyang bas brgyan to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
389b1(brgyad stong): sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs te/ bu mo lnga brgya dang bcas pas khang pa brtsegs pa de mchod pa'i bkod pa tshad med pas brgyan pa mthong zhing /
389b2(brgyad stong): de na lha stong phrag du ma dag kyang mthong ste/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / lha'i tsan dan gyi phye ma dang / lha'i gser gyi bye ma dang / lha'i
389b3(brgyad stong): dngul gyi phye ma dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa de la 'thor/ mngon par 'thor/ rab tu 'thor bar mthong ngo // lha'i sil snyan dag kyang thos so// mthong zhing

389b6(brgyad stong): dngul gyi phye ma dag 'thor zhing / mngon par 'thor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor/ lha'i sil snyan sna tshogs kyang lha rnams par snang la ci'i phyir rdung / de skad ces

389b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yum dang / yongs su 'dren pa yin te/ 'di la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems

392a2(brgyad stong): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di tshol zhing 'brog dgon par byin pa na/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su song shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes smra thos te/

392a7(brgyad stong): rnyed par 'gyur ba sgra de las ma dris so snyam pa dang / de nas bdag gi mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs shig byung ste/ de 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyo
392a8(brgyad stong): 'di nas dpag tshad lnga brgyar rim gyis song dang grong khyer spos ldan zhes bya ba de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
392b1(brgyad stong): / phyin pa ston cing 'chad pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs te/ de nas bdag dga' ba dang / rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ bdag dga' ba dang /
392b2(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' ba rgya chen po de nyid kyis khyad par gyur nas/ sa phyogs de nas ma bskyod par khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa thos so// de bdag gi

392b5(brgyad stong): pa las skyes pa yin te/ 'di la gnas pas nged kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas so zhes de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis

392b8(brgyad stong): gang du bzhud snyam mo// de nas yang bdag gis 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa chos 'phags ni gzungs thob pa/
393a1(brgyad stong): mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/ sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la bgyi ba bgyis pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
393a2(brgyad stong): ba dang thabs mkhas pa la shin tu bsrangs pa yin te/ de bdag la de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang nas byon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud/
393a3(brgyad stong): pa'i don 'di ji lta ba bzhin du ston par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams te/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i sgra thos pa las/ ci ltar gdams pa ltar sher
393a4(brgyad stong): phyogs ga la ba der mchis te mchis nas kyang / rgyang ring mo zhig nas bdag gis 'phags pa chos ston pa mthong ste/ mthong ma thag tu bdag la dper na bdag la dge
393a5(brgyad stong): slong bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa tshe gcig par yid la byed pa bde ba de lta bu skyes par gyur to// rigs kyi bu khyod la bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de
393a6(brgyad stong): dag gang nas byon/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud ces 'dri na/ rigs kyi bu ci nas bdag de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud par 'tshal cing /
393a7(brgyad stong): de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang / bzhud pa bdag la bshad du gsol//
393a8(brgyad stong): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ rtag tu ngu'i le'u zhes bya ste// sum bcu pa'o//
393b1(brgyad stong): de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces smra so//
393b2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dag ni gang nas kyang ma byon/ gang du yang ma bzhud cing / de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te/ de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin
393b3(brgyad stong): gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu mi skye ba la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ mi skye ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'ong
393b4(brgyad stong): ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ yang dag pa'i gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu stong pa nyid la 'ong ba'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ stong pa nyid
393b5(brgyad stong): gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu ci lta ba bzhin la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ ci lta bzhin gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
393b6(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu 'dod chags dang bral ba la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro ba med de/ 'dod chags dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'gog pa la
393b7(brgyad stong): ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa med de/ 'gog pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i khams la ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de/ namakha'i
393b8(brgyad stong): khams gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rigs kyi bu chos de dag las de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan na med de/ rigs kyi bu chos 'di dag gi de bzhin nyid
394a1(brgyad stong): @gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de bzhin cid gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa 'di dag ni de/
394a2(brgyad stong): bzhin nyid gcig ste/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid la ni gnyis su byar med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid gcig ste/ 'di lta ste/ med pa'i phyir gnyis sam
394a3(brgyad stong): gsum du bgrang ba las 'das pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bus sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la mos ka'i tsha ba nyi ma gung gi dus la bab pa'i tshe
394a4(brgyad stong): sreg rgyu g.yo ba mthong ba la 'di ltar chu btang ngo snyam nas/ de gang du chu mthong ba de dang der rgyug na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gar phyogs kyi rgya mtsho
394a5(brgyad stong): chen po 'am/ lho phyogs sa ba nub phyogs sam/ byang phyogs las chu de gang nas 'ongs/ nu de gang du song / rtag tu ngus sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu smig rgyu la chu ma/
394a6(brgyad stong): mchis na/ 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba shes pa lha ga la mchis te/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu de nyi mas gdungs shing byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes rab 'chal pa'i rang
394a7(brgyad stong): bzhin can gyis sdig rgyu ba mthong nas/ chu ma mchis pa la chur 'du shes skyes kyi/ yang de la chu ni rang bzhin gyis ma mchis so// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/
394a8(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ de bzhin du rigs kyi gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pa la gzugs sam/ slar mngon par chags pa de dag ni de bzhin
394b1(brgyad stong): / gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog go// gang de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am bzhud par rtog pa de dag thams cad ni byis pa'i rang bzhin can/ shes raH
394b2(brgyad stong): 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can/ zhes bya ste/ dper na/ skyes bu de nyid chu med pa la chur 'du shes bskyed pa bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzug
394b3(brgyad stong): kyi skur mi lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o// rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa
394b4(brgyad stong): 'am/ bzhad pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i glang po che'i tshogs sam/ rta ba'i tshogs sam/ shing rta'i tshogs sam/
394b5(brgyad stong): dpung bu chung gi tshogs la 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la bzhud pa med do// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ skyes bu gnyid
394b6(brgyad stong): kyis log pa'i rmi lam du de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gam/ gnyis sam/ gsum 'am/ bzhi 'am/ lnga 'am/ drug gam/ bdun nam/ brgyad dam/ dgu
394b7(brgyad stong): 'am/ bcu 'am/ nyi shu 'am/ sum bcu 'am/ bzhi bcu 'am/ lnga bcu 'am/ brgya'am/ de las lhag pa zhig mthong ba las sad pa dang / des de bzhin
394b8(brgyad stong): gshegs pa gcig kyang ma mthong na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gang du bzhud/ rtag tu dus smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rmi lam
395a1(brgyad stong): la chos gang yang yongs su grub par shes pa mi gda'o// rmi lam ni rdzun te yang dag pa ma yin no// chos 'phags kyis smras pa/
395a2(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu de bzhin te/ chos thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rmi lam lta bu'o zhes gsungs so// rigs kyi bu gang su dag de bzhin gshegs pas chos
395a3(brgyad stong): thams cad rmi lam lta bur yang dag pa ci lta bzhin du bstan pa mi shes pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ming gi sku dang gzugs kyi skur mngon par zhen par byed de/
395a4(brgyad stong): de ltar chos nyid mi shes pas de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa dang bzhud par rtog pa'i byis pa so//
395a5(brgyad stong): se'i skye bo de dag thams cad ni 'khor ba 'gro ba drug po 'di dag thams cad du dong ba/ 'dod ba/ 'dong bar 'gyur bar 'gyur ba'o// de dag thams cad ni shes
395a6(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las rgyang ring du gyur pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu gang dag chos
395a7(brgyad stong): thams cad rmi lam lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu'o zhes yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa shes pa de dag ni chos gang yang /
395a8(brgyad stong): 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am/ skyes pa 'am/ 'gag par mi rtog go// gang dag chos gang la yang 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba 'am skye bar 'am 'gag par mi rtog pa de
395b1(brgyad stong): / dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes so// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa chos nyid du rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la byon pa 'am
395b2(brgyad stong): bzhud pa mi rtog go// gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos nyid de lta ba rab tu shes pa de dag ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nye bar
395b3(brgyad stong): spyod pa ste/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni yul 'khor gyi bsod snyoms don yod par zab ste/
395b4(brgyad stong): de dang de dag ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas so// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i nang na/ rin po che dag yod pa ni/ shar phyogs nas kyang ma
395b5(brgyad stong): 'ongs/ lho nas ma yin/ nub nas ma yin/ byang nas ma yin/ phyogs mtshams nas ma yin/ steng dang 'og nas ma yin/ phyogs bcu nas kyang ma
395b6(brgyad stong): 'ongs mod kyi/ 'on kyang sems can dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten nas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas rin po che dag 'byung ste/ de dag kyang rgyu med par 'byung ba ma
395b7(brgyad stong): yin gyi/ rgyu dang rkyen dang gzhi la rag las pa yin te/ brten nas 'byung ngo // rin po che de dag 'gag pa yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na gang du yang mi 'pho
395b8(brgyad stong): mod kyi 'on kyang rkyen de dag yod na/ rin po che dag rab tu 'byed do// rkyen de dag med na rin po che de dag rab tu dbye ba yang med par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu de
396a1(brgyad stong): bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sku yongasu grub pa yang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang ma byon/ phyogs bcu'i 'azhi
396a2(brgyad stong): rten gang du yang ma bzhud do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sku rgyu med pa yang ma yin te/ sngon gyi spyad pas yongs su grub pa yin/ rgyu la rag las
396a3(brgyad stong): kha/ rkyen la reg las pa/ 'di lta ste/ sngon gyi 'phrin las rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin zhing / de ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang na yang
396a4(brgyad stong): yod pa ma yin no// 'on kyang rkyen rnams yod pa sku mngon par grub par 'gyur te/ rkyen de dag med na sku mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di lta
396a5(brgyad stong): ste dper na/ bi bang gi sgra byung ba yang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs 'gags pa yang gang du yang mi 'gro/ gang nus kyang mi 'pho ste/ rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las
396a6(brgyad stong): brten nas byung ba/ rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ 'di lta ste/ bi bang gi khog pa la brten pags pa la brten/ rgyud la rten/ yu ba la rten/
396a7(brgyad stong): shing bu la brten/ rgyud rten la brten/ mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba la brten nas/ 'di ltar pi bang de las spa 'byung ste/ rgyal rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las
396a8(brgyad stong): pa/ sgra de yang bi bang gi khog pa las ma byung / pags pa las ma byung / rgyud las ma byung / yu ba las ma byung / shing las ma byung / rgyud rten las ma byung /
396b1(brgyad stong): mi de las skyes pa'i rtsol ba las sgra ma byung mod kyi/ 'on kyang de dag thams cad 'dus pa las kyang slar gdags so// sgra de 'gags yang gang du yang mi 'gro'o//
396b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku yongs su grub pa yang rgyu la rag las pa/ rkyen la rag las pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyor ba du ma
396b3(brgyad stong): yongs su grub pa yin te/ rgyu gcig gi ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku rab tu dbye ba ma yin te/
396b4(brgyad stong): rgyu med pa yang ma yin no// rgyu dang rkyen mang po 'tshegs pa las byung ba yin te/ rgyu gcig gis ma yin/ rkyen gcig gis ma yin gang du yang mi bzhud de/
396b5(brgyad stong): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag byon pa dang bzhud pa de ltar blta'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad kyi chos nyid kyang khyod kyis 'di bzhin du khong
396b6(brgyad stong): du chud par gyis shig/ rigs kyi bu khyod gang tshun chad de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dang chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med par shes pa de tshun chad
396b7(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la nges par spyod par 'gyur ro//
396b8(brgyad stong): yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ sa g.yo ba chen po byung ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
397a1(brgyad stong): thams cad ltas chen po bco brgyad dang / rnam pa drug tu g.yos pa 'di lta ste/ 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ g.yos//
397a2(brgyad stong): rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs/ chem chem/

397a4(brgyad stong): gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ rtsa dang shing gel ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal ci snyed yod pa de dag thams cad byung
397a5(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ga la ba de logs su 'dud par gyur to// dus ma yin pa'i me tog dag kyang steng gi bar snang las 'thor
397a6(brgyad stong): zhing me tog gi char chen po dag kyang bab bo// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
397a7(brgyad stong): chos 'phags dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dag gi phyogs su lha'i tsan dan gyi bye ma dang / lha'i me tog gis 'bor mngon par
397a8(brgyad stong): 'khor/ mngon par rab tu 'thor zhing / tshig 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi mthus deng bdag cag gis kyang /
397b1(brgyad stong): sems can gang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i sa la gnas pa/ lta ba dang bcas pa thams cad la mngon par zhen pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang mi 'thun pa/ don dam//

397b3(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po rtag tu dus 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sa chen po g.yos pa 'jig rten du byung ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ byang chub
397b4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mi byon mi bzhud pa bstan pa 'di khyod kyis dris te bdag/
397b5(brgyad stong): gis bstan pas srog chags stong phrag brgyad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa dang / srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgya bcu bla na med pa yang dag par
397b6(brgyad stong): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes pa dang / srog chags drug khri bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag par gyur to//
397b7(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu dga' ba dang rangs pa/ mchog tu rgya chen po dang ldan par gyur te/ gang bdag gis shes rab kyi pha
397b8(brgyad stong): rol tu phyin pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byon pa dang bzhud pa med pa'i bstan pa 'di dris pas/ sems can 'di snyed cig gi don byas par gyur pa ni//
398a1(brgyad stong): bdag gis rnyed pa mchog tu legs par rnyed do// 'di nyid kyis bdag blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su 'grub papa
398a2(brgyad stong): za ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog thob par gyur pas/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la sar yang be com mi 'jug go ka bdag ni be tsom med par de
398a3(brgyad stong): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro// sum pa dang / de dga' ba dang / rangs pa de dang ldan pas ta la bdun tsam du/
398a4(brgyad stong): nam mkha' la 'phags nas/ tas bdu ca du 'dug ste/ 'di ltar bdag dang pa'a' la 'dug nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'ang/
398a5(brgyad stong): kha bkur stir bya'o// snyam du sems so// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du mngon par 'phags pa/
398a6(brgyad stong): mthong ste/ de'i sems sems kyis shes nas/ de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dag byin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ lha'i me tog 'di /

398b1(brgyad stong): ci ltar khyod spo bar byed pa de ltar/ skal ba gzhal du med pa/ grangs med par sngo bar byed cing / khur chen po khyer bar byed pa'i sems can de dag ni rnyed par dag//

398b3(brgyad stong): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor/ mngon par gtor mngon par rab tu gtor nas/ bdag gi lus kyis byang

398b6(brgyad stong): kyi mdun du thal mo sbyar te 'dug go// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo de dang / bu mo lnga brgya de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu la 'di skad
398b7(brgyad stong): ces/ rigs kyi bu bdag cag kyang khyod la lus 'bul gyis/ bdag cag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis/ chos de dag thob par gyur cig/ khyod nyid dang lhan cig
398b8(brgyad stong): du yang dang yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la bkur stir bgyi/ bla mar bgyi/ de dag dang nye
399a1(brgyad stong): bar gyur par bgyi'o// zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo lha srog
399a2(brgyad stong): bu mo lnga brgya la 'di skad ces sbas so// bu mo dag gal te khyed ngal lhag pa'i bsam pas gnas par byed na/ ngal lhag pa'i bsam pas bdag nyid byin cig dang /
399a3(brgyad stong): de ltar na ngas bu mo khyed ngas blang ngo // bu mo de dag gis smras pa/ khyod la lhag pa'i bsam pa thag pa nas khyod kyi rjes su mthun par 'jug go// khyod
399a4(brgyad stong): lhag pa'i bsam pas/ ci 'dod par bya bar bdag nyid dbul lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus tshong dpon gyi bu la stsogs bu mo lnga brgya de dag
399a5(brgyad stong): rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan ste/ shing rta lnga brgya yang brgyan nas/ thams cad byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la/ rim gro dang / zham 'bring
399a6(brgyad stong): bya ba'i byer bul te/ rigs kyi bu bdag ni g.yog mo 'di dag 'bul shing rta lnga brgya 'di dag kyang yongs su longs spyang ba'i phyir khyod la 'bul lo// de nas lha rnams
399a7(brgyad stong): kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis rigs kyi bu de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag
399a8(brgyad stong): gis 'byor pa thams cad yongs su gang bar bya'o// yongs su gtong ba'i sems de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
399b1(brgyad stong): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de ltar na chos smra ba dag la mchod pa byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa nyan nus
399b2(brgyad stong): pa rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod na/ 'di lta bu'i
399b3(brgyad stong): tshul dang / 'di lta bu'i gtong ba la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
399b4(brgyad stong): thabs mkhas pa yongs su dris so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa/ bu mo lnga brgya po de dag
399b5(brgyad stong): dang / shing rta lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bskang ba'i phyir blangs te/ blangs nas rigs kyi bu
399b6(brgyad stong): rtag tu ngu slar byin to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags stan las langs te/ bdag gi khyim du zhugs pa dang nyi ma nub par gyur to//
399b7(brgyad stong): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di ltar bdag chos 'dod pa'i phyir 'ongs la 'dug pa 'am/ nyal bar byed pa ni bdag gi mi cha la/ 'di ni//
399b8(brgyad stong): ma legs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags bdag bzung ba'i phyir 'di lta ste/ chos ston du phyir ma byung gi bar du/ bdag 'greng ba 'am/
400a1(brgyad stong): bya 'chag pa'i spyod las gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
400a2(brgyad stong): 'phags lo bdun gyi bar du ting nge 'dzin gcig la snyoms par zhugs par gyur cing / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin stong phrag gzhal du med grangs med pa/
400a3(brgyad stong): dag dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs mkhas pa las byung ba la gnas par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
400a4(brgyad stong): yang / lo 'dun gyi bar du gnyid dang rmugs pa med par spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de/ lo bdun gyi bar du 'dod pa'i rtog pa ma byung / gnod
400a5(brgyad stong): sems kyi rtog pa ma byung / rnam par 'tshe ba'i rtog pa ma byung / rol rnam pa ma yin sems kyi rnam par rtog pa byung ste/ gzhan du na byang chub sems
400a6(brgyad stong): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin las nam ldang bar 'gyur/ bdag cag gis kyang khri gang la rigs kyi bu de 'dug nas chos ston par
400a7(brgyad stong): 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi khri bshams nas/ bdag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag ma btab kyis/ sa phyog/
400a8(brgyad stong): gang du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs mkhas pa rab tu ston par 'gyur ba der legs par byug
400b1(brgyad stong): par bya me tog sna tshogs mngon par dgram mo// tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya po de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rtag tu/
400b2(brgyad stong): du'i rjes su slob cing / spyod lam gnyis kyis dus 'da' bar byed de bya ba thams cad kyang de'i rjes su 'jug go// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
400b3(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra dag las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags da ste zhag bdun ting nge 'dzin 'di las ldang ste langs nas grong khyer gyi
400b4(brgyad stong): dbus su 'dug ste chos ston par 'gyur ro zhes thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus lha'i sgra de thos pa dang dga' mgu yi rang
400b5(brgyad stong): rab tu dga' mgu zhing bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgya dang lhan cig tu sa phyogs de phyags nas chos kyi khri rin po che sna bdun
400b6(brgyad stong): gyi rang bzhin bshams so// de nas bu mo de dag gis rang rang gi bla gos lnga brgya po de dag stan gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags 'dug
400b7(brgyad stong): nas chos ston par 'gyur ba der bting ngo // de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan bshams pa la bu mo de dag thams na
400b8(brgyad stong): dga' mgu yi rangs rab tu dga' zhing mgu ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus phyogs der chag
401a1(brgyad stong): chag gdab par 'dod na ci nas kyang bdud sdig can gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu de chu ma rnyed nas sems mi
401a2(brgyad stong): dga' zhing sdug bsngal te/ yeng mi bde bar gyur cing sems gzhan du 'gyur ba dang gang gis de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nub par 'gyur ba dang mchod pa de yang mi mdzes
401a3(brgyad stong): bar bya ba'i phyir gang gis sa phyogs der chag chag 'debs pa'i chu de dag thams cad kyang mi snang ba nyid du byas pas kun tu btsal na chu ma rnyed do// de nas byang chub
401a4(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du ma la bdag gi lus bug la khrag gis sa phyogs 'di chag chag gdab bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa phyogs/
401a5(brgyad stong): 'di nas rdul gyi khams byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi lus la phog na mi rung gis bdag gis lus gdon mi za bar 'jig
401a6(brgyad stong): pa'i chos can 'dis ci zhig bya/ bdag gi lus 'di lta bu'i bya ba la zhig pa ni sra'i nus pa med pa'i bya ba la 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis yang dang yang du 'gro/
401a7(brgyad stong): bar 'khor zhing / bdag gi lus stong phrag mang po de lta bu'i gnas su zhig pa ni 'di lta bu'i gnas sam chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ni ma yin te/ 'dod pa de lta
401a8(brgyad stong): bu'i chos can la zhig pa yin no snyam du bsams so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ de ltar bsams nas/ mtshon rnon po
401b1(brgyad stong): blangs te/ bdag gi lus kun tu phug nas/ rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de thams cad du chag chag btab bo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu
401b2(brgyad stong): rjes su slob pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu mo la stsogs pa bu mo lnga brgya de dag thams cad kyang mtshon rnon po blangs te/ rang rang gi lus phug nas rang rang gi khrag gis sa phyogs de
401b3(brgyad stong): thams cad du chag chag btab ste/ de dag la bdud sdig can des/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bar chad bya ba'i glags gang du rnyed par 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
401b4(brgyad stong): po rtag tu ngu dang / bu mo de dag thams cad sems gzhan du gyur pa med do// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
401b5(brgyad stong): chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du chos 'dod pa dang / ci tsam du yid brtan pa dang / ci tsam du go cha chen po bgos pa dang / lus dang / srog dang / longs spyod rnams la mi lta ba dang /
401b6(brgyad stong): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
401b7(brgyad stong): nas/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal yongs su dpag tu med pa las sems can thams cad bar bar bya'o// snyam du lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa ni ngo mtshar to// snyam mo//
401b8(brgyad stong): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ khrag de dag thams cad lha'i tsan dan gyi chur byin gyis brlabs te/ lha'i tsan dan gyi chur dri dam pa rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang
402a1(brgyad stong): #ldan pa de'i dris sa phyogs de kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad lnga brgya tshar bar yongs su khyab bo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub
402a2(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dul 'di skad ces rigs kyi bu legs so// legs so// khyod kyis brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab pa legs so// khyod kyi
402a3(brgyad stong): chos 'dod pa dang / chos yongs su tsho ba yang legs te/ rigs kyi bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis
402a4(brgyad stong): kyang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'di lta bu dang / brtson 'grus 'di lta bu dang / chos 'dod pa 'di lta bus/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par
402a5(brgyad stong): bsgrubs so// zhes smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngu 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
402a6(brgyad stong): dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyi chos kyi stan ni bting / sa phyogs 'di phyag dang ni legs par byas/ chag chag ni legs par btab na/ bdag gis me tog gang
402a7(brgyad stong): ngag gis sa phyogs 'dir gtor bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags chos 'chad cing chos ston cing 'dug pa la gtor bar bya ba'i
402a8(brgyad stong): me tog de dag gang nas rnyed par 'gyur snyam mo// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu ngul 'di skad ces rigs
402b1(brgyad stong): kyi bu lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba 'di dag long la/ khyod kyis sa phyogs 'di dag tu me tog man d+ha ra ba bkram par gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
402b2(brgyad stong): chos 'phags chos ston cing / chos kyi khri la 'dug pa la yang gtor cig ces smras nas/ des de la lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba kha la stong byin no// de nas byang chub
402b3(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus me tog de dag blangs te/ me tog kha cig gis ni sa phyogs der me tog bkram par byas so// me tog kha cig gyis ni
402b4(brgyad stong): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la gtor to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags lo bdun 'das pa dang /
402b5(brgyad stong): ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ chos kyi stan gang na yod pa der 'ongs nas/ stan bting ba la 'dug 'khor brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
402b6(brgyad stong): nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'jags
402b7(brgyad stong): mthong ma thag tu 'di lta ste/ dper na bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong rtse gcig pa yid la byed pa bzhin du bde ba de lta bu thob bo// de la byang/
402b8(brgyad stong): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa ni 'di yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab
403a1(brgyad stong): @kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad dben pa gnyis pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa nyid do// chos thams/
403a2(brgyad stong): cad g.yo ba med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rlob pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom pa med
403a3(brgyad stong): bzhed do// chos thams cad khengs pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khengs pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid pas/ shes
403a4(brgyad stong): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig pa nyid do// chos thams cad bu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// chos thams cad skye ba med pa nyid
403a5(brgyad stong): bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skye ba med pa nyid do// chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gag pa med pa nyid do// nam
403a6(brgyad stong): mkha' mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rgya mtsho mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// ri rab sku
403a7(brgyad stong): tshogs pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs pa nyid do// nam mkha' rtog pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtog pa med pa nyid de/
403a8(brgyad stong): gzugs mu med pa nyid do// gzugs mu med pa nyid bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnam
403b1(brgyad stong): rnam par shes pa mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// sa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// /
403b2(brgyad stong): de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// na mkha'i khams mu med
403b3(brgyad stong): pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do// rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid do//
403b4(brgyad stong): rdo rje lta bu'i chos mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// chos thams cad ma 'dres pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma 'dres pa
403b5(brgyad stong): nyid do// chos thams cad dmigs su med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa nyid do// chos thams cad rnam par 'jig pa mnyam pa
403b6(brgyad stong): nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'jig pa nyid do// chos thams cad byed pa med pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med pa nyid do//
403b7(brgyad stong): chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya ba yin no// de nas byang chub
403b8(brgyad stong): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu du de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ de'i tshe chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po skyes par gyur to// chos tham
404a1(brgyad stong): cad dben pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
404a2(brgyad stong): chos thams cad rlom pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad khengs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad ro gcig pa
404a3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
404a4(brgyad stong): chos thams cad 'gag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam mkha' bu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyamatsho bu med pa zhes bya ba mi ting /
404a5(brgyad stong): 'dzin dang / ri rab sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / na mkha' rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzugs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
404a6(brgyad stong): dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sa'i khams su med
404a7(brgyad stong): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin du chu'i khams dang / nga me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / namakha'i
404a8(brgyad stong): khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin dang /
404b1(brgyad stong): chos thams cad ma 'dres pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad dmigs su med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad rnam par
404b2(brgyad stong): 'jig pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa
404b3(brgyad stong): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus de lta bu la stsogs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgya phrag drug cu rab tu
404b4(brgyad stong): thob par gyur to// // 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ chos 'phags kyi le'u zhes bya ste/
404b5(brgyad stong): sumacu gcig pa'o// // rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dus/ ting nge
404b6(brgyad stong): 'dzin gyi sgo brgya stong phrag drug cu thob ma thag tu/ shar phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / mtshams dang /
404b7(brgyad stong): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/
404b8(brgyad stong): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi
405a1(brgyad stong): mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di lta bu nyid dang/ thaMng 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di 'chadas
405a2(brgyad stong): mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na/ da ltarang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ni/ chos ston pa/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
405a3(brgyad stong): yongs su bskor cing / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun du byas te/ tshul 'di nyid dang / ming 'di nyid dang / yi ge 'di nyid kyis/
405a4(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'chang ba 'chang ba de bang du thos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / bos pa rgya mtsho dang ldan par gyur te/ skyes pa thams cad du
405a5(brgyad stong): yang / rnam yang sangs rgyas dang bral bar ma gyur to// skye ba thams cad du yang / gang dang gang du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon gsum du 'gyur ba
405a6(brgyad stong): de dang de dag tu skyes te/ tha na mi lam na yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag dang mi bral bar 'gyur ro// de mi khom pa thams cad ni spangs/ ngal ba phun sum
405a7(brgyad stong): tshogs pa ni bsgrubs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dgar po la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rnam grangs 'dis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
405a8(brgyad stong): byin pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrub pa yin par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de lta
405b1(brgyad stong): bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'dod pa dag gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad par/
405b2(brgyad stong): bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di mnyen par bya/ gzung bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ rab tu gdon par bya/ bstan
405b3(brgyad stong): bar bya/ nye bar bstan par bya/ lung dbog par bya/ kha ton du bya/ bri bar bya/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis glegs bam chen po la yi
405b4(brgyad stong): ge gsal ba legs par bris te/ me tog dang / gdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
405b5(brgyad stong): rgyal mtshan dang / dril bu dang / ba dan dang / khor yug du mar me'i 'phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang pos bkur stir bya/
405b6(brgyad stong): bla mar bya/ rjed par bya/ mchod par bya/ ri mor bya/ bsnyen bkur bya ste/ kun dga' bo 'di ni nga'i rjes su bstan pa'o// de ci'i
405b7(brgyad stong): phyir zhe na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo 'di ci snyam du
405b8(brgyad stong): sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyi ston pa yin nam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ston pa lags so/
406a1(brgyad stong): bde bar gshegs pa bdag gi smon pa lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
406a2(brgyad stong): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo khyod kyi ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa la/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis/ lus/
406a3(brgyad stong): kyi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang // ngag gi las byams pa yid du 'ong ba dang / yid kyilas byams pa yid du 'ong bas/ rim gror byas te/ de lta bas na/
406a4(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo da ltar nga bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing bzhes pa'i sku 'di la/ ci ltar khyod kyis dga' ba dang / dad pa dang ri mor byas pa/
406a5(brgyad stong): kun dga' bo de ltar nga 'das nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la yang byos shig/ kun dga' bo ci nas/ shes rab
406a6(brgyad stong): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba dang / ci nas khyod skyes bu tha mar mi 'gyur b.rakun dga' bo khyod la
406a7(brgyad stong): lan gnyis lan gsum du yongs su btad do// rjes su yongs su gtad do// kun dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'jig rten
406a8(brgyad stong): na ci srid du rab tu spyod pa de srid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo de srid du de bzhin gshegs pa
406b1(brgyad stong): chos ston par rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
406b2(brgyad stong): kun chub par byed pa dang / rab tu 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / nye bar ston pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang /
406b3(brgyad stong): yi ger 'dri ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang /
406b4(brgyad stong): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag dang / khor yug tu mar me'i phreng ba dang / mchod pa rnam pa mang po dag gis bkur stir byed/
406b5(brgyad stong): bla mar byed/ brjed par byed/ ri mor byed/ bsnyen bkur byed pa'i sems can de dag ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / dam pa'i chos
406b6(brgyad stong): nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la rim zor byed pa dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// kun dga' bo sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du
406b7(brgyad stong): spyod par rig par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dges shing de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa
406b8(brgyad stong): la stsogs pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po
407a1(brgyad stong): @#/ brgya byin dang / lha dang / mi dang / lnga ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i
407a2(brgyad stong): 'jig rten yid rangs ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ 'phags pa
407a3(brgyad stong): shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa las/ yongs su btad pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ sum ba
407a4(brgyad stong): rtsa gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa brgyad stong pa rdzogs s+ho//
407a5(brgyad stong): rnamos ste/ slad kyis rgya gar gyi labar po 'bum phrag gsum pa dang / zhu chen gyi la hU~M ba sha kya'i rin srong blo ldan shes rab kyis/ 'grel
407a6(brgyad stong): dang gyu sa 'gyur cing ba/ gam @@\u0f7f/
